Bana nii ɓe njahdi ɓe ɗiɗo fuu haa ɓe njotti Baytilaama. Nde ɓe nasti Baytilaama, berniwol fuu hayɗini, nden rewɓe ƴami: “Ɗum Na'omi na?”
Na'omi wi'i ɓe: “Taa mbi'eeɗam Na'omi
Mi wurtino ɗo bee mardi ɗuuɗndi, ammaa Jawmiraawo wartiri yam juŋngo meere. Koni mbi'oton yam ceyiiɗo? Jawmiraawo tikkani yam, Allah Baawɗo ukkani yam sarru.”
Bana nii Na'omi wardi bee Ruut, esum Mo'abiijo diga lesdi Mo'ab. Ɓe njotti Baytilaama saa'i yimɓe puɗɗi wa'go sa'iiruuri.
Woodi banndiraawo Elimelek gorko Na'omi, o marɗo baawɗe, diskuɗo, innde maako Bo'es.
Nyannde feere Ruut Mo'abiijo wi'i Na'omi: “Accu mi yaha ngesa, mi suɓta caamndi ɓaawo wa'ooɓe to ɓe ngerdi ɗum.” Na'omi jaabi mo: “Booɗɗum, yah, ɓiŋngel am
Ruut yehi wapi ngesa Bo'es, banndiraawo Elimelek, suɓti caamndi ton ɓaawo wa'ooɓe.
Nden Bo'es wurti Baytilaama, wari haa ngesa ka'a, hoofni wa'ooɓe mum, wi'i: “Jawmiraawo wonda bee mooɗon.” Ɓe njaabi: “Jawmiraawo barkiɗine.”
Bo'es ƴami ardiiɗo wa'ooɓe: “Moy jeyi paanyo debbo oo?”
Ardiiɗo go jaabi: “O Mo'abiijo garduɗo bee Na'omi diga lesdi Mo'ab.
O tori yam duŋayeere tokkaago wa'ooɓe haa o suɓta caamndi caka baagaaje. O ɗon diga fajiri e haa jonta o ɗon huuwa. O siwti seɗɗa tan nder suudu.”
Nden Bo'es wi'i Ruut: “Nanam, ɓiŋngel am. Taa yah suɓtugo haa ngesa feere. Taa dillu, ammaa wondu bee horɓe am,
laar haa pellel ngel ɓe kuuwata, nden tokka ɓe. Mi umri sukaaɓe am, taa ɓe ɓille. To a ɗomɗi, yar haa bulki ɗi ɓe kebbini ndiyam.”
Ruut tuggi koppi, sujidi yeeso maako, wi'i mo: “Ngam ɗume keɓmi mo'ere haa maaɗa? Ngam ɗume a suklanto goɗɗo jananno bana am?”
Bo'es jaabi mo: “Mi nani booɗɗum ko mbaɗanɗa esiraawo ma ɓaawo maayde gorko ma fuu. A acci baaba ma e daada ma e lesdi danyeeki ma, a wari haa yimɓe ɓe a meeɗaay anndugo.
Jawmiraawo warjo ma mbooɗeeŋga man. Mbarjaari ma heewa haa Jawmiraawo, Allah Isra'iila, haa ngarɗa ɗaɓɓititgo hisrude.”
Ruut jaabi: “Accu mi heɓa mo'ere haa maaɗa, jaagorɗo am ngam a de'itini yam, a seyni yam, koo nde mi wonaay gooto caka horɓe ma boo.”
Nde wakkati nyaamugo waɗi, Bo'es wi'i Ruut: “Ɓadita, nyaam tamseere, tallu loŋngere ma nder haako boo.” Ruut jooɗi kommbi wa'ooɓe. Bo'es hokki mo gabbe ca'aaɗe
Nden o ummi ngam suɓtugo caamndi fahin. Bo'es umri sukaaɓe mum: “Acce mo o suɓta caka baagaaje boo, taa cemtine mo.
Coltinane mo boo cammeeje haa o suɓta ɗe, taa pele mo.”
Ruut suɓti haa ngesa man haa kiikiiɗe waɗi. Nden o fiyi ko o suɓti, ɗum waɗi baakin sa'iiruuri muudooje jowi.
O roondi ɗum, o lorti nder berniwol, o holli ɗum esiiko. O hokki mo luttaandi maako go.
Na'omi ƴami mo: “Toy cuɓtuɗaa hannde? Haa ngesa moy kuuwɗaa? Allah barkiɗin cuklaniiɗo ma.” Ruut anndini esum, wi'i: “Gorko mo kuuwmi haa ngesa mum hannde, innde mum Bo'es.”
Na'omi wi'i esum: “Allah barkiɗin mo. Jawmiraawo accaay waɗango yeeɗɓe e maayɓe mbooɗeeŋga.” Nden o tokki wi'ugo: “Gorko oo, o banndiraawo men, o gooto nder soottooɓe en
Ruut wi'i esum: “O yecci yam boo mi wonda bee yimɓe maako haa to ɓe timmini codol maako fuu.”
Na'omi wi'i Ruut: “Nonnon, ɓiŋngel am, ndikka a huuwda bee horɓe haa ngesa Bo'es. Ngam to a yehi haa ngesa feere, teema ɓe toskete.”
Bana nii Ruut huuwdi bee maɓɓe, suɓti caamndi haa ɓe timmini wa'go sa'iiruuri e alkamaari fuu. O tokki jooɗodaago bee esiiko.
Nyannde feere Na'omi wi'i Ruut: “Ɓiŋngel am, sey mi heɓane gorko, haa keɓa saare, njooɗoɗa jam.
Siftor Bo'es mo ngondunooɗa bee horɓe mum, o banndiraawo men. Jemmaare nde'e o fiyan sa'iiruuri maako haa laarre
Yiiwa, wuja nebbam uurɗam, ɓornu limce ma, yah haa laarre man. Ammaa taa waŋginan mo hoore ma haa to o timmini nyaamugo e yarugo.
Heɓtu nokkuure haa o waaloto. To o ɗaanake, yah, ɓaŋtu suddaare maako, waala haa kosɗe maako. Kaŋko o yeccete ko mbaɗata.”
Ruut jaabi: “Iyyo! Mi waɗan ko mbi'ɗa fuu.”
Ruut yehi haa laarre, o waɗi ko esiiko umri mo fuu.
Nde Bo'es timmini nyaamugo e yarugo, ɓernde maako boo seyi, o yehi haa sera waagaare, o waali ton. Nden Ruut wari bee sirri, ɓaŋgti suddaare maako, waali haa kosɗe maako.
Caka jemma Bo'es diwtori, o wayliti, o yi'i, ndaa debbo ɗon waali haa kosɗe maako!
Bo'es ƴami mo: “Ɗum moy?” O jaabi: “Min, Ruut, korɗo ma. Te'am, ngam an woni coottoowo yam.”
Bo'es jaabi: “Jawmiraawo barkiɗine, ɓiŋngel am! A waɗi booɗɗum, amaana ka ɓuri ka naane, ngam a ɗaɓɓitaay suka'en riskuɓe koo laafuɓe boo.
Taa sakla jonta, ɓiŋngel am, ko ƴamɗa yam fuu, mi waɗante ɗum. Koo moy nder berniwol anndi a debbo marɗo saman.
A wi'i gooŋga, mi coottoowo ma. Ammaa woodi coottoowo feere ɓurɗo yam ɓadaago on
Waala ɗo, fajiri en ngi'an ko o waɗata. To o jaɓi soottugo ma, ɗum booɗɗum. To o jaɓaay, nden kam min mi soottete, fakat bana Jawmiraawo o geeto. Kadi ɗaana jonta haa to weeti.”
Ruut waali haa kosɗe Bo'es haa subaha. Hiddeko koo moy anndita goɗɗo, o ummi ngam Bo'es wi'no: “Taa yimɓe anndita debbo oo wari haa laarre.”
Nde Ruut yiɗi dillugo, Bo'es wi'i mo: “Fiistu mojaare ma, joga nde booɗɗum.” Ruut jogi nde, Bo'es etani mo muudooje sa'iiruuri joweego, o walli mo roondaago ndi. Nden Ruut lorti haa berniwol,
warti haa esum. Na'omi ƴami mo: “Ɗum an boo, ɓiŋngel am?” Ruut yecci mo ko Bo'es waɗani mo fuu.
O wi'i: “O hokki yam sa'iiruuri muudooje joweego ɗe'e, ngam o wi'i: A hootataa haa esiraawo ma juŋngo meere.”
Na'omi wi'i mo: “Munyu, ɓiŋngel am, haa to a annditi no haala ka timmirta. Gorko oo siwtataako hannde, sonaa to o laɓɓini ka fuu.”
Bo'es yehi haa dammugal berniwol, o jooɗi ton. Nden coottoowo mo Bo'es wolwuno dow muuɗum go, ɗon saalo ton. Bo'es ewni mo: “Wayne, war gaa'e, jooɗa ɗo.” O seli, o jooɗi.
Nden Bo'es ewni worɓe sappo nder ndotti'en berniwol, wi'i ɓe: “Njooɗe ɗo.” Kamɓe boo ɓe njooɗi,
o wi'i coottoowo go: “A anndi Na'omi warti diga lesdi Mo'ab. O yiɗi soorrugo ngesa ka Elimelek, banndiraawo men marno.

Min, mi numi faamtingo ma haala ka, mi wi'e: Soodu ngesa ka yeeso ndotti'en ummaatoore am e jooɗiiɓe haa ɗo fuu. Yeccam to a yiɗi soottugo ka malla a yiɗaa. Enen ɗiɗo tan mari baawɗe soottugo ka, walaa goɗɗo feere, an woni arano, min boo mi ɗiɗaɓo.” Nden o jaabi: “Mi soottan ka.”
Bo'es wi'i mo: “Saa'i a soodata ngesa ka diga Na'omi, a sootta boo Ruut, Mo'abiijo, debbo jurumɗo, o laatoto debbo ma haa innde maayɗo tabita dow maral mum.”
O jaabi: “To non kam, mi waawataa soottugo ka, ngam taa mi waɗa asar dow maral am. Mi hokkiti ma baawɗe coottuki man. An, soottu ka, min kam mi waawataa.”

Nden coottoowo go wi'i Bo'es: “Soottu ka ngam maaɗa.” Nden o faɗɗiti faɗo maako, o hokki ngo Bo'es. Ɓooyma haa Isra'iila, goɗɗo ɗon faɗɗito faɗo mum, hokka ngo oya ngam tabitingo haalaaji seedamku coottuki malla cannjuki maral fuu
Nden Bo'es wi'i ndotti'en e yimɓe wonɓe ton fuu: “Onon on seedooɓe hannde. Mi sootti maral Elimelek e Kiliyon e Mahalon fuu diga Na'omi.

Non boo Ruut Mo'abiijo, debbo Mahalon, mi sootti mo haa o laato debbo am, ngam tabitingo innde maayɗo dow maral mum, ngam taa nde wile caka banndiraaɓe maako e nder dawriinde berniwol maako. Onon hannde on seedooɓe

Ndotti'en e yimɓe wonɓe ton fuu mbi'i: “Nonnon, min seedooɓe. Jawmiraawo wartira debbo garanɗo nder saare ma bana Rahiilu e Leya laatiiɓe kaakiraaɓe Isra'iila'en fuu. An boo laata baawɗo haa Efrata, innde ma tedda nder Baytilaama
Ngam daliila danygol ngol Jawmiraawo hokkete bee Ruut, derkeejo oo, saare ma laato teddunde bana saare Peres mo Tamar danyani Yahuuda
Bana nii Bo'es te'ri bee Ruut. Bo'es hawti bee debbo mum. Jawmiraawo mo'ani mo o reedi, o danyi ɓiɗɗo gorko.
Rewɓe mbi'i Na'omi: “Yettoore laatano Jawmiraawo! O hokki ma hannde coottoowo. Innde taaniraawo oo laato teddunde nder Isra'iila.
O de'itinte. To a naywi, o wuurnete ngam o ɓii esiraawo ma giɗɗo ma. Ngam ma, esiraawo oo ɓuri ɓiɓɓe worɓe njoweeɗiɗo.”
Na'omi hoo'i ngel, suklani ngel, mawnini ngel.
Heeddiɗɗiraaɓe maako mbi'i: Na'omi heɓi ɓiŋngel, ɓe inndi ngel: Obet. Kaŋko woni baaba Yessa laatiiɗo baaba Daawuda.
Ndaa danygol Peres: Peres danyi Hesruunu,
Hesruunu danyi Ram, Ram danyi Amminadabu,
Amminadabu danyi Nahasunu, Nahasunu danyi Salmuuna,
Salmuuna danyi Bo'es, Bo'es danyi Obet,
Obet danyi Yessa, Yessa danyi Daawuda.
Ɓooyma woodi goɗɗo haa Ramatayim-Cofim nder kooseeje Efrayim. Innde maako Elkaana ɓii Yeroham ɓii Elihu ɓii Toku ɓii Cuuf, nder lenyol Efrayim.
Elkaana woodi rewɓe ɗiɗo. Innde oo Hanna, innde oya boo Peninna. Peninna woodi ɓikkoy, ammaa Hanna woodaa ɓikkoy.
Hitaande fuu Elkaana ɗon yaha bee saare mum haa Silo ngam sujidango Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama e lii'ango mo kirseteeŋga. Zamanu man Hofni e Pinehas, ɓiɓɓe Eeli ngonno liman'en Jawmiraawo ton.
Nde ɓe kawti ngam nyaamugo kusel ndabbaawa kirsaaŋga fuu, Elkaana ɗon hokka Peninna, debbo mum e ɓiɓɓe mum worɓe e rewɓe fuu geɗal gootal.
Ammaa Hanna, o ɗon hokka mo geɗe ɗiɗi, ngam o yiɗi mo masin, koo nde Jawmiraawo laatini mo dimaro.
Nawliiko ɓilli mo tum ngam mettingo mo ngam o dimaro.
Bana nii ɗum laatori hitaande fuu to Hanna yehi haa suudu Jawmiraawo. Peninna mettini mo haa o woyi, o sali nyaamugo.
Goriiko ƴami mo: “Ko waɗi a ɗon woya, a nyaamataa? Ko sakli ma? Mi ɓurantaa ma ɓiɓɓe worɓe sappo na?”
Ɓaawo ɓe nyaami e ɓe njari haa Silo, Hanna ummi. Eeli, limanjo ɗon jooɗi dow koromwal mum baŋnge nastirde suudu Jawmiraawo.
Ɓernde Hanna metti masin, o tori Jawmiraawo bee bojji ɗuuɗɗi.
O togi
Hanna neeɓi toraago Jawmiraawo, Eeli boo ɗon laara mo.
O yi'i hunnduko Hanna ɗon dimmbo, ammaa o nanaay sawtu ngam Hanna ɗon wolwa nder ɓernde mum. Ngam maajum Eeli tammi o ɗon wuyki.
O feli mo, o wi'i: “Haa jonta a ɗon nder wuykere ma? Ittu wuykere ma.”
Hanna jaabi mo: “Aa'a, barkaama, mi yaraay inaboojam malla nguykinoojam sam, ammaa mi debbo cuniiɗo. Mi rufi ko woni haa ɓernde am fuu yeeso Jawmiraawo.
Taa nanndinam bee rewɓe meere'en. Ɓernde am naawi masin, suno e mettamɓeram ɗuuɗani yam. Ngam maajum ɗuɗɗinmi bolle.”
Eeli wi'i mo: “Yah jam. Allah Isra'iila jaɓa tornde nde toriiɗa mo.”
Hanna jaabi: “Useni mo'an korɗo ma foroy.” Nden o dilli, o nyaami, ɓanndu maako ferti.
Jaŋngo maajum Elkaana e yimɓe saare mum ndawi cub haa ɓe cujidana Jawmiraawo. Nde ɓe ngarti, ɓe njehi haa Rama. Elkaana hawti bee debbo mum, Jawmiraawo jaɓi tornde Hanna.
Hanna reedi, danyi ɓiɗɗo gorko. O wi'i: “Mi tori mo haa Jawmiraawo.” Ngam maajum o inndi mo Samuyila.
Mawri maajum Elkaana yehi fahin haa Silo, kaŋko e yimɓe saare maako fuu, ngam haa o lii'ano Jawmiraawo kirseteeŋga hitaande man e kirseteeŋga feere nga o togi ɗum.
Hanna yahdaay bee maɓɓe, o wi'i goriiko: “To mi enti ɓiŋngel, saa'i man mi yahran ngel haa suudu Jawmiraawo, ngel jooɗo ton haa foroy.”
Elkaana jaabi mo: “Waɗ ko fottani ma, jooɗa haa saare haa to a enti ngel. Jawmiraawo boo tabitin wolde mum nde o wi'no dow maagel.” Bana nii Hanna jooɗi haa saare, hakkilani ɓiyum Samuyila.
Ɓaawo Hanna enti mo, o yahri mo haa suudu Jawmiraawo haa Silo. O yahri boo ngaari ndi duuɓi tati e kuroori buhuure e kanyakanyaawu
Nde saaro'en maako kirsi ngaari, ɓe ngaddi ɓiŋngel haa Eeli.
Hanna wi'i: “Barkaama, a ɗon siftora na? Min woni debbo darinooɗo haa ɗo ngam toraago Jawmiraawo.
Ndaa ɓiŋngel ngel toriimi haa maako, Jawmiraawo hokki yam ko mi ƴamno mo.
Min boo mi hebbinan
Hanna waɗi do'a, wi'i:
“Ɓernde am ɗon seyoro Jawmiraawo,
ngam o ɓaŋgti yam.
Mi ɗon jala konne'en am,
mi ɗon heewi seyo ngam o walli yam.
Jawmiraawo feere mum woni ceniiɗo,
walaa nannduɗo bee maako,
walaa aynoowo cemmbiɗɗo bana Allah men.
Taa mawnite, acce juraago.
Taa ɗuɗɗine bolle elewɗe.
Ngam Allah Jawmiraawo anndi ko mbaɗoton,
o hiitoto kuuɗe yimɓe fuu.
O yewan lagaaje honooɓe semmbiɗɓe,
ammaa o semmbiɗinan tampuɓe.
Haarnooɓe coorran ko'e muuɗum'en ngam heɓugo nyaamdu,
ammaa weelanooɓe ceyorto siwtaare.
Debbo dimaro danyan ɓiɓɓe njoweeɗiɗo,
ammaa marɗo ɓiɓɓe ɗuuɗɓe tampan.
Jawmiraawo maaynan, yeeɗinan boo.
O nastinan nder joonde maayɓe, o wurtinan boo.
O talkiɗinan, o riskinan boo,
o leestinan oo, o ɓaŋgtan oya.
O ɓaŋgtan yawaaɓe nder mbulwuldi
haa o teddina ɓe,
o hawta ɓe bee laamiiɓe,
o jo'ina ɓe dow joole tedduɗe.
Ngam duniyaaru fuu Jawmiraawo jeyi,
o jo'ini ndu dow caɓɓaaje ɗe ndimmbataako.
Jawmiraawo ɗon ayna kosɗe hoolaaɓe mum,
ammaa halluɓe majjan nder nyiɓre.
ngam neɗɗo waawataa heɓugo jaalorgal bee semmbe muuɗum.
Konne'en Jawmiraawo kalkan,
jooɗiiɗo haa asama riggoto dow maɓɓe.
Jawmiraawo hiitoto yimɓe duniyaaru haa yotto keeri maaru fuu,
o ɓaŋgtan laamiiɗo mo o suɓi,
o hokkan mo jaalorgal
Elkaana hooti haa Rama. Ammaa Samuyila, derkeejo jooɗi haa Silo ngam jagganaago Jawmiraawo les limanjo Eeli.
Ammaa ɓiɓɓe Eeli ɓe meere'en, ɓe anndaa Jawmiraawo.
Ndaa ko ɓe mbaɗi ummaatoore: Koo ndeye goɗɗo lii'ani Jawmiraawo kirseteeŋga, wakkati o ɗon defa kusel maaga, suka limanjo wara bee tufirɗum marɗum cinde tati.
O tufa nder defruɗe malla payanɗe fuu, o hoo'a ngam limanjo ko tufirɗum wurtini fuu. Bana nii ɓe mbaɗata koo moy Isra'iilaajo garɗo haa Silo.
Hiddeko ɓe ngula ɓellere dow hirsirde Jawmiraawo, suka limanjo wara, wi'a lii'otooɗo kirseteeŋga: “Hokku kusel ca'eteeŋgel
To goɗɗo wi'i: “Accu ɓe ngula ɓellere tawon, nden koo'a ko ngiɗɗa”, suka jaabo mo: “Aa'a, hokkam ngel jonta. To a hokkaay, mi jaɓtan ngel bee semmbe.”
Aybewol ɓiɓɓe Eeli ngo'ol mawni masin yeeso Jawmiraawo, ngam ɓe njawi kirsaaɗi ɗi yimɓe lii'ani mo.
Wakkati maajum Samuyila ɗon huuwana Jawmiraawo. Koo nde o derkeejo tawon boo, o ɗon ɓorni toggoore limanku.
Hitaande fuu daada maako waɗana mo ngapaleewol deydey darnde maako, waddana mo ngol yaake o wardi bee goriiko ngam lii'aago kirseteeŋga hitaande man fuu.
Eeli barkiɗini Elkaana e Hanna, wi'i Elkaana: “Jawmiraawo hokke ɓikkoy feere bee debbo oo, mbattudi ɓiŋngel ngel ndokkititɗon Jawmiraawo.” Ɓaawo maajum ɓe kooti.
Jawmiraawo barkiɗini Hanna, hokki mo ɓiɓɓe worɓe tato e ɓiɓɓe rewɓe ɗiɗo. Samuyila derkeejo boo mawni haa suudu Jawmiraawo.
Eeli ndottidi masin. O nani ko ɓiɓɓe maako mbaɗani Isra'iila'en fuu, ɓe mbaɗi boo njeenu bee rewɓe huuwanɓe haa dammugal laymaaru hawtirde.
O wi'i ɓe: “Koni mbaɗoton kuuje ɗe'e? Mi ɗon nana haala kuuɗe mon kalluɗe haa yimɓe fuu.
Acce ɗum, ɓikkoy am! Ko nanmi haa yimɓe Jawmiraawo, wooɗaay sam.
To goɗɗo waɗi aybe dow neɗɗo, Allah seettoto mo. Ammaa to goɗɗo waɗi aybe dow Jawmiraawo, moy seetata mo?” Ammaa ɓe nananaay baaba maɓɓe, ngam Jawmiraawo yiɗino halkugo ɓe.
Samuyila kam ɓesdi mawnugo, ɓesdi heɓugo yerduye boo haa Jawmiraawo e yimɓe fuu.
Nyannde feere goɗɗo Allah wari haa Eeli, wi'i mo: “Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo wi'i: Zamanu kaaka ma e saare mum laati maccuɓe Firawna, laamiiɗo Misra, naa mi waŋgani mo!

Nder le'i Isra'iila fuu mi suɓi mo, kaŋko e asŋgol maako, haa ɓe laato liman'en am, ɓe lii'o kirsaaɗi dow hirsirde am, ɓe ngula uurle, ɓe ɓorno limce limanku yeeso am boo. Mi yeɗi ɓe geɗal kirsaaɗi guleteeɗi dow hirsirde fuu

Kadi ngam ɗume ndaaroton bee suuno heedi kirseteeɗi e dokke nyaamdu ɗe umrumi Isra'iila'en? An boo, Eeli, koni ɓurata teddingo ɓiɓɓe ma dow am haa on tekkina ɓalli mon bee ko ɓuri wooɗugo haa dokke ɗe yimɓe am lii'anto yam?
Gooŋga, ɓooyma mi wi'no asŋgol mon huuwantam kuugal limanku haa foroy. Ammaa jonta ɗum haaɗi ngam mi teddinan teddinooɓe yam, ammaa mi wudinan yawotooɓe yam, min Allah Jawmiraawo Isra'iila wi'i ɗum!
Anndu, nyalɗe ngaran mi mbaran suka'en fuu nder asŋgol ma. Walaa koo gooto maɓɓe naywata.
A laaran konneejo ma haa saare ma e barkaaji ɗi ngaɗanmi Isra'iila. Ammaa saare ma meetataa nayeejo haa foroy.
Gorko gooto tan accanmi haa o huuwanammi kuugal limanku, luttuɓe fuu maayan saa'i ɓe suka'en. Kanjum ɗum tampinan gite ma, ɗum torran ɓernde ma boo.
To ɓiɓɓe ma Hofni e Pinehas maayi ɓe ɗiɗo fuu nder nyalaade woore, nden kam a anndan ko mbi'mi fuu laatoto.

Mi suɓanan hoore am goɗɗo koolaaɗo haa o laato limanjo am. Kaŋko o waɗan ko fottantammi fuu. Mi hokkan mo danygol, kamɓe ɓe kuuwan kuugal limanku yeeso laamiiɗo mo mi suɓi. Bana nii ɗum laatorto haa foroy.
To goɗɗo saare ma lutti saa'i man, o yahan haa limanjo oo, o sujida yeeso maako haa o heɓa suleyre cardi malla tamseere, o wi'a: Accu mi walle huuwugo kuugal limanku haa mi heɓa ko mi ƴakka.”
Samuyila, derkeejo ɗon huuwana Jawmiraawo dow ardaaŋgal Eeli. Wakkati maajum wahayuuji Jawmiraawo malla bolle muuɗum ɗuuɗaay.
Eeli ɗon waali haa nokkuure muuɗum. Gite maako puɗɗi tampugo, o waawataa yi'ugo laaɓɗum.
Samuyila boo ɗon waali nder suudu seniindu, ɓadiindu bee sundukru
Allah ewni Samuyila. Kaŋko o jaabi: “Na'am.”
O doggi haa Eeli, o wi'i: “A ewni yam. Ndaa yam ɗo.” Ammaa Eeli wi'i: “Aa'a, mi ewnaaki ma. Yah, waala fahin.” O yehi, o waali.
Fahin Jawmiraawo ewni Samuyila. Samuyila ummi, yehi haa Eeli, wi'i: “A ewnake yam. Ndaa yam ɗo.” Ammaa Eeli jaabi: “Ɓiŋngel am, mi ewnaaki ma. Yah, waala fahin.”
Samuyila anndaano Jawmiraawo tawon, ngam Jawmiraawo meeɗaayno waŋginango mo wolde mum.
Jawmiraawo ewni Samuyila tataɓre. O ummi, o yehi haa Eeli, o wi'i: “A ewni yam. Ndaa yam ɗo.” Jonta Eeli annditi ɗum Jawmiraawo ewni derkeejo oo.
Ngam maajum o wi'i Samuyila: “Yah, waala fahin. To o ewni ma, wi': Wolwu yaa Jawmiraawo, maccuɗo ma ɗon nana.” Samuyila yehi, waali haa nokkuure mum.
Nden Jawmiraawo ɓaditi Samuyila, dari, ewni mo bana naane: “Samuyila, Samuyila!” O jaabi: “Wolwu, maccuɗo ma ɗon nana.”
Jawmiraawo wi'i mo: “Nan, mi tammi waɗugo huunde naawnde nder Isra'iila. Koo moy nani ɗum, hultoran.
Nyalaade maajum mi ukkan dow Eeli e saare mum ko mbi'moomi fuu.
Mi anndinan mo no mi hiitorto saare maako haa foroy, ngam ɓikkoy maako kuɗi yam, kaŋko boo o haɗaay ɓe.
Ngam maajum kuniimi dow saare maako: Walaa kirseteeɗi malla dokke nyaamdu ittata aybe saare Eeli haa foroy.”
Samuyila waali fahin. Fajiri o maɓɓiti dammugal suudu Jawmiraawo. O huli anndingo Eeli wahayu mo o heɓi.
Ammaa Eeli ewni mo, wi'i: “Samuyila, ɓiŋngel am.” O jaabi: “Na'am.”
Eeli wi'i: “Ɗume Jawmiraawo wi'i ma? Taa suuɗam koo ɗume! Jawmiraawo hiito ma bee caatal fuu to a suuɗi yam wolde woore haa ko o wi'i fuu.”
Samuyila yecci mo haala man fuu, suuɗaay koo ɗume. Eeli wi'i: “Kaŋko woni Jawmiraawo, o waɗa ko fottani mo.”
Samuyila tokki mawnugo. Jawmiraawo ɗon wondi bee maako, gooŋɗini bolle maako fuu.
Koo moy nder lesdi Isra'iila, diga Dan haa yotti Biirsaba faami Jawmiraawo waɗi Samuyila annabiijo mum.
Jawmiraawo tokki waŋgango Samuyila haa Silo, o anndini mo hoore maako bee wolde maako.
Samuyila wolwani Isra'iila'en fuu wolde nde'e. Wakkati maajum Filisti'en mooɓi ngam haɓugo bee Isra'iila'en. Isra'iila'en njehi, caŋngini haa Eben-Ezer. Filisti'en boo caŋngini haa Afek.
Filisti'en mbaɗi caffuuji muuɗum'en, haɓre wuli jaw. Ɓe njaali Isra'iila'en, ɓe mbari baakin worɓe ujine nayo haa nokkuure haɓre man.

Nde Isra'iila'en luttuɓe ngarti nder saŋngeere, mawɓe maɓɓe mbi'i: “Ngam ɗume Jawmiraawo acci Filisti'en njaalo en hannde? Sey en ɗaɓɓa sundukru alkawal maako haa Silo. Nden kam Jawmiraawo yahdan bee meeɗen, hisnan en juuɗe konne'en men.”
Ɓe neli worɓe woɗɓe haa Silo ngam haa ɓe ɗaɓɓitoya sundukru alkawal Jawmiraawo honooɓe Isra'iila, jooɗiiɗo caka keruba'en
Nde sundukru alkawal yotti saŋngeere, Isra'iila'en fuu ceyi, ɓe kooli masin haa lesdi dimmbi.
Filisti'en nani hoolo man, ƴami: “Ɗume hoolo nder saŋngeere Ibraniŋke'en yiɗi wi'go?” Nde ɓe nani sundukru Jawmiraawo wari nder saŋngeere,
ɓe kuli, ɓe mbi'i: “Allah wari haa maɓɓe. En majji! Bana nii meeɗaay waɗeego.
En majji! Moy hisnata en juuɗe ɗowanteeɗo baawɗo bana oo? Naa kaŋko ukkani Misra'en torraaji ɗuuɗɗi nder ladde na?
Tiɗɗine ɓerɗe mon, onon Filisti'en, laate on worɓe! Kaɓe ngam taa on laato maccuɓe Ibraniŋke'en, bana kamɓe ɓe laati maccuɓe mooɗon haa wargo hannde. Laate on worɓe, kaɓe!”
Filisti'en kaɓi bee semmbe, njaali Isra'iila'en. Isra'iila'en ndoggi, koo moy haa suudu laaymaaru mum. Jaaleeki ki teddi masin, honooɓe Isra'iila'en baakin ujine cappanɗe tato (30.000) mbaraama.
Filisti'en kooci sundukru alkawal Allah. Hofni e Pinehas, ɓiɓɓe Eeli ɗiɗo go, kamɓe boo ɓe maayi.
Goɗɗo lenyol Benyamin doggi nokkuure haɓre, yotti Silo nyalaade maajum. Ngam daliila mettamɓeram o seekino limce maako, o waɗino mbulwuldi dow hoore maako boo.

O yotti, o tawi Eeli ɗon jooɗi dow koromwal mum, ɗon reena haa kommbi laawol, ngam ɓernde mum ɗon saklano sundukru alkawal Allah. Duuɓi maako cappanɗe joweenayi e joweetati, o bumɗo. Nde goɗɗo go nasti berniwol, saŋkiti habaru haɓre boo, yimɓe fuu kuli, ɓe ngooki. Eeli ƴami: “Ngam ɗume yimɓe ngookata?” Gadduɗo habaru yaawɗi, wari haa maako,
wi'i mo: “Mi doggi haɓre, hannde nde'e ngarmi diga ton.” Eeli ƴami mo: “Ɓiŋngel am, noy haala men wa'i?”
O jaabi: “Filisti'en njaali en, yimɓe men ndoggi, ɗuuɗɓe maayi. Ɓiɓɓe ma ɗiɗo, kamɓe boo ɓe maayi. Sundukru Allah boo, Filisti'en kooci ndu.”
Nde o wolwi haala sundukru, Eeli do'iri ɓaawo dow koromwal mum haa dammugal suudu seniindu. Ngam o ndottiijo, loorɗo, daande maako yewi. O laatino alkaaliijo Isra'iila duuɓi cappanɗe nayi.
Esiraawo maako, debbo Pinehas o reeduujo ɓadiiɗo ɓesnugo. Nde o nani Filisti'en kooci sundukru Allah, esiiko e goriiko boo maayi, luuwe naŋngi mo, o turi, nden o danyi.
Nde o ɗon maaya, rewɓe walluɓe mo mbi'i: “Tiɗɗin ɓernde ma, a danyi ɓiɗɗo gorko.” Ammaa o jaabaaki, o sali de'itineego.
O numi haala sundukru, non boo maayde esiiko e goriiko, o wi'i: “Sundukru Allah majji. Tedduŋgal maako wurtake Isra'iila.” Ngam maajum o inndi ɓiɗɗo maako Ikabood
Filisti'en kooci sundukru Allah. Nden ɓe njahri ndu diga Eben-Ezer haa Asdod,
ɓe nastini ndu nder suudu lawru maɓɓe Daagon, ɓe njo'ini ndu kommbi maaru.
Fajiri cub yimɓe Asdod ngari, tawi suura Daagon do'ake haa lesdi, ɗon waali dow yeeso mum, yeeso sundukru Jawmiraawo. Ɓe ndartini nga haa nokkuure maaga.

Jaŋngo maajum fajiri cub boo, ɓe tawi suura Daagon do'ake haa lesdi, ɗon waali dow yeeso mum, yeeso sundukru Jawmiraawo. Hoore maaga e juuɗe maaga ɗiɗi ta'aama, ɗon mbaali haa les dammugal, ɓanndu maaga tan lutti.
Ngam maajum liman'en Daagon e nastooɓe suudu Daagon fuu njaaɓataa les dammugal suudu man haa wargo hannde.
Jawmiraawo tikkani yimɓe Asdod. Asdod e gure maagol fuu, Jawmiraawo sarri ɗum, hiiti ɗum bee ɓuule naawɗe.
Nde ɓe ngi'i ko laati, ɓe mbi'i: “Ɗowanteeɗo Isra'iila'en ɗon hiito en bee caatal, enen bee ɗowanteeɗo men Daagon fuu. Taa en njogo sundukru maako haa ɗo.”
Ɓe neldi ewnaandu, ɓe mooɓti laamiiɓe Filisti'en fuu, ɓe ƴami: “Ɗume min mbaɗata bee sundukru ɗowanteeɗo Isra'iila'en?” Laamiiɓe njaabi: “Njahre ndu haa Gaat.” Ɓe njahri ndu ton.
Ammaa nde ndu yotti haa Gaat, Jawmiraawo tikkani berniwol man boo, saklere mawnde waɗi. O nyawni yimɓe ton, mawɓe e ɓikkoy fuu, ɓuule peeri haa maɓɓe.
Ngam maajum ɓe neldi sundukru Allah haa Ekuruun. Nde ndu yotti Ekuruun, yimɓe wonɓe ton ngooki. Ɓe mbi'i: “Ɓe ngaddi sundukru ɗowanteeɗo Isra'iila'en haa meeɗen, ngam haa ndu mbara en.”

Kamɓe boo ɓe neldi ewnaandu, ɓe mooɓti laamiiɓe Filisti'en fuu, ɓe mbi'i ɓe: “Lorne sundukru ɗowanteeɗo Isra'iila'en haa nokkuure maaru, ngam taa ndu mbara min, minin e yimɓe amin fuu.” Kultoreeŋgol maayde ukkani berniwol maɓɓe, ngam Jawmiraawo hiiti ɓe bee caatal.
Koo nde yimɓe ɓe maayaay boo, ɓe nyawi nyawu ɓuule, gookaali maɓɓe njotti haa asama.
Sundukru alkawal Jawmiraawo faɓɓi nder lesdi Filisti'en lebbi joweeɗiɗi.
Filisti'en mooɓti liman'en e hiila'en fuu, ƴami ɓe: “Ko mbaɗeten bee sundukru Jawmiraawo? E noy lornirten ndu?”

Ɓe njaabi: “Fakat, to on ɗon lorna sundukru ɗowanteeɗo Isra'iila'en, taa lorne ndu sookru. Nelde dokkal bee maaru ngam ittuki hakkeeji mon haa on njamɗita. Bana non anndirton daliila ka o accaay hiitaago on.”

Yimɓe ƴami: “Ɗume haani en njoɓa?” Ɓe njaabi: “Suuraaji ɓuule kaŋŋeeri jowi e doombi kaŋŋeeri jowi, gootel gootel ngam berniwol fuu. Ngam masiibo gooto ukkani berniiji Filisti'en jowi bee laamiiɓe muuɗum'en fuu.
Mbaɗe suuraaji ɓuule mon e suuraaji doombi bonnanɗi lesdi mon, nelde ɗi haa ɗowanteeɗo Isra'iila'en ngam haa teddinon mo. Teema o hoynanan on e ɗowanteeɓe mon e lesdi mon tikkere maako.
Taa caatine ko'e mon bana Misra'en e Firawna ɓooyma. Allah saatani ɓe haa ɓe njoofi Isra'iila'en.
Kadi, mbaɗe moota kesa nga ga'i, koo'e na'i musininooji ɗiɗi ɗi meeɗaay kaɓɓirgal tawon, kaɓɓe ɗi haa moota man. Kooce nyalbi maaji, lorne ɗi haa saare.
Nden koo'e sundukru Jawmiraawo, njo'ine ndu dow moota man, non boo akootiyel bee dokkal kuuje kaŋŋeeri go ngam ittuki hakkeeji mon. Ɓaawo maajum acce sundukru, ndu dilla.

Ndaare ndu booɗɗum. To ndu yehi gal Bayti-Semes, laawol lesdi maaru, nden kam ɗum Jawmiraawo neldi en sarru maŋngu ngu'u. To ndu yehi laawol feere, en anndan naa kaŋko hiiti en, ammaa ɗum hoddiroore non.”
Filisti'en mbaɗi bana nii. Ɓe koo'i na'i musininooji ɗiɗi, ɓe kaɓɓi ɗi yeeso moota, ammaa nyalbi maaji ɓe maɓɓi ɗi haa saare.
Nden ɓe njo'ini sundukru Jawmiraawo dow moota man, non boo akootiyel bee doombi kaŋŋeeri e suuraaji ɓuule maɓɓe.
Na'i tokki laawol yahugo Bayti-Semes, ɗi ɗon mboya, ɗi celaay haa juŋngo nyaamo malla nano sam. Laamiiɓe Filisti'en tokki ɗi haa njotti keerol Bayti-Semes.
Yimɓe berniwol maajum ɗonno coda alkamaari nder waadiwol. Nde ɓe ɓaŋgti gite maɓɓe, ɓe ngi'i sundukru alkawal, ɓe ceyi.
Moota na'i yotti ngesa Yosuwa, goɗɗo Bayti-Semes, dari ton, woodino hayre mawnde wonnde ton. Yimɓe Bayti-Semes ta'i leɗɗe moota, lii'ani Jawmiraawo na'i ɗiɗi fuu guleteeɗi goɗɗi.
Lewi'en njippini sundukru Jawmiraawo e akootiyel bee kuuje kaŋŋeeri go. Ɓe njo'ini ɗum dow hayre mawnde man. Nyannde man yimɓe Bayti-Semes lii'ani Jawmiraawo guleteeɗi e kirseteeɗi.
Laamiiɓe Filisti'en njowo ndaari ɗum fuu, nden ɓe kooti nyalaade maajum haa Ekuruun.
Filisti'en nelduno Jawmiraawo suuraaji ɓuule kaŋŋeeri jowi ngam ittuki hakkeeji muuɗum'en, gootel gootel ngam berniiji muuɗum'en Asdod e Gaaza e Askalon e Gaat e Ekuruun.

Doombi kaŋŋeeri ɓuri ɗuuɗugo, wooru wooru ngam berniiji nder maral laamiiɓe Filisti'en njowo fuu, diga berniwol cemmbiɗŋgol haa gure haa yotti hayre mawnde kommbi Bayti-Semes nder ngesa Yosuwa. Dow hayre man ɓe njo'inno sundukru alkawal. Nde ɗon ton haa wargo hannde.
Jawmiraawo mbari worɓe cappanɗe njoweeɗiɗo nder yimɓe Bayti-Semes ujine cappanɗe njowo (50.000), ngam ɓe njurni sundukru maako. Yimɓe fuu cuni ngam kiita Jawmiraawo ka'a.
Ɓe mbi'i: “Moy foti daraago yeeso Jawmiraawo, yeeso Allah Ceniiɗo oo? Ndikka sundukru maako yaha nokkuure feere. Ammaa haa toy?”
Ɓe neli nelaaɓe haa Kiriyat-Ye'arim, ɓe mbi'a yimɓe ton: “Filisti'en ngartiri sundukru Jawmiraawo. Ngare, njahre ndu haa mooɗon.”
Yimɓe Kiriyat-Ye'arim ngari, koo'i sundukru Jawmiraawo, njahri ndu haa saare Abinadabu wonnde dow towndiire. Ɓe ceni ɓiɗɗo maako Eli'azaaru haa o ayna sundukru Jawmiraawo
Diga garki sundukru alkawal haa Kiriyat-Ye'arim, duuɓi noogas caali. Wakkati man fuu Isra'iila'en ɗon uumo yeeso Jawmiraawo.

Samuyila wi'i Isra'iila'en: “To on muuyi loraago haa Jawmiraawo bee ɓernde woore, nden kam itte suuraaji labbi jananni e Astarot fuu. Ɗakkotire bee Jawmiraawo, njaggane mo kaŋko feere maako. Nden kam o hisnan on juuɗe Filisti'en.”
Isra'iila'en ɗowtani mo, itti suuraaji Ba'al e Astarot, njaggani Jawmiraawo feere mum.
Nden Samuyila wi'i: “Sey Isra'iila'en fuu mooɓto haa Mispa. Ton mi toroto Jawmiraawo ngam mooɗon.”
Ɓe mooɓti haa Mispa. Ɓe nyeɗi ndiyam, ɓe ndufi ɗam yeeso Jawmiraawo, ɓe cuumi nyalaade man, ɓe mbi'i: “Min mbaɗi hakke dow Jawmiraawo.” Ton haa Mispa, Samuyila wonno alkaaliijo maɓɓe.
Nde Filisti'en nani haala mooɓtorde Isra'iila'en haa Mispa, laamiiɓe maɓɓe njowo fuu ummi, kamɓe e jama'aare konu maɓɓe, haa ɓe ukkano Isra'iila'en. Nde Isra'iila'en nani ɗum, ɓe kultori.
Ɓe mbi'i Samuyila: “Taa accu toraago Allah Jawmiraawo men haa o hisna en juuɗe Filisti'en.”
Samuyila hirsi jawgel musinanŋgel, lii'ani ngel Jawmiraawo guleteeŋgel, tori mo haa o walla Isra'iila'en. Jawmiraawo boo jaɓi tornde maako.
Saa'i Samuyila ɗonno lii'o guleteeŋgel, Filisti'en ɓaditi Isra'iila'en haa ɓe kaɓa. Ammaa Jawmiraawo hulni ɓe bee pelmaali cemmbiɗɗi, jiiɓi hakkilooji maɓɓe, Isra'iila'en njaali ɓe.
Isra'iila'en ngurti Mispa, taasni ɓe, puɗɗi mbarugo ɓe haa yotti les Bayti-Kar.
Samuyila hoo'i hayre mawnde, darni nde hakkunde Mispa e Seen. O wi'i: “Haa wargo ɗo Jawmiraawo walli en.” Ngam maajum o wi'i hayre maajum Eben-Ezer
Bana nii Filisti'en njaalaama. Ɓe meetaay nastugo lesdi Isra'iila. Jawmiraawo tikkani ɓe balɗe ngeendam Samuyila fuu.
Berniiji Isra'iila hakkunde Ekuruun e Gaat ɗi Filisti'en njaɓtuno, ɗi lorti nder maral Isra'iila, lesdi maɓɓe kisi juuɗe Filisti'en. Ammaa sulhu ɗonno hakkunde Isra'iila'en bee Amoori'en.
Samuyila laati alkaaliijo Isra'iila balɗe mum fuu.
Hitaande fuu o yaalti Baytila, Gilgal e Mispa, o waɗani Isra'iila'en kiita ton.
Nden o lorti haa Rama haa saare maako woni. Ton boo o mahani Jawmiraawo hirsirde, o huuwi kuugal alkaaliijo Isra'iila.
Nde Samuyila ndottidi, o waɗi ɓiɓɓe maako alkaali'en dow Isra'iila.
Innde afo maako Yo'el, innde ɗiɗaɓo boo Abiya. Kamɓe ɓe alkaali'en haa Biirsaba.
Ammaa ɓe tokkaaki misaalu baaba maɓɓe. Ɓe ɗaɓɓi riba, ɓe njaɓi ngeenaari zammba, ɓe cottini gooŋga wakkati kiita boo.
Ngam maajum ndotti'en Isra'iila fuu mooɓti, ngari haa Samuyila haa Rama.
Ɓe mbi'i mo: “Ndaa, a ndottidi, ɓiɓɓe ma tokkataako misaalu ma. Kadi, waɗan min laamiiɗo fodde al'aada ummaatooje fuu. Kaŋko o waɗana min kiita
Haala ka seynaay Samuyila. O ƴami Jawmiraawo,
ammaa kaŋko o jaabi Samuyila: “Waɗ ko ɓe mbi'i ma fuu. Naa an ɓe ngudini, ammaa ɓe ngudini yam min, ngam taa mi laamano ɓe.
Diga ngurtinmi ɓe lesdi Misra haa wargo hannde ɓe acci yam haa ɓe ndewa ɗowanteeɓe woɗɓe. Ko ɓe mbaɗi yam foroy, kanjum ɓe mbaɗete an boo.
Kadi nanan ɓe, ammaa faamtin ɓe booɗɗum no goɗɗo laamiiɗo laamoranto ɓe.”
Bolle Jawmiraawo ɗe'e fuu, Samuyila yecci ɗe ummaatoore nde ƴamno mo laamiiɗo.

O wi'i ɓe: “Annde ko laamiiɗo ɗaɓɓata haa mooɗon: O hoo'an ɓiɓɓe mon worɓe, o jo'ina woɗɓe maɓɓe dow moota pucci maako, woɗɓe laato wa'iiɓe pucci maako, woɗɓe boo njaha yeeso moota pucci maako bee kosɗe.
O waɗan woɗɓe hoore'en dow honooɓe ujineere malla dow cappanɗe njowo, woɗɓe boo ndema gese maako, mooɓta ƴaamle maako malla ɓe mbaɗana mo balmi e ko mootaaji pucci e pucci mari haaje.
O hoo'an ɓiɓɓe mon rewɓe boo, ɓe laato jillooɓe uurle malla defooɓe malla tamsooɓe haa saare maako.
O hoo'an gese mon ɓurɗe wooɗugo, demetirle mon e gese inabooje e gese jaytunje, o hokka ɗe saraaki'en maako.
O hoo'an zakka
O hoo'an huuwooɓe mon worɓe e rewɓe e suka'en mon suɓaaɓe e bamɗe mon, ngam humtugo haajeeji maako.
O hoo'an zakka haa dammooji mon, onon boo on fuu on laatoto maccuɓe maako.
To ɗum laatake bana nii, on mboyan ngam daliila laamiiɗo mo ɗaɓɓoton hannde. On mboyanan Jawmiraawo, ammaa kaŋko o nanantaa on nyalaade maajum.”
Ammaa yimɓe cali nanango Samuyila. Ɓe mbi'i: “Naa non! Sey min keɓa laamiiɗo
haa nannden bee ummaatooje goɗɗe fuu. Kaŋko o waɗana min kiita, o ardo min nder konuuji.”
Samuyila nani ko ɓe mbi'i fuu, yecci ɗum Jawmiraawo.
Jawmiraawo wi'i mo: “Waɗ ko ɓe ngiɗi, waɗan ɓe laamiiɗo.” Nden Samuyila wi'i ɓe ɓe koota, koo moy haa wuro mum.
Woodino goɗɗo mo lenyol Benyamin. Innde maako Kis ɓii Abiyel ɓii Ceror ɓii Bekorat ɓii Afiyaha, o camɗinaaɗo.
O woodi ɓiɗɗo gorko mo innde mum Sawulu. Kaŋko o suka booɗɗo, walaa gorko nder Isra'iila ɓuri mo wooɗugo. O juutɗo, hoore maako towti dow yimɓe fuu.
Nyannde feere bamɗe Kis debbe majji. O wi'i Sawulu, ɓiyiiko: “Hoo'u gooto nder suka'en men, njehe, ɗaɓɓite bamɗe.”
Ɓe njehi, ɓe ta'i nder kooseeje Efrayim e nder lesdi Salisa, ammaa ɓe keɓtaay ɗe. Ɓe ta'i nder lesdi Sa'aliima, ammaa ɗe ngalaa ton. Ɓe ta'i nder lesdi Yemini, walaa koo ɗume.
Nde ɓe njotti lesdi Cuuf, Sawulu wi'i suka gonduɗo bee muuɗum: “Ndikka en loro, ngam taa baaba am ɓura saklanaago en dow bamɗe.”
Ammaa suka jaabi mo: “Woodi goɗɗo Allah nder berniwol ngo'ol. O anndaaɗo, ko o wi'ata fuu ɗum waɗoto fakat. En njaha haa maako, teema o anndinan en toy en keɓtata ɗe.”
Sawulu wi'i: “To en njehi kam, ɗume en ndokkata mo? Nyaamdu haa boorooji men jinni, caahu feere boo walaa.”
Suka jaabi: “Ndaa, mi woodi suleyre cardi. Kayre ndokkanmi goɗɗo Allah, haa o anndina en laawol man.”

Sawulu wi'i: “Booɗɗum, njemme kadi.” Ɓe njehi haa berniwol ngol goɗɗo Allah woni e mum. Nde ɓe ɗon mba'o wa'orde berniwol, ɓe potti bee faanyɓe rewɓe wurtiiɓe ngam nyeɗugo ndiyam. Ɓe ƴami faanyɓe man: “Gi'oowo ɗon haa berniwol na?” Zamanuuru maajum, to goɗɗo Isra'iilaajo yiɗi ƴamugo muuyo Allah, o wi'a: “Ngare, en njaha haa gi'oowo.” Ngam mo ɓe mbi'ata hannde annabiijo wi'eteno ɓooyma gi'oowo.
Faanyɓe njaabi ɓe: “Ooho, ɗon. Hannde nde'e o wari, ngam yimɓe ɗon lii'a kirseteeɗi dow towndiire. Ammaa njaawɗe
haa on tawa mo hiddeko o wa'o ton ngam haa o nyaamda bee yimɓe. Yimɓe ewnaaɓe puɗɗataa nyaamugo, sey to o wari. Ngam kaŋko barkiɗinta kirseteeŋga, ɓaawoɗon ɓe nyaama. Njaawɗe haa on tawoya mo.”
Sawulu e suka go tokki laawol muuɗum'en yahugo berniwol. Nde ɓe ɗon nasta ngol, ɓe ngi'i Samuyila ɗon wurto yeeso maɓɓe ngam yahugo towndiire.
Keenya man Jawmiraawo wi'no Samuyila:

“Jaŋngo bana saa'iire nde'e nelanmi goɗɗo lenyol Benyamin haa maaɗa. Sey a moyta mo haa o laato ardiiɗo yimɓe am Isra'iila'en, o hisna ɓe juuɗe Filisti'en. Mi yi'i, mi nani bojji yimɓe am, mi wallan ɓe.”
Nde Samuyila yi'i Sawulu, Jawmiraawo wi'i mo: “Kaŋko woni gorko mo mbolwanmaami e muuɗum. Kaŋko laamanto yimɓe am.”
Haa dammugal berniwol, Sawulu ɓaditi Samuyila, ƴami mo: “Useni, toy saare gi'oowo?”
Samuyila jaabi mo: “Min woni gi'oowo. Ardeeɗam wa'aago haa towndiire, ngam on nyaamdan bee am hannde. Jaŋngo fajiri mi jaaboto ƴamɗe ma fuu, nden mi jaɓɓito ma.
Taa saklana bamɗe majjirɗe ma diga nyalɗe tati, ɓe keɓti ɗe. Ammaa moy ɓerɗe Isra'iila'en fuu ɗaɓɓata? Naa ɗum an na, an e saare baaba ma?”
Sawulu wi'i: “Asee! Mi goɗɗo lenyol Benyamin. Lenyol man ɓuri le'i Isra'iila fuu famɗugo. Kadiboo saare am ɓuri ci'e Benyamin fuu famɗugo. Ngam ɗume a wolwani yam irin bolle ɗe'e?”
Samuyila yahri Sawulu e suka mum haa nokkuure seniinde, nastini ɓe suudu ton, hokki ɓe joole tedduɗe caka ewnaaɓe. Woodi ton baakin worɓe cappanɗe tato.
Samuyila umri defoowo: “Waddu geɗal ngal mi hokkuno ma ngam haa a siga go.”

Defoowo waddi daŋngo, wallini ngo yeeso Sawulu. Samuyila wi'i: “Ndaa ko ɓe cigani ma, nyaam ɗum ngam haa ɓe mbi'a an ewni ɓe haa juulde kirseteeɗi nde'e.” Nden Sawulu nyaamdi bee Samuyila nyalaade man.
Samuyila diirtodi bee Sawulu haa berniwol, wolidi bee maako dow soorowol.
Fajiri cub jaŋngo maajum nde weeti, Samuyila ewni Sawulu gonɗo dow soorowol: “Umma, haa mi ɗofte seɗɗa.” Sawulu ummi, nden ɓe ngurti haa laawol, kaŋko e Samuyila.
Nde ɓe njotti keerol berniwol, Samuyila wi'i Sawulu: “Wi' suka ma ardo yeeso. Ammaa an, dara jonta, haa mi anndine ko Allah wi'i yam.” Suka ardi yeeso.
Nden Samuyila hoo'i faandu nebbam rufi ɗam dow hoore Sawulu, hebbi mo, wi'i: “Bana nii Jawmiraawo darniri ma dow yimɓe muuɗum Isra'iila'en.

To a dilli jonta, a fottan bee worɓe ɗiɗo haa yenaande Rahiilu kommbi Selsa nder lesdi Benyamin. Ɓe mbi'ete: Bamɗe debbe ɗe njahɗa ɗaɓɓititgo, keɓtaama. Haala maaje saklataa baaba ma. Ammaa o ɗon sakli jonta daliila ma, o ɗon ƴama: Ko mbaɗanmi ngam ɓiyam?

Nden a tokkoto yeeso haa a yotto lekki makki bi'eteeki Taboora. Haa ton worɓe tato pottan bee maaɗa, ɓe ɗon njaha haa Baytila ngam ɓe lii'ano Allah dokkal. Gooto nder maɓɓe ɗon roondi njawkoy tatoy, ɗiɗaɓo tamseeje tati, tataɓo boo kanyakanyaawu
Ɓe ƴaman njamu maaɗa, ɓe ndokkete tamseeje ɗiɗi, jaɓ ɗe.

Ɓaawo maajum a yottoto nokkuure wi'eteende Towndiire-Allah haa caŋngeeje aynooɓe Filisti'en ngoni. Haa nastirde berniwol a fottan bee mooɓre annabi'en waranɓe diga towndiire. Ɓe ɗon ngima bee moolooji e bawɗi e ciide e hooduuji, ɓe ɗon mbaɗa annabaaku boo.
Nden Ruuhu Jawmiraawo jippoto dow maaɗa haa a waɗa annabaaku bana maɓɓe, a laato goɗɗo keso.
To alaamaaji ɗi mbaŋgi yeeso maaɗa kam, waɗ ko warani ma fuu, ngam Allah ɗon wondi bee maaɗa.
Aartam yahugo haa Gilgal, reenam ton nyalɗe joweeɗiɗi. Mi yahan ton haa mi lii'ano Jawmiraawo guleteeɗi e kirseteeɗi ngam kawtal yimɓe bee maako. Nden mi wi'e ko mbaɗata fuu.”
Nde Sawulu wayliti, acci Samuyila, Jawmiraawo hokki mo ɓernde hesre. Ko Samuyila wi'i mo fuu, ɗum laati nyalaade maajum.
Nde Sawulu e suka mum njotti Towndiire-Allah go, mooɓre annabi'en fotti bee maɓɓe. Ruuhu Jawmiraawo jippi dow Sawulu, o fuɗɗi waɗugo annabaaku caka maɓɓe.
Annduɓe mo diga ɓooyma fuu, nde ɓe ngi'i mo o ɗon waɗa annabaaku bee annabi'en, ɓe ƴamƴamtiri: “Ko waɗi ɓii Kis? Sawulu boo laati caka annabi'en na?”
Goɗɗo jooɗiiɗo wuro man ƴami: “E moy woni baaba ɓeya?” Bana nii geccawol fuɗɗiri: “Sawulu boo laati caka annabi'en na
Nde Sawulu timmini waɗugo annabaaku, o wa'i haa towndiire.
Bappa maako yi'i mo, kaŋko e suka maako, ƴami ɓe: “Toy njahɗon?” O jaabi: “Ɗaɓɓititgo bamɗe. Nde min ngi'aay ɗe koo toy, min njehi ƴamugo Samuyila.”
Bappa maako ƴami: “Ɗume o wi'i on?”
Sawulu jaabi: “O yecci min bee laaɓɗum bamɗe keɓtaama.” Ammaa haala laamu ka Samuyila wolwanno mo, o yeccaay ka.
Samuyila ewni Isra'iila'en haa ɓe ngara yeeso Jawmiraawo haa Mispa.
O wi'i ɓe: “Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo, Allah Isra'iila wi'i: Mi wurtini on lesdi Misra. Mi hisni on juuɗe Misra'en e laamuuji konne'en woɗɓe fuu.
Min woni Allah mon kisnuɗo on sarruuji e ɓillaaje fuu. Ammaa onon on ngudini yam hannde, on ɗaɓɓi mi hokka on laamiiɗo. Yoo booɗɗum! Ndare jonta yeeso Jawmiraawo fodde le'i mon e ci'e mon.”
Samuyila ɓaditini le'i Isra'iila fuu, lenyol Benyamin naŋngaama.
O ɓaditini lenyol Benyamin fodde ci'e maagol, saare Matiri naŋngaama. Nder saare man boo Sawulu ɓii Kis naŋngaama. Ammaa nde ɓe ɗaɓɓiti mo, ɓe tawaay mo.
Ɓe ƴami Jawmiraawo: “Lutti goɗɗo feere na?” Ammaa Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Sawulu ɗon nyukki ɓaawo kuuje nder saŋngeere.”
Ɓe ndoggi, ɓe tawi mo ton, ɓe ngaddi mo. Nde o ɗon dari caka yimɓe, ndaa, hoore maako towti dow yimɓe fuu.
Samuyila wi'i ɓe: “Kaŋko woni cuɓaaɗo Jawmiraawo. Walaa nannduɗo bee maako nder ummaatoore fuu.” Yimɓe ngooki bee seyo, ɓe kooli: “Hayru laamiiɗo!”
Samuyila faamtini yimɓe umrooje laamu. O winndi ɗum nder deftere, o wallini nde yeeso Jawmiraawo. Nden o wi'i yimɓe fuu koota ci'e muuɗum'en.
Sawulu boo hooti saare mum haa Gibiya. Ɗuuɗɓe nder honooɓe tokki mo ngam Jawmiraawo meemi ɓerɗe maɓɓe.
Ammaa woɗɓe meere'en ƴami: “Noy kaŋko o hisnirta en?” Ɓe njawi mo, ɓe teddinaay mo bee dokke. Ammaa Sawulu dooli hoore mum jeeɗaago.
Nahas, laamiiɗo Ammooni'en wari, taari berniwol Yaabes nder lesdi Gile'at, kaŋko e jama'aare konu maako. Yimɓe Yaabes fuu mbi'i Nahas: “Haɓɓu alkawal bee amin, nden kam min laatoto maccuɓe ma.”
Laamiiɗo Ammooni'en jaabi ɓe: “To on ngerdake mi itta koo moy mooɗon yiitere mum nyaamre, haa mi toska Isra'iila fuu, nden kam mi haɓɓan alkawal man bee mooɗon.”
Ndotti'en Yaabes mbi'i mo: “Accu min nyalɗe joweeɗiɗi, haa min nelda habaru koo toy nder Isra'iila. To kisnanɗo min walaa, nden kam min laatoto maccuɓe ma.”
Nelaaɓe ngari haa Gibiya, wuro Sawulu. Ɓe ngecci yimɓe haala man fuu. Yimɓe mboyi bee sawtu.
Saa'i maajum Sawulu warti diga ladde, o ɗon ɓaawo na'i maako. O ƴami: “Ngam ɗume yimɓe mboyata?” Ɓe ngecci mo bolle nelaaɓe Yaabes.
Nde Sawulu nani ɗum, Ruuhu Jawmiraawo wari dow maako, tikkere maako saati masin.
O hoo'i ga'i ɗiɗi, o ta'i ɗi geɓe geɓe, o neldi geɓe man koo toy nder Isra'iila. O umri nelaaɓe ɓe mbi'a: “Koo moy mo yahdaay bee Sawulu e Samuyila ngam haɓre, nii ga'i maako laatoto.”
Jawmiraawo hulni Isra'iila'en fuu, haa ɓe fuu ɓe ngari bana goɗɗo gooto.
Sawulu laari ɓe haa Bezek, limi ɓe. Woodi yimɓe Isra'iila ujine teemeɗɗe tato (300.000) e yimɓe Yahuuda ujine cappanɗe tato (30.000).
Ɓe umri nelaaɓe Yaabes: “Mbi'e yimɓe berniwol mon: Jaŋngo, caka nyalawma, on kisan.” Ɓe njehi, ɓe ngecci ɗum yimɓe Yaabes. Kamɓe ɓe ceyi.
Ɓe mbi'i Nahas: “Jaŋngo min ngurtoto haa on mbaɗa min ko fottani on.”
Jaŋngo maajum Sawulu senndi yimɓe mum mooɓe tati. Subaha ɓe ukkani saŋngeere Ammooni'en. Ɓe mbari Ammooni'en haa yotti caka nyalawma. Luttuɓe ndoggi, caŋkiti gooto gooto.
Nde haɓre timmi, Isra'iila'en mbi'i Samuyila: “Toy saliiɓe Sawulu laamano en? Accide min bee maɓɓe haa min mbara ɓe.”
Ammaa Sawulu wi'i: “Walaa mbareteeɗo hannde! Ngam hannde Jawmiraawo hisni Isra'iila.”
Samuyila wi'i yimɓe: “Ngare, njahden haa Gilgal, en tabitina laamu ton.”
Yimɓe fuu njehi haa Gilgal. Yeeso Jawmiraawo ɓe mbaɗi Sawulu laamiiɗo. Kaŋko e Isra'iila'en fuu ɓe ceyi masin. Ɓe lii'ani Jawmiraawo kirseteeɗi ngam kawtal maɓɓe bee maako.
Nden Samuyila wi'i Isra'iila'en fuu: “Ndaa, mi waɗi ko on tori yam, mi waɗani on laamiiɗo.
Ndaa mo jonta yeeso mooɗon ngam o ardo on. Min kam mi ndottiijo, marɗo dandanndi. Ɓiɓɓe am ɗon ngondi bee mooɗon. Mi huuwi yeeso mooɗon diga nderkaaku am haa wargo hannde.

Ndaa yam ɗo. Ceedaneeɗam yeeso Jawmiraawo e laamiiɗo mo o suɓi to mi waɗi aybewol koo ngole. Nagge moy koocumi? Malla wamnde moy koocumi? Moy mbaɗmi rikici? Moy toonyiimi? Haa juŋngo moy njaɓmi ceede ngam sottingo gooŋga? Mbi'e ɗum jonta, haa mi hokkita on.”
Isra'iila'en mbi'i: “A waɗaay min rikici, a toonyaay min, a jaɓaay koo ɗume haa juŋngo koo moy.”
Samuyila wi'i ɓe: “Jawmiraawo e laamiiɗo mo o suɓi laati seedooɓe, on tawaay aybewol koo ngole haa am.” Ɓe fuu ɓe mbi'i: “Nonnon nii!”

Samuyila wi'i ɓe: “To non kam, sey mi wullo on yeeso Jawmiraawo. Sey mi siftinora on kuuɗe booɗɗe ɗe Jawmiraawo huuwani on, onon e kaakiraaɓe mon. Nde Yaakubu e yimɓe saare mum ngari haa Misra, nde kaakiraaɓe mon tori Jawmiraawo ballal, saa'i maajum o nelani ɓe Muusa e Haruna. Bee juuɗe worɓe ɗiɗo ɓe'e o wurtiniri ɓe lesdi Misra, o hokki ɓe joonde nder lesdi ndi'i

Ammaa kamɓe ɓe ngejjiti ko Allah Jawmiraawo waɗani ɓe, ɓe acci mo. Ngam maajum o hokki ɓe haa juuɗe Filisti'en e laamiiɗo Mo'abi'en e Sisera, mawɗo honooɓe berniwol Hacoor. Ɓe fuu ɓe kaɓi bee kaakiraaɓe mon, ɓe njaali ɓe

Ɓe tori Jawmiraawo ballal, ɓe mbi'i: Min mbaɗi hakke, yaa Jawmiraawo, ngam min ngudini ma, min ndewi suuraaji Ba'al e Astarot. Ammaa jonta hisnu min juuɗe konne'en amin, nden kam min njagganto ma an feere ma
Jawmiraawo nelani on Yerub-Ba'al, Bedan, Yefta e Samuyila. O hisni on juuɗe konne'en mon taariiɓe on fuu, haa on njooɗo bee jam e de'ere
Ammaa nde ngi'ɗon Nahas, laamiiɗo Ammooni'en ɗon wara ngam haɓugo bee mooɗon, on mbi'i yam: Sey min keɓa laamiiɗo. On ngejjiti Allah Jawmiraawo mon woni laamiiɗo mon
Ndaa laamiiɗo mo ɗaɓɓuɗon, mo cuɓɗon, Jawmiraawo darni mo dow mooɗon.
Kadi, teddine Jawmiraawo, njaggane mo, ɗowtane umrooje maako, taa luute ɗe sam, tokke mo, onon e laamiiɗo mon fuu. Nden kam on njooɗoto jam.
Ammaa to on nananaay Jawmiraawo, to on ɗowtanaaki umrooje maako, nden kam o honan on bana o honno kaakiraaɓe mon.
Jonta kam ndare booɗɗum, ndaare kaayeefiwol ngol Jawmiraawo waɗata yeeso mooɗon.

Naa jonta ɗum wakkati codol alkamaari na? Bee non fuu mi toroto Jawmiraawo, kaŋko boo o neldan diggaali e iyeende. To ɗum waɗi, on anndan no kaɓɓotiral mooɗon ɗaɓɓugo laamiiɗo halliri yeeso Jawmiraawo.”
Nden Samuyila tori Jawmiraawo. Nyalaade maajum Jawmiraawo neldi diggaali e iyeende. Yimɓe fuu kuli Jawmiraawo e Samuyila masin.
Ɓe mbi'i Samuyila: “Useni, torana min Allah Jawmiraawo ma, ngam taa min maaya. Fakat min marɓe hakke, dow maajum fuu min ɓesdi halleende bee ɗaɓɓugo laamiiɗo.”
Samuyila jaabi ɓe: “Taa kule. On mbaɗi aybe fakat, ammaa tokke Jawmiraawo jonta, njaggane mo bee ɓernde woore.
Taa ndewe labbi, ngam kanji ɗi meereeji, ɗi nafataa, ɗi kisnataa on boo.
Ammaa Jawmiraawo, ngam daliila innde mum mawnde, accataa yimɓe mum. Ɗum fottani mo o waɗa on ummaatoore maako.
Min boo, taa mi waɗa aybe dow Jawmiraawo, mi acca do'anaago on. Koo yeeso boo mi anndinan on ko foti, ko wooɗi.
Sey on teddina Jawmiraawo, on ɗowtano mo bee gooŋga e ɓernde woore. Ciftore kuuɗe mawɗe ɗe o huuwani on.
Ammaa to on tokkake waɗugo halleende, nden kam on kalkan, onon e laamiiɗo mon fuu.”
Sawulu woodi duuɓi …

Sawulu suɓi worɓe ujine tato (3.000) nder Isra'iila'en, wi'i luttuɓe ɓe koota. Ujine ɗiɗo ɗon ngondi bee maako haa Mikmas e dow kooseeje kommbi Baytila. Ujineere boo ɗon ngondi bee Yonatan, ɓiyiiko, haa Gibiya-Benyamin.
Yonatan mbari aynooɓe Filisti'en haa Geba, Filisti'en nani habaru maajum. Sawulu umri fuufugo luwal konu nder lesdi fuu, wi'i: “Sey Ibraniŋke'en fuu nana ɗum!”
Isra'iila'en fuu nani haala man, mbi'i: “Sawulu mbari aynooɓe Filisti'en, ummini nganyŋgu maɓɓe.” Ngam maajum worɓe Isra'iila fuu mooɓti haa Sawulu haa Gilgal.

Filisti'en boo mooɓti ngam haɓre bee Isra'iila'en. Ɓe ngoodi mootaaji pucci ujine cappanɗe tati (30.000), wa'iiɓe pucci ujine njoweego (6.000) e honooɓe woɗɓe ɗuuɗɓe bana njaareendi maayo. Ɓe ngari, ɓe caŋngini haa Mikmas, haa fuunaaŋge Baytawiina.
Nde Isra'iila'en ngi'i ɓe ɗon yeeso joote ngam konne'en ɓaditi ɓe masin, ɓe nyukki nder lowi, nder kooraaje, caka tapaaje, nder cuuɗi gasaaɗi e nder ɓulli.
Woɗɓe maɓɓe ndoggi haa gaɗa maayo Urdun, haa lesdi Gada e Gile'at.
Ammaa Sawulu ɗonno haa Gilgal, yimɓe wonduɓe bee maako ndiwni ngam kulol.
Samuyila wi'no mo o reena nyalɗe joweeɗiɗi. Ammaa nde Samuyila waraay tawon, yimɓe puɗɗi saŋkitaago
Ngam maajum Sawulu umri waddugo dabbaaji ngam nguleteeŋga e kirseteeɗi ngam kawtal yimɓe, nden o lii'i nguleteeŋga.
Nde o timmini lii'aago nguleteeŋga, Samuyila wari. Sawulu yehi haa fotta bee maako, hoofna mo.
Samuyila ƴami mo: “Ko mbaɗɗa ɗo?” Sawulu jaabi: “Yimɓe puɗɗi saŋkitaago ngam a waraay nder saa'iire ta'aande. Filisti'en boo ɗon mooɓi haa Mikmas.
Ngam maajum mi numi: Jonta Filisti'en ukkanto yam haa Gilgal, min boo mi toraaki yerduye Jawmiraawo tawon. Kanjum mi tiɗɗini ɓernde am, mi lii'ani mo nguleteeŋga.”
Samuyila wi'i mo: “Kay, a waɗi faataare! Koni a ɗowtanaaki umroore Allah Jawmiraawo maaɗa? O tabitinanno laamu ma dow Isra'iila haa foroy,
ammaa jonta ngu tabitittaa. Jawmiraawo suɓani hoore mum goɗɗo ɓurɗo fottango mo dow maaɗa, haa o waɗa mo ardiiɗo yimɓe maako ngam a ɗowtanaaki ko Jawmiraawo umri
Nden Samuyila ummi haa Gilgal, yehi haa Gibiya nder lesdi Benyamin. Sawulu limi yimɓe mum, ɓe ɗon baakin worɓe teemeɗɗe njoweego.
Sawulu e Yonatan ɓiyum e wonduɓe bee muuɗum'en caŋngini haa Geba nder lesdi Benyamin. Ammaa Filisti'en ɗon caŋngini haa Mikmas.
Filisti'en neli mooɓe honooɓe tati ngam wilugo e jaɓtugo: Mooɓre arannde yehi haa Ofra nder lesdi Su'al,
mooɓre ɗiɗawre haa Baytihurun e mooɓre tataɓre boo haa kooseeje dow Waadiwol-Pobbi haa sera ladde.
Wakkati maajum walaa kilaajo nder lesdi Isra'iila fuu, ngam Filisti'en ngiɗaano Isra'iila'en mbaɗa kaafaaje malla labbe.
Ɗum dooli Isra'iila'en yahugo haa Filisti'en ngam welnugo baaneeje e gasirɗe e pe'irɗe e bafɗi.
Ngam welnugo fe'irde malla ngam wo'itingo seɓatto sawru gaynaako, sey ɓe njoɓa suleyre. Ngam welnugo baaneewo malla wafdu boo suleyje ɗiɗi.
Ngam maajum nyalaade haɓre walaa kaafahi malla labbo haa juuɗe Isra'iila'en, sey Sawulu e Yonatan ɓiyum ngoodi balmi, kamɓe tan.
Filisti'en neli mooɓre honooɓe ngam haa ɓe ayna laawol Mikmas.
Nyannde feere Yonatan ɓii Sawulu wi'i suka doondoowo balmi mum: “War, en njah haa aynooɓe Filisti'en to.” Ammaa o wi'aay ɗum baaba maako.
Saa'i maajum Sawulu ɗon jooɗi les rummaanoohi haa laarre wi'eteende Migiron haa keerol gese Gibiya. Worɓe baakin teemeɗɗe njoweego ɗon ngondi bee maako.
Ahiyya ɓii Ahitooba deerɗiraawo Ikabood ɓii Pinehas ɓii Eeli, ɗonno limanjo Jawmiraawo haa Silo, kaŋko o ɗon ɓorni limce limanku saa'i man. Yimɓe wonduɓe bee Sawulu kamɓe boo ɓe anndaa Yonatan dilli.
Haa laawol ngol Yonatan tammi yahugo, woodi tapaaje towɗe ceeɓɗe haa bakeeje maagol ɗiɗi fuu. Tapaare nde'e wi'ete Booses, ndeya boo Seene.
Nde'e ɗon haa woyla maagol, yeeso Mikmas, ndeya boo haa fombina maagol, yeeso Geba.
Kadi, Yonatan wi'i suka mum go: “War, en njah haa aynooɓe saadooni'en ɓe'e to. Teema Jawmiraawo wallan en. Walaa ko haɗata mo hokkugo en jaalorgal, koo en ɗuuɗaay boo.”
Doondoowo balmi maako jaabi mo: “Waɗ ko ɓernde ma yiɗi fuu, yah. Min kam mi yahdan bee ma koo toy a yiɗi yahugo.”
Yonatan wi'i: “Sey en ɓadito ɓe haa to ɓe ngi'i en.
To ɓe mbi'i: Ndare, munye haa to min ngari – nden kam en ndaroto haa en ngoni.
Ammaa to ɓe mbi'i: Ngare haa amin – nden kam en mba'oto, ngam Jawmiraawo hokki en ɓe haa juuɗe men. Bana nii en anndirta ɗum.”
Ɓe njehi haa aynooɓe Filisti'en ngi'i ɓe. Filisti'en mbi'i: “Asee, Ibraniŋke'en ngurti gasɗe muuɗum'en haa ɓe nyukkino!”
Nden ɓe ewni Yonatan e doondoowo balmi, ɓe mbi'i: “Hey, onon, ngare haa amin! Woodi ko min mbi'ata on!” Yonatan wi'i suka mum: “Tokkam! Jawmiraawo hokki ɓe haa juuɗe Isra'iila.”
Yonatan wa'i bee juuɗe e kosɗe fuu, doondoowo balmi maako tokki mo. Nde ɓe njotti haa dow, Filisti'en ndo'i yeeso maako, suka maako boo mbari ɓe.
Haɓre aranndeere bee Filisti'en nde'e, Yonatan e suka mum mbari worɓe noogas haa nokkuure nde yaajaay sam.
Filisti'en wonɓe nder lesdi, honooɓe nder saŋngeere e mooɓe jaɓtooɓe fuu kultori ngam haala maajum. Allah hulni ɓe bee dimmbaaki lesdi boo.
Yimɓe Sawulu aynooɓe haa Gibiya-Benyamin ngi'i jiiɓotiral nder saŋngeere Filisti'en.
Sawulu umri yimɓe wonduɓe bee muuɗum, wi'i: “Lime, ndaare to goɗɗo meeɗen dilli.” Ɓe limi, ɓe tawi Yonatan e doondoowo balmi mum ngalaa ton.
Sawulu wi'i Ahiyya, limanjo: “Waddu sundukru Allah.” Ngam nyalaade maajum sundukru alkawal ɗon caka Isra'iila'en.
Saa'i Sawulu ɗon wolida bee Ahiyya tawon, jiiɓotiral nder saŋngeere Filisti'en ɓesdi masin. Sawulu wi'i limanjo: “Accu haala man!”
Nden o ewni yimɓe wonduɓe bee maako, ɓe nasti haɓre. Saa'i man hakkiilooji Filisti'en cakli, ɓe ɗon kaɓa koo moy bee soobaajo mum, jiiɓre mawnde waɗi.
Ibraniŋke'en wonduɓe bee Filisti'en diga naane, warduɓe bee maɓɓe haa saŋngeere, ngayliti, kawtani Isra'iila'en wonduɓe bee Sawulu e Yonatan.
Isra'iila'en nyukkiiɓe nder kooseeje Efrayim go, nde ɓe nani Filisti'en ndoggi, ɓe ngarti, ɓe taasni ɓe.
Bana nii Jawmiraawo hisniri Isra'iila'en nyalaade maajum.
Haɓre maajum yotti haa gaɗa Baytawiina.
Sawulu umruno yimɓe mum bee hunayeere: “Naaloore dow koo moy nyaami nyaamdu haa yahugo kiikiiɗe, hiddeko mi waato konne'en am.” Nyalaade man fuu, ɓe nyaamaay, ngam maajum ɓe comi masin.
Ɓe fuu ɓe ngari nder laynde, njumri ɗon ton haa lesdi.
Ɓe ngi'i njumri ɗon simta, ammaa walaa koo gooto maɓɓe metti ndi, ngam ɓe kuli hunayeere Sawulu.
Ammaa Yonatan anndaa haala maajum. O nastini seɓatto sawru maako nder njumri, o nyaami ndi. Law ɓanndu maako ferti.
Gooto nder yimɓe maako wi'i mo: “Baaba ma huni hunayeere, naali koo moy nyaami nyaamdu hannde.” Ngam maajum honooɓe fuu ɗon comi.
Yonatan wi'i: “Baaba am jaanyani lesdi fuu sarru. Ndaare, semmbe am warti ngam mi metti njumri seɗɗa.
To yimɓe fuu nyaamino ko keɓɗen haa Filisti'en hannde, jaalorgal men ɓuranno mawnugo piw. Ammaa jonta kam en mbaraay ɗuuɗɓe nder Filisti'en.”
Nyalaade maajum Isra'iila'en mbari Filisti'en diga Mikmas haa yotti Ayyalon. Weelo tampini ɓe masin,
haa ɓe ukkani keɓal konu, ɓe kirsi dammooji e ga'i e nyalbi, ɓe ndufi ƴiiƴam maaji haa lesdi. Nden ɓe nyaami haa nokkuure nde ɓe kirsi ton.
Sawulu anndinaama: “Ndaa, yimɓe ɗon mbaɗa hakke dow Jawmiraawo, ɓe ɗon nyaama haa nokkuure nde ɓe kirsi ton.” Sawulu hooli, wi'i: “On zammbake Jawmiraawo. Ngadde hayre mawnde hiddeko naaŋge muta

Nden o umri: “Naste caka yimɓe, mbi'e ɓe ɓe ngadda dabbaaji malla dammooji maɓɓe, ɓe kirsa ɗi haa ɗo dow hayre, ɓe nyaama bilaa ƴiiƴam ngam taa ɓe ngaɗa hakke dow Jawmiraawo.” Jemmaare maajum yimɓe ngaddi dabbaaji muuɗum'en, kirsi ɗi ton.
Sawulu mahani Jawmiraawo hirsirde. Kayre woni hirsirde arannde nde o mahani Jawmiraawo.

Nden Sawulu wi'i: “Sey en taasna Filisti'en jemmaare nde'e, en njaɓta kuuje maɓɓe haa weeta. Taa gooto nder maɓɓe daɗa.” Yimɓe maako njaabi: “Waɗ ko fottani ma fuu!” Ammaa limanjo wi'i: “En aartu en ƴama muuyo Allah.”
Sawulu ƴami Allah: “Mi diirto, mi taasna Filisti'en na? Min njaaloto ɓe na?” Ammaa nyalaade maajum Allah jaabaaki mo.
Sawulu ewni ardiiɓe yimɓe, wi'i ɓe: “Keɓte hakkewol ngole laati hannde.
Fakat mi ɗon hunoro Jawmiraawo geeto, kisnuɗo Isra'iila: Baɗɗo hakke man o maayan, koo to ɗum ɓiyam Yonatan!” Ammaa walaa koo gooto wolwi.
Nden Sawulu wi'i Isra'iila'en fuu: “On fuu ndare haa wakeere nde'e, min e ɓiyam Yonatan min ndaroto wakeere ndeya.” Yimɓe njaabi mo: “Waɗ ko fottani ma.”
Sawulu tori Jawmiraawo, Allah Isra'iila: “Yaa Allah, anndinam gooŋga bee hayre kur'u. Kur'u aybini Sawulu e Yonatan, gooŋɗini yimɓe woɗɓe
Sawulu wi'i: “Mbaɗe kur'u hakkunde am bee ɓiyam.” Ngu aybini Yonatan.
Sawulu wi'i mo: “Yeccam ko mbaɗɗa.” Yonatan jaabi: “Mi hoo'i njumri seɗɗa bee seɓatto sawru am, mi nyaami. Ndaa yam, mi taaskani maayugo.”
Sawulu wi'i: “Nonnon, Jawmiraawo hiito yam bee caatal muuɗum fuu, to mi acci ma bee yoŋki.”

Ammaa yimɓe mbi'i Sawulu: “Kadi Yonatan mo heɓani Isra'iila jaalorgal maŋngal nga'al hannde, o maaya na? Walaa sam! Fakat min ɗon kunoro Jawmiraawo geeto, min accataa a meema koo gaasaawol hoore maako gootol. Kuuɗe maako hannde kam, bee ballal Allah o huuwri ɗe.” Bana nii yimɓe kisniri Yonatan, o daɗi maayde.
Sawulu acci taasnugo Filisti'en. Kamɓe ɓe kooti lesdi maɓɓe.
Wakkati Sawulu ɗon laamano Isra'iila, o haɓi bee konne'en maako koo toy fuu: O haɓi bee yimɓe Mo'ab e Ammoon e Edoom, bee laamiiɓe Soba, bee Filisti'en boo. Koo toy o haɓi fuu, o jaalo.
O tiɗɗini ɓernde maako, o haɓi bee yimɓe Amalek, o hisni Isra'iila'en juuɗe jaɓtooɓe.
Sawulu woodi ɓiɓɓe worɓe tato: Yonatan e Isuwi e Malkisu'a. O woodi boo ɓiɓɓe rewɓe ɗiɗo: Innde mawniraawo, Meerab, innde minyiraawo boo, Mikal.
Ahino'am ɓii Ahimaas woni debbo Sawulu. Innde mawɗo honooɓe maako, Abineer ɓii Neer. Neer woni bappa Sawulu,
ngam Kis baaba Sawulu e Neer baaba Abineer ɓe ɓiɓɓe Abiyel.
Zamanu Sawulu fuu haɓre bee Filisti'en ɗon saati. Ngam maajum koo ndeye Sawulu yi'i goɗɗo cemmbiɗɗo, baawɗo konu, o hoo'a mo, o nastina mo haa jama'aare konu maako.
Samuyila wari haa Sawulu, wi'i mo: “Naane Jawmiraawo nelino yam ngam haa mi moyte haa a laato laamiiɗo yimɓe maako Isra'iila'en. Ngam maajum nan umroore maako jonta
Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wi'i: Mi yiɗi waataago ko yimɓe Amalek mbaɗi Isra'iila'en, no ɓe kaɗiri ɓe laawol yaake ɓe ngurti Misra
Yah, haɓu bee Amaleki'en jonta, nattin ɓe kamɓe e ko ɓe mari fuu, taa enɗa ɓe sam. Mbare worɓe e rewɓe, derke'en e musinankoy, na'i e dammooji e geelooɗi e bamɗe fuu.”
Sawulu ewni yimɓe mum ɓe ngara haa Telayim. O limi ɓe ton: Honooɓe ujine teemeɗɗe ɗiɗo (200.000), non boo worɓe Yahuuda ujine sappo (10.000).
Ɓe njahdi bee maako haa berniwol Amaleki'en, ɓe mbaɗi baaltol nder waadiwol kommbi berniwol man.

Sawulu neldi habaru haa Keni'en, wi'i ɓe: “Ndille, ngurte caka Amaleki'en, ngam taa mi halka on bana maɓɓe. Ngam saa'i Isra'iila'en ɗonno ngara diga Misra, onon on kolli ɓe mbooɗeeŋga.” Keni'en cenndiri bee Amaleki'en.
Nden Sawulu ukkani Amaleki'en, jaali ɓe diga Hawila haa yotti Sura haa fuunaaŋge Misra.
Sawulu e yimɓe mum nattini ɓe fuu bee kaafahi, ammaa ɓe naŋngi Agag, laamiiɗo Amaleki'en.
Ɓe acci mo o geeto, kaŋko e ɓurɗum wooɗugo haa dammooji e na'i e borti e ko mari saman fuu. Ɓe nattini dabbaaji tampuɗi e ɗi mbooɗaay tan.
Jawmiraawo wi'i Samuyila:
“Ɓernde am ɗon naawa ngam mi laamini Sawulu, o wayliti, o acci yam, o ɗowtanaaki umrooje am.” Kanjum ɗum naawi Samuyila, o woyani Jawmiraawo jemmaare man fuu.
Jaŋngo maajum o dawi cub, o yehi ngam fottugo bee Sawulu. O nani Sawulu warno haa Karmel, darnani hoore mum hayre maandorde, dilli haa Gilgal.
Nde Samuyila yotti ton, Sawulu hoofni mo, wi'i: “Jawmiraawo barkiɗine. Mi waɗi ko Jawmiraawo umri yam.”
Ammaa Samuyila ƴami mo: “Ko mi nanata ɗo, naa ɗum bojji dammooji e boodaali na'i na?”
Sawulu jaabi: “Yimɓe koo'i na'i e dammooji ɓurɗi wooɗugo haa Amaleki'en ngam lii'anaago ɗi Jawmiraawo Allah maaɗa kirseteeɗi. Ammaa luttuɗi fuu min nattini ɗi.”
Samuyila wi'i Sawulu: “He'i kam! Haa mi yecce ko Jawmiraawo wi'i yam jemmaare saaliinde.” Sawulu wi'i: “Mi ɗon heɗito.”
Samuyila wi'i mo: “Wakkati a maraayno saman, a laati ardiiɗo le'i Isra'iila, Jawmiraawo suɓi ma a laato laamiiɗo maaji.
O neli ma, o umri ma a haɓa bee Amaleki'en hakke'en ɓe'e haa a nattina ɓe.
Koni a ɗowtanaaki mo? Koni a yaawɗi ɓoftugo keɓal konu? A waɗi ko haanaay yeeso Jawmiraawo.”
Sawulu jaabi: “Na mi ɗowtani umroore Jawmiraawo? Mi yehi bana o wi'i yam, mi halki Amaleki'en fuu. Mi naŋngi Agag, laamiiɗo maɓɓe, mi waddi mo haa ɗo.
Ammaa yimɓe am nattinaay ɓurɗum wooɗugo haa keɓal konu, waato na'i e dammooji booɗɗi, ngam haa ɓe lii'ano ɗi Allah Jawmiraawo maaɗa haa Gilgal ɗo.”
Ammaa Samuyila wi'i: “Ɗume ɓuri fottango Jawmiraawo, guleteeɗi e kirseteeɗi na malla to goɗɗo ɗowtanake umroore maako? Fakat, ɗowtaare ma ɓuran seynugo mo dow kirseteeɗi jawɗi payɗi fuu.
Luutugo umroore maako halli bana kaaramaaku, tuurtango mo boo halli bana rewugo labbi. An a wudini umroore Jawmiraawo, ngam maajum o wudini ma, o ɓorti ma laamu.”
Sawulu jaabi: “Gooŋga, mi waɗi hakke. Mi luuti umroore Jawmiraawo e anndinol maaɗa, ngam mi huli yimɓe am, mi waɗi ko ɓe ngiɗi.
Ammaa jonta yaafanam hakke am, yahdu bee am haa Gilgal, haa mi sujidana Jawmiraawo.”
Samuyila wi'i mo: “Aa'a, mi yahdataa bee ma. A wudini umroore Jawmiraawo, kaŋko boo o wudini ma, a laamantaako Isra'iila fahin.”
Samuyila wayliti haa dilla. Ammaa Sawulu naŋngi gawargal limce Samuyila haa ngal seeki.
Samuyila wi'i: “Bana nii Jawmiraawo seekiri laamu Isra'iila dow maaɗa hannde, hokki ngu goɗɗo feere ɓurɗo ma fottugo.
Jawmiraawo Allah Isra'iila, o tedduɗo, o fewataa, o mimsitittaa boo, ngam naa o neɗɗo.”
Sawulu wi'i: “Mi waɗi hakke. Ammaa teddinam jonta yeeso ndotti'en yimɓe am e yeeso Isra'iila'en, yahdu bee am haa mi sujidana Allah Jawmiraawo maaɗa.”
Samuyila jaɓi, yahdi bee maako haa Gilgal. Nde Sawulu timmini sujidango Jawmiraawo,
Samuyila umri: “Ngaddaneeɗam Agag, laamiiɗo Amaleki'en.” Agag wari haa maako o de'itɗo ngam o numi: “Jonta kam joote maayde ittake.”
Ammaa Samuyila wi'i mo: “Kaafahi ma sooyni rewɓe ɗuuɗɓe ɓikkoy muuɗum'en. Bana nii daada ma boo sooyan ɓiyum jonta.” Nden o ta'i Agag geɓe geɓe yeeso Jawmiraawo haa Gilgal.
Ɓaawo maajum Samuyila yehi haa Rama. Sawulu boo hooti saare mum haa Gibiya.
Samuyila jooɗi nder suno ngam ɓernde Jawmiraawo metti daliila Sawulu mo o laaminino dow Isra'iila. O meetaay yi'ugo Sawulu haa nyalaade maayde maako.

Jawmiraawo wi'i Samuyila: “Ndey a accata sunoraago Sawulu? Mi wudini mo ngam taa o tokko laamanaago Isra'iila. Hebbin luwal ma bee nebbam cenirɗam, yah haa Baytilaama haa goɗɗo mo innde mum Yessa. Mi suɓani hoore am gooto nder ɓiɓɓe maako haa o laato laamiiɗo.”
Samuyila wi'i: “Noy njahanmi ton? To Sawulu nani ɗum, o mbaratam.” Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Hoo'u wiige, yahru nge ton, wi' yimɓe a wari ngam lii'anaago Jawmiraawo kirseteeŋga.
Ewna Yessa haa juulde kirseteeŋga man, min boo mi wi'ete ko mbaɗata, moy nder ɓiɓɓe maako a moytata ngam o laato laamiiɗo.”
Samuyila ɗowtani Jawmiraawo, yehi Baytilaama. Nde ndotti'en berniwol ngi'i mo, ɓe kultori, ɓe ƴami mo: “Jam waddu ma boo?”
O jaabi: “Jam! Mi wari ngam lii'anaago Jawmiraawo kirseteeŋga. Cene ko'e mon, nden njahde bee am haa nyaamdu kirseteeŋga.” O seni Yessa e ɓikkoy muuɗum boo, o ewni ɓe ton.
Nde ɓe ngari, Samuyila yi'i Eliyabu ɓii Yessa, numi: “Kaŋko woni cuɓaaɗo Jawmiraawo.”
Ammaa Jawmiraawo wi'i mo: “Taa hakkilan darnde maako juutnde, mi suɓaay mo. Min kam mi laarataa bana yimɓe ndaardata. Neɗɗo laaran ko gite mum ngi'ata, ammaa min mi laaran ko woni nder ɓernde goɗɗo.”
Yessa ewni Abinadabu, yahri mo yeeso Samuyila. Ammaa Samuyila wi'i: “Jawmiraawo suɓaay mo.”
Yessa waddi Samma, ammaa Samuyila wi'i: “Kaŋko boo Jawmiraawo suɓaay mo.”
Bana nii Yessa waddi ɓiɓɓe muuɗum njoweeɗiɗo yeeso Samuyila. Ammaa Samuyila wi'i: “Jawmiraawo suɓaay koo gooto maɓɓe.”
Nden o ƴami Yessa: “Kamɓe tan ngoni ɓiɓɓe ma fuu na?” Yessa jaabi: “Aa'a, lutti gaajiijo am, o ɗon dura dammooji.” Samuyila wi'i: “Nel goɗɗo wadda mo, ngam en puɗɗataa nyaamugo hiddeko o wara.”
Yessa neli goɗɗo, nden Daawuda wari. O suka ŋarniiɗo, boɗeejo, gite maako ɗon njayna. Jawmiraawo wi'i Samuyila: “Ɗum kaŋko, moytu mo.”
Samuyila hoo'i luwal bee nebbam cenirɗam, moyti Daawuda yeeso deerɗiraaɓe muuɗum fuu
Ruuhu Jawmiraawo acci Sawulu, Jawmiraawo neli mo ruuhuwol kalluŋgol ngol hulna mo.
Sukaaɓe Sawulu mbi'i mo: “Ndaa, ruuhuwol kalluŋgol iwŋgol haa Jawmiraawo ɗon hulne, barkaama.
Naa ndikka min ɗaɓɓitane goɗɗo annduɗo fiyugo moolooru na? To ruuhuwol man wari dow maaɗa, o yimane bee moolooru haa keɓa daama.”
Sawulu jaabi: “Ndaaraneeɗam goɗɗo annduɗo fiyugo moolooru booɗɗum, ngadde mo haa am.”
Gooto nder sukaaɓe maako wi'i: “Mi anndi goɗɗo. Yessa mo Baytilaama woodi ɓiɗɗo baawɗo moolooru. O konoowo cemmbiɗɗo boo, o ŋarniiɗo, baawɗo wolwugo, Jawmiraawo ɗon wondi bee maako.”
Sawulu neli nelaaɓe haa Yessa, wi'i mo: “Neldam ɓiɗɗo ma Daawuda, duroowo dammooji.”
Yessa hokki Daawuda jawgel mbeewa e wamnde rimdaande tamseeje e kanyakanyaawu
Bana nii Daawuda wari, yehi haa laamiiɗo Sawulu. Sawulu yiɗi mo masin, waɗi mo doondoowo balmi mum.
Sawulu neli goɗɗo haa Yessa, wi'i mo: “Mi yiɗi Daawuda. Accu mo o jooɗo haa am, o huuwanammi.”
Koo ndeye ruuhuwol iwŋgol haa Allah go wari dow Sawulu, Daawuda hoo'a moolooru, fiya ndu. Nden Sawulu foofta, heɓa daama, ruuhuwol boo acca mo.
Filisti'en mooɓti jama'aare konu muuɗum'en haa Soko nder lesdi Yahuuda. Ɓe caŋngini haa Efes-Damiima, hakkunde Soko bee Azeka.
Sawulu e Isra'iila'en boo mooɓi, ɓe caŋngini nder waadiwol leɗɗe mawɗe. Ɓe mbaɗi caffuuji ngam haɓugo bee Filisti'en.
Filisti'en ndari dow hooseere to, Isra'iila'en boo dow hooseere ɗo, waadiwol ɗon hakkunde maɓɓe.
Soojeejo manaaɗo wurti saŋngeere Filisti'en. Innde maako Goliyat, o iwɗo Gaat. Darnde maako baakin meetir tati.
Hufneere maako e sulkewol maako fuu ɗum njamndi mboɗeeri. Teddeeŋga sulke man, baakin kilo cappanɗe joweego.
O woodi jamɗe boɗeeje haa korle maako. Dow balawal maako boo, o wakki jaaral njamndi mboɗeeri.
Kalasal labbo maako nanndi bee leggal cannyirgal. Ceeɓndi labbo maako ɗum njamndi ɓaleeri, teddeeŋga maari baakin kilo joweeɗiɗi. Goɗɗo feere ardi mo, ɗon roondi wawarde
Goliyat dari, telɓani caffuuji
To o waawti yam, o mbari yam, min laatoto maccuɓe mon. Ammaa to min mi jaalake mo, mi mbari mo, nden kam onon on laatoto maccuɓe amin, on kuuwana min.”
Nden o fuɗɗi jancugo caffuuji konu Isra'iila'en, o wi'i: “On nani ko mbi'mi na? Ngadde goɗɗo gooto haa min kaɓa.”
Nde Sawulu e Isra'iila'en nani bolle ɗe'e, ɓe ndiwtori, ɓe kuli masin.

Daawuda go, o gaajiijo Yessa mo asŋgol Efrata haa Baytilaama nder lesdi Yahuuda. Yessa, o ndottiijo saa'i man. O woodi ɓiɓɓe njoweetato. Mawniraaɓe maɓɓe tato, Eliyabu e Abinadabu e Samma tokkino Sawulu haa konu.
Saa'i feere feere Daawuda ɗon ummo haa saare Sawulu, ɗon hoota, ngam durugo dammooji baaba mum haa Baytilaama.
Ammaa Filistiijo go ɗon wara fajiri e kiikiiɗe fuu, ɗon tiitotira bee Isra'iila'en, nyalɗe cappanɗe nayi.
Nyannde feere Yessa wi'i Daawuda: “Yah haa deerɗiraaɓe ma haa saŋngeere konu. Yahran ɓe buhuuyel gabbe ca'aaɗe e tamseeje sappo.
Hoo'u boo leeɓi sappo ngam mawɗo honooɓe ujineere. Laar no deerɗiraaɓe ma mba'i, ƴam njamu maɓɓe. Jaɓ huunde koo ndeye haa maɓɓe, waddanam nde ngam seedaago fakat a yi'i ɓe, a tawi ɓe ɓe yamɓe.
Ɓe ɗon ngondi bee Sawulu e worɓe Isra'iila fuu ngam haɓre nder waadiwol Leɗɗe-mawɗe.”

Jaŋngo maajum Daawuda dawi cub, acci dammooji haa juŋngo aynoowo. O hoo'i kuuje go, o yehi bana baaba maako umruno mo. Nde o yotti saŋngeere, Isra'iila'en ɗon ngurto, ɗon ndarna caffuuji, ɗon mbaɗa gookaali konu.
Caffuuji Isra'iila'en e ɗi Filisti'en ɗon tiitotiri.
Daawuda acci kuuje mum haa juŋngo aynoowo doŋgle, doggi haa deerɗiraaɓe mum wonɓe nokkuure haɓre, ƴami ɓe njamu maɓɓe.
Saa'i o ɗon wolida bee maɓɓe, Goliyat Filistiijo go wari fahin, dari yeeso caffuuji Filisti'en, lorniti ko o wolwuno go. Daawuda nani ɗum.
Worɓe Isra'iila, nde ngi'i Goliyat, ɓe fuu ɓe kultori masin, ɓe ndoggi.
Ɓe mbi'mbi'tiri: “A yi'i mo na? Ndaa mo ɗon wara! Kayya no o jancirta Isra'iila! Koo moy mbari Goliyat, laamiiɗo riskinan mo, te'nan mo ɓiyiiko debbo. Saare baaba maako boo rimɗan e jomorli fuu.”
Daawuda ƴami worɓe dariiɓe kommbi muuɗum: “Mbarjaari ndiye mbaranɗo Filistiijo oo, ittanɗo mbustu dow Isra'iila heɓata? Moy saadooniijo oo haa o janca caffuuji konu Allah geeto?”
Yimɓe mbolwani mo haala mbarjaari go fahin.

Eliyabu, mawniiko nani mo o ɗon wolida bee yimɓe. O tikki, o wi'i Daawuda: “Ko mbaɗata ɗo? A acci dammooji men pamari nder ladde. Moy aynata ɗi jonta? Mi anndi ma, a elewɗo, bonɗo. A wari laarugo haɓre non.”
Daawuda jaabi: “Ko mbaɗmi kadi? Walaa koo ɗume, sey ƴamugo ƴamɗe.”
Nden o wayliti, o ƴami goɗɗo feere. Kaŋko o jaabi mo bana naane.
Worɓe woɗɓe nani bolle Daawuda, anndini ɗum Sawulu. Kaŋko o neli ɗaɓɓugo mo.
Daawuda wari, wi'i Sawulu: “Taa goɗɗo hula Filistiijo oo, barkaama. Min mi yahan haɓugo bee maako.”
Sawulu wi'i: “A fotaay ngam haɓre man, ngam a derkeejo tawon. Ammaa kaŋko o cemmbiɗɗo, annduɗo haɓre diga sukaaku maako.”
Daawuda wi'i: “Barkaama, saa'i mi ɗon dura dammooji baaba am, koo ndeye mbarooga malla ɓoodu
mi taasna ɗum, mi mbara ɗum, mi hisna jawgel man diga hunnduko mum. To nga ummani yam, mi naŋnga nga wakkude, mi mbara nga.
Mi waawti barooɗe e ɓoodi goɗɗi fuu. Filistiijo saadooniijo oo laatoto bana maaje, ngam o janci caffuuji konu Allah geeto.
Jawmiraawo hisni yam jagge barooɗe e ɓoodi goɗɗi, o hisnatam juŋngo Filistiijo oo boo.”
Sawulu wi'i Daawuda: “Booɗɗum, yah, Jawmiraawo wondu bee ma.”
Nden o hoo'i sulkewol maako e hufneere njamndi, o ɓorni ɗum Daawuda.
Daawuda wakki kaafahi Sawulu, nden o foondi yahugo ngam o woowaay kuuje ɗe'e. O wi'i Sawulu: “Mi meeɗaay kuuje konu tawon, mi waawaay yahugo bee maaje.” O ɓorti ɗe,
o hoo'i sawru maako haa juŋngo, o suɓti kaa'e ɓorwuɗe jowi nder maayel, o waati ɗe nder booro maako. Nden o naŋngi piwlol maako, o yehi ngam fottugo bee Filistiijo go.
Goliyat ɓaditi Daawuda, jogiiɗo wawarde
Nde o waawi yi'ugo Daawuda laaɓɗum, o yawi mo ngam Daawuda o suka mo he'aay yahugo konu tawon, o boɗeejo, o ŋarniiɗo.
Goliyat telɓani mo: “Koni ngarɗa haa am bee sawru? Mi rawaandu na?” O naalori Daawuda bee labbi maako fuu.
Nden o janci mo: “War, haa mi nyaamna colli e kuuje ladde kusel ma.”
Daawuda jaabi mo: “An a wari dow am bee kaafahi e labbo e jaaral. Min kam mi wari bee innde Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama, Allah caffuuji Isra'iila. Kaŋko njancuɗa.
Ngam maajum o nastinte hannde haa juŋngo am. Mi mbarete, mi ta'an hoore ma. Ɓalli honooɓe Filisti'en, mi hokkan ɗi colli e kuuje ladde. Nden kam duniyaaru fuu anndan Allah ɗon haa Isra'iila.
Mooɓtiiɓe haa ɗo fuu anndan Jawmiraawo walaa haaje kaafahi malla labbo ngam hisnugo yimɓe mum. Haɓre nde'e ɗum haɓre Jawmiraawo, o hokkan min on haa juuɗe amin.”
Nden Filistiijo ɓaditi ngam fottugo bee Daawuda. Daawuda boo yaawɗi, doggi ngam fottugo bee maako,
hoo'i hayre haa booro mum, waɗi nde haa piwlol, fiɗi Goliyat haa tiinde. Hayre nasti tiinde maako, o do'i dow yeeso maako haa lesdi.
Bana nii Daawuda jaalori Filistiijo bee piwlol e hayre, mbari mo. O walaa kaafahi.
Nden Daawuda yaawɗi, dari dow maako, losi kaafahi maako, ta'i hoore maako. Nde Filisti'en ngi'i cemmbiɗɗo muuɗum'en maayi, ɓe ndoggi.

Yimɓe Isra'iila e Yahuuda ummi, mbaɗi gookaali haɓre, taasni ɓe haa njotti haa waadiwol, koo haa dammuɗe Ekuruun boo. Filisti'en mbaraaɓe ɗon mbaali haa laawol jahranŋgol haa Saarayim haa Gaat e Ekuruun.
Nde Isra'iila'en timmini taasnugo Filisti'en, ɓe lori, ɓe nyaami saŋngeere maɓɓe.
Daawuda hoo'i hoore Goliyat, ɓaawoɗon o yahri nde haa Urusaliima. Ammaa o resi balmi Filistiijo nder laymaaru maako.
Nde Sawulu yi'i Daawuda ɗonno yaha ngam fottugo bee Filistiijo go, o ƴami Abineer, mawɗo honooɓe maako: “Suka oo o ɓii moy?” Abineer jaabi: “Fakat bana a geeto, barkaama, mi anndaa.”
Laamiiɗo wi'i mo: “Heɓtu ɗum.”
Nde Daawuda mbari Filistiijo, lorti nder saŋngeere, Abineer yahri mo yeeso Sawulu, hoore Goliyat ɗon haa juŋngo Daawuda.
Sawulu ƴami mo: “An suka, moy woni baaba ma?” Daawuda jaabi: “Mi ɓii Yessa, maccuɗo ma haa Baytilaama.”
Nde bolidal Sawulu bee Daawuda timmi, ɓernde Yonatan ɓii Sawulu fuɗɗi yiɗugo Daawuda masin. O yiɗi mo bana yoŋki maako.
Nyalaade maajum Sawulu accaay Daawuda hoota saare baaba mum, ammaa o jogiti mo.
Yonatan e Daawuda kaɓɓi alkawal soobiraaku, ngam Yonatan yiɗi mo bana o yiɗiri yoŋki maako.
Yonatan ɓorti ngapaleewol mum, hokki ngol Daawuda. O hokki mo limce maako e kaafahi maako e lagaawal maako e taadorgol maako fuu.
Koo toy Sawulu neli Daawuda fuu, o yehi, o heɓi jaalorgal. Ngam maajum Sawulu darni mo dow jama'aare konu muuɗum. Saraaki'en Sawulu e yimɓe fuu ngerdi mo.

Ɓaawo Daawuda jaali Filistiijo go, nde jama'aare konu ɗonno hoota, rewɓe ngurti berniiji e gure Isra'iila fuu ngam fottugo bee laamiiɗo Sawulu. Ɓe ɗon piya moolooji e bawɗi, ɓe ɗon ngama, ɓe ɗon ngimnda mo.
Nder gimol maɓɓe ɓe ɗon mbi'a:
“Sawulu mbari ujineere,
ammaa Daawuda ujine sappo
Sawulu seyoraaki gimol man, o tikki masin. O numi: “Sey ujineere tan ɓe ndokki yam, ammaa kaŋko ɓe ndokki mo ujine sappo. Walaa ko luttani mo heɓugo, sey laamu.”
Nyalaade maajum Sawulu fuɗɗi laarugo Daawuda bee gite kalluɗe e kaajal.
Jaŋngo maajum ruuhuwol kalluŋgol iwŋgol haa Allah jippi dow Sawulu, o wolwi nder saare maako bana ginnaaɗo. Daawuda fuɗɗi fiyugo moolooru bana nyalɗe goɗɗe. Sawulu ɗonno jogi labbo mum.
Nden o ɓaŋgti labbo ngo, o wi'i: “Sey mi tigga Daawuda haa mahol”, sakkini ngo boo. Ammaa Daawuda ruuɗi ngo nde ɗiɗi.
Sawulu fuɗɗi hulugo Daawuda, ngam Jawmiraawo ɗon wondi bee maako, acci Sawulu.
Ngam maajum Sawulu daayni Daawuda, waɗi mo hooreejo dow honooɓe ujineere. Daawuda ardi yimɓe mum nder haɓre,
heɓi jaalorgal nder kuuɗe mum fuu, ngam Jawmiraawo ɗon wondi bee maako.
Nde Sawulu yi'i ɗum, o tokki hulugo Daawuda.
Ammaa koo moy nder Isra'iila e nder Yahuuda yiɗi Daawuda ngam o ardiiɗo booɗɗo.

Sawulu wi'i Daawuda: “Mi hokkete Meerab, ɓiyam debbo mawniraajo, a ɓaŋga mo. Ammaa sey a huuwanammi, a haɓa bee konne'en Jawmiraawo.” Sawulu numi: “Walaa haaje juŋngo am meema mo, ndikka Filisti'en mbara mo.”
Daawuda jaabi mo: “Min kam mi moy? Ɓeye ngoni banndiraaɓe am e asŋgol amin nder Isra'iila? Mi fotaay mi laato esiraawo laamiiɗo.”
Nde nyalaade ɓaŋgal waɗi, Daawuda ɓaŋgaay Meerab ngam Sawulu te'ni mo haa Adiriyel, goɗɗo iwɗo Mehola.
Ammaa Mikal ɓii Sawulu debbo minyiraajo, yiɗi Daawuda. Nde Sawulu nani haala maajum, o seyi.
O numi: “Mi accan Daawuda ɓaŋga mo, haa o laatano mo tuuforgol, Filisti'en boo mbara mo.” Ngam maajum o wi'i Daawuda ɗiɗawre: “Hannde a laatoto esam.”
Sawulu umri saraaki'en mum: “Mbolwane Daawuda bee sirri, mbi'e mo: A anndi laamiiɗo ɗon yerdi ma, yimɓe maako fuu boo ngiɗi ma, esir bee maako kadi.”
Saraaki'en mbolwani Daawuda bana nii. Daawuda jaabi ɓe: “On tammi esirgo bee laamiiɗo ɗum koyɗum na? Naa mi leesɗo, talakaajo na?”
Kamɓe ɓe anndini ɗum Sawulu.
O umri ɓe ɓe mbi'a Daawuda: “Laamiiɗo ɗaɓɓataa sadaaki haa maaɗa, sey lare saadooniiku Filisti'en teemerre, ngam waataago konne'en muuɗum.” Ammaa o nufi halkugo Daawuda bee juuɗe Filisti'en.
Saraaki'en ngecci Daawuda haala man fuu. Ɗum fottani mo o laato esiraawo laamiiɗo. Diga nyalaade ɓaŋgal siwaa,
Daawuda yehi bee worɓe mum, ɓe mbari Filisti'en teemeɗɗe ɗiɗo. O yahrani laamiiɗo lare saadooniiku maɓɓe, o limani mo ɗe gootal gootal. Nden Sawulu hokki mo ɓiɗɗo mum Mikal, o laato debbo maako.
Sawulu faami bee laaɓɗum Jawmiraawo ɗon wondi bee Daawuda. O faami boo ɓiyiiko debbo yiɗi Daawuda.
Ngam maajum o tokki hulugo mo, o laati ganyo maako haa foroy.
Ardiiɓe Filisti'en tokki haɓugo bee Isra'iila'en. Nde haɓre waɗi fuu, Daawuda ɓura saraaki'en woɗɓe jaalaago. Ngam daliila man innde maako laati teddunde.
Sawulu wi'i ɓiɗɗo muuɗum Yonatan e saraaki'en muuɗum o tammi mbarugo Daawuda. Ammaa Yonatan soobiri bee Daawuda masin.
Ngam maajum o reentini
Min kam mi wurtoto, min bee baaba am, mi daro kommbi maako haa ngesa haa ngonɗa. Nden mi wolwana mo haala maaɗa, haa mi heɓta no ka wa'i. Ɓaawoɗon mi anndinte.”
Yonatan mani Daawuda haa noppi baaba mum. O wi'i mo: “Barkaama, taa waɗan suka ma Daawuda aybe, ngam o waɗanaay ma aybe, ammaa o waɗi ko nafete masin,

ngam o suklanaaki yoŋki maako nde o haɓi bee Goliyat, o mbari mo. Bee maako Jawmiraawo hisniri Isra'iila fuu. An boo a yi'i ɗum, a seyori ɗum. Ngam ɗume a yiɗi waɗugo aybe bee mbarugo goɗɗo mo waɗaay aybe? A walaa daliila sam.”
Sawulu nanani Yonatan, o huni hunayeere, o wi'i: “Fakat mi ɗon hunoro Jawmiraawo geeto, Daawuda, o mbarataake.”
Yonatan ewni Daawuda, yecci mo haala man fuu. Nden o yahri mo haa Sawulu, Daawuda boo jooɗi haa saare Sawulu bana naane.
Haɓre bee Filisti'en fuɗɗiti. Daawuda yehi, haɓi bee maɓɓe, jaali ɓe jaalorgal maŋngal haa ɓe ndoggi.
Nyannde feere, nde Daawuda ɗon fiya moolooru yeeso Sawulu, ruuhuwol kalluŋgol iwŋgol haa Jawmiraawo wari dow laamiiɗo fahin. O ɗon jooɗi haa suudu maako, labbo ɗon haa juŋngo maako.
O ɗaɓɓi tiggugo Daawuda bee labbo haa mahol, ammaa Daawuda ruuɗi ngo, ngo tiggi haa mahol. Bee jemma Daawuda doggi, daɗi.
Sawulu neli nelaaɓe haa saare Daawuda, haa ɓe ayna mo, ɓe mbara mo jaŋngo maajum fajiri. Ammaa Mikal, debbo Daawuda wi'i gorum: “To a hisnaay yoŋki ma jemmaare nde'e, ɓe mbarete jaŋngo
O jippini mo gal wurdere mahol, o wurti, o doggi, o daɗi.
Nden Mikal hoo'i lawru saare, wallini ndu dow be'itte. Haa hoore maaru o waɗi tayre laral mbeewa bee gaasaaji. O suddi lawru bee limce.
Nde Sawulu neli nelaaɓe ngam naŋngugo Daawuda, Mikal wi'i ɓe: “O nyawɗo.”
Sawulu neli ɓe fahin, umri ɓe ɓe nasta suudu, ɓe ndaara Daawuda. O wi'i: “Ngadde mo bee be'itte maako fuu ngam haa mi mbara mo.”
Nelaaɓe nasti suudu, tawaay Daawuda, sey lawru tan ɗon dow be'itte, bee gaasaaji mbeewa haa hoore maaru.
Sawulu ƴami Mikal: “Koni mbaɗɗa mi rikici bee wallugo konneejo am haa o daɗi?” Mikal jaabi mo: “O wi'i o mbaratam to mi yoofaay mo.”
Ammaa Daawuda daɗi, yehi Rama, haa Samuyila. O yecci mo ko Sawulu waɗi mo fuu. Nden o yahdi bee Samuyila haa Nayot.
Nde Sawulu nani Daawuda ɗon ton,

o neli nelaaɓe ngam haa ɓe naŋnga mo. Wakkati ɓe njotti ton, jama'aare annabi'en ɗon waɗa annabaaku. Samuyila, ardiiɗo maɓɓe boo ɗon dari kommbi maɓɓe. Nde yimɓe Sawulu ngi'i ɗum, Ruuhu Allah wari dow maɓɓe, ɓe puɗɗi waɗugo annabaaku.
Goɗɗo wi'i ɗum Sawulu. O neli nelaaɓe woɗɓe. Kamɓe boo ɓe puɗɗi waɗugo annabaaku. Fahin Sawulu neli nelaaɓe, ammaa kamɓe boo ɓe mbaɗi annabaaku.
Nden Sawulu bee hoore mum yehi Rama. Nde o yotti waawru mawndu haa Seku, o ƴami haa o tawata Samuyila e Daawuda. Ɓe njaabi mo: “Ɓe ɗon haa Nayot haa Rama.”
Saa'i o ɗon yaha ton, Ruuhu Allah wari dow maako kaŋko boo, o ɗon tokko laawol maako, o ɗon waɗa annabaaku haa o yotti Nayot haa Rama.

O ɓorti limce maako, o waɗi annabaaku yeeso Samuyila haa o somi, o do'i. Luttuɗum nyalawmaare maajum e jemmaare maajum fuu o ɗon waali haa lesdi o temmbo. Bana nii geccawol fuɗɗiri: Sawulu boo ɗon caka annabi'en na
Daawuda ummi Nayot haa Rama, o doggi, o wari haa Yonatan, o ƴami mo: “Aybewol ngole mi waɗani baaba ma? Ngam ɗume o ɗon ɗaɓɓa mbarugo yam?”
Yonatan wi'i: “Aa'a, o mbarataa ma, waɗataako! Baaba am waɗataa koo ɗume, koo mawɗum koo peetum, sonaa o aarta, o yeccammi ɗum. Kadi o suuɗatam huunde nde mbi'ɗa na? Irin maajum laatataako!”

Ammaa Daawuda huni, wi'i: “Baaba ma anndi booɗɗum a yerdi yam. Ngam maajum o anndinaay ma ko o tammi waɗugo, ngam taa ɓernde ma naawa. Fakat bana Jawmiraawo o geeto, an boo a geeto, hakkunde am bee waade kam, falannde woore tan.”
Yonatan wi'i: “Mi waɗante ko ngiɗɗa fuu.”
Daawuda wi'i: “Booɗɗum, jaŋngo ɗum fuɗɗoode lewru hesru, mi nyaamdan bee laamiiɗo. To a yerdake, mi yahataa, ammaa mi nyukkoto haa ladde haa faɓɓijaŋngo kiikiiɗe
To baaba ma heɓti mi waraay, wi' mo: Daawuda tori yam duŋayeere yaawɗaago haa Baytilaama, berniwol maako, ngam lenyol maako fuu ɗon waɗa kirseteeŋga hitaande nde'e.
To baaba ma wi'i: Booɗɗum, nden kam walaa ko saklatammi. Ammaa to tikkere maako saati jamum, a anndan o waɗi anniya mbarugo yam.
Useni, tabitin amaana meeɗen. Siftor alkawal soobaaku ngal kaɓɓuɗa bee am yeeso Jawmiraawo. Ammaa to mi waɗi aybe, sey mbaraami an! Ammaa taa hokkam haa juŋngo baaba ma.”
Yonatan jaabi mo: “Aa'a, kayya! Ɗum waɗataako! To mi anndi fakat baaba am ɗon nufo haala sarru dow maaɗa, nden mi anndinte ɗum.”
Daawuda ƴami mo: “Noy mi anndirta to baaba ma jaabake ma bee tikkere?”
Yonatan wi'i Daawuda: “War, ndillen haa yaasi.” Nde ɓe ɗon ngurto,
Yonatan wi'i: “Mi hunorake bee Jawmiraawo, Allah Isra'iila: Faɓɓijaŋngo bana wakkati jonta mi ƴaman baaba am. To o numi hayru ma, mi neldete habaru.

Non boo to o numi sarru ma, mi anndinte. To mi waɗaay, Jawmiraawo hiito yam bee caatal! Fakat mi wallete haa a hisna yoŋki ma. To doole a dogga, nden kam Jawmiraawo wondu bee maaɗa bana o wonduno bee baaba am.
To mi lutti bee yoŋki wakkati maajum, waɗanam mbooɗeeŋga bana Jawmiraawo waɗani ma, taa mbaram.
Taa ittan danygol am amaana haa foroy, koo to Jawmiraawo itti konne'en ma fuu dow lesdi
Yonatan haɓɓi alkawal bee saare Daawuda, o wi'i: “Jawmiraawo hiito konne'en Daawuda.”
Nden Yonatan ɓesdi wi'ugo: “Hunoranam bee yiide nde marɗa ngam am. Ngam min mi yiɗi ma bana ngiɗmi hoore am.”
Ɓaawo maajum Yonatan wi'i Daawuda: “Jaŋngo ɗum fuɗɗoode lewru hesru. Ɓe ɗaɓɓititte ngam joonde ma haa faada nyaamdu ferwan.
Faɓɓijaŋngo yah haa nokkuure nde nyukkuɗa nyannde go, nyukka baŋnge hayre wi'eteende Ejel.
Min kam mi fiɗan kuri tati gal wakeere hayre man bana to huunde fiɗeego ɗon ton.
Nden mi nela derkeejo haa o suɓta kuri man. To mi wi'i mo: Kuri njani gaa'e maaɗa, suɓtu! – nden kam wurta, haala ma jam, fakat bana Jawmiraawo o geeto, walaa sarru.
Ammaa to mi wi'i mo: Kuri njani gaɗa maaɗa – nden kam dillu, ngam Jawmiraawo neli ma daayiiɗum.
Ammaa siftor wolde alkawal hakkunde am bee maaɗa. Jawmiraawo tabitinan ngal haa foroy.”
Daawuda nyukki bana o wi'no. Nde fuɗɗoode lewru hesru yotti, laamiiɗo Sawulu wari haa pellel nyaamdu.
O jooɗi dow joonde maako haa mahol bana o woowi. Yonatan jooɗi, tiitotiri bee maako, Abineer mawɗo ardiiɓe sooje'en boo haa wakeere Sawulu. Ammaa joonde Daawuda ferwi.
Nyannde maajum Sawulu wi'aay koo ɗume, ngam o numi: “Teema woodi ko heɓi mo haa o senaaki ngam nyaamdu.”
Ammaa koo nyalaade juulde ɗiɗawre boo, joonde Daawuda ferwi. Ngam maajum Sawulu ƴami Yonatan: “Koni ɓii Yessa waraay nyaamugo keenya e hannde?”
Yonatan jaabi: “Daawuda tori yam duŋaye yahugo haa Baytilaama.

O wi'i yam: Useni accam mi yaha, ngam banndiraaɓe am mbaɗan kirseteeŋga nder berniwol. Mawnam umri yam mi wara. To a yerdake yam, accu mi yaha, mi laara deerɗiraaɓe am. Ngam maajum o waraay haa nyaamdu maaɗa.”
Sawulu tikkani Yonatan masin, o telɓani mo: “An njaaluujo! Mi anndi booɗɗum a soobiri bee ɓii Yessa oo, ɗum mbustu dow maaɗa e dow daada ma fuu.
Yaake Daawuda o geeto, yoŋki maaɗa hisaay, laamu ma boo tabitaay. Jonta nel naŋngugo mo, o he'i mbareego.”
Yonatan ƴami baaba mum: “Ngam ɗume a yiɗi mbarugo mo? Ɗume o waɗi?”
Ammaa Sawulu sakkini labbo mum haa yuwa Yonatan. Bana nii Yonatan anndiri anniya mbarugo Daawuda tabiti haa ɓernde Sawulu.
Yonatan tikki masin, o ummi haa taabal, o waawaay nyaamugo koo ɗume nyannde maajum. Ɓernde maako naawi ngam baaba maako huɗi Daawuda.
Jaŋngo maajum fajiri Yonatan wurti, yehi haa nokkuure nde o narrino bee Daawuda go, derkeejo ɗon wondi bee maako.
O wi'i derkeejo: “Yaawɗa, suɓtu kuri ɗi piɗanmi.” Nde o doggi, Yonatan fiɗi kurol haa gaɗa maako.
Derkeejo yotti pellel kurol man, ammaa Yonatan hooli: “Kurol ɗon gaɗa maaɗa.
Yaawɗa, taa dara!” Derkeejo hooci kurol ngol, waddi ngol haa Yonatan.
O anndaa ko saawi nder haala maajum, sey Yonatan e Daawuda anndi ɗum.
Yonatan hokki derkeejo lagaawal e kuri haa o hoora ɗum nder berniwol.
Nde o dilli, Daawuda wurti nyukkorde mum haa wakeere hayre fombinaare. O tuggi koppi, nden o sujidi nde tati. Ɓe koofnindiri, kaŋko e Yonatan, ɓe mboyi ɓe ɗiɗo fuu, ammaa bojji Daawuda ɓuri semmbe.
Nden Yonatan wi'i mo: “Yah jam! Taa yejjitit ko en kunotiri bee innde Jawmiraawo. Alkawal man tabiti hakkunde meeɗen, hakkunde ɓiɓɓe men boo. Jawmiraawo tabitin ɗum!”
Daawuda ummi, dilli, Yonatan boo hooti berniwol mum.
Daawuda yehi haa Ahimelek, limanjo haa Noba. Ahimelek wari haa Daawuda, o diwni, o ƴami: “Ngam ɗume ngarɗa an feere ma? Toy yimɓe ma?”
Daawuda jaabi: “Laamiiɗo neli yam bee umroore sirri. O wi'i yam taa goɗɗo annda ngam ɗume o neli yam malla ko o umri yam. Sukaaɓe am boo, mi hawran bee maɓɓe haa nokkuure kaja.
Ɗume a woodi bana nyaamdu? Hokkam tamseeje jowi koo boo ko a mari bana nyaamdu fuu.”
Limanjo jaabi mo: “Mi walaa tamseeje meere, sey cenaaɗe. Mi hokkataa ma ɗe, sonaa to sukaaɓe ma kawtaay bee rewɓe.”
Daawuda wi'i: “Taa sakla! Bana naane min meemaay rewɓe. Wakkati min ummi, worɓe am ɓe senaaɓe, koo ɗum laataaki jahaaŋgal cenaaŋgal. Sakkomaa hannde ɓe senaaɓe
Nde limanjo nani ɗum, o hokki Daawuda tamseeje ɗe o ittuno haa taabal nder suudu Jawmiraawo ngam haa o jo'ina kese.
Nyannde man Do'ek Edoomiijo, mawɗo waynaaɓe Sawulu ɗon ton haa yeeso Jawmiraawo.
Daawuda ƴami Ahimelek: “A walaa labbo malla kaafahi ngam am na? Mi heɓaay hoo'ugo balmi am, ngam umroore laamiiɗo yaawɗini yam masin
