Limanjo jaabi: “Mi woodi kaafahi Goliyat Filistiijo mo mbarɗa nder waadiwol bi'eteeŋgol Leɗɗe-mawɗe. Ki saawaama nder limce, ndaa ki ɓaawo limce limanku. To a yiɗi kam, hoo'u ki. Balmol feere walaa ɗo.” Daawuda wi'i: “Ɓuranki ki'i walaa, hokkam ki.”
Nyannde maajum Daawuda ummi Noba, tokki doggugo Sawulu. O wari haa Akis, laamiiɗo Gaat
Saraaki'en annditi mo, mbi'i Akis: “Na kaŋko woni Daawuda, laamiiɗo maɓɓe! Ngam maako ɓe ngami, ɓe ngimi:
Sawulu mbari ujineere,
ammaa Daawuda ujine sappo
Daawuda samɗini bolle ɗe'e, o huli laamiiɗo Akis masin
O waɗi hoore maako bana o ginnaaɗo caka maɓɓe, o ɗon ngaasa pareeje dammugal, o ɗon ilna tuuɗe maako dow wakkude maako.
Akis wi'i jaggiiɓe mum: “Ndaa, on ɗon ngi'a o ginnaaɗo. Koni ngadduɗon mo haa am?
Kadi yinnaaɓe haa ɗo ke'aay na? On ngiɗi o daamammi bee ginnawol maako na? Mi yiɗaa mo haa saare am.”
Daawuda doggi ton, wari haa lowol Adullam. Nde deerɗiraaɓe maako e luttuɓe saare baaba maako nani ɗum, ɓe ngari haa maako
Non boo yimɓe woɗɓe, ɓilliiɓe e tokkaaɓe nyamaale e haaɗa-ɓerɗe'en, ɓe fuu ɓe mooɓi haa Daawuda, ɓe ɗon baakin teemeɗɗe nayo. Daawuda laati ardiiɗo maɓɓe.
Daawuda ummi ton, yehi Mispe
Bana nii o acciri saaro'en maako haa laamiiɗo Mo'abi'en. Ɓe njooɗi ton saa'i Daawuda ɗon nyukki nder gasol.
Ammaa annabi Gada wi'i Daawuda: “Taa jooɗa haa ɗo nder gasol, hootu lesdi Yahuuda.” Ngam maajum Daawuda ummi, yehi laynde Heeret.

Nyannde feere Sawulu nani habaru yimɓe woɗɓe ngi'i Daawuda e yimɓe muuɗum. Saa'i maajum Sawulu ɗon jooɗi les aslahi gonki haa towndiire haa Gibiya, labbo maako ɗon haa juŋngo maako. Saraaki'en maako fuu ɗon ndari, taari mo.
O wi'i ɓe: “Naneeɗam, onon yimɓe Benyamin! Kadi on tammi ɓii Yessa hokkan on gese alkamaari e gese inabooje na? Malla o waɗan on mawɓe fuu dow honooɓe ujineere malla dow honooɓe teemerre?

Ngam maajum on tuurtani yam. Walaa koo gooto nder mooɗon anndini yam alkawal ɓiyam bee ɓii Yessa oo. Walaa koo gooto mooɗon suklani yam, walaa mo faamtini yam haala ɓiyam mo ummini maccuɗo am ngam waaltanaago yam bana hannde.”
Do'ek Edoomiijo ɗon dari ton caka yimɓe Sawulu. O wi'i: “Ndaa, mi yi'i ɓii Yessa nde o wari haa Noba, haa Ahimelek ɓii Ahitooba.
Limanjo ƴami muuyo Jawmiraawo ngam maako, hokki mo njooɓaari, hokki mo kaafahi Goliyat Filistiijo boo
Laamiiɗo Sawulu neli ɗaɓɓugo Ahimelek ɓii Ahitooba, kaŋko e saare baaba maako fuu, waato liman'en wonɓe haa Noba fuu. Ɓe fuu ɓe ngari haa laamiiɗo.
Sawulu wi'i: “Nan, ɓii Ahitooba!” Ahimelek jaabi: “Na'am, barkaama.”
Sawulu wi'i mo: “Koni on tuurtani yam, an e ɓii Yessa? Koni ndokkuɗa mo tamseeje e kaafahi, ƴamɗa muuyo Allah ngam maako boo? Jonta o ummani yam ngam waaltanaago yam.”
Ahimelek jaabi laamiiɗo: “Asee, naa Daawuda woni koolaaɗo ma ɓurɗo yimɓe ma fuu na? O esiraawo ma boo, o ardiiɗo doogari'en ma suɓaaɓe, koo moy haa saare ma ɗon teddina mo.
Nonnon, naa hannde tan boo mi ƴami Allah ngam maako. Aa'a, barkaama, taa aybinam dow koo ɗume, taa aybin banndiraaɓe am boo. Mi anndaano koo ɗume nder haala maajum fuu.”
Ammaa laamiiɗo wi'i: “Fakat, an Ahimelek, a maayan bee yimɓe saare ma fuu.”

O umri aynooɓe dariiɓe ton: “Taare liman'en Jawmiraawo, mbare ɓe. Ɓe mballi Daawuda, ɓe anndi o doggi yam, ammaa ɓe ngeccaay yam.” Ammaa worɓe ɓe'e cali fortugo juuɗe muuɗum'en ngam mbarugo liman'en Jawmiraawo.
Ngam maajum Sawulu wi'i Do'ek Edoomiijo: “An, war mbaru ɓe!” Do'ek mbari ɓe, liman'en cappanɗe njoweetato e njowo, ɓorniiɓe toggooje limanku.
Nden Sawulu umri mbarugo jooɗiiɓe haa Noba, berniwol liman'en fuu, bee mbeldi kaafahi: Worɓe e rewɓe, derke'en e musinankoy, non boo na'i e bamɗe e dammooji fuu.
Ammaa gooto nder ɓiɓɓe Ahimelek daɗi. Innde maako Abiyatar. O doggi, o wari haa Daawuda,
o yecci mo no Sawulu mbardi liman'en Jawmiraawo.
Daawuda wi'i Abiyatar: “Nde ngi'mi Do'ek Edoomiijo haa Noba naane, mi anndi o yeccan ɗum Sawulu. Maayde banndiraaɓe ma fuu ɗum aybe am.
Jooɗoda bee am, taa hul! Sawulu ɗon ɗaɓɓa mbarugo en en ɗiɗo fuu, ammaa haa am a heɓi jam.”
Daawuda nani habaru Filisti'en ɗon ukkano Ke'ila, ɓe ɗon njaɓta gawri haa laarɗe
Daawuda ƴami Jawmiraawo: “Mi yaha haɓugo bee Filisti'en na?” Jawmiraawo jaabi mo: “Yah, ukkana Filisti'en, hisnu Ke'ila.”
Ammaa yimɓe maako mbi'i mo: “Koo haa ɗo nder lesdi Yahuuda boo en ɗon bee kulol, sakkomaa to en ndilli haɓugo bee caffuuji Filisti'en.”
Daawuda ƴami Jawmiraawo fahin. Jawmiraawo jaabi mo: “Umma, yah haa Ke'ila. Mi hokkete Filisti'en haa juŋngo ma.”
Daawuda yehi Ke'ila, kaŋko e yimɓe muuɗum. Ɓe ukkani Filisti'en, ɓe mbari ɗuuɗɓe nder maɓɓe, ɓe koo'i dabbaaji maɓɓe. Bana nii Daawuda hisniri jooɗiiɓe berniwol Ke'ila.
Haa ton Abiyatar ɓii Ahimelek warino haa Daawuda, wakkati o doggi Sawulu. Limce limanku ɗon haa juŋngo maako.
Nde Sawulu nani Daawuda wari haa Ke'ila, o wi'i: “Yowwa, jonta Allah hokki mo haa juŋngo am. Daawuda do'ake nder tuuforgol, ngam o maɓɓi hoore maako nder berniwol bee dammuɗe e jamɗe palduɗe.”
Sawulu ewni honooɓe Isra'iila'en fuu, ngam haa ɓe njahda bee muuɗum haa Ke'ila, ɓe taaro berniwol ngam honugo Daawuda e worɓe mum.
Daawuda faami Sawulu ɗon waɗa dabare honugo mo. Ngam maajum o umri Abiyatar, limanjo: “Waddu limce limanku.”
Nden o wi'i: “Yaa Jawmiraawo, Allah Isra'iila, mi anndi Sawulu waɗi anniya wargo haa Ke'ila, haa o halka berniwol ngam daliila am.
Yimɓe Ke'ila ndokkatam haa juŋngo maako na? Sawulu waran na? Mi ɗon toro ma, yaa Jawmiraawo, Allah Isra'iila, anndinam ɗum.” Jawmiraawo jaabi mo: “O waran.”
Daawuda ƴami: “Yimɓe Ke'ila ndokkatam, min e yimɓe am, haa juŋngo maako na?” Jawmiraawo jaabi: “Ɓe ndokkan.”
Ngam maajum Daawuda ummi, kaŋko e yimɓe muuɗum, baakin worɓe teemeɗɗe njoweego. Ɓe ngurti Ke'ila, ɓe njehi haa ɓe mbaawi yahugo fuu. Nde Sawulu nani Daawuda wurti Ke'ila, daɗi, o acci taasnugo mo.
Daawuda faɓɓi nder gasi dow kooseeje nder ladde Zif haa Horeesa. Sawulu ɗaɓɓiti mo wakkati man fuu, ammaa Allah hokkaay Daawuda haa juŋngo Sawulu.
Daawuda anndi laaɓɗum Sawulu yiɗi mbarugo mo.
Saa'i maajum Daawuda ɗon jooɗi haa Horeesa nder ladde Zif.
Yonatan ɓii Sawulu yehi, tawi mo ton. O semmbiɗini hoolaare Daawuda bee Allah,
o wi'i mo: “Taa hul! Juŋngo baaba am heɓataa naawnugo ma. An a laatoto laamiiɗo Isra'iila, min boo mi ɗiɗaɓo maaɗa. Kanjum, baaba am anndi ɗum booɗɗum.”
Ɓe ɗiɗo fuu ɓe kaɓɓi alkawal soobaaku yeeso Jawmiraawo. Nden Yonatan hooti saare mum, ammaa Daawuda tokki jooɗaago haa Horeesa
Yimɓe Zif ngari haa Sawulu haa Gibiya. Ɓe mbi'i mo: “Daawuda ɗon nyukki haa lesdi amin, nder gasi haa Horeesa dow hooseere Hakila, haa fombina harde Yahuuda
War, waɗ ko ngiɗɗa barkaama. Minin kam min nastinan mo nder juuɗe ma.”
Sawulu wi'i ɓe: “Jawmiraawo barkiɗin on, ngam on enɗi yam.
Njehe, tefe fahin, ndaare nokkuure haa o woni, keɓte giiɗo mo ton. Mi meeɗi nanugo o ƴoyɗo masin.

Mbiɗite nokkuuje fuu haa o waawi nyukkaago. To on anndi koo ɗume fuu bee laaɓɗum, lorte haa am. Nden mi yahda bee mooɗon. To o wurtaaki lesdi tawon, mi heɓtan mo, koo to doole mi tefa mo nder le'i Yahuuda fuu.”
Kamɓe ɓe aarti Sawulu hootugo haa Zif. Ammaa Daawuda e worɓe mum njahno ladde hamaadaare Ma'on, ɓe nasti haa luggol haa fombina harde Yahuuda.
Sawulu e worɓe mum njehi ngam haa ɓe ɗaɓɓita mo ton. Nde Daawuda nani ɗum, o wa'i tapaare feere nder ladde hamaadaare Ma'on. Sawulu nani ɗum, o taasni mo.

Sawulu e worɓe mum njehi haa wuttudu hooseere ndu'u, Daawuda e worɓe mum boo haa wuttudu maare nduya. Daawuda haɓdi doggugo taasnooɓe ɗum, ammaa Sawulu e worɓe mum ɓadi taaraago mo e yimɓe maako ngam naŋngugo ɓe.
Ɗon nii nelaaɗo wari haa Sawulu, wi'i mo: “War law, wallu min, Filisti'en kippake lesdi meeɗen.”
Sawulu acci taasnugo Daawuda, o yehi haɓoygo bee Filisti'en. Ngam maajum nokkuure man wi'aama Tapaare-cennduki.
Daawuda wa'i, nyukki haa En-Gedi nder gasi.
Nde Sawulu warti diga haɓre bee Filisti'en, o nani Daawuda ɗon nder ladde haa En-Gedi.
Sawulu hoo'i honooɓe ujine tato (3.000), suɓaaɓe nder Isra'iila fuu, nden o yehi haa o ɗaɓɓita Daawuda e worɓe mum haa Tapaare-Be'i kooseeje.
O wari haa baalɗe dammooji kommbi laawol. Lowol ɗon ton. O nasti ngol ngam waɗugo haaje maako. Daawuda e worɓe mum ɗonno njooɗi ton
Worɓe Daawuda mbi'i: “Hannde woni nyalaade nde Jawmiraawo wi'i ma: Ndaa, mi hokkete konneejo ma haa juŋngo ma. Waɗ mo ko fottani ma.” Daawuda ɓaditi Sawulu bee sirri, ta'i gawargal limce maako seɗɗa.
Ammaa ɓaawoɗon ɓernde maako de'itaay ngam ko o waɗino.
O wi'i worɓe maako: “Jawmiraawo haɗam ɗum, taa mi meema jaagorɗo am. Ngam kaŋko woni laamiiɗo mo Jawmiraawo suɓi.”
Bee bolle ɗe'e o haɗiri yimɓe maako ngam taa ɓe ukkano Sawulu.
Nde Sawulu wurti lowol man,
Daawuda boo wurti, ewni Sawulu. O wi'i: “Laamiiɗo am, barkaama.” Sawulu yeesiti. Daawuda tuggi koppi, turi yeeso maako,
wi'i: “Ngam ɗume a nananta yimɓe wi'anɓe ma mi yiɗi halkugo ma?

Hanndeere nde'e ngi'ɗa bee gite ma no Jawmiraawo hokki ma nder juŋngo am, haa ton nder lowol. Yimɓe am mbi'i yam mi mbare, ammaa mi acci ma. Mi sali naawnugo jaagorɗo am, ngam an woni laamiiɗo mo Jawmiraawo suɓi.

Baaba am, laar gawargal limce ma haa juŋngo am. Koyɗum mi mbaranno ma, ammaa mi ta'i gawargal limce ma tan. Faamu mi tuurtanaay ma, mi ɗaɓɓataa waɗugo ma halleende. Mi waɗaay ma aybe, ammaa an a ɗon looho yam haa mbara mi.
Jawmiraawo hiito hakkunde am bee maaɗa. Kaŋko o waato halleende nde mbaɗɗa mi, ammaa min mi ɓaŋgtataa juŋngo am dow maaɗa.
A anndi geccawol kaakiraaɓe men: Halleende kam, haa halluɓe iwata. Kadi min mi meemataa ma.
Anndu ko mbaɗata. Moy a taasnata? Laamiiɗo Isra'iila ɗon taasna rawaandu waatndu, asee, pilpilyel o taasnata!
Mi accan kiita haa juŋngo Jawmiraawo, haa o hiito hakkunde am bee maaɗa. Kaŋko o gooŋɗinammi, o hisnammi juŋngo ma.”
Nde Daawuda timmini wolwugo, Sawulu ƴami mo: “Fakat ɗum an na, Daawuda, ɓiŋngel am?” Sawulu ɓaŋgti sawtu, fuɗɗi woyugo.
Nden o wi'i Daawuda: “A semtini yam. A waɗani yam mbooɗeeŋga, ammaa min mi waɗi ma halleende.
Hannde mbooɗeeŋga ma waŋgi, ngam Jawmiraawo nastinno yam juŋngo ma, ammaa a acci yam, a mbaraay yam.
Nde noy ɗum laatoto haa goɗɗo tawa konneejo mum, acca mo o dilla jam? Jawmiraawo warjo ma mbooɗeeŋga ma dow am hannde.
Jonta anndumi a laatoto laamiiɗo fakat, laamu Isra'iila tabitan haa juŋngo ma.
Ammaa hunoranam bee Jawmiraawo, a halkataa danygol am, ngam taa innde am majja nder saare baaba am.”
Daawuda huni dow maajum. Nden Sawulu hooti saare mum, Daawuda e yimɓe mum boo lori haa gasol muuɗum'en nder kooseeje.
Saa'i maajum Samuyila maayi. Isra'iila'en mooɓi, mboyi mo. Nden ɓe uwi mo nder saare haa Rama.
Wakkati maajum Daawuda ummi, yehi fombina, jooɗi nder ladde hamaadaare Paran.

Haa wuro Ma'on woodi goɗɗo diskuɗo masin. Innde maako Nabal mo lenyol Kaaleb. O mari baali ujine tati (3.000) e be'i ujineere (1.000), ɗi ɗon ndura kommbi wuro Karmel. Abigayel, debbo maako o ŋarniiɗo, kakkilɗo, ammaa Nabal o caatuɗo, kalluɗo.
Nder ladde Daawuda nani Nabal ɗon meksa gaasa baali mum haa Karmel,
o suɓi suka'en sappo nder worɓe maako, o wi'i ɓe: “Njehe haa Karmel, haa Nabal, koofne mo bee innde am.
Mbi'e mo: Ndaa nii Daawuda wi'i: Allah hokke sabbuŋgo, Allah hokke jam, an bee saare ma e ko marɗa fuu.
Mi nani a mari meksooɓe gaasa baali ma. Anndu waynaaɓe ma ɗonno ngondi bee amin, min mbaɗaay ɓe kalluɗum. Walaa koo ɗume majjiri ɓe yaake ɓe ɗonno haa Karmel fuu.
Ƴam sukaaɓe ma, ɓe ngooŋɗinan bolle am. Kadi mo'an sukaaɓe am, ngam hannde woni nyalaade juulde haa maaɗa. Useni, woonan ɓe, hokku ɓe ko juŋngo ma heɓi ngam ɓiɗɗo ma Daawuda.”
Kamɓe ɓe njehi, ɓe anndini Nabal bolle Daawuda ɗe'e fuu. Nden ɓe ɗon ndeena.
Ammaa Nabal telɓani ɓe: “Daawuda, ɗum moy? Ɓii Yessa, ɗum moy? Maccuɓe dogguɓe jawmiraaɓe muuɗum'en ɗuuɗi hannde.
Nyaamdu am e ndiyam am e kusel ngel kirsumi, meksooɓe gaasa baali am keɓata ɗum. Kadi mi hoo'a ɗum, mi hokka ɗum yimɓe ɓe mi anndaa iwde muuɗum'en na?”
Ɓe lori haa Daawuda, ɓe ngecci mo haala man fuu.

Daawuda umri worɓe mum: “Mbakke kaafaaje mon!” Koo moy wakki kaafahi mum. Kaŋko boo o wakki ki maako nden o yahdi bee worɓe teemeɗɗe nayo (400). Ammaa teemeɗɗe ɗiɗo (200), o acci ɓe ngam aynugo kuuje maɓɓe.
Ammaa gooto nder suka'en Nabal yehi haa Abigayel, o wi'i mo: “Nelaaɓe Daawuda ngari diga ladde ngam hoofnugo jaagorɗo amin. Ammaa kaŋko o saatani ɓe.
Fakat, worɓe Daawuda ɗon mboonana min masin, ɓe meeɗaay waɗugo min kalluɗum. Walaa ko majji yaake min ɗonno ngondi bee maɓɓe nder ladde.
Wakkati min ngondi bee maɓɓe e min ndurdi fuu, ɓe ayni min jemma e nyalawma bana mahol taariiŋgol min.
Useni, numtu ɗum, anndu no a hisnirta en. To a waawaay, nden kam sarru ukkanto jaagorɗo amin e saare maako fuu. A anndi o meereejo, o nanantaa koo moy.”
Law Abigayel hoo'i tamseeje teemeɗɗe ɗiɗi, kanyakanyaaji
Nden o umri sukaaɓe: “Njehe onon, ardeeɗam, min kam mi tokkoto on.” Ammaa o yeccaay goriiko koo ɗume.
O wa'i wamnde maako, o tokki ɓe. Nde o ɗon diirto hooseere, ndaa, Daawuda e worɓe mum potti bee maako.
Hiddeko ɓe potta, Daawuda numno: “Fakat, ko gorko oo mari nder ladde fuu, mi ayni ɗum meere. Walaa koo gootel majji. Ammaa kaŋko o warji mbooɗeeŋga am bee halleende.
Jawmiraawo hiito konne'en am to mi luttani mo gorko gooto nder yimɓe maako haa jaŋngo fajiri.”
Nde Abigayel yi'i Daawuda, o jippi wamnde maako bee jaawal, o tuggi koppi, turi yeeso Daawuda.
O do'i les kosɗe Daawuda, o wi'i: “Ɗum fuu ɗum aybe am, barkaama! Mi korɗo ma, duŋanam wolwango ma, yerda nanugo bolle am.
Useni, taa suklana gorko am Nabal, o laati ko innde maako wi'i, o paataaɗo meereejo. Min kam mi walaa ton nde nelaaɓe ma ngari, barkaama.
Ɗum Jawmiraawo haɗi ma waataago aybe man e rufugo ƴiiƴam hannde. Fakat bana Jawmiraawo o geeto, an boo a geeto, konne'en ma e ɗaɓɓanɓe halkugo ma fuu ɓe hiiteteeɓe bana Nabal.
Jaɓ dokkal ngal ngaddanmaami, a hokka ngal sukaaɓe tokkiiɓe ma.

Yaafanam, aybewol am, barkaama. Mi anndi Jawmiraawo waɗete laamiiɗo fakat, o tabitinan laamu ma haa saare ma boo. Ngam a ɗon haɓana Jawmiraawo nder konuuji mum, balɗe ma fuu walaa mo heɓata aybingo ma dow koo ɗume.
To goɗɗo taasni ma, yiɗi mbarugo ma, Allah Jawmiraawo maaɗa aynan yoŋki ma kommbi maako. Ammaa yoŋkiiji konne'en ma, o sakkinan ɗi bana goɗɗo sakkinirta hayre bee piwlol.
To Jawmiraawo laatini barkaaji ɗi o wi'no ma fuu, to o hokki ma laamu dow Isra'iila,
nden kam walaa ko teddanta numo ɓernde ma, ngam a rufaay ƴiiƴam bilaa daliila, a acci waataago boo. To Jawmiraawo woonani ma, barkaama, siftor korɗo ma.”
Daawuda wi'i Abigayel: “Yettoore laatano Jawmiraawo, Allah Isra'iila mo neli ma hannde ngam fottugo bee am.
An boo, barka laatano ma ngam hakkiilo ma, ngam a haɗi yam waataago e rufugo ƴiiƴam hannde.
Ammaa fakat bana Jawmiraawo o geeto, Allah Isra'iila mo haɗi yam waɗugo ma kalluɗum: To a yaawɗaayno fottugo bee am, walaa koo gooto nder worɓe Nabal luttanno hiddeko jaŋngo fajiri.”
Daawuda jaɓi dokke Abigayel, o wi'i mo: “Hootu saare ma jam. Mi waɗan ko toriiɗa mi.”
Nde Abigayel warti saare, Nabal ɗon jooɗodi bee yimɓe mum, ɗon nyaama nyaamduuji ɗuuɗɗi bana ɗi laamiiɗo. Ɓernde maako ɗon seyi, o ɗon wuyki masin. Ngam maajum debbo maako yeccaay mo koo ɗume.
Jaŋngo maajum fajiri, nde wuykere acci mo, Abigayel anndini mo ko waɗi. Nde o nani ɗum, ɓernde maako yoori nder maako, laati bana hayre.
Ɓaawo nyalɗe sappo Jawmiraawo maayni mo.

Nde Daawuda nani haala maajum, o wi'i: “Yettoore laatano Jawmiraawo ngam o waɗani yam kiita, o gooŋɗini yam. O haɗi yam waɗugo aybe, ammaa o hiiti mo ngam o huɗi yam, o lorni halleende Nabal dow hoore muuɗum.” Nden Daawuda neldi muuyugo Abigayel, ngam haa o te'a mo.
Nelaaɓe maako ngari haa Abigayel haa Karmel, ɓe mbi'i mo: “Daawuda neli min haa maaɗa, ngam o yiɗi te'ugo ma.”
Abigayel ummi, tuggi koppi, turi, nden o wi'i: “Mi korɗo maako, mi taaskani lootugo kosɗe huuwanooɓe mo.”
O yaawɗi, o wa'i wamnde maako, o tokki nelaaɓe Daawuda, kaŋko e horɓe maako njowo. O laati debbo Daawuda.
Daawuda aartuno te'ugo Ahino'am, iwɗo Yisre'el. Ahino'am e Abigayel, ɓe ɗiɗo fuu ɓe laati rewɓe maako.
Ammaa Mikal, debbo maako arano, Sawulu hoocuno mo, hokki mo Palti ɓii Layis mo Gallima.
Yimɓe Zif ngari haa Sawulu haa Gibiya. Ɓe mbi'i mo: “Daawuda ɗon nyukki haa hooseere Hakila haa fuunaaŋge harde Yahuuda
Sawulu ummi, yehi haa ladde Zif ngam ɗaɓɓititgo Daawuda. Honooɓe Isra'iila suɓaaɓe ujine tato (3.000) njahdi bee maako.
Nde ɓe njotti hooseere Hakila yeeso harde Yahuuda, ɓe caŋngini kommbi laawol. Saa'i maajum Daawuda ɗon haa harde tawon. O nani Sawulu wari ngam ɗaɓɓititgo mo,
o neli horooɓe, o annditi fakat Sawulu wari.
Nden o ummi bee hoore maako, o yehi, o tawi saŋngeere Sawulu. O laari haa Sawulu e Abineer ɓii Neer, mawɗo honooɓe maako ɗon mbaali. Sawulu ɗon haa caka saŋngeere, yimɓe fuu ɗon taari mo.
Daawuda ƴami Ahimelek Hetiijo e Abisay ɓii Seruyatu, deerɗiraawo Yo'ab: “Moy yahdata bee am nder saŋngeere Sawulu?” Abisay jaabi: “Mi yahdan bee ma.”

Wakkati jemma Daawuda e Abisay nasti saŋngeere. Ɓe caali worɓe taariiɓe Sawulu, ɓe caali Abineer boo, ɓe fuu ɓe ɗon ɗaani. Ɓe tawi Sawulu haa caka saŋngeere, o ɗon ɗaani. Labbo maako ɗon tiggi nder lesdi kommbi hoore maako.
Abisay wi'i Daawuda: “Hannde Allah hokki konneejo ma haa juŋngo ma. Accu mi tigga mo bee labbo haa lesdi, nde woore tan, walaa haaje mi waɗa ɗum nde ɗiɗi.”
Ammaa Daawuda wi'i: “Taa halku mo! Kaŋko woni laamiiɗo mo Jawmiraawo suɓi. Kadi Jawmiraawo hiitataako mo meemi cuɓaaɗo maako na?
Fakat bana Jawmiraawo o geeto, kaŋko tan hiitoto Sawulu, koo o maaya non, koo o halka nder haɓre.
Jawmiraawo haɗammi meemugo laamiiɗo mo o suɓi. Ammaa hoocu labbo maako e jollooru maako, nden en ndillu!”
Ɓe kooci labbo e jollooru, ɓe ndilli. Walaa gi'ɗo ɓe, walaa nanɗo ɓe, walaa pinɗo, ɓe ɗon ɗaani ɓe fuu, ngam Jawmiraawo ukki ɗoyŋgol lugguŋgol dow maɓɓe.
Daawuda lori haa wakeere waadiwol feere, o wa'i hooseere haa o tiitotiri bee saŋngeere, daayiiɗum bee maare.
Nden o hooli heedi ummaatoore e Abineer: “Abineer, a ɗon nanammi na?” Abineer jaabi: “Moy findinta laamiiɗo bee hoolo bana nii?”
Daawuda wi'i: “Na a gorko? Moy nder Isra'iila foti haɓugo bee maaɗa? Kadi ngam ɗume a aynaay jaagorɗo ma laamiiɗo? Neeɓaay goɗɗo nasti saŋngeere ngam mbarugo mo.

A waɗaay kuugal ma bana no fotti. Fakat bana Jawmiraawo o geeto, on fuu on ke'i kiita mbareego, ngam on aynaay jaagorɗo mon, laamiiɗo mo Jawmiraawo suɓi. Laar! Toy labbo laamiiɗo? Toy jollooru maako? Kuuje man ɗonno haa hoore maako.”
Sawulu annditi sawtu Daawuda. O ƴami: “Ɗum an na, Daawuda, ɓiŋngel am?” Daawuda jaabi: “Ɗum min, barkaama.”
Nden o ɓesdi wi'ugo: “Ngam ɗume a taasnatammi? Ko mbaɗmaami? Ɗume woni aybe am?

Nanam, laamiiɗo am ko maccuɗo ma yiɗi wi'go: Moy ummini ma dow am? To ɗum Jawmiraawo kam, lii'anen mo kirseteeŋga. Ammaa to ɗum yimɓe, nden kam Jawmiraawo hiito ɓe. Ngam ɓe ndiiwi yam yaasi lesdi Jawmiraawo, ɓe ngiɗi doolugo yam mi rewa ɗowanteeɓe jananɓe.
Taa accu ɓe mbarammi haa lesdi ndaayiindi bee Jawmiraawo. Ngam ɗume a loohoto yam bana gerlal nder kooseeje? Laamiiɗo Isra'iila wurti ngam naŋngugo pilpilyel.”
Sawulu wi'i: “Mi waɗi aybe. Lorta, ɓiŋngel am Daawuda, mi meetataa waɗugo ma kalluɗum. A samɗini yoŋki am hannde. Fakat, mi laatino paataaɗo, mi waɗi ma aybe masin.”
Daawuda jaabi mo: “Ndaa ɗo labbo ma, barkaama. Gooto nder yimɓe ma wara, hoo'a ngo.
Jawmiraawo warjoto koo moy fodde adilaaku e gooŋgaaku maako. Hannde o nastini ma juŋngo am, ammaa mi sali naawnugo laamiiɗo mo o suɓi.
Bana min mi samɗini yoŋki ma hannde, bana non Jawmiraawo samɗinirta yoŋki am boo, wurtintammi ɓillaaje fuu.”
Sawulu wi'i: “Allah barkiɗine, ɓiŋngel am Daawuda. A heɓan barka nder ko mbaɗata fuu.” Nden Daawuda tokki laawol mum, Sawulu boo hooti haa saare mum.
Daawuda numi: “Nyannde feere Sawulu mbaratam. Ndikka mi daɗa, mi heɓa hisrude haa lesdi Filisti'en. Nden kam Sawulu accan tefugo yam koo toy nder Isra'iila.”
Daawuda ummi, kaŋko e worɓe teemeɗɗe njoweego (600) wonduɓe bee maako, ɓe njehi haa Akis ɓii Ma'ok, laamiiɗo Gaat.
Ɓe njooɗi ton, koo moy bee saare mum. Rewɓe Daawuda ɗiɗo boo ɗon ton, Ahino'am mo Yisre'el e Abigayel mo Karmel, laatinooɗo debbo Nabal.
Nde Sawulu nani Daawuda ɗon haa Gaat, o acci tefugo mo.
Daawuda wi'i Akis: “To a yerdake yam, accu mi yaha berniwol ma gootol, mi jooɗo ton. Walaa haaje mi jooɗodo bee maaɗa nder berniwol laamiiɗo, barkaama.”
Nyalaade maajum Akis hokki mo Cikilak. Ngam maajum laamiiɓe Yahuuda mari Cikilak haa wargo hannde.
Daawuda faɓɓi nder lesdi Filisti'en nduuɓu e lebbi nayi.
Wakkati maajum Daawuda e worɓe mum ɗon njaha, ɗon ukkano Gesuri'en e Gijiri'en e Amaleki'en, jooɗiiɓe haa lesdi man diga ɓooyma, haa yotti Sura e lesdi Misra.
Haa Daawuda yahata fuu, o halka worɓe e rewɓe, o hooca dammooji e na'i e bamɗe e geelooɗi e limce. Nden o lora haa Akis.
Akis ƴama mo: “Toy njahɗon hippugo jonta?” Nden Daawuda jaaba: “Haa Lesdi Fombina, lesdi Yahuuda” malla “Haa Lesdi Fombina, lesdi Yerahameeli'en”, maaboo “Haa Lesdi Fombina, lesdi Keni'en.”
Daawuda accaay koo moy, o waddaay worɓe e rewɓe naŋngaaɓe haa Gaat boo, ngam taa goɗɗo yecca Filisti'en ko Daawuda e worɓe mum mbaɗi. Saa'i o ɗon jooɗi haa lesdi Filisti'en, nii non o waarata.
Akis nuɗɗini Daawuda ngam o numi: “Daawuda wartiri hoore mum o ganyaaɗo haa yimɓe maako Isra'iila'en, doole o huuwanammi haa foroy.”
Wakkati maajum Filisti'en mooɓti jama'aaje konu muuɗum'en fahin ngam haa ɓe kaɓa bee Isra'iila'en. Akis wi'i Daawuda: “Walaa seko sam, a yahdan bee am haa saŋngeere konu, an e worɓe ma.”
Daawuda jaabi: “Nonnon nii, barkaama, jonta a yi'an no mi huuwrante.” Akis wi'i mo: “Booɗɗum, mi waɗi ma a aynoowo yam haa foroy.”
Samuyila maayi faɓɓi. Isra'iila'en fuu mboyi mo, uwi mo haa Rama, berniwol maako. Sawulu riiwno sarwooɓe maayɓe e laarooɓe fuu haa lesdi
Kadi, jama'aaje konu Filisti'en mooɓi, ɓe ngari haa Sunem, ɓe caŋngini ton. Sawulu mooɓti Isra'iila'en fuu, kamɓe ɓe caŋngini haa Gilbo'a.
Nde Sawulu yi'i jama'aaje Filisti'en, o huli, ɓernde maako diwni masin.
O ƴami Jawmiraawo ko o waɗata, ammaa Jawmiraawo jaabaaki mo, koo bee koyɗi, koo bee hayre kur'u waato Urim, koo bee wolde annabiijo boo
Ngam maajum Sawulu wi'i yimɓe mum: “Ɗaɓɓiteeɗam debbo carwoowo maayɓe, haa mi yaha haa maako, mi ƴama mo.” Ɓe mbi'i mo: “Irin debbo oo ɗon haa En-Door.”
Sawulu ɓorni limce goɗɗe ngam taa goɗɗo anndita mo, nden o yahdi bee worɓe ɗiɗo.
Ɓe njotti haa debbo man jemma. Sawulu wi'i mo: “Sarwanam maayɓe, wurtinanam ruuhuwol maayɗo mo mbi'anmaami.”
Debbo jaabi: “A anndi ko Sawulu waɗi, no o riiwri sarwooɓe maayɓe e laarooɓe fuu nder lesdi. A yiɗi nastingo yam tuuforgol haa mbara mi na?”
Ammaa Sawulu hunani mo: “Bana Jawmiraawo o geeto, walaa ko yaalu ma nder haala ka'a.”
Nden debbo ƴami: “Moy ngurtinanmi ngam maaɗa?” Sawulu jaabi: “Waddu Samuyila.”
Nde debbo yi'i Samuyila, o wooki. Nden o ƴami Sawulu: “Koni mbaɗɗa mi rikici? An woni Sawulu.”
Laamiiɗo wi'i mo: “Taa hul, yeccam ko ngi'ata.” Debbo wi'i: “Mi ɗon yi'a ruuhuwol ɗon wurto lesdi.”
Sawulu ƴami: “Noy ngol wa'i?” O jaabi: “Ɗum gorko nayeejo, o ɗon ɓorni ngapaleewol.” Bee maajum Sawulu annditiri ɗum Samuyila. Law o tuggi koppi, o turi.

Samuyila ƴami mo: “Koni a daami yam? Ngam ɗume a wurtini yam?” Sawulu jaabi: “Woodi ko ɓillatammi masin: Filisti'en ɗon ɗaɓɓanammi haɓre. Allah boo seedi bee am, o jaabaaki yam, koo bee annabi'en, koo bee koyɗi. Ngam maajum mi ewni ma, a wi'ammi ko mi waɗata”.
Samuyila wi'i: “Koni a ƴamatammi to Jawmiraawo acci ma, to o laatake konneejo ma?
O waɗan jonta ko o anndini bee hunnduko am diga ɓooyma: O hoo'i laamu haa juŋngo maaɗa, o hokki ngu Daawuda mbattudi maaɗa
Jawmiraawo umruno ma a halka Amaleki'en e ko ɓe mari fuu. Ammaa an a ɗowtanaaki wolde maako, a waɗaay fodde tikkere Jawmiraawo saatunde dow maɓɓe. Ngam maajum kuuje ɗe'e ngaɗete jonta
Jawmiraawo hokkete haa juuɗe Filisti'en, an e jama'aare Isra'iila fuu. Jaŋngo a wondan bee am nder joonde maayɓe, an e ɓiɓɓe ma worɓe.”
Bana Sawulu juutiri nii, o do'i haa lesdi ngam bolle Samuyila kulni mo. O tampuɗo boo ngam o nyaamaay koo ɗume nyalawmaare man e jemmaare man fuu.
Debbo go ɓaditi mo, yi'i o ɗon wemmbo masin. O wi'i mo: “Mi waɗi ko a umri yam, barkaama, haa mi ɓadake maayugo.
Ammaa jonta an boo waɗ ko mi wi'ete, barkaama. Accu korɗo ma jo'inane nyaamdu seɗɗa, a nyaama, a semmbiɗa haa tokkitina laawol.”
Ammaa Sawulu sali nyaamugo. Ɗoftuɓe mo e debbo carwoowo tori mo ɗuuɗɗum, haa o nanani ɓe, o ummi e lesdi, o jooɗi dow be'itte.
Debbo woodi gaggel payŋgel haa saare. O yaawi, o hirsi ngel. O hoo'i kuroori, o jiiɓi ndi, o tamsi tamseeje ɗe ufnaaka.
O yahrani ɗum Sawulu e yimɓe mum, ɓe nyaami. Nden ɓe ummi, ɓe ndilli jemmaare maajum.
Filisti'en mooɓti jama'aaje muuɗum'en fuu haa Afek. Isra'iila'en boo caŋngini kommbi seeɓoore haa Yisre'el.
Nde laamiiɓe Filisti'en ɗon caalo bee mooɓe muuɗum'en fodde ujineeje e teemeɗɗe, honooɓe laamiiɗo Gaat ngari haa ragare, Daawuda e worɓe mum ɗon ngondi bee maɓɓe.

Mawɓe konu Filisti'en ƴami: “E ɗume Ibraniŋke'en mbaɗata ɗo?” Akis jaabi ɓe: “Ɗum Daawuda. Ɓooyma o suka Sawulu, laamiiɗo Isra'iila. Ammaa ɓuri nduuɓu o ɗon wondi bee am. Mi yi'iraay mo aybe koo seɗɗa diga nyannde o wari haa hannde.”

Ammaa mawɓe konu Filisti'en tikkani Akis, mbi'i mo: “Lortin mo haa nokkuure nde njo'inɗa mo. Taata o yahda bee meeɗen ngam haɓre, ngam taa o waylito dow meeɗen nder haɓre. Noy o heɓrata yerduye jaagorɗo maako, sonaa to o wallinani mo ko'e worɓe men?
Malla a yejjiti ko ɓe ngimani mo:
Sawulu mbari ujineere,
ammaa Daawuda ujine sappo

Akis ewni Daawuda, wi'i mo: “Fakat bana Jawmiraawo o geeto, a gooŋgaajo. Min kam mi yiɗi masin a nasta bee am nder haɓre. Mi yi'iraay ma zammba diga ngarɗa haa am haa wargo hannde. Ammaa a fottanaay laamiiɓe woɗɓe.
Kadi lorta, yah bee jam. Taa waɗ koo ɗume ko ɓerninta ɓe.”
Daawuda wi'i Akis: “Aybewol ngole mbaɗmi, barkaama? Woodi ko a yi'iri yam diga mi nasti kuugal ma? Ngam ɗume mi heɓataa yahdugo bee maaɗa, mi haɓa bee konne'en jaagorɗo am laamiiɗo?”
Akis jaabi mo: “Mi anndi. Yeeso am a koolaaɗo bana malaa'ikaajo Allah, ammaa mawɓe konu Filisti'en mbi'i: Taata o yahda bee meeɗen nder haɓre.
Ngam maajum ndawe cub, an e accuɓe Sawulu, warduɓe bee maaɗa fuu, ndille to weeti.”
Jaŋngo maajum Daawuda e worɓe mum ndawi cub, ɓe lorti haa lesdi Filisti'en. Ammaa Filisti'en njehi gal Yisre'el.
Nyannde tataɓre, nde Daawuda e yimɓe mum njotti haa Cikilak, ɓe tawi berniwol maɓɓe wulaama. Amaleki'en kippi Lesdi Fombina e Cikilak, ɓe nguli e ɓe mbili Cikilak.
Ɓe mbaraay koo gooto, ammaa ɓe ndahi rewɓe e ɓikkoy.
Nde Daawuda e worɓe mum ngarti, ɓe ngi'i ko waɗi, ɓe mboyi haa ɓuri semmbe.
Rewɓe Daawuda ɗiɗo boo ndahaama, Ahino'am mo Yisre'el e Abigayel mo Karmel, laatinooɗo debbo Nabal
Daawuda sakli masin, ngam yimɓe maako ngiɗno fiɗugo mo bee kaa'e, ɓerɗe maɓɓe naawi ngam daheeki
O umri Abiyatar ɓii Ahimelek, limanjo: “Waddu ɗanciki limanku bee jiiba wiɓɓere.” Abiyatar waddani mo ɗum
Daawuda ƴami Jawmiraawo: “Mi taasna hippooɓe ɓe'e na? Mi jokkoto ɓe na?” Jawmiraawo jaabi mo: “Taasnu ɓe, fakat a jokkoto ɓe, a hisna naŋngaaɓe.”

Saa'i man nden ɓe ndilli, Daawuda e worɓe mum teemeɗɗe njoweego (600). Nde ɓe njotti maayo Besor, Daawuda acci ton worɓe teemeɗɗe ɗiɗo, ngam ɓe somɓe, ɓe mbaawaay eeraago maayo. Bee luttuɓe teemeɗɗe nayo o tokki taasnugo Amaleki'en.

Ɓe tawi Misraajo suka mo heɓaay nyaamdu e njaram nyalɗe tati. Ɓe njahri mo haa Daawuda, ɓe ndokki mo tamseere e ndiyam, ɓe ndokki mo tayre tamre ibbe joorɗe e tame inabooje joorɗe boo ɗiɗi. Nde o nyaami ɗum, o heɓti semmbe maako.
Daawuda ƴami mo: “Toy iwɗaa? Moy mari ma?” O jaabi: “Mi Misraajo, mi maccuɗo goɗɗo Amalekiijo. Jaagorɗo am acci yam haa ɗo diga heeciti keenya, ngam mi nyawɗo.
Min kippino Lesdi Fombina, lesdi Kereti'en e Lesdi Fombina, ndi Yahuudu'en e haa ndi asŋgol Kaaleb ɗon jooɗi. Min nguli Cikilak bee yiite.”
Daawuda ƴami mo: “A yahratam haa mooɓre hippooɓe ɓe'e na?” Maccuɗo wi'i: “Hunoranam bee Allah a mbarataa yam, a hokkataa yam haa juŋngo jawmam boo. Nden kam mi yahrete haa maɓɓe.”
Ɓe njehi, ɓe tawi Amaleki'en ɗon caŋkiti haa nokkuure man fuu, ɓe ɗon nyaama, ɓe ɗon njara, ɓe ɗon ngama ngam daliila keɓal ɗuuɗŋgal ngal ɓe njaɓtuno haa lesdi Filisti'en e lesdi Yahuuda.
Jaŋngo maajum nde weeti Daawuda ukkani ɓe, haɓi bee maɓɓe haa kiikiiɗe waɗi. Worɓe Daawuda mbari Amaleki'en fuu, sey suka'en teemeɗɗe nayo wa'iiɓe geelooɗi ndaɗi.
Daawuda hisni ko ɓe koocuno fuu, o hisni rewɓe maako ɗiɗo boo.
Walaa ko majji, diga ɓikkoy haa ndotti'en koo moy heɓti ɓikkoy mum e ko Amaleki'en njaɓtuno fuu. Daawuda wartiri ɗum fuu.
Dammooji e na'i maɓɓe, Daawuda hoo'i ɗi fuu bee hoore mum. Yimɓe maako coggi ɗi yeeso dabbaaji luttuɗi, ɓe mbi'i: “Kanjum woni keɓal Daawuda.”
Nde ɓe ɓadi maayo Besor, worɓe teemeɗɗe ɗiɗo somnooɓe haa ɓe mbaawaayno tokkaago Daawuda go ngari, potti bee maɓɓe. Daawuda ɓaditi ɓe, hoofni ɓe, ƴami njamu maɓɓe.

Ammaa nder yahduɓe bee Daawuda woodi woɗɓe halluɓe e meere'en. Kamɓe ɓe mbi'i: “Ɓe njahdaay bee meeɗen nder haɓre, ngam maajum ɓe ngalaa geɗal haa keɓal konu. Koo moy heɓtan debbo mum e ɓikkoy mum tan, ɓe koo'a ɓe, ɓe ndilla.”
Ammaa Daawuda wi'i: “Deerɗiraaɓe am, fotaay on mbaɗa bana nii bee ko Jawmiraawo hokki en. Kaŋko ayni en, o hokki en jaalorgal dow mooɓre hippooɓe ɓe'e.
Walaa mo yerdoto ko mbi'ɗon. Ndaa ko foti: Jahɗo konu e aynuɗo kuuje saŋngeere cenndan keɓal konu kal-kal.”
Daawuda laatini ɗum umroore nder Isra'iila diga nyalaade maajum haa wargo hannde.
Nde Daawuda warti Cikilak, o hoo'i geɗe haa keɓal konu, o neldi ɗe haa sooba'en maako ndotti'en Yahuuda. O wi'i: “Ndaa geɗal mooɗon nder keɓal konu ngal keɓɗen diga konne'en Jawmiraawo.”
O neldi dokke man haa Baytila e Ramot nder Lesdi Fombina e Yattir,
haa Aro'er e Sifmot e Estemo'a,
haa Rakal e berniiji Yerahameeli'en e berniiji Keni'en,
haa Horma e Bor-Asan e Atak,
haa Heburuun e nokkuuje fuu haa Daawuda e worɓe mum keɓno hisrude.
Filisti'en kaɓi bee Isra'iila'en haa hooseere Gilbo'a. Isra'iila'en ɗuuɗɓe mbaraama ton, luttuɓe boo ndoggi.
Filisti'en taasni Sawulu e ɓiɓɓe mum. Ɓe mbari Yonatan e Abinadabu e Malkisu'a, ɓiɓɓe Sawulu.
Haɓre saati dow Sawulu. Nde fiɗooɓe kuri keɓti mo, o hultori masin.

Sawulu wi'i doondoowo balmi mum: “Los kaafahi ma, yuwam, ngam taa saadooni'en ɓe'e ngara, njuwammi, pijirammi.” Ammaa doondoowo balmi maako sali, ngam o huli masin. Ngam maajum Sawulu hoo'i kaafahi mum, do'i dow maaki.
Nde doondoowo balmi go yi'i Sawulu maayi, o losi kaafahi maako, kaŋko boo o do'i dow maaki, o maaydi bee laamiiɗo.
Bana nii Sawulu e ɓiɓɓe mum e doondoowo balmi mum e worɓe mum fuu maaydi nyalaade man.

Isra'iila'en wonɓe gaɗa waadiwol e gaɗa Urdun, nde ɓe ngi'i jama'aare konu Isra'iila doggi, Sawulu e ɓiɓɓe mum boo maayi, ɓe acci berniiji maɓɓe, ɓe ndoggi. Filisti'en ngari, njooɗi nder berniiji man.
Jaŋngo maajum Filisti'en ngari ngam ɓoftugo kuuje mbaraaɓe. Ɓe tawi Sawulu e ɓiɓɓe mum tato ɗon mbaali dow hooseere Gilbo'a.
Ɓe ta'i hoore Sawulu, ɓe ɓorti mo balmi maako. Nden ɓe neldi ɗi koo toy nder lesdi Filisti'en ngam yahrugo habaru jaalorgal haa cuuɗi labbi maɓɓe e haa yimɓe fuu.
Ɓe ndesi balmi Sawulu nder suudu Astarot, lawru maɓɓe rewru. Ɓe ɓili ɓanndu maako haa mahol taariiŋgol Baytisaanu.
Yimɓe wonɓe haa Yaabes nder lesdi Gile'at nani ko Filisti'en mbaɗi Sawulu.
Worɓe maɓɓe semmbiɗɓe fuu ummi, njehi jemmaare man fuu. Ɓe ɓilti ɓanndu Sawulu e ɓalli ɓiɓɓe mum haa mahol Baytisaanu, ɓe njahri ɗi haa Yaabes, ɓe nguli ɗi ton.
Nden ɓe koo'i i'e maɓɓe, ɓe uwi ɗe les lekki aslahi haa Yaabes, ɓe cuumi nyalɗe joweeɗiɗi.
Ɓaawo maayde Sawulu, Daawuda jaalinooɗo Amaleki'en warti Cikilak, o faɓɓi ton nyalɗe ɗiɗi.
Nyannde tataɓre goɗɗo iwi diga saŋngeere konu Sawulu, wari haa Daawuda, limce maako ɗon ceeki, mbulwuldi ɗon dow hoore maako
Daawuda ƴami mo: “Diga toy ngarɗaa?” O jaabi: “Mi daɗi, mi wari diga saŋngeere konu Isra'iila.”
Daawuda ƴami mo: “Noy kubar? Yeccam ɗum!” O wi'i: “Jama'aare Isra'iila doggi, ɗuuɗɓe nder yimɓe men boo maayi. Sawulu e ɓiyum Yonatan, kamɓe boo ɓe maayi.”
Daawuda ƴami mo fahin: “Noy anndirɗa Sawulu e ɓiyum Yonatan maayi?”
O jaabi: “Mi ɗonno dow hooseere Gilbo'a. Mi yi'i Sawulu ɗon tuggi dow labbo mum, mootaaji pucci Filisti'en e wa'iiɓe pucci ɗon taasna mo, ɓe ndaayaaki sam.
O wayliti, o yi'i yam, o ewni yam. Mi nooti: Na'am.
O ƴami yam: An moy? Mi jaabi: Mi Amalekiijo.
O wi'i yam: Ɓadita, mbaram! Giilol naŋngi yam, ammaa poofɗe am ta'aay tawon.
Mi anndi o yeeɗataa ɓaawo konne'en njaali mo. Ngam maajum mi ɓaditi mo, mi mbari mo. Mi hoo'i woronnde laamu wonnde dow hoore maako e jawo haa juŋngo maako. Ndaa, mi waddani ma ɗum, barkaama
Daawuda seeki limce mum
Ɓe mboyi, ɓe nyalli suumaago ngam daliila Sawulu e ɓiyum Yonatan e Isra'iila'en, ummaatoore Jawmiraawo, mbaraaɓe haa konu fuu.
Daawuda ƴami suka gadduɗo kubar go: “Toy iwɗaa?” O jaabi: “Mi ɓii Amalekiijo koɗo nder Isra'iila.”
Daawuda telɓani mo, wi'i: “Asee, a hulaay mbarugo cuɓaaɗo Allah!”
Daawuda ewni goɗɗo nder suka'en mum, umri mo mbarugo Amalekiijo. Suka fiyi mo, o maayi.
Daawuda wi'i Amalekiijo: “Aybe
Daawuda waɗi gimol boyki dow Sawulu e ɓiyum Yonatan,
o inndi ngol “Gimol Lagaawal”, ngol ɗon winndi nder Deftere Gooŋgaajo. Daawuda umri yimɓe Yahuuda ndurso ngol. Ndaa nii o yimi
“Yaa Isra'iila, honooɓe ma ɓurduɓe semmbe ndo'ake dow kooseeje ma,
honooɓe ma maŋgtaaɓe boo maayi.
Taa anndine ɗum haa Gaat,
taa ngooyne ɗum haa laabi Askalon,
ngam taa rewɓe Filisti'en ceyo,
taa ɓiɓɓe saadooni'en rewɓe mbelmbelta.
Onon kooseeje Gilbo'a,
taa saawawre waɗa dow mooɗon,
taa iyeende boo toɓa dow mooɗon,
taa gese dimooje cudda on.
Ngam bawarɗe
wawarde Sawulu soɓi haa foroy.
Lagaawal Yonatan woofaay sam,
kaafahi Sawulu lortaaki meere,
ammaa ki heewi ƴiiƴam mbaraaɓe,
ki simti ɓellere semmbiɗɓe.
Sawulu e Yonatan, welɓe e yiɗaaɓe,
ɓe ceedaay nder ngeendam e maayde fuu.
Ɓe ɓurduno dute jaawal,
barooɗe boo semmbe.
Onon rewɓe Isra'iila'en, mboye Sawulu!
Kaŋko o jaagniri on limce boɗeeje,
kaŋko o fawniri on kaŋŋeeri.
Honooɓe ɓurduɓe semmbe maayi,
ɓe mbaraama nder haɓre.
Yonatan boo maayi,
o ɗon waali haa towndiije.
Kayto deerɗiraawo am Yonatan,
ɓernde am ɗon naawa ngam maaɗa.
An wonno soobaajo am giɗaaɗo,
yiide ma ɓurani yam wooɗugo
dow yiide rewɓe fuu.
Ayye! Honooɓe ɓurduɓe semmbe maayi!
Balmi maɓɓe natti, meetataa nafugo!”
Ɓaawo kuuje ɗe'e Daawuda ƴami Jawmiraawo: “Mi yaha haa gootol nder berniiji Yahuuda na?” Jawmiraawo jaabi mo: “Ooho.” Daawuda ƴami: “Toy njahanmi?” O jaabi: “Haa Heburuun.”
Daawuda yehi ton, kaŋko e rewɓe maako ɗiɗo, Ahino'am mo Yisre'el e Abigayel laatinooɗo debbo Nabal, mo Karmel
Daawuda yahri boo worɓe wonduɓe bee muuɗum fuu, koo moy bee saare muuɗum. Ɓe njooɗi nder gure Heburuun.
Yimɓe Yahuuda ngari ton, moyti mo haa o laato laamiiɗo Yahuuda.
Yahuudu'en mbi'i Daawuda: Yimɓe berniwol Yaabes nder lesdi Gile'at uwi Sawulu
O neli nelaaɓe haa maɓɓe, o wi'i ɓe: “On mbaɗani jaagorɗo mon Sawulu mbooɗeeŋga bee uwugo mo. Jawmiraawo barkiɗin on, waŋginan on mbooɗeeŋga e gooŋgaaku ngam ko on mbaɗi. Min boo mi woonanan on.
Tiɗɗine ɓerɗe mon, cemmbiɗine juuɗe mon! Jaagorɗo mon Sawulu maayi, ammaa lenyol Yahuuda waɗi yam laamiiɗo mum.”
Abineer ɓii Neer, mawɗo honooɓe Sawulu yahri Isboset ɓii Sawulu haa Mahanayim.
Ton o waɗi mo laamiiɗo dow Gile'at e Aser e Yisre'el e Efrayim e Benyamin, waato dow Isra'iila fuu.
Isboset woodi duuɓi cappanɗe nayi saa'i o laamo. O laami duuɓi ɗiɗi. Yimɓe Yahuuda tan tokki Daawuda.
O laamani ɓe haa Heburuun duuɓi joweeɗiɗi e lebbi joweego.
Abineer e yimɓe Isboset ngurti Mahanayim yahugo Gibiyon.
Yo'ab ɓii Seruyatu e yimɓe Daawuda boo njehi ton. Ɓe potti haa heeleewo Gibiyon. Yimɓe Daawuda njooɗi haa wakeere heeleewo nde'e, yimɓe Isboset boo haa wakeere ndeya.
Abineer wi'i Yo'ab: “Accu sukaaɓe mbaɗana en fijirde konu.” Yo'ab jaɓi.
Nden sukaaɓe ngurti, sappo e ɗiɗo haa wakeere Benyamin e Isboset, sappo e ɗiɗo boo haa wakeere Daawuda.
Ɓe naŋngindiri ko'e maɓɓe, ɓe njuwnjuwtiri buttuli maɓɓe bee kaafaaje, ɓe maaydi ɓe fuu. Ɓaawoɗon nokkuure nde'e haa Gibiyon heɓi innde Helkat-Hasuriima
Nden haɓre ummi hakkunde jama'aaje ɗiɗi fuu, haɓre man saati masin. Yimɓe Daawuda njaali Abineer e yimɓe Isra'iila.
Ɓiɓɓe Seruyatu tato ɓe'e fuu ɗon ton: Yo'ab e Abisay e Asa'el. Asa'el o jaawɗo bana lelwa.
O taasni Abineer bee tiinaare ɗuuɗnde.
Abineer yeesiti, ƴami: “Ɗum an na, Asa'el?” O jaabi: “Ɗum min.”
Abineer wi'i mo: “Accu taasnugo yam! Tokka gooto nder sukaaɓe, jaɓtu ko o mari fuu.” Ammaa Asa'el sali accugo mo.
Abineer reentini
Ammaa Asa'el sali accugo mo. Ngam maajum Abineer yuwri mo ɓaawo ɓaawo haa reedu bee labbo haa ngo wurti gal ɓaawo maako. Ɗon nii Asa'el maayi, caalotooɗo fuu ɗon daro ton.
Ammaa Yo'ab e Abisay tokki taasnugo Abineer. Saa'i naaŋge ɗon muta, ɓe njotti towndiire Amma wonnde yeeso Giha, haa laawol ladde Gibiyon.
Yimɓe Benyamin mooɓti, ɓiɗɗotiri ɓaawo Abineer, ɓe ɗon ndari dow hoore towndiire man.
Abineer ewni Yo'ab: “A yiɗi kaafahi nattina yimɓe haa foroy na? Malla a anndaa no timmoode maajum hallirta? Ndey umrata yimɓe ma ɓe acca taasnugo banndiraaɓe muuɗum'en?”
Yo'ab wi'i: “Fakat bana Allah o geeto, to a wi'aayno ɗum, yimɓe am accataano taasnugo on haa jaŋngo fajiri.”
Nden o fuufi luwal konu. Yimɓe maako acci taasnugo Isra'iila'en, ɓe acci haɓre boo.
Jemmaare nde'e fuu Abineer e yimɓe mum ta'i nder Araba. Nden ɓe eeri maayo Urdun, ɓe caali lesdi Bituruna fuu, ɓe ngari haa Mahanayim.
Nde Yo'ab acci taasnugo ɓe, o mooɓti yimɓe maako. O tawi worɓe sappo e njoweenayo ngalaa ɗon, Asa'el boo walaaɗon,
yimɓe Daawuda mbarino yimɓe Benyamin e yimɓe Abineer teemeɗɗe tato e cappanɗe njoweego (360).
Ɓe kooci ɓanndu Asa'el, ɓe uwi ndu haa Baytilaama nder yenaande baaba maako. Nden Yo'ab e yimɓe mum tokkitini jahaaŋgal muuɗum'en jemmaare fuu. Ɓe njotti Heburuun wakkati naaŋge ɗon fuɗa.
Haɓre hakkunde yimɓe Sawulu e yimɓe Daawuda duuri. Semmbe yimɓe Daawuda ɗon ɓesdo ammaa yimɓe Sawulu ɗon tampa.
Daawuda danyi ɓiɓɓe worɓe haa Heburuun. Ndaa inɗe maɓɓe: Ahino'am mo Yisre'el danyani mo Amnon, afo maako.
Abigayel laatinooɗo debbo Nabal, danyani mo Kiliyabu, ɗiɗaɓo maako. Tataɓo boo Absalom, innde daada mum Ma'aka, ɓii Talmay, laamiiɗo Gesur.
Nayaɓo woni Adoniya, innde daada maako Haggit. Sefatiya woni njowaɓo, innde daada mum Abital.
Njoweegoojo Yitiriyam, Egila woni daada maako. Daawuda danyi ɓe fuu haa Heburuun.
Wakkati haɓre ɗonno tokki hakkunde saare Sawulu e saare Daawuda, baawɗe Abineer ɓesdi yeeso yeeso nder saare Sawulu.
Nyannde go'o Isboset feli Abineer ngam daliila culaaɗo baaba maako Sawulu, innde culaaɗo oo Rispa ɓii Aya. O wi'i: “Koni mbaalduɗa bee culaaɗo baaba am?”

Abineer ɓerni masin, o wi'i: “Mi zammboowo! Mi walaa amaana! Mi huuwani saare baaba ma Sawulu e banndiraaɓe muuɗum e soobiraaɓe muuɗum bee ɓernde am fuu. Mi ayni ma ngam taa nasta juuɗe Daawuda. Ammaa hannde a takkanammi haala debbo?
Jawmiraawo hiito yam bee caatal to mi waɗanaay Daawuda ko Jawmiraawo hunani mo,
o wi'no o ɓortan saare Sawulu diga laamu, o waɗa Daawuda laamiiɗo dow Isra'iila e Yahuuda fuu, diga Dan haa yotto Biirsaba
Isboset waawaay jaabaago Abineer koo wolde woore, ngam o huli mo.
Nden Abineer neli nelaaɓe haa Daawuda, o wi'i: “Naa a anndi mo mari baawɗe haa lesdi ndi na? Kadi haɓɓu alkawal bee am. Juŋngo am wondan bee maaɗa haa mi waylitane Isra'iila fuu.”
Daawuda jaabi: “Booɗɗum, mi haɓɓan alkawal bee maaɗa. Ammaa woodi huunde woore nde ɗaɓɓanmi haa maaɗa: Sey a waddanammi Mikal ɓii Sawulu debbo hiddeko a wara, a yi'ammi.”
Daawuda neli boo nelaaɓe haa Isboset, o wi'i mo: “Hokkitam debbo am Mikal. Mi ɓaŋri mo bee lare saadooniiku Filisti'en teemerre
Isboset neli hoocugo mo haa goriiko Paltiyel ɓii Layis.
Goriiko tokki mo bee bojji haa ɓe njotti Bahuriima. Nden Abineer wi'i mo: “Dillu jonta, hootu!” Nden o hooti.
Abineer dawri bee ndotti'en Isra'iila. O wi'i ɓe: “Naa diga ɓooyma on ɗon ɗaɓɓa haa Daawuda wona laamiiɗo mon na?
Kadi jonta woni saa'iire fottunde. Ciftore ko Jawmiraawo wi'no: Bee juŋngo jaggiiɗo am Daawuda kisnanmi yimɓe am Isra'iila'en juuɗe Filisti'en e konne'en muuɗum'en woɗɓe fuu.”
Abineer wolidi bee yimɓe Benyamin boo. Nden o yehi haa Heburuun ngam haa o anndina Daawuda ko Isra'iila'en e yimɓe Benyamin narri waɗugo.
Nde Abineer wari haa Heburuun, kaŋko e worɓe noogas, Daawuda waɗani ɓe nyaamduuji.

Abineer wi'i mo: “Mi yahan jonta, mi mooɓta Isra'iila'en fuu, mi yahra ɓe haa maaɗa, barkaama. Sey ɓe kaɓɓa alkawal bee maaɗa, ngam haa a laato laamiiɗo mo a yiɗi laamanaago fuu.” Daawuda jaɓɓiti Abineer, kaŋko o dilli jam.

Wakkati seɗɗa ɓaawoɗon Yo'ab e yimɓe Daawuda ngarti diga jaɓtol feere. Ɓe ngaddi keɓal ɗuuɗŋgal. Nde Yo'ab warti bee yimɓe muuɗum, o nani Abineer warino haa Heburuun haa Daawuda, Daawuda jaɓɓiti mo, o dilli jam.
Ngam maajum Yo'ab yehi haa laamiiɗo, wi'i mo: “Ɗume mbaɗɗaa? Abineer wari haa maaɗa! Ngam ɗume accuɗa mo o dilli?
Naa a anndi Abineer? O wari ƴoyrugo ma tan, ngam haa o heɓta taaskara ma e ko waɗata fuu.”
Nde Yo'ab wurti saare laamiiɗo, o neli nelaaɓe ɓaawo Abineer ngam haa ɓe ngartira mo. Daawuda anndaa koo ɗume. Nelaaɓe tawi Abineer haa ɓulndu Sira.

O lorti bee maɓɓe haa Heburuun. Yo'ab yahri mo feere maako haa nastirde berniwol, bana o yiɗi wolwango mo bee sirri. Ton o yuwi mo haa reedu, o maayi. Bana nii Yo'ab mbardiri mo ngam waataago deerɗum Asa'el mbaraaɗo.
Nde Daawuda nani haala maajum, o wi'i: “Mi walaa aybe dow maayde Abineer, min bee yimɓe laamu am. Jawmiraawo woni ceedoowo yam. Ngam maajum kiita maako warataa dow amin haa foroy.
Ka ukkano Yo'ab e banndiraaɓe mum. Foroy woɗɓe nder asŋgol maako nyawa nyawuji ilooji malla saɗawre, woɗɓe laato jiijiiɓe tuggiiɓe dow cabbi, woɗɓe maaya nder haɓre malla bee weelo.”
Bana nii Yo'ab e Abisay mbardiri Abineer, ngam kaŋko o mbarno Asa'el, deerɗiraawo maɓɓe, nder haɓre haa Gibiyon.
Nden Daawuda umri Yo'ab e yimɓe wonduɓe bee muuɗum: “Ceeke limce mon, ɓorne limce buhuuje, ngam haa on mboya Abineer.” Nde ɓe ɗon njaha uwoygo mo, laamiiɗo Daawuda bee hoore muuɗum tokki naasiwo
Ɓe uwi Abineer haa Heburuun. Daawuda woyi bee sawtu haa yenaande maako, yimɓe fuu mboyi.
Laamiiɗo yimi gimol boyki dow Abineer:
“Kayto Abineer,
ngam ɗume maayɗa
bana faataaɓe maayrata?
Juuɗe ma kaɓɓaaka,
kosɗe ma naataay ge'elle.
Ammaa a maayi bana mbaraaɗo
mo waɗooɓe zunuuba mbari.”
Nde yimɓe nani ɗum, ɓe ɓesdi woyugo.
Ɓaawoɗon ɓe tori Daawuda o nyaama seɗɗa hiddeko jemma waɗa, ammaa o sali. O huni: “Allah hiito yam naawɗum, to mi mettake nyaamdu koo nduye hiddeko naaŋge muta.”
Yimɓe ngi'i no Daawuda woyri Abineer, ɗum fottani ɓe, ko o waɗi fuu fottani ɓe.
Nyalaade maajum koo moy nder yimɓe Daawuda e nder Isra'iila fuu faami mbarki Abineer iwaay haa laamiiɗo.
Kaŋko o wi'i saraaki'en maako: “On paamaay na? Hannde ardiiɗo mawɗo maayi nder Isra'iila.
Koo mi laamiiɗo boo, mi tampuɗo hannde, ngam mi waawaay haɗugo ɓiɓɓe Seruyatu ɓe'e. Caatal maɓɓe salori yam. Jawmiraawo hiito ɓe deydey halleende maɓɓe.”
Nde Isboset ɓii Sawulu nani haala maayde Abineer haa Heburuun, o soofi, Isra'iila'en fuu cakli.
Isboset woodino ardiiɓe wiftooɓe ɗiɗo, innde gooto Ba'ana, innde oya boo Rekab. Ɓe ɓiɓɓe Rimmon mo Beerot nder lenyol Benyamin, ngam Beerot limdaama bee lesdi Benyamin.
Ɓooyma, yimɓe Beerot ndoggi haa Gittayim, ɓe ɗon njooɗi ton haa wargo hannde.

Woodino taaniraawo Sawulu boo, Mefiboset ɓii Yonatan. O woodino duuɓi jowi nde kubar maayde Sawulu e Yonatan warino diga Yisre'el. Debbo mawninoowo mo jogi mo, doggi bee maako. Ammaa ngam daliila jaawal maako, o yoofti ɓiŋngel, ngel do'i, ngel jiiji haa kosɗe maagel ɗiɗi fuu
Rekab e Ba'ana go njehi haa saare Isboset. Ɓe njotti ton caka nyalawma, naaŋge wuli masin. Isboset ɗonno waali dow be'itte.

Ɓe nasti saare ngam hoocugo alkamaari, ɓe tawi Isboset ɗon waali haa suudu muuɗum dow be'itte. Ɓe njuwi mo haa reedu, ɓe mbari mo, ɓe ta'i hoore maako, ɓe koo'i nde. Nden ɓe tokki laawol waadiwol Urdun jemmaare fuu, ɓe ndilli.

Ɓe njahri hoore Isboset haa Heburuun haa Daawuda. Ɓe mbi'i laamiiɗo: “Ndaa hoore Isboset ɓii konneejo ma Sawulu, ɗaɓɓunooɗo mbarugo ma. Hannde Jawmiraawo waatani ma dow Sawulu e asŋgol mum, barkaama.”
Daawuda jaabi ɓe: “Fakat mi ɗon wi'a bee innde Jawmiraawo geeto, kisnuɗo yam ɓillaare fuu!
Naane goɗɗo wari haa am haa Cikilak, yecci yam Sawulu maayi. O tammi kubaruwol belŋgol ngo'ol seynatam. Ammaa mi umri ɓe naŋngi mo, ɓe mbari mo, kanjum woni ngeenaari kubar maako
Kadi on tammi mi hiitataako worɓe halluɓe mbarɓe goɗɗo gooŋgaajo baaliiɗo nder suudu mum na? Fakat mi ƴaman ƴiiƴam maako haa mooɗon, mi nattina on haa lesdi!”

Daawuda umri sukaaɓe mum, ɓe mbari Rekab e Ba'ana. Nden ɓe ta'i juuɗe maɓɓe e kosɗe maɓɓe, ɓe ɓili ɓalli maɓɓe kommbi weendu nder Heburuun. Ammaa hoore Isboset, ɓe koo'i nde, ɓe uwi nde nder yenaande Abineer haa Heburuun.
Le'i Isra'iila fuu ngari haa Daawuda haa Heburuun. Ɓe mbi'i mo: “Minin min banndiraaɓe ma nder ummaatoore woore.
Koo naane, wakkati Sawulu laamani min boo, an ardi jama'aare konu Isra'iila. Jawmiraawo boo wi'i ma: An ɗowata Isra'iila'en ummaatoore am, a laatoto ardiiɗo maɓɓe.”
Nden ndotti'en Isra'iila fuu ngari haa Heburuun. Laamiiɗo Daawuda haɓɓi alkawal bee maɓɓe yeeso Jawmiraawo. Ɓe moyti mo, bana nii ɓe mbaɗi mo laamiiɗo Isra'iila.
Daawuda woodi duuɓi cappanɗe tati, saa'i o laamo. O laami duuɓi cappanɗe nayi.
Haa Heburuun o laamani Yahuuda duuɓi joweeɗiɗi e lebbi joweego. Haa Urusaliima boo o laami duuɓi cappanɗe tati e tati dow Isra'iila e Yahuuda fuu

Nden laamiiɗo Daawuda yahdi bee honooɓe muuɗum haa Urusaliima ngam honugo Yebusi'en jooɗiiɓe ton. Ammaa ɓe mbi'i mo: “A waawataa nyaamugo berniwol amin, wumɓe e jiijiiɓe ke'i riiwugo ma” bana wi'go Daawuda nastataa haa ɗo
Daawuda nyaami berniwol cemmbiɗŋgol dow Siyona, ɓe inndi ngol Berniwol Daawuda.

Nyalde maajum Daawuda wi'i: “Koo moy giɗɗo jaalaago Yebusi'en, sey tokkoro laawol gasaaŋgol dow hooseere. Daawuda wanyi wumɓe e jiijiiɓe go. Ngam maajum yimɓe umri: Wumɓe e jiijiiɓe nastataa suudu Jawmiraawo.”
Daawuda yeni dow berniwol ngol, o inndi ngol Berniwol Daawuda. O ɓesdi nyiɓugo nder taarde maagol, o fuɗɗi diga Millo
Baawɗe Daawuda ɓesdi yeeso yeeso, ngam Allah, Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama ɗon wondi bee maako.
Hiram, laamiiɗo Tirus neli nelaaɓe haa Daawuda. O neldi boo leɗɗe cemmbiɗɗe boo, bee sehooɓe e mahooɓe. Ɓe mahani mo laamorde.
Daawuda annditi Jawmiraawo tabitini mo o laamiiɗo, Jawmiraawo samɗini laamu maako ngam o yiɗi yimɓe maako Isra'iila'en.
Ɓaawo Daawuda ummi Heburuun, wari Urusaliima, o hoo'i rewɓe e sulaaɓe woɗɓe. Ɓe ndanyani mo ɓiɓɓe worɓe e rewɓe.
Ndaa inɗe ɓiɓɓe worɓe danyanaaɓe mo haa Urusaliima: Sammu'a e Sobaba e Natan e Suleymaanu
e Yibehar e Elisuwa e Nefek e Yafiya
e Eliisama e Eliyada e Elifelet.
Nde Filisti'en nani Isra'iila'en mbaɗi Daawuda laamiiɗo muuɗum'en, Filisti'en fuu ngari haa ɓe ɗaɓɓita mo. Nde Daawuda nani ɗum, o jippi nder hisrude.
Filisti'en ngari, kippi waadiwol Refayim.
Daawuda ƴami Jawmiraawo: “Mi haɓa bee Filisti'en na? A hokkatam jaalorgal dow maɓɓe na?” Jawmiraawo jaabi mo: “Yah, fakat mi hokkete.”
Daawuda yehi, jaali Filisti'en. O wi'i: “Jawmiraawo seeki caka konne'en am bana ildugol ndiyam.” Ngam maajum nokkuure nde'e wi'ete Ba'al-Perasiima
Filisti'en ndoggi, acci suuraaji labbi muuɗum'en ton, Daawuda e yimɓe mum kooci ɗi.
Fahin Filisti'en ngari, kippi waadiwol Refayim.
Daawuda ƴami Jawmiraawo kadiboo. Jawmiraawo jaabi mo: “Taa ukkana ɓe diga ɗo, ammaa sel ɓaawo maɓɓe, war dow maɓɓe diga wakeere leɗɗe balsani.
To a nani sonyo palanɗe kosɗe dow ko'e leɗɗe man, nden kam ukkana ɓe, ngam min mi ɗon aarta yeeso maaɗa, mi jaalo Filisti'en.”
Daawuda waɗi ko Jawmiraawo umri mo. O mbari Filisti'en diga Geba haa yotti Gezer.
Daawuda mooɓti honooɓe Isra'iila'en suɓaaɓe, baakin ujine cappanɗe tato (30.000).
O yahdi bee maɓɓe haa Ba'ala nder lesdi Yahuuda ngam haa ɓe koo'oya sundukru Allah wi'eteendu fodde innde Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama, jooɗiiɗo haa dow keruba'en
Ɓe njo'ini sundukru Allah dow moota ga'i kesa. Ɓe ngurtini ndu saare Abinadabu wonnde dow towndiire. Uzza e Ahiyo ɓiɓɓe Abinadabu ɗon ɗowa moota man
Ahiyo ɗon ardo nga.
Daawuda e Isra'iila'en fuu ɗon ngima bee seyo yeeso Jawmiraawo bee kuuje gimruɗe ɗe leɗɗe, bee moolooji e garayaaji, bee bawɗi e leŋngi e koŋsiije.
Nde ɓe njotti laarre
Ammaa Jawmiraawo tikkani Uzza, ngam ɗum haanaayno o meema sundukru Allah. Ɗon nii Allah mbari mo.
Ɓernde Daawuda metti ngam tikkere Jawmiraawo ukki dow Uzza. O inndi nokkuure nde'e Peres-Uzza
Nyalaade maajum Daawuda huli Jawmiraawo, o ƴami: “Noy sundukru Jawmiraawo wardata haa am?”
Ngam maajum o yiɗaa yahrugo ndu haa maako nder Berniwol Daawuda. O selni ndu haa saare Obet-Edoom, Gaatiijo.
Sundukru Jawmiraawo faɓɓi ton lebbi tati. Jawmiraawo barkiɗini Obet-Edoom e saare mum fuu
Daawuda nani: “Jawmiraawo barkiɗini Obet-Edoom e ko o mari fuu ngam daliila sundukru alkawal Allah.” Ngam maajum o seyi, o yehi ton haa o yahra sundukru haa Urusaliima.
Nde roondiiɓe ndu njehi palanɗe joweego, o hirsi ngaari kalhaldi e gaggel payŋgel.
Daawuda ɗon wama yeeso Jawmiraawo bee semmbe fuu, o ɗon ɓorni toggoore limanku.
Bana nii Daawuda e Isra'iila'en fuu njahri sundukru Jawmiraawo haa Urusaliima, bee hoolo seyo e hoolo luwe.

Wakkati sundukru Jawmiraawo ɗon nasta Berniwol Daawuda, Mikal ɓii Sawulu, debbo Daawuda laari gal wurdere nder mahol suudu mum. O yi'i laamiiɗo ɗon diwa, ɗon wama yeeso Jawmiraawo. Ngam maajum Mikal yawi mo haa ɓernde muuɗum.

Ɓaawo man, ɓe nastini sundukru nder suudu laymaaru ndu Daawuda darnino ngam maaru, ɓe njo'ini ndu haa nokkuure maaru ton. Daawuda lii'ani Jawmiraawo guleteeɗi e kirseteeɗi ngam kawtal yimɓe bee Allah.
Nde Daawuda timmini lii'aago guleteeɗi e kirseteeɗi man, o barkiɗini ummaatoore bee innde Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama.
Isra'iila'en worɓe e rewɓe wonɓe ton fuu, Daawuda yeɗi koo moy maɓɓe tamseere e tamre dibinooje e tamre inabooje joorɗe. Nden ɓe kooti, koo moy haa saare muuɗum.

Daawuda boo hooti, ngam barkiɗingo saare mum. Mikal ɓii Sawulu wurti, fotti bee maako, wi'i: “Yowwa, hannde laamiiɗo Isra'iila teddini hoore mum bee temmbinaago yeeso horɓe e maccuɓe mum, bana goɗɗo meereejo waarata
Daawuda jaabi mo: “Mi waɗi ɗum ngam teddingo Jawmiraawo. Kaŋko o yerdi e o suɓi yam mbattudi
mi ɓesdan famɗitingo hoore am ko ɓuri nii ammaa ɗum ustataa daraja am yeeso horɓe ɓe mbolwanɗa.”
Mikal ɓii Sawulu heɓaay ɓiŋngel haa o maayi.
Laamiiɗo Daawuda ɗon jooɗi haa saare mum. Jawmiraawo hokki mo siwtaare, konne'en taariiɓe mo fuu ɓillaay mo fahin.
Nyannde feere laamiiɗo wi'i annabi Natan: “Ndaa, min mi ɗon jooɗi nder suudu ndu leɗɗe cemmbiɗɗe, ammaa sundukru Allah ɗon jooɗi nder laymaaru godooje.”
Natan wi'i mo: “Waɗ ko ɓernde ma numi fuu, ngam Jawmiraawo ɗon wondi bee maaɗa.”
Ammaa jemmaare maajum wolde Jawmiraawo warani Natan, o wi'i:
“Yah, wi' jaggiiɗo am Daawuda: Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo wi'i: Kadi an a nyiɓantam suudu haa mi jooɗo nder maaru na?
Mi meeɗaay jooɗaago nder suudu, diga ngurtinmi Isra'iila'en nder Misra haa wargo hannde. Wakkati man fuu mi ɗon waanca, suudu laymaaru laati jooɗorde am.
Koo toy njahmi caka Isra'iila'en fuu, kadi mi meeɗi siŋkango koo gooto nder ardiiɓe ɓe umrumi ɗowugo yimɓe am, mbi'mi: Koni on nyiɓanaay yam suudu ndu leɗɗe cemmbiɗɗe?
Jonta sey a wi'a jaggiiɗo am Daawuda: Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wi'i: Mi hoo'i ma haa waalde, haa ɓaawo dammooji, ngam a laato ardiiɗo yimɓe am Isra'iila'en.
Mi wondi bee ma koo toy njahɗaa fuu, mi halki konne'en ma. Kadiboo mi mawninan innde ma, a laatoto gooto nder mawɓe duniyaaru.
Mi suɓani yimɓe am Isra'iila'en nokkuure joonde, mi hokkan ɓe lesdi ngam haa ɓe njooɗo nder maari bee jam. Ɓillooɓe meetataa torrugo ɓe bana ɓooyma,
ɗum laati bana nii diga wakkati alkaali'en laamani yimɓe am Isra'iila'en. An boo mi hokkete siwtaare, konne'en ma fuu ɓillataa ma fahin. Min Jawmiraawo mi hokkete danygol.
To balɗe ma timmi, a hawtoyan bee kaakiraaɓe ma. Ammaa mi jo'inan gooto nder danygol ma dow leeso laamu ma, mi tabitina laamu maako
Kaŋko o nyiɓantam suudu, min boo mi tabitinan laamu maako haa foroy.
Mi laatoto baaba maako, kaŋko boo o laatoto ɓiɗɗo am. To o waɗi kalluɗum, mi eltan mo bana baaba eltirta ɓiyiiko
Ammaa mi ittantaa mo mbooɗeeŋga am bana no ittumi nga dow Sawulu mo ndiiwmi yeeso maaɗa.
Saare ma e laamu ma nduumoto, leeso laamu ma ɗon tabiti haa foroy
Natan yecci Daawuda bolle ɗe'e fuu e wahayu oo fuu.
Laamiiɗo Daawuda nasti suudu laymaaru, jooɗi yeeso Jawmiraawo, wi'i: “Yaa Jawmiraawo Allah, mi moy e ɗume saare am haa njottinɗa min haa ɗo?
Kanjum boo ɗum pamarum haa yeeso ma, yaa Allah, Jawmiraawo am. A wolwi haala danygol maccuɗo ma nder zamanuuji garanɗi, bana nii a anndinirta yimɓe ko waɗoto, yaa Allah, Jawmiraawo am.
Ɗume mi ɓesdata wolwango ma? A anndi maccuɗo ma.
A waɗi kuuje mawɗe ɗe'e fuu daliila koŋngol ma e anniya ma, a anndini ɗum maccuɗo ma.
Fakat a mawɗo, yaa Allah, Jawmiraawo am. Walaa mo nanndi bee maaɗa, an feere ma woni Allah, fodde ko min nani bee noppi amin fuu.

Walaa ummaatoore feere haa duniyaaru bana yimɓe ma Isra'iila'en. An sootti ɓe ngam haa ɓe laato yimɓe ma. A huuwi kuuɗe mawɗe kulniiɗe ngam maɓɓe e ngam lesdi ma, bana nii a teddiniri innde ma. A rimɗini ɓe diga lesdi Misra, a riiwi ummaatooje goɗɗe e ɗowanteeɓe maaje yeeso maɓɓe haa ɓe laato jeyaaɓe ma.
A tabitini Isra'iila'en ɓe yimɓe ma haa foroy, yaa Jawmiraawo, an boo a laati Allah maɓɓe.
Ammaa jonta, yaa Allah, Jawmiraawo am, gooŋɗin wolde ma nde mbolwanɗa maccuɗo ma e danygol mum haa foroy.
Innde ma ɓaŋgo haa foroy, yimɓe mbi'a: Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama, kaŋko woni Allah Isra'iila. Tabitin danygol maccuɗo ma boo.
Yaa Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama, Allah Isra'iila, mi hulaay toraago ma tornde nde'e, ngam a anndini yam a hokkatam danygol.
Jonta, yaa Allah Jawmiraawo, an woni Allah, ko mbi'ɗa fuu ɗum gooŋga, a iinani yam hayru oo.
Nden, useni barkiɗin danygol maccuɗo ma yeeso maaɗa haa foroy. An Jawmiraawo wi'i ɗum, ngam maajum fakat danygol am heɓan barka ma.”
Ɓaawo kuuje ɗe'e, Daawuda jaali Filisti'en, leestini ɓe, rimɗini lesdi Isra'iila diga baawɗe maɓɓe.

Nden o jaali Mo'abi'en. O wallini naŋngaaɓe fuu haa lesdi, o foondi bee ɓoggol poondirgol mo maayata malla mo yeeɗata nder maɓɓe. O foonda ɓoggi ɗiɗi, wonɓe les maaji mbare, wonɓe les ɓoggol ngola boo ngeeɗa. Mo'abi'en ngarti maccuɓe Daawuda, o yowani ɓe jomorgol.
Nden o jaali Hadad'ezer ɓii Rehob, laamiiɗo Soba. Laamiiɗo oo yahno semmbiɗingo laamu maako haa maayo Efratis.
Daawuda hooci wa'iiɓe mootaaji pucci ujineere e teemeɗɗe njoweeɗiɗo (1.700) e honooɓe ujine noogas (20.000) haa maako. Daawuda soppi korle pucci mootaaji fuu, o acci teemerre ngam hoore maako.
Siriya'en ngari diga Damas ngam haa ɓe mballa Hadad'ezer, laamiiɗo Soba, ammaa Daawuda mbari nder maɓɓe worɓe ujine noogas e ɗiɗo (22.000).
Daawuda waɗi saŋngeere aynooɓe nder lesdi maɓɓe, ɓe ngarti maccuɓe maako, o yowani ɓe jomorgol. Jawmiraawo hokki Daawuda jaalorgal koo toy o yehi fuu.
Daawuda hooci bawarɗe
Haa Beeta e Berotay, berniiji Hadad'ezer, Daawuda hooci njamndi mboɗeeri ɗuuɗndi masin.
To'i, laamiiɗo Hamat nani Daawuda jaali jama'aare konu Hadad'ezer fuu.

Ngam maajum o neli ɓiyiiko Yoram haa laamiiɗo Daawuda, o ƴama njamu maako, o yelano mo barka, ngam o haɓi bee Hadad'ezer, o jaali mo. Ngam haɓre ɗonno hakkunde Hadad'ezer e To'i foroy. Yoram yahrani Daawuda kuuje kaŋŋeeri e cardi e njamndi mboɗeeri.
Daawuda seni ɗe ngam Jawmiraawo, kanje e cardi e kaŋŋeeri ndi o hoocino haa ummaatooje goɗɗe ɗe o jaalino:
Haa Siriya'en e Mo'abi'en e Ammooni'en e Filisti'en e Amaleki'en, non boo geɗal nder keɓal konu bee Hadad'ezer ɓii Rehob, laamiiɗo Soba.
Daawuda mbari Siriya'en ujine sappo e njoweetato (18.000) nder Waadiwol Mannda. Nde o lorti, innde maako ɓesdi mawnugo fahin
O jo'ini caŋngeeje aynooɓe nder lesdi Edoom. Edoomi'en fuu laati maccuɓe Daawuda. Jawmiraawo hisni Daawuda koo toy o yehi.
Daawuda laamani Isra'iila fuu. O ɗon waɗana yimɓe maako fuu kiita ndarnuka e ngooŋɗuka.
Yo'ab ɓii Seruyatu woni mawɗo honooɓe, Yusafat ɓii Ahiluudi woni hunndukoojo laamiiɗo.
Cadok ɓii Ahitooba e Ahimelek ɓii Abiyatar ngoni liman'en. Seraya woni binndoowo.
Benaya ɓii Yoyada woni hooreejo Kereti'en e Peleti'en
Nyannde feere Daawuda ƴami: “Woodi goɗɗo luttuɗo nder saare Sawulu na? Mi waɗana mo mbooɗeeŋga daliila Yonatan
Ɓe tawi goɗɗo mo laatino suka saare Sawulu, innde maako Siba. Ɓe ngaddi mo haa Daawuda. Laamiiɗo ƴami mo: “An woni Siba na?” O jaabi: “Ooho, barkaama.”
Laamiiɗo ƴami: “Kadi walaa luttuɗo nder saare Sawulu na? Mi yiɗi hebbitingo amaana fodde ko mbi'mi yeeso Allah.” Siba jaabi: “Lutti ɓii Yonatan gooto, o jiijiiɗo haa kosɗe maako ɗiɗi fuu.”
Laamiiɗo ƴami: “Toy mo?” Siba wi'i: “O ɗon haa saare Makir ɓii Ammiyel haa Loodebar.”
Daawuda neli ɗaɓɓitoygo mo.
Mefiboset ɓii Yonatan ɓii Sawulu wari haa Daawuda. O tuggi koppi yeeso maako. Daawuda wi'i: “Mefiboset.” O jaabi: “Na'am, mi maccuɗo ma.”
Daawuda wi'i mo: “Taa hul, ngam fakat mi woonante ngam daliila baaba ma Yonatan. Mi lornante gese maama ma Sawulu fuu. A nyaamdan bee am foroy.”
Fahin Mefiboset tuggi koppi, wi'i: “Min mi moy haa a suklano rawaandu waatundu bana am?”
Ammaa laamiiɗo ewni Siba, suka Sawulu, o wi'i mo: “Ko Sawulu e saare mum marno fuu, mi hokki ɗum taaniraawo jaagorɗo ma.

Sey a rema gese maako, an e ɓiɓɓe ma e huuwanooɓe ma, on mooɓta nafuuda maaje, ngam haa taaniraawo jaagorɗo ma heɓa ko yeeɗira. Ammaa o nyaaman haa saare am nyalɗe fuu.” Siba woodino ɓiɓɓe sappo e njowo e huuwooɓe noogas.
O wi'i laamiiɗo: “Mi waɗan ko umruɗa maccuɗo ma fuu, barkaama.”
Mefiboset woodi ɓiŋngel gorgel, innde maagel Mika. Wonɓe nder saare Siba fuu ɓe huuwanooɓe Mefiboset.
Kaŋko o jooɗi haa Urusaliima, ngam o ɗon nyaama foroy haa saare laamiiɗo. Ammaa o jiijiiɗo kosɗe maako ɗiɗi fuu.
Ɓaawo maajum, Nahas, laamiiɗo Ammooni'en maayi. Ɓiyiiko Hanun laami haa pellel maako.
Daawuda wi'i: “Mi waɗanan Hanun ɓii Nahas mbooɗeeŋga, bana baaba maako waɗani yam.” Daawuda neli nelaaɓe haa ɓe nde'itina mo dow maayde baaba maako. Nde nelaaɓe man njotti lesdi Ammooni'en,

mawɓe Ammooni'en mbi'i laamiiɗo muuɗum'en: “A numi Daawuda neli de'itinooɓe haa maaɗa ngam siŋkango ma daliila maayde baaba ma na? O nelaay ɓe haa maaɗa ngam wiɗitaago e horugo e hippaago berniwol ngo'ol na?”
Hanun umri ɓe naŋnga nelaaɓe Daawuda go. Ɓe naŋngi ɓe, ɓe laɓi reeta bakkuɗe maɓɓe, ɓe ta'i limce maɓɓe haa yotti pooɓe. Nden o lorti ɓe.
Worɓe ɓe'e cemti masin haa ɓe ngiɗaa hootugo. Nde Daawuda nani kubar maajum, o neli haa maɓɓe, o wi'i: “Paɓɓe haa Yeriko, haa bakkuɗe mon puɗa fahin, nden ngarton.”

Nde Ammooni'en annditi ɓe toonyi Daawuda, ɓe taaski konu, ɓe njoɓi honooɓe Siriya'en ujine noogas (20.000) haya diga Bayti-Rehob e Soba, ujineere (1.000) diga laamiiɗo Ma'aka e ujine sappo e ɗiɗi (12.000) diga laamiiɗo Tooba.
Nde Daawuda nani ɗum, o neli Yo'ab, mawɗo ardiiɓe sooje'en, bee honooɓe suusɓe fuu.
Ammooni'en ngurti berniwol muuɗum'en, ndarni caffuuji
Nde Yo'ab yi'i konne'en taarake ɗum yeeso e ɓaawo fuu, o suɓi woɗɓe nder suɓaaɓe Isra'iila, o darni ɓe dow Siriya'en.
Yimɓe luttuɓe fuu, o halfini ɓe haa juŋngo Abisay deerɗiiko mo huucitini ɓe dow Ammooni'en.
Yo'ab wi'i Abisay: “To Siriya'en calorake yam, mballa mi. An boo to Ammooni'en calorake ma, mi wallete.
Semmbiɗiɗ, en tiiɗa ngam daliila yimɓe meeɗen e ngam berniiji Allah meeɗen! Jawmiraawo boo waɗan ko fottanta mo.”
Nden Yo'ab e wonduɓe bee muuɗum njehi haɓoygo bee Siriya'en. Siriya'en ndoggi yeeso maako.
Nde Ammooni'en ngi'i Siriya'en ndoggi, ɓe ndoggi kamɓe boo yeeso Abisay, ɓe lori nder berniwol. Nden Yo'ab acci Ammooni'en, o hooti Urusaliima.
Nde Siriya'en ngi'i Isra'iila'en njaali ɓe, ɓe mooɓti jama'aaje maɓɓe fuu.
Hadad'ezer neli haa Siriya'en wonɓe gaɗa Efratis, ɓe ngari haa Heelam. Sobak, mawɗo honooɓe Hadad'ezer ardi ɓe.
Nde Daawuda nani ɗum, o mooɓti Isra'iila fuu. Ɓe eeri maayo Urdun, ɓe ngari Heelam. Siriya'en ndarni caffuuji muuɗum'en, nden ɓe kaɓi bee yimɓe Daawuda.
Isra'iila'en ndiiwi Siriya'en. Daawuda e yimɓe mum kalki mootaaji pucci teemeɗɗe joweeɗiɗi (700) e wa'iiɓe pucci ujine cappanɗe nayo (40.000). Ɓe njuwi boo Sobak, mawɗo ardiiɓe honooɓe, o maayi ton.
Nde laamiiɓe ɗowtaniiɓe Hadad'ezer ngi'i Isra'iila'en njaali ɓe, ɓe culhotiri bee Isra'iila'en, ɓe kuuwani ɓe. Ɓaawoɗon Siriya'en kuli wallugo Ammooni'en.

Mawri man, haa fuɗɗoode hitaande, wakkati laamiiɓe ngurtoto ngam haɓre, Daawuda neli Yo'ab bee maccuɓe mum e Isra'iila'en fuu ngam nattingo Ammooni'en e hippaago berniwol Rabba. Ammaa kaŋko o yahaay, o jooɗi haa Urusaliima
Nyannde feere, kiikiiɗe, Daawuda ummi e ɗoyŋgol mum, ɗon waanca dow soorowol mum haa laamorde. Nden o yi'i debbo ɗon yiiwo, debbo oo o ŋarniiɗo masin.
Daawuda neli ƴamugo haala maako. Ɓe mbi'i mo: “Kaŋko woni Bat-Seeba ɓii Eliyam, debbo Uriya Hetiijo.”
Daawuda neli nelaaɓe haa maako, ɓe ngadda mo. Debbo wari haa maako, o hawti bee maako. Wakkati maajum Bat-Seeba ɗonno seno ɓaawo lootugol mum. Nden o hooti suudu maako.
Ɓaawo maajum o reedi. O neli, o anndini Daawuda bee wi'go: “Mi reedi.”
Daawuda neli haa Yo'ab, umri mo: “Neldam Uriya Hetiijo.” Yo'ab waɗi ɗum.
Uriya wari haa Daawuda. Daawuda ƴami mo njamu Yo'ab e njamu yimɓe e kubar haɓre.
Nden o wi'i Uriya: “Jippa haa saare ma, siwta seɗɗa.” Nde Uriya dilli, Daawuda neldi dokkal ɓaawo maako.
Ammaa Uriya yahaay haa saare mum. O waali haa yolnde saare laamiiɗo, kaŋko e aynooɓe fuu.
Nde Daawuda nani Uriya jippaaki haa saare mum, o ƴami mo: “Koni a jippaaki haa saare ma? Naa jahaaŋgal juutŋgal ngartuɗa na?”

Uriya jaabi mo: “Sundukru alkawal Allah e yimɓe Yahuuda e Isra'iila fuu ɗon njooɗi nder laymaaji. Jaagorɗo am Yo'ab e mawɓe mum ɗon caŋngini nder ladde. Kadi min mi nasta saare am, mi nyaama, mi yara, mi waalda bee debbo am na? Fakat bana a geeto, barkaama, mi waɗataa ɗum!”
Daawuda wi'i Uriya: “Jooɗa haa ɗo hannde boo. Jaŋngo mi jaɓɓititte.” Bana nii Uriya faɓɓi nder Urusaliima nyalaade man e jaŋngo man boo.
Nden Daawuda ewni Uriya. Uriya nyaami e yari yeeso maako. Daawuda wuykini mo. Ammaa koo jemma maajum boo Uriya hootaay saare mum. O yehi, o waali haa nokkuure aynooɓe laamiiɗo mbaalata.
Nde weeti, Daawuda winndani Yo'ab bataakewol, hokki ngol Uriya, Uriya yahrani mo.
Ndaa ko o winndi: “Darnu Uriya haa nokkuure nde haɓre ɓuri saatugo. Nden lorte, acce mo feere maako, ngam haa konne'en mbara mo.”
Wakkati Yo'ab ɗon ayna berniwol, o darni Uriya haa nokkuure nde o anndi konne'en suusɓe ɗon ton.
Yimɓe berniwol ngurti, kaɓi bee yimɓe Yo'ab. Nder haɓre man, maccuɓe Daawuda e yimɓe woɗɓe maayi, Uriya Hetiijo boo maayi.
Yo'ab neldi Daawuda kubar haɓre fuu.
O umri nelaaɗo: “To a timmini anndingo laamiiɗo kubar haɓre fuu,
teema o tikkan, o ƴame: Koni on ɓaditi berniwol ngam haɓre? On anndaa wonɓe dow mahol taariiŋgol ngol piɗan on na?
Moy mbari Abimelek ɓii Yerub-Ba'al? Naa debbo gonɗo dow mahol sakkini hayre namarde dow maako, o maayi haa Tebes na? Koni on ɓaditi mahol bana nii? Nden kam wi' mo: Suka ma Uriya Hetiijo boo maayi
Nelaaɗo yehi, yecci Daawuda ko Yo'ab umri mo fuu.
O wi'i: “Konne'en ɓurdi min semmbe, ɓe ngurti berniwol, ɓe ukkani min haa yaasi. Ammaa min ngerɓi ɓe ɓaawo haa dammugal berniwol.
Haa ton wonɓe dow mahol piɗi yimɓe ma. Yimɓe amin woɗɓe maayi. Suka ma Uriya Hetiijo boo maayi.”

Daawuda jaabi nelaaɗo: “Ndaa nii mbi'ata Yo'ab: Taa haala ka ɓille. Hannde kam kaafahi mbaran oo, jaŋngo boo oya. Semmbiɗin haɓre dow berniwol haa to a halki ngol. Sey a tiɗɗina ɓernde Yo'ab bana nii.”
Nde debbo Uriya nani gorum maayi, o woyi mo.
Nde o sudditi, Daawuda neli haa maako, hoo'i mo haa saare mum, te'i mo. Debbo oo danyani mo ɓiɗɗo gorko. Ammaa ko Daawuda waɗi, ɗum halli yeeso Jawmiraawo.
Jawmiraawo neli annabi Natan haa Daawuda. Natan yehi haa laamiiɗo, wi'i mo: “Worɓe ɗiɗo ɗonno berniwol gootol, oo diskuɗo, oya boo talakaajo
Diskuɗo mari dammooji e na'i ɗuuɗɗi masin.

Ammaa talakaajo walaa koo ɗume, sey baalel bortel gootel tan. O sooduno ngel, o nyaamni ngel, ngel mawnidi bee ɓikkoy maako. Ngel ɗon nyaama nyaamdu maako, ngel ɗon yara nder jardugel maako, ngel ɗon ɗaano dow wiɓɓere maako, fakat ngel laati bana ɓiŋngel maako deyel.

Nyannde feere koɗo wari haa diskuɗo go. Kaŋko o yiɗaa hoo'ugo haa dammooji maako malla haa na'i maako, ngam haa koɗo maako nyaama. Ngam maajum o yehi, o jaɓti baalel talakaajo, o hirsi ngel ngam koɗo maako.”
Tikkere Daawuda saati masin, o wi'i Natan: “Fakat bana Jawmiraawo o geeto, gorko oo o mbareteeɗo!
Sey o hokkita talakaajo baalel man cowi nayi, ngam o waɗi halleende mawnde nde'e, o yurminaay mo sam.”
Natan wi'i Daawuda: “An woni gorko man! Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo, Allah Isra'iila wi'i: Min waɗi ma a laamiiɗo Isra'iila. Min hisni ma juŋngo Sawulu.
Mi hokki ma saare jaagorɗo ma e rewɓe maako fuu. Mi hokki ma laamu dow Isra'iila e Yahuuda. To ɗum he'aayno, mi ɓesdananno ma ko ɓuri ɗum.
Koni a meerɗini umrooje am? Koni kuuwɗa kalluɗum ɗu'um? A mbari Uriya Hetiijo bee kaafahi Ammooni'en, a hooci debbo maako.
Ngam a waɗi ɗum, a meerɗini yam, fakat kaafahi seedataa bee saare maaɗa haa foroy.
Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo wi'i: Mi umminan sarru dow maaɗa diga nder saare ma. Yeeso maaɗa koocanmi rewɓe ma, mi hokka ɓe goɗɗo feere, o waalda bee maɓɓe nyalawma.
An kam a waɗi ɗum bee cuuɗiiɗum, ammaa min mi waɗan ɗum nyalawma yeeso Isra'iila'en fuu
Daawuda wi'i Natan: “Mi waɗi aybe haa Jawmiraawo.” Natan jaabi mo: “Jawmiraawo yaafi aybe ma, a maayataa.
Ammaa ngam a yawi Jawmiraawo masin bee aybe ma, ɓiŋngel danyaaŋgel maayan.”
Nden Natan hooti saare mum.
Jawmiraawo nyawni ɓiŋngel ngel debbo Uriya danyani Daawuda, haa ngel yotti daande maayde.
Daawuda suumi, tori Allah ngam yoŋki maagel. Nde jemma waɗi fuu, o nasta suudu maako, o waalo haa lesdi.
Saraaki'en maako ngari ngam haa ɓe ummina mo, ammaa o sali, o jaɓaay nyaamdugo bee maɓɓe boo.

Ɓaawo nyalɗe joweeɗiɗi ɓiŋngel maayi. Ɓe kuli anndingo ɗum Daawuda, ngam ɓe mbi'i: “Wakkati ngel ɗonno yeeɗi tawon maa, o sali nanugo ko en mbi'i. To en ngecci mo ngel maayi, teema o naawnan hoore maako.”
Nde Daawuda yi'i ɓe ɗon cofndotira, o faami ɓiŋngel maayi. O ƴami saraaki'en maako: “Ngel maayi na?” Ɓe mbi'i: “Ooho.”
Nden Daawuda ummi e lesdi, yiiwi, wuji nebbam, wattiti limce mum. O nasti suudu Jawmiraawo, o sujidi. Nde o warti haa suudu maako, o umri ɓe ngaddana mo nyaamdu, nden o nyaami.
Saraaki'en maako mbi'i mo: “Min paamaay ko mbaɗɗa. Saa'i ɓiŋngel ɗonno yeeɗa tawon, a suumi ngam daliila maagel, a woyi. Nde ngel maayi jonta, a ummi, a nyaami.”
O wi'i ɓe: “Saa'i ngel ɗon yeeɗi tawon, mi suumi, mi woyi, ngam mi tammi teema Jawmiraawo enɗanno yam, hisnanno yoŋki maagel.
Ammaa jonta ngel maayi. Ngam ɗume cuumotoomi? Kadi mi waawan wartirgo ngel na? Ɗum min hawtoyta bee maagel, ammaa kaŋgel ngel lorataako haa am.”
Daawuda yehi haa Bat-Seeba debbo muuɗum, o de'itini mo, o hawti bee maako, kaŋko o danyi ɓiɗɗo gorko. Daawuda inndi mo Suleymaanu. Ɓiŋngel nge'el, Jawmiraawo yiɗi ngel.
O anndini ɗum Daawuda bee hunnduko annabi Natan. Natan inndi ngel Yedidiya
Yo'ab tokki haɓugo bee Rabba, berniwol Ammooni'en maŋngol go. Nde o nyaami laamorde maagol,
o neli nelaaɓe haa Daawuda, o wi'i mo: “Mi nasti Rabba, mi nyaami nokkuure Seeɓoore Ndiyam.
Jonta war bee Isra'iila'en luttuɓe fuu, a saŋngina kommbi maagol, a nyaama ngol. Min mi fotaay nyaamugo ngol, ngam taa ngol wi'e bee innde am.”
Daawuda mooɓti yimɓe fuu, yehi Rabba, ukkani berniwol, nyaami ngol.

O hooci woronnde wonnde dow hoore lawru Ammooni'en. Teddeeŋga maare waɗi baakin kilo cappanɗe tati (30). Hayre marnde saman ɗuuɗɗo ɗon haa maare. Daawuda waɗi nde dow hoore mum. O wurtini keɓal konu ɗuuɗŋgal masin diga berniwol man.

O wurtini boo yimɓe wonɓe nder maagol. O dooli ɓe huuwugo bee ceekruɗe e tufirɗe njamndi e pe'irɗe njamndi, non boo haa kaatane birikje. Bana non Daawuda waari berniiji Ammooni'en fuu. Nden o hooti Urusaliima bee jama'aare konu maako fuu.
Ɓaawoɗon ndaa ko waɗi: Absalom ɓii Daawuda woodi deerɗiraawo debbo ŋarniiɗo, innde maako Tamar. Amnon ɓii Daawuda, mo daada mum feere, o yiɗi Tamar.
Yiide maajum sakli mo, nyawni mo, ngam o paanyo mo meeɗaay gorko tawon. Amnon waawaay ɓaditaago mo bee koyɗum.
Ammaa Amnon woodi soobaajo, ɗum Yonadabu ɓii Sime'a deerɗiraawo Daawuda. Yonadabu o ƴoyɗo masin.
O wi'i Amnon: “Yerima, nde weeti fuu mi ɗon yi'a a ɗon ɓilli. Ko waɗ ma? Yeccam!” Amnon jaabi mo: “Mi yiɗi Tamar, minyiraawo Absalom deerɗam.”

Yonadabu wi'i mo: “Waala dow be'itte ma bana a nyawɗo. To baaba ma wari laarugo ma, wi' mo: Accu deerɗam Tamar wara, waɗanammi nyaamdu. Sey o taaskitina ndu haa ɗo yeeso am, haa mi yi'a, mi nyaama ndu dow juŋngo maako.”
Amnon waɗi hoore muuɗum bana o nyawɗo, o waali. Nde laamiiɗo wari laarugo mo, o wi'i laamiiɗo: “Accu deerɗam Tamar wara, tamsa tamseeje ɗiɗi, haa mi nyaama ɗe dow juŋngo muuɗum.”
Daawuda neli haa Tamar, wi'i mo: “Yah haa suudu deerɗa Amnon, a waɗana mo nyaamdu.”
Tamar yehi, nasti suudu deerɗum. O tawi mo o ɗon waali haa be'itte maako. Tamar hoo'i kuroori, jiiɓi ndi, tamsi tamseeje yeeso Amnon.
Nden Tamar hoo'i feho, rufi tamseeje yeeso maako. Ammaa Amnon sali nyaamugo. O wi'i: “Sey yimɓe woɗɓe fuu ngurto tawon.” Ɓe ngurtini ɓe fuu.
Nden o wi'i Tamar: “Waddanam tamseeje haa ɗo haa nder suudu, haa mi nyaama ɗe dow juŋngo ma.” Tamar hoo'i tamseeje, yahrani ɗe deerɗiiko haa nder suudu.
Nde o ɗon lii'ano mo ɗe, Amnon naŋngi mo, wi'i mo: “War, deerɗam, waaldu bee am.”
Ammaa Tamar jaabi mo: “Naa non, deerɗam, taa toskam, halleende bana nde'e huuwataake nder Isra'iila, taa waɗ ɗum!
Toy njahanmi to a toski yam? An boo a laatoto bana baɗɗo zunuuba nder Isra'iila. Wolwu bee laamiiɗo, naa o te'natam bee maaɗa na?”
Ammaa Amnon sali nanango mo, o dooli mo waaldugo bee maako, o toskini mo.
Nden Amnon wanyi mo, ɓernde maako heewi nganyŋgu caatuŋgu. Nganyŋgu maako ɓuri yiide maako naane saatugo. O wi'i Tamar: “Umma, dillu!”
Tamar jaabi mo: “Naa non, deerɗam. To a riiwi yam jonta, ɗum ɓuran hallugo dow ko mbaɗɗa.” Ammaa Amnon sali nanango mo.
O ewni suka maako, o umri mo: “Wurtin oo ɗo suudu am. Maɓɓu dammugal ɓaawo maako.”
Suka waɗi ko o umri.
Tamar ɗonno ɓorni irin suddaare nde juuɗe, bana nde faanyɓe nder ɓiɓɓe laamiiɗo rewɓe ɓornoto.
O seeki nde, o waɗi ndoondi dow hoore maako, o roondi juŋngo maako dow maare, o yaawɗi haa suudu maako, o ɗon wooka.
Nde Absalom, deerɗiiko yi'i mo, o ƴami: “Amnon naawni ma na? Taa ɗum ɓilla ɓernde ma, deerɗam. Taa waŋgin haala ka'a, ngam o deerɗa.” Tamar jooɗi nder saare deerɗiiko Absalom, o cuniiɗo.
Nde Daawuda nani haala maajum, o tikki masin.
Ammaa Absalom wanyi Amnon ngam o toski deerɗiiko debbo. O sali koo wolwididgo bee maako.
Duuɓi ɗiɗi ɓaawoɗon, Absalom ewni ɓiɓɓe laamiiɗo fuu haa Ba'al-Hacoor kommbi Efrayim. Ta'ooɓe gaasa baali maako ɗon ton.
Nden o yehi haa laamiiɗo, o wi'i: “Ndaa, ta'ooɓe gaasa baali ɗon kuuwanammi jonta, barkaama. A waran an e saraaki'en maaɗa, ngam nyaamdugo bee am na?”
Ammaa laamiiɗo jaabi mo: “Naa non, ɓiŋngel am, ngam taa min njowane doŋngal tedduŋgal.” Absalom tori mo nde ɗuuɗɗum, ammaa laamiiɗo sali yahugo. O jaɓɓiti mo.
Nden Absalom wi'i: “To an a warataa, accu deerɗam Amnon yahda bee amin.” Laamiiɗo ƴami: “Ngam daliila kaye o yahdata bee ma?”
Ammaa Absalom ɓilli mo haa laamiiɗo acci Amnon e ɓiɓɓe muuɗum woɗɓe fuu njahda bee maako.
Nden Absalom umri sukaaɓe muuɗum: “Kakkile, to Amnon yari inaboojam, ɓernde maako seyake, mi umran on mbarugo mo. Taa kule! Mbare mo. Tiɗɗine ɓerɗe mon, laate on semmbiɗɓe e suusɓe, min umri on ɗum.”
Sukaaɓe Absalom ɗowtani umroore man, mbari Amnon. Ɓiɓɓe laamiiɗo luttuɓe fuu ummi, mba'i alfadariije muuɗum'en, ndoggi.
Diga ɓe ɗon haa laawol tawon, Daawuda heɓi kubaruwol bi'anŋgol: “Absalom mbari ɓiɓɓe laamiiɗo fuu, walaa koo gooto lutti.”
Laamiiɗo ummi, seeki limce muuɗum, waali haa lesdi. Huuwanooɓe mo wonɓe ton fuu boo ceeki limce muuɗum'en.
Ammaa Yonadabu ɓii Sime'a deerɗiraawo Daawuda wi'i: “Taa num ɓe mbari ɓiɓɓe ma fuu, barkaama. Amnon feere mum maayi. Diga o toski Tamar, deerɗiiko debbo, Absalom waɗi anniya waataago ɗum.
Taa jawmam laamiiɗo numa ɓiɓɓe muuɗum fuu maayi, ammaa Amnon feere maako tan.”
Nden Absalom doggi.
Wakkati maajum aynoowo ɓaŋgti gite, o yi'i yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe ɗon ngara gal laawol gonŋgol ɓaawo maako, gal becce hooseere. Law o anndini laamiiɗo.
Yonadabu wi'i Daawuda: “Ɗum ɓiɓɓe ma, bana mi wi'i ma.”
Nde o timmini wolwugo ɗum, ɓiɓɓe laamiiɗo njotti. Ɓe ɓaŋgti sawtuuji maɓɓe, ɓe mboyi. Laamiiɗo e yimɓe muuɗum boo mboyi bojji ɗuuɗɗi masin.
Daawuda woyi ɓiyum Amnon nyalɗe ɗuuɗɗe. Ammaa Absalom doggi, yehi haa Talmay ɓii Ammihuuru, laamiiɗo Gesur. O faɓɓi ton duuɓi tati
Nde ɓernde Daawuda de'iti dow maayde Amnon, o fuɗɗi yenwugo Absalom.
Yo'ab ɓii Seruyatu anndi laamiiɗo yenwi ɓiyum Absalom.
Ngam maajum o neli haa Teko'a, ɓe ngaddani mo debbo marɗo hikma gonɗo haa ton. Yo'ab wi'i mo: “Waɗ hoore ma bana a debbo jurumɗo, taa wuja nebbam, ɓorna bana boyanɗo maayɗo diga nyalɗe ɗuuɗɗe.
Nden yah haa laamiiɗo, yeccu mo ko mbi'anmaami.” Yo'ab wi'i mo ko o tammi wi'go.
Debbo Teko'aajo yehi haa laamiiɗo. O tuggi koppi, waali, hippi, o wi'i: “Wallam, barkaama!”
Laamiiɗo ƴami mo: “Ko waɗi ma?” O jaabi: “Mi jurumɗo, gorko am maayi.
Mi woodino ɓiɓɓe worɓe ɗiɗo. Nyannde feere ɓe njokkiri haa ngesa. Walaa goɗɗo ton haa o sennda ɓe, bana nii ɗum laatori haa gooto maɓɓe mbari deerɗiiko.

Jonta boo banndiraaɓe amin fuu ɗon ɓillammi haa mi wurtinana ɓe ɓiyam geeto. Ɓe ngiɗi mbarugo mo ngam o mbari deerɗiiko. Ɓe ngiɗi halkugo donoowo oo boo. Bana nii ɓe kalkan tammunde am ragareere, gorko am boo walaa danygol tabitinanŋgol innde muuɗum.”
Laamiiɗo wi'i mo: “Hootu saare ma, min mi suklanto haala ma.”
Debbo wi'i: “Barkaama, yow aybe man dow am e dow saare am ammaa naa dow laamiiɗo, naa dow saare laamu muuɗum boo.”
Laamiiɗo jaabi: “To goɗɗo tokkake ma bee haala, waddu mo haa am. Fakat o meetataa fitingo ma.”
Ammaa debbo wi'i mo: “Huna bee innde Allah Jawmiraawo maaɗa ngam taa baatoowo ɓesda asar, taa ɓe nattina ɓiyam.” Daawuda wi'i: “Fakat bana Jawmiraawo o geeto, walaa naawɗum koo ɗume heɓata ɓiɗɗo ma.”
Debbo wi'i: “Accu korɗo ma ɓesda wolwango ma wolde woore, barkaama.” O jaabi: “Wolwu.”
Debbo wi'i: “Ngam ɗume a nufi aybewol irin ngo'ol dow yimɓe Allah? A duŋanaaki gudinaaɗo warta diga nokkuure nde o dogguno e mum. Bee bolle ma a do'iri hoore ma kiita.

Enen fuu en maayan fakat. En ɗon nanndi bee ndiyam ndufaaɗam haa lesdi, goɗɗo waawataa mooɓtugo ɗam fahin. Ammaa Allah yiɗaa halkugo yoŋki. Ngam maajum o waɗi anniya ngam taa ɓiya daayo e maako haa foroy.
Ndaa, mi waddi haala am yeeso maaɗa, barkaama, ngam yimɓe kulni yam. Min korɗo ma, mi wi'i: Sey mi wolwana laamiiɗo, teema o waɗan ko korɗo maako tori.
Teema o nanan, o hisnatam juŋngo gorko ɗaɓɓanɗo nattingo yam bee ɓiyam fuu nder geɗal ngal Allah hokki min.
Mi tammi wolde maaɗa de'itintam, barkaama, ngam a ɗon bana malaa'ikaajo Allah, haa a senndindira aybe bee gooŋga. Allah Jawmiraawo ma wondu bee maaɗa
Laamiiɗo wi'i debbo: “Haa mi ƴame huunde woore, taa suuɗam nde.” Debbo wi'i: “Ƴam, barkaama.”

O ƴami: “Yo'ab yerɓi ma wolwugo bana nii na?” Debbo jaabi: “Fakat bana a geeto barkaama, walaa mo waawata suuɗango ma koo ɗume. Gooŋga, Yo'ab, suka ma umri yam wargo haa maaɗa, kaŋko wi'i yam mi lorna bolle ɗe'e boo.
O ɗaɓɓi haa o waylita haala man bee hakkiilo. Ammaa an a mari hikma bana malaa'ikaajo Allah, a ɗon heɓta koo ɗume fuu, barkaama.”
Nden laamiiɗo wi'i Yo'ab: “Booɗɗum, mi yerdake. Yah, wartiranam Absalom, sukaajo oo.”
Yo'ab tuggi koppi, waali, hippi yeeso Daawuda, wi'i: “Allah barkiɗine barkaama! Jonta mi anndi a yerdi yam, ngam a jaɓani yam tornde am.”
Nden o ummi, o yehi haa Gesur, o wartiri Absalom haa Urusaliima.
Ammaa laamiiɗo wi'i: “Sey o hoota saare maako. Min kam mi yiɗaa o yi'ammi.” Ngam maajum Absalom yehi saare mum, o waraay yeeso laamiiɗo.
Nder lesdi Isra'iila fuu walaa gorko maŋgteteeɗo ngam daliila ŋarol mum bana Absalom. Diga hoore maako haa kosɗe maako o walaa batte.
Haa timmoode hitaande fuu, o ɗon ta'a gaasa hoore maako ngam ka ɗon teddana mo. Nde ɓe poondi ka fuu, teddeeŋga maaka ɓuri kilo ɗiɗi.
Absalom woodi ɓiɓɓe worɓe tato e ɓiɗɗo debbo gooto ŋarniiɗo, innde maako Tamar.
O jooɗi haa Urusaliima duuɓi ɗiɗi, ammaa o heɓaay yi'ugo laamiiɗo.
O neli ewnaago Yo'ab ngam haa o wolwana laamiiɗo, ammaa Yo'ab sali wargo. O neli ɗiɗawre, ammaa Yo'ab sali wargo non.
Ngam maajum Absalom wi'i yimɓe mum: “Ngesa Yo'ab ɗon heddi bee ngesa am. O woodi sa'iiruuri ton. Njehe, ngule ndi bee yiite.” Ɓe njehi, ɓe nguli ndi.
Law Yo'ab wari haa suudu Absalom. O ƴami mo: “Koni yimɓe ma nguli ngesa am?”

Absalom jaabi mo: “Ngam mi ewni ma, an boo a waraay. Mi yiɗi nelugo ma haa laamiiɗo, a wi'a mo: Ngam ɗume mi wurti Gesur, mi wari haa ɗo? Ndikkanammi to mi jooɗino ton haa jonta. Wi' mo mi yiɗi yi'ugo mo. To mi waɗi aybe, nden kam o mbarammi.”
Yo'ab yehi haa laamiiɗo, yecci mo ɗum. Laamiiɗo neli ewnaago Absalom, kaŋko o yehi, o tuggi koppi, waali, hippi yeeso maako. Laamiiɗo harli mo, hebbi mo.
Ɓaawo man Absalom heɓani hoore mum moota pucci e yimɓe cappanɗe njowo doggooɓe yeeso maako bee kosɗe.

Nde weeti fuu o ummo fajiri cub, o daro dow laawol kommbi dammugal yahugo saare laamiiɗo. Koo moy wari haa laamiiɗo ngam haala kiita, Absalom ƴama mo: “Toy iwɗaa?” To o nani garɗo oo iwi haa lenyol gootol nder Isra'iila,
nden kam o wi'a mo: “Haala ma laaɓi, a gooŋɗuɗo. Ammaa walaa mo nanante nder yimɓe laamiiɗo.”
Nden Absalom ɓesda wi'ugo: “Kay! To mi laatake kiitoowo nder lesdi ndi'i, mi gooŋɗinan koo moy garɗo haa am ngam daliila jokkirgol malla wullaandu.”
To goɗɗo ɓaditake mo ngam tuggugo koppi yeeso maako, o forta juŋngo maako, harlo mo, hebbo mo.
Bana nii o waarani Isra'iila'en warɓe haa laamiiɗo ngam waɗaneego kiita fuu. Fewjere nde'e waylitani mo ɓerɗe yimɓe.
Ɓaawo duuɓi cappanɗe nayi Absalom wi'i laamiiɗo: “Accu mi yaha Heburuun, barkaama, mi hebbina
Ngam saa'i mi ɗonno jooɗi haa Gesur nder lesdi Siriya, mbi'mi: To Jawmiraawo wartiri yam haa Urusaliima, nden kam mi jagganto mo.”
Laamiiɗo wi'i mo: “Yah jam!” Nden Absalom yehi haa Heburuun.
Ammaa o neli nelaaɓe haa le'i Isra'iila fuu, ɓe mbi'a koo toy: “To on nani hoolo luwal, mbi'e: Jonta Absalom laati laamiiɗo haa Heburuun.”
Worɓe Urusaliima ewnaaɓe teemeɗɗe ɗiɗo njahdi bee Absalom. Ammaa ɓe anndaano anniya maako sam.

Nden Absalom neli haa Gilo ngam ewnoyaago Ahitofel, sawariijo Daawuda. Saa'i maajum o fuɗɗino lii'anaago Jawmiraawo kirsaaɗi. Tuurtol dow laamiiɗo ɓurti saatugo, ngam tokkiiɓe Absalom ɗonno ɓesdo boo.
Goɗɗo wari haa Daawuda, wi'i mo: “Ɓerɗe Isra'iila'en ngaylitanake Absalom.”

Daawuda wi'i saraaki'en wonduɓe bee muuɗum haa Urusaliima fuu: “Umme, en ndoggu! To en ndoggaay law, en ndaɗataa Absalom. Njaawɗe, ngam taa o jokko en, taa o sarra en, taa o mbara yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe haa Urusaliima.”
Saraaki'en maako mbi'i mo: “Min taaskani waɗugo ko mbi'ɗa fuu, barkaama.”
Laamiiɗo wurti berniwol, yimɓe saare muuɗum fuu ndillidi bee maako. Ammaa o acci sulaaɓe sappo ngam haa ɓe ayna saare maako.
Nde laamiiɗo e yimɓe mum ngurti berniwol, ɓe ndari haa suudu ragareeru.
Yimɓe Daawuda fuu ɗon caalo yeeso maako
Laamiiɗo wi'i Ittay, Gaatiijo: “Ngam ɗume a yahdata bee amin? Ndikka a hawtana laamiiɗo keso. Naa a koɗo haa ɗo ngam a gurtinaaɗo lesdi ma na?
Neeɓaay a wari haa amin, jonta boo a dogga bee amin fahin? Min maa mi anndaa haa njahanmi! Lorta nder berniwol, an bee deerɗiraaɓe maaɗa. Jawmiraawo waɗane mbooɗeeŋga e gooŋgaaku.”
Ammaa Ittay wi'i laamiiɗo: “Fakat bana Jawmiraawo o geeto, an boo a geeto barkaama, haa ngonɗa ton ngonanmi, koo to en ngeeɗan malla en maayan boo.”
Daawuda wi'i mo: “Booɗɗum, yahdu bee am.” Ittay e worɓe mum e ɓikkoy mum fuu caali yeeso laamiiɗo.
Yimɓe Urusaliima mboyi bee hoolo maŋngo, saa'i jama'aare Daawuda ɗon dilla. Laamiiɗo eeri maayel Kederon, kaŋko e yimɓe maako ngam haa ɓe tokko laawol ladde.
Cadok, limanjo boo warino, kaŋko e Lewi'en roondiiɓe sundukru alkawal Allah. Ɓe njippini ndu, Abiyatar lii'ani Jawmiraawo kirsaaɗi
Laamiiɗo wi'i Cadok: “Lornu sundukru Allah nder berniwol. To Jawmiraawo yerdake yam, o wartirtam haa mi yi'a ndu nder jooɗorde maaru.
Ammaa to o yerdaaki yam, nden kam o waɗammi ko fottani mo.”
Laamiiɗo ɓesdi wi'ugo Cadok: “A faami na? Lorta nder berniwol bee jam, an e ɓiya Ahimaas, non boo Abiyatar e ɓiyum Yonatan.
Ndaa, mi reenan haa eerorde ladde haa to on neldi yam kubar.”
Cadok e Abiyatar lorni sundukru Allah haa Urusaliima, ɓe njooɗi ton.
Ammaa Daawuda wa'i dow Hooseere Jaytunje. O ɗon yaha bilaa paɗe, o suddi hoore maako, o ɗon woya. Yimɓe wonduɓe bee maako boo cuddi ko'e muuɗum'en, ɗon mboya.
Goɗɗo wi'i Daawuda: “Ahitofel hawtani Absalom e waɗooɓe tuurtol.” Daawuda tori, wi'i: “Yaa Jawmiraawo, laatin sawari Ahitofel faataare meere!”
Nde Daawuda yotti dow hooseere haa yimɓe cujidanta Allah, soobaajo maako Husay Arkiijo fotti bee maako. O seekino limce maako, mbulwuldi ɗon dow hoore maako boo.
Daawuda wi'i mo: “To a yahdi bee am, a teddantam.
