En njah, en kippoyo yimɓe lesdi Yahuuda, en kulna ɓe, en njaala ɓe, en laamina ɓii Tabeyel dow maɓɓe!
Jawmiraawo wi'i nii: Ɗum waɗataako, ɗum laatataako!
Ngam semmbe Siriya, ɗum Damas, semmbe Damas boo, ɗum Recin. Lutti boo duuɓi cappanɗe joweego e jowi haa ummaatoore Efrayim do'o, nde wonataa fahin.
Ngam semmbe Efrayim, ɗum Samariya, semmbe Samariya, ɗum ɓii Remaliya. Ammaa to on ngalaa nuɗɗinki, nden kam on tabitittaa!”
Jawmiraawo wolwani Akas, wi'i mo:
“Ƴam Allah Jawmiraawo maaɗa o holle alaama ngonka koo nder joonde maayɓe haa les, koo nder asamanji haa dow.”
Akas wi'i: “Mi ƴamataa koo ɗume, mi yiɗaa jarribaago Jawmiraawo.”
Esaaya wi'i: “Nane, onon yimɓe saare Daawuda! Somnugo yimɓe he'ataa on na, haa comnon koo Allah am boo?
Ngam maajum Jawmiraawo bee hoore muuɗum hokkan on alaama: Ndaa, paanyo debbo reedan, o danyan ɓiɗɗo gorko, o inndan mo Immanuyila
Kaŋko o nyaaman kettuŋgol e njumri haa to o he'i salaago kalluɗum e suɓugo booɗɗum.
Ammaa hiddeko saa'i man waɗa, lesdi ndi kulata laamiiɓe maari ɗiɗo, ferwan.
Jawmiraawo yahran dow maaɗa e dow yimɓe ma e saare baaba ma nyalɗe bone ɗe meeɗaay laataago diga Efrayim seedi bee Yahuuda. O waɗan ɗum bee laamiiɗo Assuura.
Nyalaade man Jawmiraawo yoofan buubi gonɗi haa seɓatto maaje Misra e nyaaki gonɗi haa lesdi Assuura'en.
Ɗi ngaran, ɗi njippoto fuu nder waadiiji lugguɗi e ceekli tapaaje dow bume gi'e e durduɗe fuu.
Nyalaade man Jawmiraawo laɓan gaasa hoore e suufu, ittan wakkude bee beluhi gu'aaki gaɗa maayo – waato laamiiɗo Assuura.
Nyalaade man goɗɗo duran wiige e baali ɗiɗi.
Ngam daliila ɗuuɗeeŋga kosam, yimɓe nyaaman leeɓi. Koo moy luttuɗo nder lesdi nyaaman leeɓi e njumri.
Nyalaade man, nokkuure inabooje ujineere ɗe saman mum ceede cardi ujineere, nokkuure nde'e wartan gi'e e giŋngille.
Jahanɗo loohoyaago ton jogoto kuri e lagaawal, ngam lesdi fuu heewan gi'e e giŋngille.
Kooseeje demaaɗe bee baaneewo fuu, goɗɗo yahataa ton ngam kulol gi'e e giŋngille. Na'i nduran ton, baali boo caaloto ton.”
Jawmiraawo wi'i yam: “Hoo'u alluha makka, winndu dow maaka bee binndol koyŋgol: Maher-Salal-Has-Baj. Bana wi'go yaawango keɓal konu, yaawɗan jaɓtugo.”
Mi hoo'i bee am seedooɓe hoolaaɓe: Uriya, limanjo e Zekariya ɓii Yeberikiya.
Ɓaawo man mi nasti haa debbo am. O reedi, o danyi ɓiɗɗo gorko. Jawmiraawo wi'i yam: “Ewnu mo Yaawan keɓal konu-yaawɗan jaɓtugo.
Ngam hiddeko ɓiŋngel annda wi'go: Baaba am malla daada am, ɓe koocan risku Damas e jawdi Samariya yeeso laamiiɗo Assuura.”
Jawmiraawo tokki wolwango yam, wi'i:
“Yimɓe ɓe'e ɗon njawo ndiyam Siloha ilanɗam bee hakkiilo, ammaa ɓe ɗon ndiwna
Ngam man, min Jawmiraawo mi yahran ndiyamji Efratis mawɗi cemmbiɗɗi dow maɓɓe – waato laamiiɗo Assuura bee baawɗe muuɗum fuu. Maayo man faccan, teelan
Ndiyam maago nastan Yahuuda, ɗam hebbinan lesdi, ɗam suddan ndi, ɗam yottoto daande goɗɗo.” Baawɗe laamiiɗo oo njaajan haa sudda njaajirka lesdi maaɗa fuu, an Immanuyila.
Annde ɗum, onon ummaatooje, ɓerɗe mon ta'an! Keɗite, onon jooɗiiɓe lesɗe daayiiɗe fuu. Taade balmi, ɓerɗe mon ta'an! Taade balmi, ɓerɗe mon ta'an!
Nufe nufo ammaa ngo laatoto meere! Mbolwe ko ngiɗɗon, ɗum laatataako! Ngam Allah ɗon wondi bee meeɗen.
Ndaa ko Jawmiraawo wi'i yam saa'i o naŋngi yam bee semmbe, o reentini
“Taa ewne tuurtol ko yimɓe ɓe'e fuu ewnata tuurtol. Taa kule ko ɓe kulata, taa kultore sam.
Ammaa anndite Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama o ceniiɗo, kaŋko korminton, kaŋko kuloton
O laatanto laamuuji Isra'iila ɗiɗi nokkuure seniinde, hayre nde fergata ɗi, tapaare nde do'ata ɗi, o laatanto boo jooɗiiɓe Urusaliima tuuforgol.
Ɗuuɗɓe caka maɓɓe pergoto, ɓe ndo'oto, ɓe ngewan, ɓe nastan tuuforgol e ngol naŋngan ɓe
Sey mi maɓɓa wahayuuji ɗi'i, mi maɓɓa ekkitinol ngo'ol boo, ngam haa pukara'en am ayna ngol.
Mi ɗon heɗito Jawmiraawo mo wiirnani danygol Yaakubu yeeso muuɗum. Kaŋko mi tammori
Ndaa, min e ɓikkoy koy Jawmiraawo hokkimmi, min laatani Isra'iila alaama e kaayeefi ko iwi haa Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama, jooɗiiɗo dow hooseere Siyona.

To yimɓe mbi'i on: “Sey on ƴama sarwotooɓe maayɓe e waɗooɓe hatti, sofndooɓe e lorlortirooɓe bolle. Naa yimɓe ummaatoore koo ndeye ɗon ƴama ɗowanteeɓe muuɗum'en e ɓe ɗon ƴama maayɓe ngam haala yeeɗɓe na?”
Njaabe ɓe: “Aa'a! Sey goɗɗo nana seedamku e ekkitinol Allah!” To on mbi'ataa non, ɓe ngi'ataa baɓɓol.
Ɓe ngiiloto nder lesdi, ɓe ɓilliiɓe e dolɓe. To dolo naawi ɓe, ɓe tikkan, ɓe naalan laamiiɗo maɓɓe e Allah maɓɓe. Ɓe tijjoto dow,
ɓe ndaaran haa les, ammaa ɓe ngi'an sey ɓillaare e nyiɓre e mettamɓeram, ɓe wudinaaɓe nder nyiɓre nyiɓɓunde.

Fakat, nyiɓre suddataa lesdi ɓilliindi haa foroy. Naane Jawmiraawo yawi lesdi Zabulon e Neftali, ammaa yeeso ɗo o teddinan laawol kommbi mbeela, lesdi gaɗa Urdun, waato Galiili haa ummaatooje goɗɗe njooɗi
Ummaatoore wonnde nder nyiɓre yi'i annoora makka. Annoora yaynani jooɗiiɓe nder lesdi ndi nyiɓre maayde
An yaa Jawmiraawo, a mawnini nde, a ɗuɗɗini seyo maare. Yimɓe maare ɗon ceyo yeeso maaɗa bana ɓe ceyorto wakkati codol, bana ɓe mbelmbeltata haa cennduki keɓal konu.
Ngam a yewi kaɓɓirgal doŋngal maɓɓe e leggal dow balbe maɓɓe e sawru toonyooɓe ɓe, bana ɓooyma nder nyalaade Mediyan.
Paɗe caatuɗe ɗe honooɓe e limce tallaaɗe nder ƴiiƴam fuu, ɗe nguleteeɗe, ɗe laatoto nyaamdu yiite.
En ndanyanaama ɓiŋngel, en ndokkaama ɓiɗɗo gorko! Laamu wallinaama dow balawal maako, ɓe inndan mo: Carwoowo kaayeefiijo, Allah cemmbiɗɗo, Baaba duumiiɗo, laamiiɗo salaaman.

O mawninan baawɗe laamu maako, o hokkan leeso laamu Daawuda e maral mum fuu salaaman ka timmataa sam, o semmbiɗinan laamu maako, o tabitinan ngu bee kiita ndarnuka e adilaaku, diga jonta haa foroy. Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama waɗan ɗum nder tiinaare mum
Jawmiraawo neli koŋngol dow danygol Yaakubu, ngol laarani Isra'iila.
Ummaatoore fuu anndan ngol, waato Efrayim e jooɗiiɓe haa Samariya, wolwanɓe bee mawnitaare e elewre:
“Birikje ngibbi, ammaa min nyiɓtoto bee kaa'e cehaaɗe. Dundeeje pe'aama, ammaa min ɗisan leɗɗe cemmbiɗɗe haa nokkuuje maaje.”
Ammaa Jawmiraawo jaalini konne'en Recin dow maɓɓe, o ummini konne'en maɓɓe,
Siriya'en diga fuunaaŋge e Filisti'en diga hiirnaaŋge. Ɓe moɗan Isra'iila bee hunnduko makko. Bee non fuu, tikkere Jawmiraawo feewtaay, juŋngo maako ɗon forti tawon.
Ammaa yimɓe ummaatoore lortaaki haa piyɗo ɓe, ɓe ngartanaay Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama.
Ngam man nder nyalaade woore, Jawmiraawo ta'an nder Isra'iila hoore e wicco, lisal dibinoohi e kewal
Ndottiijo e tedduɗo, kamɓe ngoni hoore. Annabiijo ekkitinanɗo fewre, kaŋko woni wicco.
Ɗowooɓe ummaatoore nde'e ɗon majjina nde, ɗowaaɓe maare boo ɗon cakli.

Ngam man Jawmiraawo seyortaako derke'en maɓɓe, o yurmintaa atiime'en maɓɓe e rewɓe maɓɓe yurumɓe. Ngam ɓe fuu ɓe halluɓe, naafiki'en. Kunnduɗe fuu ɗon mbolwa faataare. Bee non fuu, tikkere Jawmiraawo feewtaay, juŋngo maako ɗon forti tawon.
Halleende wulan bana yiite wulanŋge gi'e e giŋngille, nge jamnan laynde sukkunde, haa nge ummina cuurɗe bana daŋraŋgal.
Tikkere Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wuli lesdi, ummaatoore laati bana nyaamdu yiite, walaa enɗuɗo deerɗum.
Ɓe ɗon ceela kusel haa nyaamo, ammaa dolo ɗon. Ɓe ɗon nyaama ngel haa nano, ammaa ɓe kaarataa. Koo moy ɗon nyaama kusel keeddiɗɗum:
Manassa ɗon nyaama Efrayim, Efrayim boo ɗon nyaama Manassa, ɓe ɗiɗo fuu ɓe kawti dow Yahuuda. Bee non fuu, tikkere Jawmiraawo feewtaay, juŋngo maako ɗon forti tawon.
Bone laatanto umrooɓe umrooje kalluɗe e tiiɗanɓe winndugo sarɗiiji gaddanɗi sarru,
ngam ɓe calano talaka'en gooŋga nder kiita, ɓe njaɓta ko haandani laafuɓe nder ummaatoore am, rewɓe yurumɓe laato keɓal maɓɓe, ɓe ɗon njaɓta ko atiime'en mari.
Ko mbaɗoton nyalaade kiita, to halkere wari diga daayiiɗum? Haa moy ndoggoton ngam ballal? Toy accoton jawdi mon?
Walaa ko lutti, sey turodaago bee haɓɓaaɓe malla do'odaago bee mbaraaɓe. Bee non fuu, tikkere Jawmiraawo feewtaay, juŋngo maako ɗon forti tawon.
Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Bone laatanto Assuura! Mi ɗon huuwtinira ɓe bana sawru e ɓoccol ngam fiyugo yimɓe ɓe tikkanmi.
Mi nelan ɓe dow ummaatoore hallunde, dow tikkinɓe yam, ngam ɓe njaɓta e ɓe mbaagina keɓal, ɓe njaaɓa nde bana loope dow laawol.”
Ammaa laamiiɗo Assuura hiitaaki bana non, ɓernde maako nufataako non ngam o yeli wilugo e nattingo ummaatooje ɗuuɗɗe.
O ɗon manto, o ɗon wi'a: “Ardiiɓe honooɓe am, naa ɓe fuu ɓe laamiiɓe na?
Mi nyaami Kalno e Karkemis. Mi nyaami Hamat e Arpad. Mi nyaami Samariya e Damas.
Juŋngo am yottake laamuuji labbi, labbi maaji ɓuri ɗi Urusaliima e Samariya ɗuuɗugo.
Mi halki Samariya e labbi maagol fuu. Bana non kuuwanmi Urusaliima e labbi maagol.”
Ammaa Jawmiraawo wi'i: “To mi timmini kuugal am fuu haa hooseere Siyona e Urusaliima, mi hiitoto laamiiɗo Assuura ngam mawnitaare maako e elewre maako fuu.”
Laamiiɗo Assuura ɗon manto, ɗon wi'a: “Bee semmbe juŋngo am e hikma am mbaɗmi ɗum fuu, ngam mi kakkilɗo. Mi wayli keeri ummaatooje, mi jaɓti ndesaaje maaje. Bana jaaliiɗo mawɗo, ɓortumi laamiiɓe.
Juŋngo am ɓofti jawdi ummaatooje bana geeraaɗe nder saɓɓo. Bana goɗɗo ɓoftirta geeraaɗe accaaɗe, non ɓoftumi jawdi duniyaaru fuu, walaa mo dimmbini wileewo malla mo maɓɓiti hunnduko ngam o siika.”
Ammaa Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Fe'irde juroto dow pe'anɗo bee maare na? Ceekruga mawnititto dow ceekanɗo bee maaga na? Ɓoccol dimmbintaa ɓaŋgtuɗo ɗum, sawru boo ɓaŋgtataa mo laataaki leggal.”
Ngam man Allah, Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama nelan fooyre caka fayɓe laamiiɗo Assuura. Yiite bana jamnere huɓɓete, nyaaman tedduŋgal maako.
Annoora Isra'iila laatoto yiite, Ceniiɗo maako boo laatoto ɗemŋgal yiite. Ka wulan e ka nyaaman gi'e e giŋngille Assuura nder nyalaade woore.
Ka halkan laynde maako woonde e leɗɗe ciraka maako booɗɗe fuu. Ɗum laatoto bana nyawɗo jinnirta.
Limgal luttuɗum haa leɗɗe laynde maako famɗitan masin, koo ɓiŋngel boo waawan winndugo ɗum.
Nyalaade man yimɓe Isra'iila luttuɓe, yimɓe danygol Yaakubu hisɓe accan ɓaaroraago ummaatoore nde ɓocci ɓe, ammaa ɓe kooloto Jawmiraawo Ceniiɗo Isra'iila fakat.
Luttuɓe lortoto, luttuɓe danygol Yaakubu lortoto haa Allah cemmbiɗɗo.
Koo to yimɓe Isra'iila ɗuuɗi bana njaareendi maayo, luttuɓe maɓɓe tan lortoto. Halkere tabiti, kiita Allah ngooŋɗuka ilnan nde bana maayo.
Ngam Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama timminan nattere nder duniyaaru fuu, ngam o muuyi ɗum

Ngam man, ndaa nii Allah, Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wi'i: “Yimɓe ummaatoore am, jooɗiiɓe haa Siyona, taa kule Assuura'en, to ɓe piyi on bee sawru, to ɓe ɓaŋgti ndu dow mooɗon bana Misra'en mbaɗno ɓooyma.
Ngam lutti seɗɗa, ɓernuki am dow mooɗon timman, tikkere am wayloto ngam mi halka ɓe.
Min Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama mi ɓaŋgtan ɓoccol dow Assuura'en, bana no njaaloriimi yimɓe Mediyan ɓooyma haa hooseere Oreb. Mi ɓaŋgtan sawru am dow maayo ngo'o bana mi ɓaŋgtiri ndu haa Misra.
Nyalaade man, doŋngal Assuura sottan e balbe mooɗon, kaɓɓirgal maɓɓe boo e daaɗe mooɗon, daliila fayfayru, kaɓɓirgal man yewan.”
Konne'en ɗon haa Ayyat, ɓe ta'i caka Migiron. Haa Mikmas ɓe cigi doŋgle maɓɓe.
Ɓe caali diirtorde, ɓe ɗon mbaala haa Geba. Yimɓe Rama ɗon ndiwna, yimɓe Gibiya, wuro Sawulu ɗon ndogga.
Ngooke, onon yimɓe Gallima! Nane, onon yimɓe Layisa! Anatot wuro tampuŋgo!
Yimɓe Madameena ɗon ndaɗa, jooɗiiɓe nder Gebiima ɗon tefa hisrude.
Hannde konne'en ɗon ndaro haa Noba. Ɓe ɗon purkito Siyona, berniwol Urusaliima.
Ndaa, Allah, Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama ɗon fe'a lice bee caatal, ɗon soppa juutɗe, ɗon leestina ɓaŋgiiɗe.
Laynde sukkunde do'oto bee fe'irde, Libanon do'oto yeeso Cemmbiɗɗo
Laamu laamiiɓe ɓe asŋgol Daawuda ɓii Yessa ittaama. Ammaa bana lisal keccal fuɗirta diga tuggere lekki, bana non laamiiɗo keso mo asŋgol Yessa waŋgirta
Ruuhu Jawmiraawo ɗon dow maako, ruuhu hikma e hakkiilo, ruuhu sawari e cuusal, ruuhu anndal e kulol Jawmiraawo.
O seyorto kulol Jawmiraawo. O hiitataako fodde giiɗe gite maako, o ta'ataa kiita fodde nanɗe noppi maako.
Ammaa o hiitanto laafuɓe fodde adilaaku, o hiitoto leesɓe lesdi kiita ngooŋɗuka. O halkan duniyaaru bee wolde wurtiinde diga hunnduko maako, bee poofɗe hunnduko maako o mbaran kalluɗo
Adilaaku e gooŋgaaku laatoto taadorgol maako
Nden saafaandu wondan bee bortel, paaɗaawu waaloto kommbi jawgel, nyalahe e baroogel ngondan, ɓiŋngel duran ɗum.
Nagge e ɓoodu
Ɓiŋngel musinanŋgel fijan haa ngaska culanndi, entaaŋgel fortan juŋngo mum haa ngaska foosokre.
Walaa kalluɗum, walaa bonnuki dow hooseere Allah seniinde fuu, ngam duniyaaru heewan anndal Jawmiraawo bana mbeela heewirta ndiyamji
Nyalaade man laamiiɗo keso mo asŋgol Yessa go daroto bana tuutawal ngam jama'aaje. Ummaatooje ɗaɓɓitan mo, nokkuure siwtaago maako laatoto teddunde
Nyalaade man Jawmiraawo fortan juŋngo muuɗum ɗiɗaɓre fahin, haa o rimɗina luttuɓe yimɓe maako, luttanɓe haa Assuura e Misra e Paturus e Etiyopiya e Elam e Sine'ar e Hamat e duuɗe mbeela.
O ɓaŋgtan tuutawal ngam ummaatooje, o hawtan riiwaaɓe Isra'iila, o mooɓtan saŋkitiiɓe Yahuuda diga alkibilaaji nayi fuu.
Kaajal Efrayim sottan, konne'en Yahuuda nattinteeɓe. Efrayim meetataa haajugo Yahuuda, Yahuuda boo meetataa ɓillugo Efrayim.
Ummaatooje ɗiɗi ɗe'e ukkanto Filisti'en haa hiirnaaŋge, ɓe njaɓtan mardi yimɓe fuunaaŋge. Juuɗe maɓɓe ngaran dow Edoom e Mo'ab, yimɓe Ammoon leesanan ɓe.
Jawmiraawo ɓeeɓnan lonyoodu mbeela Misra, ruggoto maayo Efratis. Bee nguleeŋga poofɗe maako o seekan ngo, ngo senndititto maahoy njoweeɗiɗoy, haa goɗɗo eero koy bee paɗe
Bana non laawol jaasŋgol ɗon ngam luttuɓe yimɓe maako, luttanɓe haa Assuura, bana ngol laatorani Isra'iila'en ɓooyma, saa'i gurtaaki maɓɓe e Misra.
Nyalaade man ummaatoore rimɗinaande wi'an: “Mi maŋgtete, yaa Jawmiraawo! A tikkani yam, ammaa tikkere ma feewti, a de'itini yam.
Allah woni kisndam am, mi ɗon hoolo mo, mi diwnataa. Jawmiraawo woni semmbe am e yimre am, kaŋko laati kisndam am
Bee seyo nyeɗoton ndiyam haa ceeɓooje kisndam.
On mbi'an nyalaade man: “Ngette Jawmiraawo, ewne innde maako, ngecce kuuɗe maako caka ummaatooje! Ciftinore no innde maako ɓaŋgori!
Ngimane Jawmiraawo! Ngam o huuwi kuuɗe mawɗe, anndine duniyaaru fuu habaru maajum!
Ceye! Mbaɗe gookaali seyo, onon jooɗiiɓe haa Siyona! Ngam Ceniiɗo Isra'iila o mawɗo caka mooɗon.”
Ndaa wahayu dow Baabila mo Esaaya ɓii Amoosa heɓi:
Ndarne tuutawal dow hooseere sookre. Ngookane honooɓe. Ɓaase ɓe ɓe nastira dammuɗe tedda-asli'en.
Mi umri senaaɓe am, honooɓe semmbiɗɓe, jurotooɓe bee seyo, ngam ɓe mbaŋgina tikkere am.
Nane hoolo dow kooseeje bana ngo yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe! Nane hoolo laamuuji e ummaatooje mooɓtiiɗe, Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama ɗon taaskitina jama'aare konu muuɗum.
Honooɓe ɓe'e ɗon ngara diga lesdi daayiindi, diga keeri duniyaaru. Jawmiraawo e waŋginanɓe tikkere mum nattinan duniyaaru fuu.
Mboye! Ngam nyalaade Jawmiraawo ɓaditake, nde ɗon wara bee nattinki diga Allah Baawɗo
Ngam man juuɗe fuu tampan, ɓerɗe yimɓe fuu ɓolwan.
Ɓe caklake, naawɗum ukkani ɓe, ɓe ɗon njaŋngito bana ɓesnanɗo, ɓe ɗon cutindira, ɓe kayɗini, geese maɓɓe ɗon nguli jaw.
Ndaa, nyalaade Jawmiraawo hulniinde ɗon wara, ɗum nyalaade ɓernuki e tikkere saatunde, nde walaa enɗam. Duniyaaru laatoto bille, hakke'en fuu nattan.
Koode asama e dulooje muuɗum'en accan yaynugo. Naaŋge nyiɓɓan saa'i nge fuɗata, lewru boo accan yaynugo
Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Mi hiitoto halleende duniyaaru e zunuuba halluɓe. Mi ittan daliila mawnitaare mawnitiiɓe, mi sottinan elewre toonyooɓe.
Yimɓe ɗuuɗataa, kaŋŋeeri laaɓndi, iwndi lesdi Ofir ɓuran ɓe ɗuuɗugo.
Ngam man ndimmbanmi asama, lesdi dimmboto dow caɓɓaaje maari daliila tikkere Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama, daliila nyalaade nde tikkere maako saatata.
Bana lelwa ndiiwaaŋga, bana tokkere dammooji nde walaa gaynaako, koo moy lortoto haa ummaatoore mum, koo moy doggan haa lesdi muuɗum.
To konne'en tawi goɗɗo, ɓe njuwan mo. To ɓe naŋngi goɗɗo, ɓe mbaran mo bee kaafahi.
Ɓikkoy maɓɓe, konne'en ndirɓan koy yeeso maɓɓe, ɓe ɓoftan ko woni nder cuuɗi maɓɓe, ɓe toskinan rewɓe maɓɓe boo.”
Allah wi'i: “Mi umminan Medi'en dow maɓɓe. Kamɓe ɓe kakkilantaa cardi, ɓe ceyortaako kaŋŋeeri.
Lagaaje e kuri maɓɓe ndo'an suka'en, ɓe njurmintaa ɓikkoy keccoy, gite maɓɓe enɗataa koy.
Baabila, laamu ɓurŋgu laamuuji fuu wooɗugo, daliila juro e mawnitaare Kaldiya'en, laatoto bana Sodoma e Gomorra, saa'i Allah wayliti ɗi
Walaa mo jooɗoto ton, haa foroy, diga yidere haa yidere. Walaa Arabjo darnanɗo laymaaru muuɗum ton, waynaaɓe boo mballintaa dabbaaji ton.
Ammaa dabbaaji ladde mbaalan ton, duujiije kebbinan cuuɗi Baabila, dabbi njooɗoto ton, jawɗi piccan ton
Pobbi mboyan nder cuuɗi maagol cemmbiɗɗi, cuuli boo nder cuuɗi maagol neeminiiɗi. Wakkati maagol ɓadake wargo, balɗe maagol njuutintaake.”
Fakat, Jawmiraawo hinnoto danygol Yaakubu, o suɓan Isra'iila fahin. O jo'itinan ɓe nder lesdi maɓɓe fahin. Jananɓe ɗakkotiran bee maɓɓe, kawtanan danygol Yaakubu.
Ummaatooje goɗɗe koocan e njahran ɓe haa lesdi maɓɓe, Jawmiraawo marnan ɓe ndi. Ton yimɓe ummaatooje ɗe'e laatoto maccuɓe e horɓe maɓɓe. Ɓe kaɓɓan haɓɓooɓe ɓe, ɓe laamoto dow ɓillooɓe ɓe.
Isra'iila, nyannde nde Jawmiraawo siwtinte e laruura e torra e maccuŋgaaku naawŋgu ngu torriiɗa,
a yimanan laamiiɗo Baabila gimol jancowol ngo'ol: “Yowwa, toonyoowo do'ake, toonyaare timmi!
Jawmiraawo yewi ɓoccol halluɓe e sawru toonyooɓe.
O fiyi ummaatooje bee tikkere, bee piyɗe ɗuuɗɗe. O dooli ummaatooje bee ɓernuki e toonyaare, bilaa naŋgtaare.
Lesdi fuu foofti, ɗon siwto, yimɓe ɗon mbaɗa gookaali seyo.
Koo leɗɗe booɗɗe boo ɗon ceyoro do'ere ma. Leɗɗe cemmbiɗɗe haa Libanon fuu ɗon mbi'a: Diga a ɗon waali, walaa garɗo hippaago min.
Joonde maayɓe haa les ɗon dimmbo ngam jaɓɓaago ma. Nde ummini mbeeluuji waato mawɓe lesdi fuu ngam maaɗa, nde ummini laamiiɓe ummaatooje fuu e leese laamu muuɗum'en.
Ɓe fuu ɓe mbi'ete: Jonta an boo a tampuɗo, a nannduɗo bee amin.
Daraja ma do'ake nder joonde maayɓe bee hoolo moolooji ma fuu. Gilɗi laati be'itte ma, ɗi laati boo suddaare ma.”
Noy ndo'oriiɗa diga asama, an horre ɗelkoore, ɓii-beɗgol! Noy njanirɗa haa lesdi, an jaaliiɗo ummaatooje
A numi nder ɓernde ma: Mi eeŋgan haa asama, mi ɓaŋgtan leeso laamu am towɗum haa dow koode Allah, mi jooɗoto dow hooseere mooɓorde ɗowanteeɓe daayiiɗum haa woyla.
Mi eeŋgan dow duule ɓaŋgiiɗe, mi nanndinan hoore am bee Allah Ɓaŋiiɗo.
Ammaa a do'aama nder joonde maayɓe, nder ngaska ɓurka luggugo
Yi'anɓe ma fuu cutete, tiimete. Ɓe ƴaman: “Ɗum gorko dimmbuɗo lesdi e laamuuji go na?
O wartiri duniyaaru ladde meere, o yibbini berniiji, o yoofaay haɓɓaaɓe maako ɓe koota lesdi maɓɓe.”
Laamiiɓe ummaatooje fuu ɗon mbaali nder tedduŋgal, koo moy nder yenaande mum.
Ammaa an, a wudinaama bana lisal nyidduŋgal, daayiiɗum bee yenaande. A cuddaaɗo bee mbaraaɓe, bee yuwaaɓe kaafahi, wudinaaɓe dow kaa'e nder ngaska, bana caaɗŋgu ngu yimɓe njaaɓi.
A hawtataa bee laamiiɓe woɗɓe nder yenaande, ngam a wonni lesdi ma, a mbari yimɓe ma. Danygol halluɓe ewnataake haa abada.
Taaskitine mbareeki ɓiɓɓe maako daliila zunuuba kaakiraaɓe muuɗum'en. Taa ɓe ummito, ɓe mara lesdi, ɓe kebbina duniyaaru bee berniiji
Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wi'i: “Mi ummanto Baabila. Mi nattinan daraja ma e luttuɓe ton e danygol maɓɓe fuu. Min Jawmiraawo wi'i ɗum.
Mi wartiran ngol maral camnale e waalowol. Mi wuuwan ngol bee buurɗi ɗi halkere. Min Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wi'i ɗum.”
Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama huni, wi'i: “Fakat, bana numrumi, non ɗum laatorto, bana nuforiimi, non ɗum timmirta:
Mi fusan Assuura'en nder lesdi am, mi yaaɓan ɓe dow kooseeje am. Kaɓɓirgal maɓɓe sottan e yimɓe am, doŋngal maɓɓe boo e balbe maɓɓe.
Kanjum mi nufi ngam duniyaaru fuu. Kanjum woni juŋngo am fortaaŋgo dow ummaatooje fuu.”
Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama waɗi anniya, moy waawata haɗugo ka? O forti juŋngo maako, moy haɗata ngo
Hitaande nde laamiiɗo Akas maayi, koŋngol ngo'ol wari
Onon yimɓe Filistiya fuu, sawru fiyndu on yewi. Ammaa taa ceye! To mboodi waati, foosokre waran haa pellel maari. Haa yeeraande foosokre, mboodi piiroori ngiiteeleeri wurtoto.
Jawmiraawo nyaamnan yimɓe muuɗum miskini'en bana gaynaako,
Ngooke ngam ballal, onon berniiji Filisti'en fuu! Kultore on fuu! Cuurɗe ɗon ngara diga woyla, walaa dimmbotooɗo nder caffuuji maɓɓe
Ɗume en njaaboto nelaaɓe Filisti'en? En mbi'an ɓe: “Jawmiraawo jo'ini Siyona, yimɓe maako laafuɓe tawan hisrude ton.”
Ndaa koŋngol dow Mo'ab. Jemmaare woore ngol natti. Ar-Mo'ab wilaama non boo Kir-Mo'ab.
Jooɗiiɓe haa Bayit e haa Dibon ɗon mba'o haa nokkuuje towɗe ngam woyugo ton. Yimɓe Mo'ab ɗon mboya berniiji Nebo e Medeba. Ko'e maɓɓe fuu pemmbaama, bakkuɗe fuu laɓaama.
Dow laabi Mo'ab ɓe ɗon ɓorno limce buhuuje. Dow soorooji e haa babe fuu, ɓe ɗon mboya, ɓe ɗon ilna gonɗi.
Jooɗiiɓe haa Hesbon e El'ale ɗon ngooka, hoolo maɓɓe ɗon yotto Yahas. Ngam maajum jogiiɓe balmi nder Mo'ab ɗon koola, ɓerɗe maɓɓe ɗon ndiwna nder maɓɓe.
Ɓernde am ɗon woya dow lesdi Mo'ab. Ngam dogguɓe maari ɗon ndogga haa yotti Co'ar e Egilat-Silisiya. Ɓe ɗon mba'o wa'orde Luhit bee bojji. Dow laawol Horonayim ɓe ɗon mbaɗa gookaali daliila halkere.
Ndiyamji Nimrim ɓeeɓi. Huɗo ɗayli, haako jinni, walaa keccum sam.
Ngam maajum ɓe njahran jawdi maɓɓe e ndesaaje maɓɓe haa lekki kommbi maayo.
Gookaali ɗon nane haa keeri Mo'ab fuu. Bojji maɓɓe ɗon njotto Egilayim e Biir-Elim.
Ndiyamji Dimoon keewi ƴiiƴam, ngam Allah ukkanan Dimoon sarru ngoɗŋgu: Mbarooga hippoto daɗɓe Mo'ab e luttuɓe nder lesdi.
Diga berniwol Sela nder ladde, neldane ardiiɗo lesdi jawgel haa hooseere Siyona.
Bana colli giilotooɗi, bana collon ndiiwaakon e saɓɓo, non rewɓe Mo'ab tawrete haa eerorɗe Arnon.
Ɓe mbi'an yimɓe Yahuuda: “Ndokke min sawari, ta'e haala! Caka nyalawma non, ɗowdi nyiɓɓa bana jemma! Cuuɗe riiwaaɓe, taa pefte dogganɓe!
Acce riiwaaɓe Mo'ab koɗa haa mooɗon, laatane ɓe hisrude yeeso nattinoowo!” To toonyoowo halki, bonnuki jinni, ɓillooɓe majji e lesdi,
leeso laamu tabitan dow mbooɗeeŋga, goɗɗo danygol Daawuda jooɗoto dow maago bee gooŋgaaku. O laatoto giɗɗo waɗugo ko fotti, taaskiiɗo waɗugo adilaaku.
Yimɓe Yahuuda mbi'an: “Min nani habaru mawnitaare Mo'ab, ɓe mawnitiiɓe masin. Min nani haala elewre maɓɓe e mawnitaare maɓɓe e ƴaggaare maɓɓe e kappe maɓɓe meereeje.”
Ngam maajum, sey yimɓe Mo'ab mboya dow Mo'ab. Ɓe fuu ɓe ɗon mboya, ɓe ɗon uuma masin to ɓe ciftori tame inabooje joorɗe iwɗe Kir-Hareseet.

Ngam gese Hesbon njoori, non boo gese inabooje haa Sibama fuu. Ɓiɓɓe maaje booɗɗe nguykini jawmiraaɓe ummaatooje. Lice maaje njotti Ya'ajer, ɗe ngiili nder ladde. Ɗe ɗuuɗi e ɗe njaaji haa yotti Weendu Mannda.
Ngam maajum mboyanmi dow inabooje Sibama bana yimɓe Ya'ajer mboyirta. Onon Hesbon e El'ale, mi soofnan on bee gonɗi am. Ngam wookaandu konu ukki dow ittuki ɓiɓɓe leɗɗe mon e inabooje mon.
Seyo e welwelo njinni haa gese mon, woodaa gimol koo ilinaali haa gese inabooje. Walaa ɓiɗɗoowo inaboojam nder ɓiɗɗirde, hoolo seyo ɓiɗɗooɓe woodaa.
Mi ɗon uuma ngam Mo'ab, ɓernde am ɗon woya ngam Kir-Heeres.
Yimɓe Mo'ab ɗon tiino yahugo haa nokkuuje towɗe, ɓe ɗon nasta nokkuure maɓɓe seniinde ngam do'aago, ammaa ɓe kumtataa sam.
Kanjum woni koŋngol ngol Jawmiraawo wolwino dow Mo'ab.
Jonta kam ndaa ko Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Lutti duuɓi tati kal-kal, nden daraja Mo'ab majjan, non boo mooɓre maɓɓe mawnde fuu. Bee ɗuuɗeeŋga maɓɓe fuu, ko tammi luttugo marataa saman
Ndaa koŋngol dow Damas. Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Yeeso ɗo, Damas laatataako berniwol, ngol laatoto waagaare bille.
Berniiji Aro'er perwan haa foroy, ɗi laatoto durduɗe dabbaaji. Tokke mbaaloto ton, walaa kulnanɗo ɗe.
Hisrude semmbiɗnde woodaa nder lesdi Efrayim, laamu Damas majjan. Luttuɓe Siriya toskoto bana yimɓe Isra'iila.” Non Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wi'i
“Nyalaade man tedduŋgal ummaatoore Yaakubu ustoto bana fayfayru goɗɗo timmirta.
Isra'iila nanndan bee ngesa, ɓaawo codoowo naŋngi geene alkamaari, juŋngo maako ta'i cammeeje. Ɗum laatoto bana nder waadiwol Refayim ɓaawo ɓoftuki caamndi.
Woɗɓe maɓɓe luttan, bana ɓaawo caamki jaytunje: Ɓiɓɓe ɗiɗi koo tati haa hoore jaytunhi, nayi koo jowi haa lice maaki. Min Jawmiraawo, Allah Isra'iila wi'i ɗum.”
Nyalaade man yimɓe tijjoto heedi tagɗo ɓe, kuucitinan gite muuɗum'en dow Ceniiɗo Isra'iila.
Ɓe ndaarataa kirsirɗe ɗe juuɗe maɓɓe mbaɗi. Ɓe kakkilantaa ko kooli maɓɓe mbaɗi, koo labbi Asera koo gulduɗe uurle.
Nyalaade man, berniiji maɓɓe cemmbiɗɗi perwan bana leɗɗe e geereeje kooseeje ɗe ɓe ngudini yeeso Isra'iila'en, ɗum laatoto ladde meere.
Onon Isra'iila'en, on ngejjiti Allah, kisnoowo on, tapaare hisnoore on. On ɗon njubo jarne booɗɗe, on aawi aawdi njananndi ton.
Ammaa koo to ndi fuɗi nyannde on njubi ndi, koo to aawdi finni fajiri nde on aawi ndi, on keɓataa ƴaamnde, sey nyawu kalluŋgu e torra ka walaa daama.
Kayto! Hoolo jama'aaje ɗuuɗɗe! Ɗe ɗon koola bana hoolo mbeela. Dukoore ummaatooje! Ɗe ɗon nduka bana dukoore ndiyamji mawɗi.
Ummaatooje ɗon nduka bana dukoore ndiyamji mawɗi. Ammaa Jawmiraawo ɗon telɓana ɓe, ɓe ɗon ndogga daayiiɗum, ɓe riiwaaɓe bana nyaande yeeso henndu kooseeje, bana collawal yeeso duluuru.
Saa'i kiikiiɗe, ɗum kulol. Hiddeko weeta, walaa koo ɗume. Kanjum woni geɗal jaɓtooɓe en e ɓoftooɓe maral men.
Kayto! Lesdi hoolo bileeji

nelanndi nelaaɓe dow mbeela nder koommbooje kuuwraaɗe kewe. Onon nelaaɓe yaawɗotooɓe, koote haa ummaatoore yimɓe juutɓe, ɓorowɓe, yimɓe huleteeɓe koo toy, marɓe semmbe, jaalotooɓe woɗɓe, ɓe maaje ceeki lesdi muuɗum'en.
Onon yimɓe duniyaaru fuu, onon wonɓe dow lesdi, to ɓe ndarni tuutawal dow kooseeje, on ndaaran. To ɓe puufi luwal konu, on nanan.
Ngam ndaa nii Jawmiraawo wi'i yam: “Mi ɗon jooɗi haa nokkuure am, mi ɗon laara mi de'itɗo bana nguli mbelndi haa jayŋgol naaŋge, bana saawawre nder nguleeŋga ƴaamnde.”
Ngam hiddeko ɓe itta inabooje, to pinndi saami, rimi ɓiɓɓe ɓenndanɗe, Jawmiraawo halkan ɓe bana goɗɗo ta'irta lice kese e lice bilitanɗe.
O accan ɓalli maɓɓe ngam jigaaje kooseeje e dabbaaji ladde. Ton jigaaje e dabbaaji ladde boo keɓoyta nyaamdu wakkati fuu.

Wakkati man, yimɓe juutɓe ɓorowɓe, huleteeɓe koo toy, marɓe semmbe, jaalotooɓe woɗɓe, jooɗiiɓe lesdi ceekaandi bee maaje, yimɓe ɓe'e ngaddanan Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama dokke haa hooseere Siyona, nokkuure innde maako.
Ndaa koŋngol dow Misra. Jawmiraawo ɗon wara haa Misra bee jaawal, o ba'iiɗo ruuldere. Labbi Misra ɗon ndiwna yeeso maako, ɓerɗe Misra'en ɗon ɓolwa nder muuɗum'en.
“Mi umminan Misra'en dow Misra'en, ɓe kaɓan hakkunde maɓɓe, koo moy bee deerɗum, koo moy bee keeddiɗɗum, berniwol bee berniwol e laamu bee laamu.
Misra'en ellititto, mi wilan nufayeeje maɓɓe. Ɓe ƴaman labbi e sarwotooɓe maayɓe e hiila'en e laarooɓe.
Mi hokkan Misra'en haa juŋngo jaagorɗo caatuɗo, laamiiɗo mo walaa enɗam laamanto ɓe. Min Allah Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wi'i ɗum.”
Ndiyam mbeela leestan, maayo ɓeeɓan, yooran.
Maaje fuu kaccan, ilduɗe Misra ustoto, ɓeeɓan, huɗo e kewe ɗaylan.
Durduɗe maayo Niil gonɗe haa pomoole maago e ko aawa ton njooran, caŋkititto, mbilan.
Waawooɓe liɗɗi uuman, sakkinooɓe biccirgal nder maayo Niil ngonan nder mettamɓeram, wubooɓe zubaaji dow ndiyam cunoto.
Mottooɓe hottollo e leŋ mbemmboto.
Sannyooɓe tampan, ɓerɗe huuwooɓe ngam ngeenaari fuu ta'an.
Ardiiɓe berniwol Co'an, ɓe faataaɓe. Sarwooɓe Firawna ɓurduɓe hakkiilo mbaɗan sawari meere. Noy mbi'roton Firawna: “Mi ɓii hikma'en, mi danygol laamiiɓe ɓooyma”?
An laamiiɗo Misra, toy hikma'en maaɗa? Sey ɓe mbolwa, ɓe anndine ko Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama nufi dow Misra.
Ardiiɓe Co'an laati faataaɓe, ardiiɓe Memfis ɗon nder saklere, ardiiɓe le'i Misra ɗon majjina ummaatoore.
Jawmiraawo loowi ruuhu njiiɓru nder maɓɓe, haa ɓe majjina Misra nder kuuɗe muuɗum fuu, bana guykuɗo tallirta nder tuure mum.
Walaa kuugal booɗŋgal nder Misra ngal hoore malla wicco malla dibinoohi malla kewal
Nyalaade man Misra'en nanndan bee rewɓe, ɓe kulan, ɓe ndiwnan to Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama ɓaŋgti juŋngo mum dow maɓɓe.
Lesdi Yahuuda laatanto Misra daliila kultoreeŋgol. Koo ndeye goɗɗo wolwata haala Yahuuda, ɓe ndiwnan ngam nufo Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama ngo o nufani ɓe.
Nyalaade man, nder berniiji Misra jowi yimɓe mbolwan Ibraniŋkeere, ɓe kunorto bee innde Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama. Innde gootol maaji Ir-Heres
Nyalaade man hirsirde Jawmiraawo wonan haa caka lesdi Misra, hayre siftinorde ngam Jawmiraawo wonan baŋnge keerol maari.
Ɗum alaama e seedamku ngam Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama nder lesdi Misra. To toonyooɓe ɓilli ɓe, ɓe tori Jawmiraawo, kaŋko o nelanan ɓe goɗɗo ngam jiŋngugo ɓe e hisnugo ɓe.
Jawmiraawo anndinan hoore muuɗum haa Misra'en, nyalaade man ɓe anndan mo. Ɓe njagganto mo bee kirseteeɗi e dokke nyaamdu. Ɓe toganto Jawmiraawo togayeeje
Jawmiraawo fiyan Misra'en. O fiyan ɓe, ammaa o hurgan ɓe boo. Ɓe ngaylititto haa Jawmiraawo, kaŋko o jaɓan tornde maɓɓe, o hurgan ɓe.
Nyalaade man buuwol ummoto diga Misra haa Assuura. Assuura'en e Misra'en ngillotiran. Misra'en hawtaade bee Assuura'en njagganto Jawmiraawo.
Nyalaade man Isra'iila laatoto daliila barka ngam duniyaaru fuu, o tataɓo ɓaawo Misra e Assuura.
Jawmiraawo barkiɗinan bee wi'go: “Barka laatanto Misra, ummaatoore am, Assuura, kuugal juuɗe am e Isra'iila, maral am
Sargon, laamiiɗo Assuura neli hooreejo jama'aare konu mum haa Asdod. Kaŋko o haɓi bee Asdod, o nyaami berniwol ngo'ol.
Duuɓi tati hiddeko ɗum laato, Jawmiraawo wi'no Esaaya ɓii Amoosa: “Yah, fiistu leppi buhuure ɗi a haddi, faɗɗita paɗe ma boo.” Esaaya waɗi non, o yehi o temmbo, walaa paɗe boo.
Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Bana Esaaya, suka am yehi o temmbo, walaa paɗe boo— ɗum laatanto Misra e Etiyopiya alaama e kaayeefi duuɓi tati,
bana non laamiiɗo Assuura dahan haɓɓaaɓe Misra e daheteeɓe Etiyopiya, derke'en e ndotti'en fuu ɓe temmbuɓe, ɓe ngalaa paɗe, dubbe meere, ɗum laatoto toskaare dow Misra.
Nden kam ɓe kultoran, ɓe cemtan daliila Etiyopiya, tammunde hayru maɓɓe e Misra, juro maɓɓe.
Nyalaade man, jooɗiiɓe haa fomoonde mbeela nde'e mbi'an: Ndaa, bana nii tammunde men, hisrude walloore en wa'i ngam haa kisen juŋngo laamiiɗo Assuura. Noy ndaɗirten kadi?”
Ndaa koŋngol dow ladde hamaadaare wonnde kommbi mbeela. Bana duluuji bifanɗi haa Lesdi Fombina, non ɗum wardata diga ladde, diga lesdi kulniindi.
Allah yi'ni yam kuuje kulniiɗe: Zammboowo ɗon zammbo, biloowo ɗon wila. “Jama'aare Elam, wa'a! Jama'aare Mediya, hippa! Mi timminan uumaali yimɓe Baabila.”
Ngam man keeci am tampi, naawreeŋga naŋngi yam bana luuwe ɓesnanɗo. Mi sakli, mi huli haa mi waawaay nanugo e yi'ugo.
Hoore am ɗon yiilo, kultoreeŋgol ɗon hulnammi. Maŋngariba ka keppantoomi ɗum, laatani yam daliila diwnol.
Mi yi'i ɓe ɗon ngurtina nyaamdu, ɓe ɗon mbe'ita daago, ɓe ɗon nyaama, ɓe ɗon njara. Nden umroore waɗaama: “Onon hoore'en umme, nguje bawarɗe
Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo wi'i yam: “Darnu aynoowo! Ko o yi'ata fuu, o wi'a.
To o yi'i mootaaji ɗi pucci ɗiɗi ɗiɗi ɗon ndasa, to o yi'i boo wa'iiɓe bamɗe e wa'iiɓe geelooɗi, nden kam sey o hakkila masin!”
Ndaa, aynoowo ɗon hoola: “Barkaama, tum mi ɗon dari dow suudu aynirdu, jemma fuu mi ɗon dari haa babal aynol.
Ndaa, mootaaji pucci ɗon ngara, bee wa'iiɓe ɗi! Wa'iiɓe ɗi ɗon ngara ɗiɗo ɗiɗo!” Nden aynoowo ɗon hoola: “Ngol do'ake, Baabila do'ake! Suuraaji labbi maagol cehaaɗi fuu pusi, ɗon mbaali haa lesdi
Kayto! Ummaatoore am fiyaama bana ɓe piyrata alkamaari dow laarre! Ko nanmi haa Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama, Allah Isra'iila, kanjum mbi'mi on.
Ndaa koŋngol dow Duuma.
Haa kooseeje Se'ir goɗɗo ɗon ewno yam: “Aynoowo, noy jemma jeŋngiri? Aynoowo, noy jemma jeŋngiri?”
Aynoowo jaabi: “Subaha waɗan, non boo jemma. To ƴamtugo, ngare fahin, ƴamte kadi.”
Ndaa koŋngol dow Arabiya.
Nder guuɓe, nder ladde Arabiya mbaaloton, onon Dedani'en, waɗooɓe jahaale.
Ngaddane ɗomɗuɓe ndiyam. Onon jooɗiiɓe nder lesdi Tema
Ngam ɓe ɗon ndogga yeeso kaafahi, yeeso kaafahi losaaki e lagaawal tiraaŋgal, yeeso caatal konu.
Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo wi'i yam: “Lutti nduuɓu ngootu kal-kal, nden tedduŋgal Keedar fuu jinnan.
Limgal waawɓe lagaaje luttanɓe haa yimɓe Keedar famɗan masin. Min Jawmiraawo, Allah Isra'iila wi'i ɗum.”
Ndaa koŋngol dow Waadiwol Wahayuuji. Koni yimɓe ma fuu mba'i dow soorooji,
an berniwol keewŋgol hoolo e laanyotiral, berniwol ceyiiŋgol?
Mbaraaɓe ma, naa ɗum mbaraaɓe kaafahi, naa ɗum do'iiɓe nder haɓre.
Ardiiɓe konu ma fuu ndoggi. Fiɗooɓe lagaaje kaɓɓi ɓe. Yimɓe ma fuu kaɓɓidaama hawtaade yaake ɓe ɗonno ndogga daayiiɗum.
Ngam maajum mbi'mi: Taa ndaareeɗam, haa mi woya bojji naawɗi! Taa tiine de'itingo yam dow halkere ummaatoore am!
Ngam Allah, Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama waddi nyalaade saklere e nattere e njiiɓru nder Waadiwol Wahayuuji: Mahi ngibbinaama e gookaali ɗon ummo heedi kooseeje.
Honooɓe Elam ngardi bee lagaaje e kuri, bee mootaaji pucci e wa'iiɓe pucci. Honooɓe Kir taaskitini bawarɗe muuɗum'en.
Waadiiji Yahuuda ɓurɗi wooɗugo keewi mootaaji pucci, wa'iiɓe pucci ɗon ndari yeeso dammuɗe Urusaliima, ɓe taaskanake kippol.
Jawmiraawo itti aynol Yahuuda.
Saa'i man on kuuciti gal balmi mon haa Suudu Laynde
On ngi'i gibbe ɗuuɗɗe nder mahi berniwol Daawuda. On mooɓti ndiyamji haa weendu lesru.
On limi cuuɗi Urusaliima, on ngibbini cuuɗi ngam semmbiɗingo mahol taariiŋgol berniwol.
On mbaɗi okoloore hakkunde mahi ɗiɗi ngam mooɓtugo ndiyamji ilanɗi diga weendu ɓooymaaru. Ammaa on ngartanaay Allah baɗɗo kuuje ɗe'e, on ndaaraay taaskitinɗo ɗum diga ɓooyma.
Allah Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama ewni on nyalaade man haa on mboya, on cuno, on pemmba ko'e mon, on kadda limce buhuuje.
Ammaa onon on ceyi, on mbelmbelti, on kirsi na'i e baali, on nyaami kusel, on njari inaboojam. On mbi'i: “Nyaamen, njaren, ngam jaŋngo en maayan
Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wolwani yam, wi'i: “On njaafantaake aybewol ngo'ol haa to on maayi. Min Allah Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wi'i ɗum.”
Ndaa nii Allah, Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wi'i yam: “Umma, yah haa saraakiijo oo, haa Sebna, kaliifaajo laamorde, wi' mo:
Ɗume a mari haa ɗo, bannda moy ɗon wondi bee ma, haa ngasana hoore ma yenaande dow towndiire e keɓana hoore ma saare nder tapaare?
Ndaa, Jawmiraawo sakkinte daayiiɗum! O naŋngete bee semmbe,
o taggete bana taggol gaaraaji, o sakkinte bana tamre haa lesdi njaasndi, ton maayata. Ton boo mootaaji pucci ma booɗɗi njahata, an gadduɗo toskaare dow saare jawma.
Jawmiraawo riiwete e joonde ma, jippinte e nokkuure ma townde.”
Jawmiraawo anndini Sebna: “Nyalaade man mi ewnoto suka am Eliyakim ɓii Hilkiyya.
Mi ɓornan mo limce ma, mi taadan mo taadorgol ma. Mi waɗan baawɗe ma haa juŋngo maako. O laatanto jooɗiiɓe nder Urusaliima e yimɓe Yahuuda baaba.
Mi wallinan maɓɓitirɗum saare Daawuda dow balawal maako. To o maɓɓiti, walaa maɓɓoowo. To o maɓɓi boo, walaa maɓɓitoowo
Mi ɗisan mo bana suufuure haa nokkuure saatunde. O laatanto saare baaba maako daliila tedduŋgal.
Ammaa deerɗiiko'en e banndiiko'en fuu laatanto mo doŋngal. Ɓe ɓiloto haa maako bana payanɗe e bulki e taasaaje e pehe ɓilirte haa suufuure ɗisiinde.”
Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wi'i: “Saa'i man suufuure ɗisiinde haa nokkuure saatunde ɗistoto, yanan. Doŋngal ɓilaaŋgal dow maare nattan.” Jawmiraawo wi'i ɗum.
Ndaa koŋngol dow Tirus: “Mboye, koommbooje Tarsis, ngam jipporde mon Tirus wili bee cuuɗi e nastirɗe maare fuu!” Ɓe nani habaru man yaake ɓe ngarti duunde Kitti'en.
Njeeɗe daliila kulol, onon jooɗiiɓe haa fomoonde mbeela, filooɓe Sidon! On neli nelaaɓe, ɓe ta'i mbeela,
ɓe ngaddi ƴaamle gese diga maayo Sihor e maayo Niil, kanjum riskini Sidon!
Semtu, an Sidon! Ngam mbeela wi'i: “Mi luuwaaka, mi ɓesnaay, mi mawninaay koo suka'en malla faanyɓe rewɓe.”
To habaru do'ere Tirus yottake Misra, ɓe ndiwnan.
Njehe haa Tarsis. Mboye, onon jooɗiiɓe haa fomoonde mbeela!
Na ɗum berniwol mon ceyiiŋgol? Ngol fuɗɗi diga zamanuuji ɓooymaaji! Ngol neli yimɓe jooɗoyaago haa lesɗe daayiiɗe!
Moy nufani ɗum Tirus, berniwol cenndanŋgol meetaleeji? Filooɓe maagol ɓe laamiiɓe, soorrooɓe maagol ɓe tedduɓe haa duniyaaru fuu.
Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama nufi ɗum haa o wila ngol daliila mawnitaare marɓe daraja fuu, o yawna tedduɓe duniyaaru fuu.
Ndeme lesdi mon, bana lesdi kommbi maayo Niil, onon yimɓe Tarsis, ngam nokkuure darnugo koommbooje woodaa fahin.
Jawmiraawo forti juŋngo muuɗum dow mbeela. O dimmbini laamuuji. O umri gibbinki berniiji Kanaana cemmbiɗɗi.
O wi'i: “A meetataa welweltugo, an berniwol Sidon toskaaŋgol. Umma, yah haa Kitti'en, ton boo a heɓataa siwtaare!”
Ndaare Kaldiya'en! Lenyol maɓɓe woodaa. Assuura'en acci lesdi man haa dabbaaji ladde. Ɓe ndarni cuuɗi towɗi ngam hippugo, ɓe ngibbini laamorɗe Tirus, ɓe ngartiri ɗe bille.
Mboye, koommbooje Tarsis, ngam jipporde mon semmbiɗnde nattinaama!
Saa'i man yimɓe ngejjitan Tirus duuɓi cappanɗe joweeɗiɗi, bana duuɓi ngeendam laamiiɗo. To duuɓi cappanɗe joweeɗiɗi timmi, ɗum laatanto Tirus bana debbo daakaareejo nder gimol ngo'ol:
“Hoo'u moolooru, waancu nder wuro, an daakaareejo gejjitaaɗo! Fiy ɓoggi booɗɗum, ɗuɗɗin gimi ma, haa ɓe ciftore!”
To duuɓi cappanɗe joweeɗiɗi timmi, Jawmiraawo lortanto Tirus. Ngol heɓtan ngeenaari daakaareeku maagol, ngol waɗan daakaareeku bee laamuuji gonɗi nder duniyaaru fuu.
Ammaa bote e ngeenaari daakaareeku maagol laatanto Jawmiraawo. Ɗum mooɓtataake, ɗum sigataake, ammaa ɗum laatanto jooɗiiɓe yeeso Jawmiraawo, haa ɓe nyaama, ɓe kaara, ɓe ɓorno limce jaage
Ndaa, Jawmiraawo ferwinan lesdi, wonnan ndi. O jiiɓan ndi, o saŋkitan jooɗiiɓe ton.
Kiita ngoota laatanto ummaatoore e limanjo, maccuɗo e jawmum, korɗo e jawmum debbo, coodoowo e coorroowo, dokkuɗo nyamaande e jaɓɗo nyamaande.
Lesdi ferwan, ɓe ɓoftan kuuje maari fuu, ngam Jawmiraawo wolwi koŋngol ngo'ol.
Lesdi ɗon nder suno, ɗon ɗayla. Duniyaaru ɗon jinna, ɗon wonno. Asamanji ɗon njinna hawtaade bee lesdi.
Lesdi soɓi les jooɗiiɓe muuɗum, ngam ɓe ƴaɓɓi umrooje, ɓe luuti farillaaji, ɓe piisti alkawal duumiiŋgal.
Ngam maajum naaloore ɗon nyaama lesdi, jooɗiiɓe maari ɗon njara bone daliila aybe muuɗum'en. Ngam maajum jooɗiiɓe nder lesdi ɗon njinna, luttanɓe ɗuuɗataa sam.
Inaboojam ɗon jinna, inabohi ɗon yoora, wela-ɓerɗe'en fuu ɗon uumo.
Hoolo seyo bawɗi acci naneego, hoolo welweltuɓe timmi, hoolo seyo moolooru nanataake.
Ɓe acci yarugo inaboojam bee gimi, nguykinoojam laatani yarooɓe ɗam kaaɗɗam.
Berniwol perewŋgol yibbi, cuuɗi fuu maɓɓake, taa goɗɗo heɓa nastugo.
Gookaali ɗon nder laabi ngam inaboojam woodaa. Seyo fuu majji, welwelo lesdi eggi.
Walaa ko lutti nder berniwol, sey bille. Dammuɗe maagol ngibbi.
Bana non ɗum laatoto caka duniyaaru, caka ummaatooje, bana caamki jaytunje, bana saa'i ittuki ɗiɗahi, to ittuki inabooje timmi.
Ammaa luttanɓe kooldan, ɓe mbaɗan gookaali seyo. Haa hiirnaaŋge ɓe koolan bee seyo ngam tedduŋgal Jawmiraawo:
“Teddine Jawmiraawo haa fuunaaŋge! Dow duule mbeela teddine innde Jawmiraawo Allah mo Isra'iila!”
Haa keeri duniyaaru en nanan gimi dow Tedduŋgal Adiliijo.
Ammaa min kam mi ɗon wi'a hoore am mi kalkuɗo. Bone laatanake yam! Zammbooɓe ɗon zammbo! Zammba maɓɓe ɗon ɓesdo!
Kultoreeŋgol e tuuforgol e ngaska ɗon ndeena on, onon yimɓe duniyaaru!
Dogguɗo hoolo kultoreeŋgol do'oto nder ngaska, gurtiiɗo ngaska nastan tuuforgol. Ngam burɗe asama maɓɓiti, caɓɓaaje lesdi ndimmbake.
Lesdi ɗon seeka, ɗon yibba, ɗon dimmbidimmbino.
Lesdi ɗon liilta bana guykuɗo, ɗon dimmbo bana laymaaru. Aybeeji maari teddani ndi, ndi ɗon do'o, ndi ummitittaako.
Nyalaade man Jawmiraawo hiitoto mooɓre konu asama haa asama e laamiiɓe duniyaaru boo dow lesdi.
O mooɓtan ɓe fuu, bana haɓɓaaɓe nder ngaska, o maɓɓan ɓe nder suudu fursina. Ɓaawo nyalɗe ɗuuɗɗe o hiitoto ɓe.
Lewru toskan, naaŋge semtan. Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama ɗon laamo, o laamiiɗo dow hooseere Siyona haa Urusaliima. Ndotti'en yimɓe maako ngi'an tedduŋgal maako.
Yaa Jawmiraawo, an woni Allah am. Mi maŋgtete, mi teddinan innde ma. Ngam a waɗi kaayeefiiji. Ko a annini diga ɓooyma, a timmini ɗum bee gooŋga e hoolaare.
A laatini berniwol waagaare kaa'e, berniwol cemmbiɗŋgol boo bille, a halki laamorde jananɓe, taa nde ndaro bana berniwol. Ɓe meetataa nyiɓtaago ɗe haa foroy.
Ngam man ummaatoore semmbiɗnde teddinte. Berniiji ummaatooje toonyooje kulete.
A laati aynirde laafuɓe e talaka'en nder ɓillaare maɓɓe, hisrude to naargewol ummake, ɗowdi to nguleeŋga waɗi. Ngam tikkere toonyooɓe laati bana henndu saatundu dow mahol,
bana nguleeŋga dow lesdi njoorndi. Ammaa an a naŋgti fitina jananɓe, bana ɗowdi ruuldere feewtinirta nguleeŋga, a je'ini gimi toonyooɓe.
Dow hooseere Siyona nde'e Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama taaskanto ummaatooje fuu nyaamduuji belɗi, bee inaboojam ɓennduɗam e kusel ɗigguŋgel e ɓellere e inaboojam mbooɗɗam laaɓɗam.
Dow hooseere nde'e o ittan cuddirɗum ɗum jama'aaje cuddata fuu e wiirndallo wiirnanŋgo ummaatooje.
O nattinan maayde haa abada. Allah Jawmiraawo woostan gonɗi haa geese fuu, o ittanan ummaatoore maako mbustu nder duniyaaru fuu. Jawmiraawo wi'i ɗum
Nyalaade man yimɓe fuu mbi'an: “Kaŋko woni Allah meeɗen! Kaŋko kooliiɗen, o hisna en. Ndaa Jawmiraawo mo kooliiɗen. Mbelmbelten, en ceyoro kisndam maako.”
Juŋngo Jawmiraawo ɗon ayna hooseere nde'e. Ammaa o yaaɓan yimɓe Mo'ab haa nokkuure maɓɓe, bana goɗɗo jiiɓirta loope bee huɗo.
Ɓe mbeeɗan juuɗe maɓɓe nder maajam, bana ginoowo weeɗirta ɗe ngam nginam. Ammaa Jawmiraawo leesnan mawnitiiɓe koo to juuɗe maɓɓe kaɓdi.
Mahi maɓɓe towɗi cemmbiɗɗi, Allah turnan ɗi, yibbinan ɗi, wallinan ɗi nder mbulwuldi
Nyalaade man ɓe ngiman yimre nde'e nder lesdi Yahuuda: En ngoodi berniwol cemmbiɗŋgol. Ngam hisnugo en, Jawmiraawo taarni ngol mahi ɗiɗi.
Maɓɓite dammuɗe haa ummaatoore adili'en e hoolaaɓe nasta.
Mo ɓernde mum tabiti, a ɗon hokka ɗum jam timmuɗam, yaa Jawmiraawo, ngam an o hooli.
Koole Jawmiraawo haa foroy, ngam Allah Jawmiraawo woni tapaare duumiinde.
O leesni jooɗiiɓe dow towndiije, o jippini berniwol towŋgol, o yibbini ngol haa lesdi, o wallini ngol nder mbulwuldi.
Kosɗe talaka'en e laafuɓe ɗon njaaɓa ngol jonta.
Laawol adili'en, ngol darnuŋgol, an a ɗon dartina ngol ngam maɓɓe.
Yaa Jawmiraawo, min ɗon koolo ma dow laawol ngol a darnani min. Ewnaago innde ma kanjum ɓerɗe amin ngiɗi.
Koo jemma boo ɓernde am e ruuhu am ɗon ngele. Ngam to kiitaaji ma njippanake lesdi, jooɗiiɓe haa duniyaaru ekkititto adilaaku.
To kalluɗo heɓi mo'ere, o ekkitittaako adilaaku. Koo nder lesdi gooŋga'en boo o tokkoto waɗugo kalluɗum, o yi'ataa maŋngu Jawmiraawo.
Yaa Jawmiraawo, a ɓaŋgtani konne'en juŋngo, ammaa ɓe cali yi'ugo ɗum. Yi'nu ɓe no a yiɗiri ummaatoore ma, ɓe cemta. Yiite nyaama ɓe
Yaa Jawmiraawo, a hokkan min salaaman. Ko min mbaɗata fuu, an a timminan ɗum ngam amin.
Yaa Jawmiraawo, Allah amin, jaagorɓe woɗɓe laamani min, ammaa min ɗon ewno innde maaɗa tan.
Maayɓe ngeeɗitittaa, mbeeluuji maɓɓe ummitittaako. A hiiti ɓe, a halki ɓe, a nattini ciftorki maɓɓe fuu.
Ammaa a mawnini ummaatoore amin, yaa Jawmiraawo, a yaajini keeri lesdi fuu. Bana nii a teddiniri innde ma.
Yaa Jawmiraawo, nde yimɓe ma ɗon nder ɓillaare, ɓe ɗakkotiri bee ma. Nde elto ma heɓi ɓe, ɓe ɗuɗɗini do'aaje.
Bana reeduujo ɓadiiɗo danyugo ɗon ɓoslo, ɗon woya nder luuwe muuɗum, non min laatori yeeso maaɗa, yaa Jawmiraawo.
Min laati reedu'en, luuwe naŋngi min, ammaa min ndanyi henndu. Min mbaawataa wallugo lesdi koo danyugo hisnanɓe duniyaaru.
Ammaa maayɓe maaɗa ngeeɗitan, ɓalli yimɓe ma maayɓe ummititto. Pine, ngime, onon waaliiɓe nder mbulwuldi! Jawmiraawo hokkete saawawre ɗelkoore, barka maare lesdi yeeɗitinan maayɓe.
Yimɓe ummaatoore am, naste cuuɗi mon, maɓɓe dammuɗe mon ɓaawo mooɗon, cuuɗe wakkati seɗɗa, haa tikkere Jawmiraawo saalo!
Ngam ndaa, o ɗon wurto nokkuure maako haa o hiito aybe yimɓe duniyaaru. Lesdi sudditan ƴiiƴam ndufaaɗam dow muuɗum, ndi accan suddugo mbaraaɓe.
Nyalaade man Jawmiraawo losan kaafahi muuɗum caatuki, makki cemmbiɗki. O hiitoto Lewiyatan, mboodi ndoggoori
Nyalaade man, on ngimanan ngesa inabooje booɗɗe:
“Min Jawmiraawo mi ɗon ayna ka, mi ɗon yarna ka wakkati fuu. Mi ɗon ayna ka jemma e naaŋge, ngam taa goɗɗo wonna ka.
Mi acci tikkango ka. To mi tawi gi'e e giŋngille, mi honan ɗe, mi wulan ɗe fuu.
Ammaa to goɗɗo yiɗi mi ayna ɗum, sey o sulhotira bee am. Nonnon sey o sulhotira bee am.”
Saa'i waran nde yimɓe Isra'iila, danygol Yaakubu, mbaɗan ɗaɗi, puɗan, mbilitan, pinnan bana lekki, kebbinan duniyaaru bee ɓiɓɓe.
Allah fiyaay ɓe naawɗum bana o fiyiri fiyooɓe ɓe. O mbaraay ɓe bana o mbardiri mbarooɓe ɓe.
Jawmiraawo riiwi ɓe, dahi ɓe, non o hiitori ɓe. O riiwi ɓe bee henndu fuunaaŋge saatundu

Ndaa nii yaafuye hakkeeji danygol Yaakubu heɓrete e ndaa nafuuda maare boo: Ɓe naman kaa'e kirsirɗe fuu bana ɓe namirta kaa'e daneeje, ɓe ittan daŋraŋge Asera e gulduɗe uurle fuu, ɗe meetataa darneego.
Walaa koo gooto haa berniwol cemmbiɗŋgol. Ngol laati jooɗorde accaande, ferewnde bana ladde hamaadaare. Ga'i ɗon ndura ton, ɗi ɗon mbaalo ton, ɗi ɗon nyaama huɗo wonko ton.
To lice leɗɗe njoori, ngewi, rewɓe ngaran, njamnan ɗe. Ngam ummaatoore nde'e nde walaa faamu. Ngam maajum tagɗo nde yurmintaa nde, baɗɗo nde hinnataako nde.
Nyalaade man Jawmiraawo sorɓan yimɓe muuɗum bana alkamaari, diga fomoonde Efratis haa yotto maayel Misra. Onon Isra'iila'en, on mooɓteteeɓe gooto gooto bana cammeeje.
Nyalaade man goɗɗo fuufan luwal maŋngal. Majjuɓe haa lesdi Assuura e riiwaaɓe haa lesdi Misra, ɓe fuu ɓe ngaran sujidango Jawmiraawo dow hooseere seniinde haa Urusaliima.

Kayto laamorde Efrayim! A laatake meetaleewol pawnaaŋgol gonŋgol dow waadiwol cemmbiɗŋgol. Wuykooɓe lesdi ma ɗon mantoro ma. Ammaa a nanndi bee pinndi ɗaylundi ngonndi dow ko'e wuykuɓe ɓe njaram do'i.
Jawmiraawo woodi goɗɗo cemmbiɗɗo, baawɗo, taaskaniiɗo haɓre. O waran bee semmbe bana mallimallooje, bana naargewol bonnoowol, bana ndiyamji mawɗi teeliiɗi
Ɓe njaaɓan berniwol nannduŋgol bee meetaleewol, ngol wuykooɓe mantori.
Ɓe njaaɓan boo pinndi ɗaylundi pawnandi berniwol Samariya gonŋgol dow waadiwol cemmbiɗŋgol. Samariya laatoto bana ibbe aartuɗe ɓenndugo: To goɗɗo yi'i ɗe, jonta nii o teɓan ɗe, o nyaaman ɗe.
Nyalaade man Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama laatanto yimɓe ummaatoore mum luttuɓe bana meetaleewol pawnaaŋgol,
o hokkan jooɗiiɗo dow leeso kiita ruuhu gooŋga, o semmbiɗinan riiwanɓe konne'en haa dammuɗe berniwol.

Ammaa koo liman'en e annabi'en boo ɗon cakli daliila inaboojam, ɓe ɗon liillilta daliila nguykinoojam. Inaboojam jaali ɓe, ɓe ɗon liillilta, ɓe paamataa wahayuuji ɗi Allah yi'nata ɓe, ɓe mbaawataa ta'ugo kiita ngam daliila wuykere.
Taabe haa ɓe njari fuu keewi tuure e tuundi haa babal luttaay.
Ɓe ɗon mbolwa dow Jawmiraawo: “Moy o yiɗi ekkitingo faamu? Moy o yiɗi faamtingo habaru? Haa ɓikkoy entaakoy jonta na?
Woodi dooka dow dooka, dooka dow dooka, haala dow haala, haala dow haala, ɗo seɗɗa to seɗɗa.”
Nonnon nii! Bee kunnduɗe ɗe ɓe paamataa, bee ɗemŋgal janannal, Jawmiraawo wolwanan yimɓe ummaatoore nde'e,
kaŋko wi'no ɓe: “Ndaa siwtaare, acce comɗo siwto, ndaa fooftere.” Ammaa ɓe cali nanugo
Wolde Jawmiraawo laatanto ɓe dooka dow dooka, dooka dow dooka, haala dow haala, haala dow haala, ɗo seɗɗa to seɗɗa, haa ɓe njaha, ɓe ndo'oro ɓaawo ɓaawo, ɓe name, ɓe nasta tuuforgol, ngol naŋnga ɓe.
Ngam maajum, onon jancooɓe, laamaniiɓe yimɓe Urusaliima, nane wolde Jawmiraawo.
On mbi'i: “Min kaɓɓi alkawal bee waade, min alkotiri bee joonde maayɓe. To masiibo nattinoowo ɗon saalo, o heɓataa min, ngam min mbaɗi fewre hisrude amin, min mbiirnake nder fewjere.”

Ngam maajum Allah Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Ndaa, mi ɗon wallina caɓɓawal dow Siyona. Nder maagal mi ɗon jo'ina hayre tabitinaande, hayre talkumoore, marnde saman, jo'inaande booɗɗum: Kooliiɗo nde fuu tabitan
Kiita ngooŋɗuka laatanto yam bana ɓoggol mahoowo e gooŋgaaku boo bana njamndi mahoowo poondirndi. Mallimallooje kalkan hisrude fewre, ndiyamji boo ilnan biirnol fewjere.
Alkawal mooɗon bee waade fiistete! Kaɓɓotiral mooɗon bee joonde maayɓe tabitittaa. To masiibo nattinoowo ɗon saalo, o naman on.
Nde o saaloto fuu, o naŋngan on ngam o saaloto nde weeti fuu, jemma bee naaŋge. Nanugo habaru maako nastinan yimɓe nder kultoreeŋgol.
Ɗum laatanto on bana nder balndol: Leeso rammi ngam naaɗaago, suddaare famɗi ngam suddoraago.”
Jawmiraawo ummoto bana haa hooseere Perasiima, o tikkan bana nder waadiwol Gibiyon, haa o huuwa kuugal maako, kuugal maako laatiiŋgal kayɗiniiŋgal!
Ngam maajum taa njale dow bolle am, ngam taa kaɓɓorli mon ɓesda saatugo. Ngam Allah, Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama anndini yam, o annini nattingo duniyaaru fuu
Nane ko mbi'anmi, keɗite bolle am!
Naa demoowo giɗɗo aawugo ɗon rema tum tum na? O ɗon rema, o ɗon waɗa diŋiiji, naa o ɗon mo'ina ngesa maako tum na?
Na to o wo'ini pellel man, o aawan haako anisa e haako algaru
Bana nii Allah maako ekkitini mo laawol man, faamtini mo kuugal man.
O sorɓataa haako anisa bee corɓirɗum tedduɗum, o tallataa kosŋgal moota ga'i dow haako algaru. Ammaa o sorɓan anisa bee sawru e algaru bee cawel.
Haa goɗɗo tamsa tamseere, sey o nama alkamaari. O fiyataa ndi tum tum. To o saalini kosŋgal moota maako malla pucci maako dow maari, o namataa ndi.
Kanjum boo ɗum iwi haa Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama, sawariiji maako ɗi kaayeefiiji, anndal maako ɗuuɗŋgal.
Kayto Ariyel! berniwol Urusaliima, haa Daawuda saŋngini. Ɓesde hitaande haa hitaande, bee tokkindirki juulde maare!
Nden kam min Allah mi wilan Ariyel. Uumaali e gookaali mbaɗan, berniwol man laatanto yam bana Ariyel, waato caɓɓawal hirsirde.
Mi taarnete bee saŋngeere, mi hippoto ma diga suudu aynirdu am, mi darnan kuuje kipporɗe dow ma.
A leestan, a wolwan nder mbulwuldi haa les, bolle ma ngurtoto nder lesdi bana sawtu ginnawol, ɗe ngurtoto bana cofndaaki nder mbulwuldi.
Ammaa mooɓre konne'en ma laatoto bana kuroori ɗiggundi, mooɓre toonyooɓe laatoto bana nyaande saŋkitaande. Bee juhuki ɗum laatorto, nder ma'annde yiitere.
Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama jinjete bee riggaaŋgo e dimmbaaki lesdi e hoolo maŋngo, bee duluuru e henndu saatundu e ɗemŋgal yiite wulanŋge.
Mooɓre jama'aaje ummaatooje hippiiɓe ma, darnuɓe kuuje kipporɗe muuɗum'en fuu e honanɓe ma majjan bana koyɗol, bana wahayu jemma.

Bana to dolɗo hoyɗi o ɗon nyaama, nde o fini boo, o tawa walaa ko o nyaami. Malla bana to ɗomɗuɗo hoyɗi o ɗon yara, nde o fini boo, o tampuɗo, o ɗomɗuɗo. Bana non mooɓre ummaatooje konanɗe hooseere Siyona laatorto.
Kayɗine! Maɓɓe gite mon haa on mbuma fakat! Ɓe nguyki, ammaa naa bee inaboojam. Ɓe ɗon liillilta ammaa naa bee nguykinoojam.
Ngam Jawmiraawo waanji ruuhu ɗoyŋgol tedduŋgol dow mooɗon. O maɓɓi gite mon, waato annabi'en, o suddi ko'e mon, waato yi'ooɓe
Wahayu fuu suuɗani on bana bolle deftere maɓɓaande kab nde ɓe ndokki goɗɗo annduɗo jaŋngugo bee wi'ugo mo: “Jaŋngu ɗu'um ɗo, useni”, kaŋko o wi'a: “Mi waawataa, ngam nde maɓɓaama kap.”
Malla ɓe ndokki nde goɗɗo mo anndaa jaŋngugo bee wi'ugo mo: “Jaŋngu ɗu'um ɗo”, kaŋko o wi'a: “Mi anndaa jaŋngugo.”
Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Yimɓe ummaatoore nde'e ɗon ɓadito yam bee hunnduko tan, ɓe ɗon teddinammi bee bolle meere, ammaa ɓerɗe maɓɓe ndaaytake yam. Ɓe ɗon kulammi fodde umrooje ɗe yimɓe ekkitini ɓe
Ngam man mi tokkoto hayɗingo yimɓe ummaatoore nde'e bee waɗango ɓe kuuje kayɗiniiɗe ɗuuɗɗe. Nden kam hikma hikma'en maɓɓe halkan, faamu marɓe faamu maɓɓe boo majjan
Bone laatanto nyukkotooɓe yeeso Jawmiraawo ngam suuɗugo nufayeeje muuɗum'en, huuwooɓe kuuɗe muuɗum'en haa nyiɓre, wi'ooɓe: “Moy yi'ata min, moy anndi min?”
Kayya, on wonniiɓe! Mahoowo payanɗe e loope ɗum gootum na? Huunde tafaande wi'an tafɗo ɗum: “A tafaay yam?” Malla tagdi wi'an tagɗo ɗum: “A walaa hakkiilo na
Lutti seɗɗa, hooseere Libanon sookre wartan ciraka, ciraka boo laatoto bana laynde.
Nyalaade maajum, fahɓe nanan bolle deftere, wumɓe ngurtoto nyiɓre e jemma, ɓe mbumtan.
Yaŋkiniiɓe ceyorto Jawmiraawo bee seyo fantuŋgo, talaka'en caka yimɓe mbelmbeltan daliila Allah Ceniiɗo Isra'iila.
Ngam toonyooɓe e jancooɓe majjan, taaskinooɓe waɗugo halleende fuu nattan,
non boo aybinanɓe woɗɓe yeeso kiita e tuufnananɓe kiitoowo tuuforli e sottinanɓe gooŋga gooŋga'en.
Ngam maajum, ndaa nii Jawmiraawo kisnuɗo Ibrahiima wi'i danygol Yaakubu: “Yeeso ɗo, yimɓe saare Yaakubu cemtintaake, geese maɓɓe purɗataa fahin.
To ɓikkoy maɓɓe ngi'i kuugal juuɗe am caka maɓɓe, nden kam ɓe annditan min woni Allah Ceniiɗo mo Yaakubu, ɓe kulan Allah Isra'iila.
Ellitiiɓe keɓan hakkiilo, ngurŋgurtooɓe njaɓan ekkitinol.”
Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Bone laatanto Yahuudu'en tuurtuɓe dow am! Ɓe kooci anniyaaji ɗi iwaay haa am, ɓe kaɓɓi alkawal luutŋgal Ruuhu am, haa ɓe mbaaga hakke dow hakke.
Ɓe ɗon njippo haa Misra bilaa ƴamugo muuyo am. Ɓe ɗon ndogga haa aynol Firawna, ɓe ɗon ɗaɓɓita hisrude les ɗowdi Misra.
Ammaa aynol Firawna laatanto ɓe mbustu, hisrude les ɗowdi Misra boo laatanto ɓe palasa.
Ardiiɓe maɓɓe njehi haa Co'an, nelaaɓe maɓɓe njottake Hanes.
Ammaa ɓe fuu ɓe cemtan dow ummaatoore nde nafataa ɓe, nde waddantaa ɓe ballal koo nafuuda, sey mbustu e palasa.”

Ndaa koŋngol dow dabbaaji haa lesdi fombina: “Nder lesdi ɓillaare e mettamɓeram, ndi mbarooga ngorga e ndewa, foosokre e boɗɗe piirooje giiteeleeje ngoni haa muuɗum, nelaaɓe ɗon njahra jawdi Yahuuda dow ɓaawe bamɗe e ndesaaje maɓɓe dow ƴuuke geelooɗi haa ummaatoore nde nafataa ɓe.
Ngam ballal Misra nafataa, ngal walaa saman. Ngam maajum mi ɗon sooma Misra: Rahab, kuuŋga mbaaliiŋga.”
“War jonta, diidu ɗum yeeso maɓɓe dow alluha, winndu ɗum nder deftere, haa ɗum laato seedamku haa foroy ngam garanɗum.
Ngam ɓe yimɓe tuurtooɓe, ɓe ɓiɓɓe fewooɓe, saliiɓe nanugo ekkitinol Jawmiraawo.
Ɓe ɗon mbi'a yi'ooɓe: Taa ngi'e! Annabi'en boo: Taa anndine wahayuuji gooŋgaaji! Ammaa mbi'e min bolle belɗe, ngi'ane min kaayeefiiji estooji.
Ngaylite, cele laawol gooŋgawol, taa mbolwane min haala Ceniiɗo Isra'iila!”
Ngam maajum, ndaa nii Ceniiɗo Isra'iila wi'i: “Nde nii on ɗon calo wolde am, on ɗon koolo toonyotooɓe on, on ɗon tuugo dow leliiɗum,
aybewol ngo'ol laatanto on bana ceekgol nder mahol towŋgol, nden ngol ɓaarto e ɗon nii ngol yibba.
Ɓe campitan ngol bana ɓe campititta fayannde loope. To nde fusi boo, keeɗe maare ke'ataa ngam hoo'ugo yiite haa kaatane malla ngam nyeɗugo ndiyam haa waawru.”
Ndaa nii Allah Jawmiraawo, Ceniiɗo Isra'iila wi'i: “On keɓan kisndam to on tuubi, on ciwtake. On keɓan semmbe to on nde'i, on kooli yam, ammaa on ngiɗaa.
On mbi'i: Naa non! Ammaa min ndoggan bee pucci. Nonnon nii, on ndoggan! On mbi'i: Min mba'oto pucci jaawɗotooɗi. Nonnon nii, taasnooɓe on njaawɗoto ko ɓuri on!
Ujineere ndoggan to gooto furkiti ɓe. To konne'en njowo purkitake on, on ndoggan. Luttanɓe mon nanndan bee leggal tuutawal dariiŋgal feere mum dow yeereere hooseere malla dow towndiire.”
Ammaa Jawmiraawo ɗon reena wakkatiire nde o mo'anta on. O ummoto haa o hinno on. Ngam Jawmiraawo woni Allah baɗanɗo kiita ngooŋɗuka, barka laatanto hoolotooɓe mo fuu.
Onon yimɓe Siyona, jooɗiiɓe haa Urusaliima, on accan woyugo. Fakat o hinnoto on ngam hoolo bojji mooɗon. To o nani ngo, o jaaboto on.
Jawmiraawo hokki on tamseere nder ɓillaare mon e ndiyam nder torra mon. Ekkitinoowo mon wiccitittaako fahin, gite mon ngi'an mo.
To on ɗon njaha gal nyaamo malla gal nano, noppi mon nanan koŋngol ɓaawo mooɗon: “Ndaa laawol, tokke ngol.”
Labbi mon cuddaaɗi bee cardi, on karminan ɗi, non boo labbi mon ɓolinaaɗi, kuuwraaɗi bee kaŋŋeeri. A sakkinan ɗi bana limce tunwuɗe, a wi'an: “Haa yaasi!”
Nden kam Jawmiraawo toɓnan iyeende dow aawdi mon ndi aawɗon nder lesdi. Lesdi fuɗnan nyaamdu welndu, semmbiɗndu. Nyalaade man tokke mon nduran nder durdude yaasnde.
Ga'i e bamɗe ɗum ndemrirton ngesa, nyaaman huɗo jillindiraako mannda, ko on camminta bee tufirgel e ɓoftirgel.
Nyannde nde konne'en mon maaydi, to cuuɗi maɓɓe towɗi ngibbi, maahoy e maaje njarnan kooseeje e towndiije mon fuu.

Jayŋgol lewru laatoto bana ngol naaŋge, jayŋgol naaŋge boo yaynan cowi joweeɗiɗi, bana jayŋgol nyalɗe joweeɗiɗi nde woore, nyannde nde Jawmiraawo haɓɓanta ummaatoore muuɗum kuuduuje mum, o yamɗitinan ɓattajje piyɗe maare.
Ndaa, Jawmiraawo ɗon wara diga daayiiɗum. Tikkere maako ɗon saati, barriya maako nyaaɗi, o ɗon heewi ɓernuki, ɗemŋgal maako bana yiite wulanŋge.
Poofɗe maako nanndi bee maayo teelanŋgo
Ammaa onon on ngiman bana nder jemmaare juulde seniinde. Ɓerɗe mooɗon ceyoto bana yahanɓe bee gime ciide haa hooseere Jawmiraawo mo tapaare hisnoore Isra'iila.
Jawmiraawo nannan sawtu mum cemmbiɗɗo, waŋginan juŋngo mum taaskiiŋgo fiyugo nder caatal tikkere mum e ɗemŋgal yiite wulanŋge, waabiliije e naargeeji e mallimallooje.
Assuura'en kultoran ngam sawtu Jawmiraawo, Jawmiraawo fiyan ɓe bee sawru muuɗum.
Koo ndeye sawru kiita fiyata ɓe fuu, ndu Jawmiraawo jippinta dow maɓɓe, yimɓe piyan bawɗi e moolooji. Jawmiraawo haɓan bee maɓɓe, bee juŋngo mum ɓaŋgtiiŋgo ngam haɓre.
Duuri, ngaska yiite ɗon taaski ngam laamiiɗo Assuura. Ka luggi, ka yaaji boo, ka heewi yiite e leɗɗe ɗuuɗɗe. Poofɗe Jawmiraawo kuɓɓan ɗe bana maayo baruudu

Bone laatanto yahanɓe haa Misra ngam ɗaɓɓititgo ballal. Ɓe ɗon tuugo dow pucci, ɓe ɗon koolo mootaaji pucci Misra ngam ɗi ɗuuɗɗi e wa'iiɓe pucci ɓe'e ɓe semmbiɗɓe. Ammaa ɓe tijjataako heedi Ceniiɗo Isra'iila, ɓe ƴamataa Jawmiraawo.
Ammaa kaŋko o hikmaajo, o waawan nelugo sarru, o hoositittaa bolle maako. O ummanto halluɓe, huuwanɓe zunuuba e wallooɓe ɓe fuu.
Ngam Misra'en ɓe yimɓe, ɓe laataaki Allah. Pucci maɓɓe ɗum pucci tan, naa ruuhu. To Jawmiraawo forti juŋngo mum, balloowo fergoto, ballaaɗo do'oto, hawtaade maɓɓe ɓe kalkidan.

Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo wi'i yam: “Bana mbarooga cemmbiɗŋga ubbirto dow keɓal muuɗum, koo to ɓe mooɓti waynaaɓe ɗuuɗɓe dow maaga, nga hultortaa gookaali maɓɓe, nga saklataako ngam hoolo maɓɓe, bana non min Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama mi jippoto ngam haɓugo dow hooseere Siyona.
Min Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama mi aynan berniwol Urusaliima, bana colli leerirta dow ɓiɓɓe muuɗum'en. Mi aynan, mi hisnan, mi daaynan sarru, mi rimɗinan ngol.”
Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Onon yimɓe Isra'iila, on ndokkiti yam ɓaawo, ammaa lorte haa am!
Nyannde man koo moy mooɗon wudinan labbi mum ɗi cardi e ɗi kaŋŋeeri, ɗi on mbaɗani ko'e mooɗon bee juuɗe mon marɗe aybe.
Assuura'en kalkan bee kaafahi ki laatanaaki neɗɗo. Kaafahi ki laatanaaki neɗɗo nyaaman ɓe. Ɓe ndoggan ngam daɗugo kaafahi, suka'en maɓɓe laatoto maccuɓe, huuwooɓe kuuɗe dooleeje.
Paddoowo ɓe doggan ngam kulol, hoore'en maɓɓe boo kultoran, accan tuutawal maɓɓe.” Non Jawmiraawo wi'i, kaŋko mari yiite haa Siyona e ɓolinirde nder Urusaliima.
Ndaa, laamiiɗo waŋgan, o laamoto fodde adilaaku, ardiiɓe boo laamoto fodde kiita ngooŋɗuka.
Koo moy laatoto bana biirnol yeeso henndu, bana suuɗirde yeeso naargewol, bana maaje ndiyam nder nokkuure yoornde, bana ɗowdi tapaare mawnde dow harde.
Nden kam gite waawɓe yi'ugo maɓɓataako fahin, noppi waawɓe nanugo boo keɗititto.
Ɓerɗe sooya-hakkiilo'en keɓan faamu, ɗemɗe me'ooɓe mbolwan law bee laaɓɗum.
Ɓe ewnataako paataaɗo tedduɗo, ɓe mbi'ataa faasikiijo caahiiɗo.
Ngam paataaɗo ɗon wolwa faataare, ɓernde maako ɗon nufo halleende, haa o huuwa geddal, o wolwa kalluka dow Jawmiraawo, haa o acca dolɗo bee dolo mum, o haɗa ɗomɗuɗo yarugo.
Balmi faasikiijo, ɗi kalluɗi: O ɗon nufo dabareeji ngam halkugo yurumɓe bee pewe, koo to laafuɗo mari gooŋga.
Ammaa tedduɗo ɗon nufo ko mari saman, o daroto dow nufayeeje maako booɗɗe.
Umme, onon rewɓe riskuɓe, nane ko mbi'anmi! Onon ɓiɓɓe rewɓe ɓe ngalaa saklere, keɗite bolle am!
Lutti nduuɓu bee balɗe seɗɗa, on ndiwnan, onon rewɓe ɓe ngalaa saklere, ngam ittuki inabooje timmi, teɓol ɓiɓɓe leɗɗe warataa fahin.
Kultore, onon riskuɓe! Ndiwne, onon sooyɓe saklere! Ɓorte limce mooɗon, temmbiɗe, kadde limce buhuuje!
Mboye, piye biɓɓe mon, ngam daliila gese booɗɗe e inabooje dimooje!
Gi'e e giŋngille njaɓti lesdi yimɓe am. Mboye ngam daliila cuuɗi welwelo nder berniwol ceyiiŋgol.
Yimɓe accan laamorde, berniwol keewŋgol hoolo ferwan, towndiire laamorde e suudu aynirdu laatoto lowi haa foroy. Bamɗe ladde ceyoto, tokke nduran ton,
haa to Allah waanji Ruuhu mum dow amin, haa to ladde laatake ciraka, ciraka boo laatake bana laynde.
Nden kiita ngooŋɗuka tabitan nder ladde, adilaaku boo jooɗoto haa ciraka.
Adilaaku waddan salaaman e de'ere e hoolaare ngam foroy.
Ummaatoore am jooɗoto haa nokkuure salaaman, nder ci'e
Daliila mallimallooje, laynde nattan, berniwol boo yibban.
Barka laatanto on! On mbaawan aawugo haa ndiyam woni fuu, walaa haaje on toŋga na'i e bamɗe.
Bone laatante, an nattinoowo mo meeɗaay nattineego! Bone laatante, an zammboowo mo meeɗaay zammbeego! To a timmini nattingo, ɓe nattinte, to a timmini zammbaago, ɓe zammbete.
Yaa Jawmiraawo, hinna min! Min ɗon koolo ma. Laata aynoowo amin cemmbiɗɗo nde weeti fuu, hisnu min nder wakkati ɓillaare.
To jama'aaje nani hoolo, ɗe ndoggan, ummaatooje caŋkititto nde ummotoɗa fuu.
Woɗɓe ɓoftan keɓal mooɗon bana baɓɓatti ɓoftirte, ɓe ndiwan dow maagal bana ndo'uuji ndiwrata.
Jawmiraawo o Ɓaŋiiɗo, ngam o ɗon jooɗi nder ɓaŋgiiɗum, o ɗon hebbina Siyona bee kiita ngooŋɗuka e adilaaku.
An Siyona, balɗe ma fuu ɗe tabitɗe. Marugo hikma e anndal, ɗum risku, ɗum hisnan. Haa kulol Jawmiraawo, ndesaari ma woni.
Nane, semmbiɗɓe ɗon ngooka haa yaasi, nelaaɓe sulhindirooɓe ɗon mboya bojji caatuɗi.
Buuwi perwi, walaa saalotooɓe fahin. Yimɓe piisti alkawalji, ɓe ɗon njawo seedooɓe, ɓe paalataa koo moye.
Lesdi ɗon nder suno, yoori. Libanon toski, ɗon ɗayla. Waadiwol Saron laati bana ladde meere, Baasan e Karmel ɗon cammina haakooji maaji.
Jawmiraawo wi'i ummaatooje: “Jonta mi ummoto! Jonta mi daroto! Jonta maŋngu am waŋgan!
Onon reedu'en bee huɗo yoorko, on ndanyan tiitiiji. Foofaaŋgo mooɗon woni yiite nge tammi nyaamugo on.
Ummaatooje laatoto ndoondi ɓolinirɗe e gi'e pe'aaɗe gulanɗe nder yiite.
Nane ko mbaɗanmi, onon daayiiɓe! Onon ɓadiiɓe boo, annde baawɗe am!”
Marɓe hakke nder Siyona ɗon kultora, diwnol naŋngi yedduɓe Allah. Ɓe ɗon mbi'a: “Moy caka meeɗen waawata faɓɓugo kommbi yiite wulanŋge? Moy waawata faɓɓugo kommbi nguli maage haa foroy?”

Mo ɗon yeeɗa nder adilaaku e ɗon wolwa gooŋga, mo njaɓataa keɓal rikiciwal e mo ɗon salo ngeenaari zammba, mo ɗon sukka noppi muuɗum ngam taa nana haala mbar-hoore, mo ɗon maɓɓa gite muuɗum ngam taa o laara kalluɗum,
irin goɗɗo oo jooɗoto haa nokkuuje towɗe, cuuɗi cemmbiɗɗi mahaaɗi dow tapaare laatoto hisrude maako, o heɓan nyaamdu, ndiyam ŋakkantaa mo.
Gite ma ngi'an laamiiɗo nder tedduŋgal muuɗum fuu. A laaran lesdi peeciindi.
Ɓernde ma siftoran kultoreeŋgol naane: Toy binndoowo? Toy jaɓoowo jomorgol? Toy linyoowo cuuɗi towɗi?
A meetataa yi'ugo ummaatoore elewnde, marnde wolde saɗnde e ɗemŋgal me'oowal ngal faamataake.
Laar Siyona, berniwol juulɗe men. Gite ma ngi'an Urusaliima, pellel de'uŋgel, laymaaru ndu meetataa sottineego. Tiggirɗe maaru meetataa ɗoofeego, ɓoggol maaru boo meetataa fiisteego.
Jawmiraawo mawɗo wondan bee meeɗen ton! Ngol laatoto nokkuure ɓulannde ilaali jaasɗi e maaje. Koommbooje

Ɓoggi maagal tirti, ɗi njogataako daŋraŋgal haa caka koommbowal, ɗi mbe'itittaa leppi mawɗi cemmbiɗɗi ɗi ngerɓata koommbowal bee henndu. Jawdi konne'en fuu laatoto keɓal konu, koo woosɓe boo keɓan geɗe muuɗum'en. Ngam Jawmiraawo woni kiitoowo en, Jawmiraawo woni umroowo en, Jawmiraawo woni laamiiɗo men. Kaŋko o hisnan en.
Walaa jooɗiiɗo haa lesdi men meetata wi'go o tampuɗo. Ngam ummaatoore wonnde haa ɗo heɓan yaafuye hakkeeji maare.
Ɓadite, onon jama'aaje, haa on nana. Onon ummaatooje, keɗite. Sey duniyaaru e ko woni nder maaru fuu nana, non boo lesdi e ko fuɗata dow maari fuu.
Ngam Jawmiraawo ɗon tikkana yimɓe ummaatooje e mooɓe konu maaje fuu. O do'ani ɓe kiita nattineego, o hokki ɓe ngam mbareego.
Ɓe ngudinan mbaraaɓe maɓɓe, nyawmanɗe maɓɓe kaccan, kooseeje ɓolwan ngam ƴiiƴam maɓɓe.
Jayli asamanji campititto. Asamanji taggoto bana deftere taggaande, jayli asamanji caaman bana haako inabohi e ibbi saamirta
Kaafahi Jawmiraawo ɗon ɓakkori bee ƴiiƴam haa asama. Ki ukkanto Edoom, dow ummaatoore nde mi hiiti kiita nattineego.

Ƴiiƴam ɗon simta diga kaafahi Jawmiraawo, ki ɗon saɓa ɓellere, bee ƴiiƴam boorti e njawɗi, bee ɓellere ɓooƴe boorti. Ngam Jawmiraawo, o waɗan kirsol maŋngol haa berniwol Bosra, o mbaran yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe nder lesdi Edoom.
Yimɓe ndo'odotto bee bani e nga'oy e ga'i kalhali. Ƴiiƴam suddan lesdi maɓɓe, ɓellere suddan mbulwuldi maari.
Ngam ɗum laatani Jawmiraawo nyalaade waataago, hitaande waataago konne'en daliila Siyona.
Maaje Edoom laatoto demmbere ɓaleere, mbulwuldi boo baruudu
Jemma e naaŋge yiite maari nyifataako, cuurɗe maari eeŋgan haa foroy. Ndi laatoto bille diga yidere haa yidere. Goɗɗo saalataako ton, haa abada
Duujiire e camnagel maran ndi, ngaasiyoowal e leekuwal njooɗoto ton. Jawmiraawo nattinan lesdi ndi'i, koo ɗume fuu wilan e ndi ferwan.
Mawɓe maari ngonataa ton ngam laamingo laamiiɗo. Laamiiɓe maɓɓe fuu ngoodaa.
Gi'e mawnan nder laamorɗe maari, geene e giŋngille boo nder cuuɗi cemmbiɗɗi. Ndi laatoto jooɗorde cuuli e nokkuure dabbi.
Kuuje ladde e pobbi pottotiran ton, jawɗi kawrotiran ton, ginnawol jemmawol wonan, siwtoyto ton.
Foosokre boo waɗan waalorde ton, sakkinan geeraaɗe, solƴinan ɗe, mawninan ɓikkoy muuɗum haa ɗowdi mum. Jigaaje mooɓotiran ton, gootal gootal fuu.
Mbiɗite deftere Jawmiraawo, njaŋnge! Walaa koo gootel caka kuuje ɗe'e luttata ɓaawo. Ɗe fuu ɗe taweteeɗe ton ngam hunnduko maako umri ɗe, Ruuhu maako mooɓti ɗe fuu.
O waɗani ɗe kur'u, juŋngo maako yeɗani ɗe lesdi bee ɓoggol poondirgol. Haa foroy ɗe maran ndi, diga yidere haa yidere ɗe njooɗoto nder maari
Harde e lesdi njoorndi ceyoto, ladde welweltan, finnan bana pinndi.
Nde heewan pinndi, nde welweltan bee gimi e gookaali seyo. Tedduŋgal Libanon laatanto nde, non boo maŋngu Karmel e Saron. Koo moy yi'an tedduŋgal e maŋngu Jawmiraawo meeɗen.
Cemmbiɗine juuɗe comɗe e koppi tampuɗi
Mbi'e ta'a-ɓerɗe'en: “Cemmbiɗe, taa kule! Ndaa, Allah mooɗon, o ɗon wara ngam waataago konne'en mon, o warjo halleende nde ɓe mbaɗani on. O ɗon wara bee hoore maako hisnugo on.”
Nden wumɓe ngi'an, fahɓe boo nanan.
Boosɗo diwan bana lelwa, ɗemŋgal muukaajo waɗan gookaali seyo. Ndiyamji ɓulan nder harde, maahoy boo nder ladde
Njaareendi ngulndi laatoto coofol, lesdi njoorndi boo ceeɓooje ndiyam. Waalorde cuuli laatoto nokkuure cannji e kewe.
Buuwol bi'eteeŋgol Laawol-Ceniiŋgol wonan ton. Coɓɗo yahataa dow maagol, sey tokkotooɓe laawol man tan. Koo faataaɓe boo majjataa ton.
Walaa mbarooga ton, walaa ndabbaawa paɗɗoowa tokkoto ngol, ɗum tawataake ton. Ammaa soottaaɓe tan tokkoto ngol.
Rimɗinaaɓe Jawmiraawo ngartan, nastan Siyona bee gimi seyo. Seyo duumiiŋgo heewan ɓerɗe maɓɓe. Ɓe keɓan welwelo e seyo, ammaa torra e uumaali ndoggan.
Nder nduuɓu laamu Hezekiya sappo e nayaɓu, Sanherib, laamiiɗo Assuura ukkani berniiji Yahuuda cemmbiɗɗi fuu, o nyaami ɗi.
Laamiiɗo Assuura neli mawɗo yarnooɓe mo bee jama'aare konu mawnde diga Lakis haa Urusaliima haa laamiiɗo Hezekiya. Mawɗo yarnooɓe go dari haa ildugol weendu ɓaŋgiindu, haa buuwol Lootirde.
Eliyakim ɓii Hilkiyya, kaliifaajo laamorde e Sebna, binndoowo e Yo'ak ɓii Asaf, hunndukoojo laamiiɗo, ngurti, njehi haa maako.
Mawɗo yarnooɓe man wi'i ɓe: “Mbi'e Hezekiya: Laamiiɗo mawɗo, laamiiɗo Assuura wi'i: Hoolaare laaɓnde ndeye marɗa?
A tammi bolle meere ɗum sawari e baawɗe ngam konu na? Kadi, moy kooluɗa haa a tuurtani yam?
Ndaa, a ɗon hooli Misra, kewal gewaaŋgal. To goɗɗo tuggorake ngal, ngal sumpitan mo juŋngo. Bana non Firawna, laamiiɗo Misra wa'i haa hoolotooɓe mo fuu

Ammaa to a wi'i yam: Min ɗon kooli Allah Jawmiraawo amin, naa ɗum kaŋko Hezekiya itti nokkuuje mum towɗe e kirsirɗe mum na? Nden o wi'i yimɓe Yahuuda e Urusaliima: Yeeso hirsirde nde'e tan cujiditton!
Kadi, narru bee jaagorɗo am, laamiiɗo Assuura. Mi hokkete pucci ujine ɗiɗi, to a woodi wa'otooɓe ɗi.
Noy a lornirta koo ngomnaajo ɓuranɗo leesugo caka maccuɓe jaagorɗo am? Ammaa a ɗon hoolo Misra ngam daliila mootaaji pucci e wa'otooɓe ɗi.
Kadi, to mi wari halkugo lesdi ndi'i, ɗum laataaki bee muuyo Jawmiraawo na? Jawmiraawo wi'i yam mi nasta lesdi ndi'i, mi halka ndi.”
Nden Eliyakim e Sebna e Yo'ak mbi'i mo: “Useni wolwan min Aramiyaare, min nanan nde. Accu wolwango min bee Ibraniŋkeere, ngam yimɓe wonɓe dow mahol ɗon nana en.”

Mawɗo yarnooɓe go wi'i: “On tammi jaagorɗo am neli yam haa jaagorɗo mooɗon e haa mooɗon tan na? Naa ɗum laarani boo jooɗiiɓe dow mahol ɓe'e na? Kamɓe boo naa ɓe nyaaman bu'e maɓɓe, ɓe njaran cille maɓɓe, kal-kal bee mooɗon!”
Nden o dari, o hooli bee Ibraniŋkeere, o wi'i: “Nane bolle laamiiɗo mawɗo, laamiiɗo Assuura!
Ndaa nii o wi'i: Taa Hezekiya sakla on, ngam o waawataa hisnugo on.
Taa Hezekiya de'itina on bee Jawmiraawo, o wi'a: Jawmiraawo hisnan en sike, o hokkataa berniwol ngo'ol haa laamiiɗo Assuura.
Taa nanane Hezekiya, ngam laamiiɗo Assuura wi'i: Culhotire bee am, ngarte haa am. Nden koo moy mooɗon nyaaman inabooje muuɗum e ibbi muuɗum, koo moy yaran ndiyam ɓulndu muuɗum,
haa mi wara, mi yahra on haa lesdi feere bana ndi mooɗon, lesdi marndi alkamaari e inaboojam ɓennduɗam e tamseere e gese inabooje.
Taa Hezekiya esta on bee wi'go: Jawmiraawo hisnan en. Kadi ɗowanteeɓe ummaatooje goɗɗe meeɗi hisnugo lesɗe muuɗum'en diga juŋngo laamiiɗo Assuura na?
Toy ɗowanteeɓe Hamat e Arpad? Toy ɗowanteeɓe Sefarwayim? Ɓe kisni Samariya diga juŋngo am na?
Ɓeye caka ɗowanteeɓe lesɗe ɗe'e fuu kisni lesɗe muuɗum'en e juŋngo am, haa Jawmiraawo hisna Urusaliima diga juŋngo am?”
Ammaa yimɓe njeeɗi, njaabaaki mo koo wolde. Ngam laamiiɗo Hezekiya umruno: “Taa njaabe mo.”
Nden Eliyakim ɓii Hilkiyya, kaliifaajo laamorde e Sebna, binndoowo e Yo'ak ɓii Asaf, hunndukoojo laamiiɗo, ngarti haa Hezekiya bee limce ceekaaɗe, ɓe anndini mo bolle mawɗo yarnooɓe go.
Nde laamiiɗo Hezekiya nani ɗum, o seeki limce maako. O ɓorni buhuuje, o nasti haykaliiru Jawmiraawo.
O neli Eliyakim, kaliifaajo laamorde e Sebna, binndoowo e liman'en ndotti'en haa annabi Esaaya ɓii Amoosa, ɓe ɓorniiɓe limce buhuuje.
Ɓe mbi'i mo: “Ndaa ko Hezekiya wi'i: Nyalaade nde'e ɗum nyalaade ɓillaare e feloore e toskaare ngam amin, bana to nyalaade danyugo yotti, ammaa semmbe danyugo walaa.

Teema Allah Jawmiraawo maaɗa nanan bolle mawɗo yarnooɓe, mo jawmum laamiiɗo Assuura neli ɗum, haa o janca Allah geeto. Teema Allah Jawmiraawo maaɗa hiitoto bolle ɗe o nani. Kadi waɗ do'aare ngam luttuɓe wonɓe ɗo.”
Jaggiiɓe laamiiɗo Hezekiya ngari haa Esaaya,
Esaaya wi'i ɓe: “Nii mbi'oton jaagorɗo mooɗon: Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo wi'i: Taa hul bolle kalluɗe ɗe nanɗa, ɗe jaggiiɓe laamiiɗo Assuura mbolwi dow am.
Ndaa, mi nastinan ruuhuwol nder maako, haa o nana habaru, o loro haa lesdi maako. Ton mi do'an mo bee kaafahi.”
Mawɗo yarnooɓe go lori, tawi laamiiɗo Assuura, ɗon haɓa bee berniwol Libna ngam o nani laamiiɗo ummi Lakis, dilli.
Laamiiɗo nani habaru Tirhaka, laamiiɗo Etiyopiya. Ɓe mbi'no mo: “O waran haɓugo bee maaɗa.” Nde o nani ɗum, o neli nelaaɓe haa Hezekiya, o wi'i:
Ndaa nii mbi'oton Hezekiya laamiiɗo Yahuuda: “Taa Allah maaɗa mo koolotoɗa sakle, wi'e: Urusaliima hokkataake haa juŋngo laamiiɗo Assuura.
Ndaa, a nani ko laamiiɓe Assuura mbaɗi lesɗe fuu, no ɓe nattiniri ɗe. Kadi, an a hisan na?
Nde kaakiraaɓe am nattini Goojan e Haran e Resef e ɓiɓɓe Eden wonɓe haa Telassar, ɗowanteeɓe maɓɓe kisni ɓe na?
Toy laamiiɗo Hamat e laamiiɗo Arpad e laamiiɗo berniwol Sefarwayim e Hena e Iwwa?”
Hezekiya jaɓi bataakewol ngol nelaaɓe ngaddi, o jaŋngi ngol. Nden o nasti haykaliiru, o we'iti ngol yeeso Jawmiraawo.
Nden o tori Jawmiraawo, o wi'i:
“Yaa Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama, Allah Isra'iila, jooɗiiɗo haa leeso laamu dow keruba'en
Yaa Jawmiraawo, nan, laar. Yaa Jawmiraawo, nan bolle ɗe Sanherib neldi ngam jancugo ma, yaa Allah geeto.
Gooŋga, yaa Jawmiraawo, laamiiɓe Assuura mbirgi ummaatooje e lesɗe maaje.
Ɓe cakkini ɗowanteeɓe maaje nder yiite – gooŋga kam naa ɓe ɗowanteeɓe – ngam ɗum yimɓe mbaɗi ɗum bee leɗɗe e kaa'e. Ɓe mbirgi ɗum.
Ammaa jonta, yaa Allah Jawmiraawo amin, hisnu min juŋngo maako, ngam haa laamuuji duniyaaru fuu annda, an feere ma woni Jawmiraawo.”
Esaaya ɓii Amoosa neli haa Hezekiya, ɓe mbi'i mo: “Ndaa nii Allah Jawmiraawo Isra'iila wi'i: Tornde nde toriiɗa mi ngam daliila Sanherib laamiiɗo Assuura, mi nani nde.
Ndaa koŋngol ngol Jawmiraawo wi'i dow maako:
Berniwol Urusaliima nannduŋgol bee paanyo debbo ɗon yawe, ɗon jance. Siyona ɗon dimmbina hoore ɓaawo maaɗa.
Moy njancuɗa? Moy mbolwanɗa kalluka, dow moy ɓaŋgtuɗa sawtu? A ɓaŋgti gite ma dow Ceniiɗo Isra'iila.

Bee kunnduɗe jaggiiɓe ma njancuɗa Jawmiraawo, mbi'ɗa: Min mi wa'i towɗe kooseeje bee mooɓre mootaaji pucci am, haa yeereere Libanon ɓurnde daayaago. Mi fe'i leɗɗe maare mawɗe cemmbiɗɗe e leɗɗe maare cuɓaaɗe booɗɗe. Mi yotti yeereere Libanon, laynde maare ɓurdunde sukkugo.
Mi wasi, mi yari ndiyam haa lesɗe feere feere. Bee jaaɓruɗe kosɗe am njoornanmi maaje Misra fuu.
A nanaay no duuri mi taaskitini ɗum na? Mi nufi ɗum diga wakkati ɓooyma. Jonta timminmi ɗum, haa ngartira berniiji cemmbiɗɗi towndiije bille.
Jooɗiiɓe ton ngalaa baawɗe, ɓe cakli, ɓe cemti. Ɓe laati bana huɗo ngesa e haako hecco, bana huɗo dow soorowol, ko yoori diga ko mawnaay.
Mi anndi yaake njooɗotooɗa, yaake ngurtotooɗa e nastata e yaake tikkanta yam.
A tikkani yam, elewre ma eeŋgi haa noppi am. Ngam maajum mbaɗanmi halagaare am nder kine ma, labaŋgal am boo haa hunnduko ma. Mi lortinte dow laawol ngol ngardunooɗa.”
Nden Esaaya wi'i laamiiɗo Hezekiya: “Ndaa ko laatanto ma alaama: Hikka on nyaaman gabbe gariije, mawri boo ko fuɗi ɓaawo. Ammaa hitaande tataɓre, aawe, code, njube gese inabooje, nyaame ɓiɓɓe maaje.
Daɗɓe nder yimɓe lenyol Yahuuda, luttuɓe maɓɓe mbaɗan ɗaɗi haa les, ndiman haa dow.
Ngam daɗɓe, woɗɓe luttan haa Urusaliima e dow hooseere Siyona. Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama timminan ɗum nder yiide mum semmbiɗnde.
Ngam maajum, ndaa nii Jawmiraawo wi'i dow laamiiɗo Assuura: O nastataa berniwol ngo'ol, o fiɗataa kurol nder maagol, o ɓadintaa wawarde
O loroto dow laawol ngol o wardi, o nastataa berniwol ngo'ol. Min Jawmiraawo wi'i ɗum.
Min mi aynan berniwol ngo'ol haa mi hisna ngol, ngam daliila hoore am e ngam daliila jaggiiɗo am Daawuda boo.”
Malaa'ikaajo Jawmiraawo yehi, mbari nder saŋngeere Assuura'en worɓe ujine teemerre e cappanɗe njoweetato e njowo (185.000). Nde weeti, luttuɓe, yeeɗɓe tawi ɓalli maayɗi.
Sanherib, laamiiɗo Assuura ummi, lori haa Niniwe, jooɗi ton.

Nyannde go'o, nde o ɗon sujida nder suudu lawru maako Nisrok, ɓiɓɓe maako Adirammelek e Sareser mbari mo bee kaafahi. Ammaa ɓe ndoggi haa lesdi Araraada, ɓe ndaɗi. Ɓiyiiko Esarhaddon laami haa pellel maako.
Nder wakkati man Hezekiya nyawi haa o ɓadake maayugo. Annabi Esaaya ɓii Amoosa wari laarugo mo, wi'i: “Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo wi'i: Saa'i waɗi, umru saare ma alkawal, ngam a yeeɗataa, a maayan.”
Nden Hezekiya wayliti gal mahol. O tori Jawmiraawo,
o wi'i: “Yaa Jawmiraawo, siftor no mi yeeɗiri yeeso maaɗa bee gooŋga e ɓernde woore, no kuuwrumi ko fottani ma.” Hezekiya woyi masin.
Nden Jawmiraawo wolwani Esaaya, wi'i:
“Yah, wi' Hezekiya: Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo Allah kaaka ma Daawuda wi'i: Mi nani tornde ma, mi yi'i gonɗi ma. Ndaa, mi ɓesdante duuɓi sappo e jowi.
Mi hisnete, an bee berniwol ngo'ol diga juŋngo laamiiɗo Assuura. Mi aynan berniwol ngo'ol.
Kanjum laatante alaama diga Jawmiraawo, haa o hebbina koŋngol ngol o wolwi:
Ndaa, mi lornan ɗowdi ɓaawo bee jaaɓruɗe sappo dow jaaɓruɗe Akas saa'i naaŋge ɗon loro ɓaawo.” Naaŋge lorti bee jaaɓruɗe sappo dow jaaɓruɗe haa nge jippino.
Ɓaawo Hezekiya, laamiiɗo Yahuuda yamɗiti e nyawu muuɗum, o winndi bolle ɗe'e:
“Mi numi: Haa reeta balɗe am ngonmi, doole mi dilla, mi nasta dammuɗe joonde maayɓe, mi sooya duuɓi am luttuɗi.
Mi numi mi meetataa yi'ugo Jawmiraawo nder lesdi yeeɗɓe. Mi meetataa laarugo yimɓe caka jooɗiiɓe nder duniyaaru.
Jooɗorde am ittaama, nde yahraama daayiiɗum bana laymaaru waynaaɓe. Mi taggi yoŋki am bana cannyoowo taggirta limce. O ta'i yam e geesewol. Mi numi: Hakkunde nyalawma e jemma o timminan yoŋki am.
Jemma fuu mi wooki, ngam o yewi i'e am fuu bana mbarooga. Mi numi: O timminan yoŋki am law.
Mi siiki bana collel zawleeru, mi uumi bana poola. Gite am comi tijjaago dow. Yaa Jawmiraawo, mi ɓilliiɗo, yiidam!
Ɗume mi wi'ata mo? Ngam o jaabi yam, kaŋko waɗi ɗum. Mi yeeɗan duuɓi am fuu bee mettamɓeram nder nafsu, mi jaŋkiniiɗo.
Jawmiraawo ɗon wondi bee yimɓe muuɗum. Ɓe ngeeɗan e ruuhu maako yeeɗinan ko ɗon nder maɓɓe fuu. A nyawndatam, a yeeɗinan yoŋki am.
Ndaa, mettamɓeram sannji warti salaaman. A yiɗi yam, a hisni yam diga ngaska halkere, a sakkini hakkeeji am fuu ɓaawo ma.
Ngam joonde maayɓe yettataa ma, waade boo maŋgtataa ma. Nastuɓe nder ngaska tammortaako gooŋgaaku ma.
Ammaa geeto yettete, sey geeto tan, sey kaŋko yettete bana am hannde. Baaba anndinan ɓikkoy gooŋgaaku ma.
Jawmiraawo hisni yam! Sey en ngimana mo bee moolooji ngeendam men fuu nder haykaliiru Jawmiraawo.”
Esaaya wi'i ɓe koo'a tamre ibbe joorɗe, ɓe takka ɗum dow ɓuudi, ngam haa laamiiɗo yamɗita.
Ammaa Hezekiya ƴami: “Alaama kaye gooŋɗinta mi heɓan yahugo haa haykaliiru Jawmiraawo?”
Saa'i maajum Merodak-Baladan ɓii Baladan, laamiiɗo Baabila neldi bataakewol e dokkal haa Hezekiya. Ngam o nani Hezekiya nyawino, yamɗiti.

Hezekiya seyori ɗum. O holli nelaaɓe sigordu ndesaaje maako, cardi e kaŋŋeeri e uurle e nebbam caɗɗam, non boo suudu balmi e ko woni nder ndesaaje maako fuu. Walaa ko o suuɗani ɓe nder saare maako e nder maral maako.
Nden annabi Esaaya wari haa laamiiɗo Hezekiya, ƴami mo: “Ɗume worɓe ɓe'e mbi'i? Diga toy ɓe ngari?” Hezekiya jaabi: “Diga lesdi ndaayiindi ɓe ngari, diga Baabila, ngam laarugo yam.”
O ƴami: “Ɗume ɓe ngi'i nder saare ma?” Hezekiya jaabi: “Ɓe ngi'i koo ɗume ko woni nder saare am fuu. Walaa ko mi suuɗani ɓe nder ndesaaje am.”
Esaaya wi'i Hezekiya: “Nan koŋngol Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama:
Ndaa, nyalɗe ɗon ngara, ɓe njahran haa Baabila ko woni nder saare ma fuu, ɗum ko kaakiraaɓe ma mbaagi haa wargo hannde, walaa ko luttata sam. Non Jawmiraawo wi'i.
Ɓe koo'an woɗɓe nder danygol maaɗa, haa ɓe laato saraaki'en nder laamorde laamiiɗo Baabila
Hezekiya wi'i Esaaya: “Koŋngol Jawmiraawo ngol mbolwuɗa, ngol wooɗi.” O wi'i: “Nder balɗe am kam, jam e salaaman ɗon!”
“Nde'itine ummaatoore am, nde'itine nde”, non Allah mooɗon wi'i.
“Mbelne ɓerɗe yimɓe Urusaliima. Anndine ɓe, konu maɓɓe timmi, aybe maɓɓe yaafaama, ɓe keɓi diga juŋngo Allah ngeenaari hakkeeji maɓɓe cowi ɗiɗi.”
Goɗɗo ɗon hoola nder ladde: “Mo'inane Jawmiraawo laawol, mbaɗane Allah men buuwol darnuŋgol nder ladde hamaadaare
Waadiwol fuu towta, hooseere e towndiire fuu leesta. Lesdi kooseeje laato yayre, nokkuuje towɗe boo laato waadiwol.
Tedduŋgal Jawmiraawo waŋgan, yimɓe fuu ngi'an ɗum, ngam hunnduko Jawmiraawo wi'i ɗum
Goɗɗo wi'i: “Wooynu!” Mi ƴami: “Ɗume mi wooynata?” – “Wooynu: Yimɓe fuu nanndi bee fuɗŋgooji, ɗelko mum fuu bana pinndi ladde.
Fuɗŋgooji njooran, pinndi ɗaylan, to poofɗe Jawmiraawo puufi dow maajum. Fakat yimɓe nanndi bee fuɗŋgooji.
Fuɗŋgooji njooran, pinndi ɗaylan, ammaa wolde Allah meeɗen tabitan haa foroy
Wa'a dow hooseere townde, an Siyona, gaazoowo habaru seyo! Townu sawtu ma bee semmbe, an Urusaliima, gaazoowo habaru seyo! Townu sawtu, taa hul! Wi' gure Yahuuda: “Ndaa Allah mooɗon!”
Ndaa, Jawmiraawo Allah ɗon wara bee baawɗe. Baawɗe maako ke'i ngam laamaago. Ndaa, ngeenaari maako ɗon wondi bee maako, mbarjaari maako ɗon ardo mo
O duran tokkere maako bana gaynaako. O mooɓtan e o hoo'an mbaaloy dow juuɗe maako, o roondoto koy haa wiɓɓere maako. O ɗowan baali musinanɗi bee hakkiilo
Moy foondi ndiyamji nder newre mum? Moy heerori asamanji bee hapakaare? Moy foondi mbulwuldi duniyaaru fuu bee etirgal? Moy foondi kooseeje dow awnorɗum e towndiije bee taasaaje?
Moy foondi Ruuhu Jawmiraawo, moy woni dawroowo ekkitinɗo mo
Bee moy o waadi sawari haa o heɓa anndal? Moy ekkitini mo kiita ngooŋɗuka? Moy faamtini mo hikma? Moy anndini mo laawol faamu?
Ndaa, ummaatooje nanndi bee toɓɓere haa yaasi cafgal, teddeeŋga maaje bana teddeeŋga jaareeŋgel dow awnorɗum, duuɗe boo bana collaayel.
Laynde Libanon he'ataa huɓɓugo yiite ngam maako, dabbaaji maare ke'ataa ngam lii'aneego bana guleteeɗi.
Ummaatooje fuu laati meere yeeso maako, o ɗon laara ɗe bana meereejum koros.
Bee moy nanndinton Allah? Bee suura kaye nanndinton mo?
Ɓolinoowo ɓolinan lawru, tappoowo suddan ndu bee kaŋŋeeri, o waɗanan ndu callalluhoy cardi
Talakaajo mo waawataa hokkugo irin dokkal nga'al, suɓan leggal ngal nyolataa. Nden o ɗaɓɓitan cehoowo baawɗo, haa o sehana mo lawru ndu dimmbataako.
On anndaa ɗum na? On nanaay ɗum na? Ɓe ngeccaay on ɗum diga fuɗɗam na? On paamaay ɗum diga caɓɓuki duniyaaru na?
Kaŋko o ɗon jooɗi haa dow taarde duniyaaru, jooɗiiɓe nder maaru laati bana baɓɓatti. O ɗon we'ita asamanji, o ɗon yaajina ɗi bana suudu laymaaru, haa o wartira ɗi jooɗorde maako.
O ɗon laatina laamiiɓe huunde meere, o ɗon laatina hiitooɓe duniyaaru huunde meere.
Neeɓaay ɓe njube, neeɓaay ɓe aawe, neeɓaay leggal maɓɓe waɗi ɗaɗi nder lesdi, o fuufa dow maɓɓe, ɓe njooran. Henndu saatundu wiftoto ɓe bana nyaande.
Kadi, bee moy nanndinton Allah Ceniiɗo haa o nannda bee maako?

Tijje dow, ndaare! Moy tagi koode ɗe ngi'oton? Kaŋko yahrata ɗe fuu bana sooje'en haa konu, o ɗon ewno ɗe fuu innde bee innde. Ngam baawɗe maako mawɗe e semmbe maako ɗuuɗnde, walaa koo woore maaje majji.
Onon yimɓe Isra'iila, danygol Yaakubu, koni mbi'oton: “Joonde am suuɗanake Jawmiraawo, Allah hakkilantaa gooŋga am!”
On anndaa ɗum na? On nanaay ɗum na? Jawmiraawo, Allah duumiiɗo tagi keeri duniyaaru. O somataa, o tampataa, hakkiilo maako heɓtataake.
O ɗon hokka comɗo semmbe, o ɗon ɗuɗɗinana tampuɗo baawɗe.
