Ɓe ɗon njanca laamiiɓe, ɓe ɗon pijira mawɓe, ɓe ɗon njala koo berniwol cemmbiɗŋgol ngole, ɓe mbaagan lesdi ɗakki mahol maagol, nden ɓe nyaaman ngol.
Ɓaawo man ɓe tokkoto yeeso bana henndu, ɓe ndilla. Bana non ɓe aybini ko'e maɓɓe, semmbe maɓɓe laati ɗowanteeɗo maɓɓe.”
Yaa Jawmiraawo, naa an woni Allah am, Ceniiɗo am diga ɓooyma? An a maayataa! Yaa Jawmiraawo, a jo'ini yimɓe ɓe'e ngam hiitaago min. An tapaare hisnoore amin, a tabitini ɓe ngam ɓe ndartina min.
Gite ma ngi'ataa halleende, ngam ɗe ceniiɗe, a yiɗaa laarugo toonyaare. Ammaa ngam ɗume a munyanta zammbotooɓe? Ngam ɗume a ɗon jeeɗo to kalluɗo ɗon moɗa ɓurduɗo ɗum adilaaku?
A ɗon nanndina ɓiɓɓe Aadama bee liɗɗi nder mbeela, bee ladooji ɗi ngalaa ardiiɗo.
Kaldiya'en ɓe'e ɗon naŋnga yimɓe ɓe'e fuu bee kunayel, ɗon ndasa ɓe nder zubaawol, ɗon mooɓta ɓe nder arewal. Nden ɓe ɗon ceyo, ɓe ɗon mbelmbelta.
Ɓe ɗon lii'ano zubaawol kirseteeɗi, ɓe ɗon ngula uurle ngam arewal, ngam ɗum keɓni ɓe geɗal ɗuuɗŋgal e nyaamdu welndu.
Ngam man ɓe njuppata zubaaji maɓɓe, ɓe tokkitina mbargo ummaatooje goɗɗe bilaa enɗam na?
Sey mi wa'o haa nokkuure aynirde am, mi daro dow mahol ngam aynugo berniwol e anndugo ko Jawmiraawo wi'atammi e no o jaaborto siŋkuye am.
Jawmiraawo jaabi yam, wi'i: “Winndu wahayu mo ngi'ɗa. Winndu ɗum dow alluhaaje, haa ɗum jaŋnge bee koyɗum.
Wahayu man hiɓɓan to saa'i man yottake, ammaa ɗum ɗon yaawana timmoode, ɗum walaa fewre. To ɗum neeɓi, a munyana ɗum. Ngam ɗum laatoto fakat, ɗum neeɓataa sam
Ɓernde cooyɗo adilaaku ɗon mawnito, ammaa adiliijo yeeɗiran bee nuɗɗinki muuɗum
Fakat risku
Yimɓe ɓe'e fuu taaliran mo, ɓe njancan mo bee balndi e annditanamji, ɓe mbi'an: “Bone laatanto ɗuɗɗinanɗo risku mum bee kuuje ɗe o maraay. Ndey o accata yowango yimɓe doŋngal nyamaale?”
Law ɓe tokkiiɗa nyamaande ummoto, ɓillooɓe ma pinan. A laatoto keɓal konu maɓɓe.
Ngam an, a hippi ummaatooje ɗuuɗɗe, an boo ummaatooje luttuɗe fuu kippete, ngam a rufi ƴiiƴam yimɓe e a wonni lesdi e a toonyi berniwol e jooɗiiɓe nder maagol fuu.
Bone laatanto ɗaɓɓitanɗo riba kalluka ngam saare muuɗum, jo'inanɗo saɓɓo mum towɗum, ngam taa sarru heɓa ɗum.
Bee dabareeji ma a fooɗani saare ma toskaare, a waɗi hakke dow hoore ma bee nattingo ummaatooje ɗuuɗɗe.
Koo hayre nder mahol boo ɗon wooka dow maaɗa, bilorgol boo ɗon waɗa non.
Bone laatanto nyiɓanɗo wuro dow ƴiiƴam, jo'inanɗo berniwol dow caɓɓawal bee sooynde adilaaku muuɗum.
Kadi, kanjum ɗum iwaay haa Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama na? Nafuuda torra jama'aaje halkan nder yiite, ummaatooje goɗɗe boo ɗon coma meere.
Ngam duniyaaru heewan anndal tedduŋgal Jawmiraawo, bana ndiyam heewri mbeela
Bone laatanto jarnanɗo keeddiɗɗum'en, nyaɗinanɗo njaram muuɗum bana tooke ngam wuykingo ɓe, haa o laara temmbuki maɓɓe.
A haari bee toskaare, naa bee tedduŋgal. Sey a yara, an boo, a waŋgina saadooniiku ma. Jardugel tikkere nder juŋngo nyaamo Jawmiraawo loroto dow hoore maaɗa, tedduŋgal maaɗa laatoto toskaare mawnde.
Ngam toonyaare nde a toonyiri Libanon, loroto dow hoore ma, hippete. A halki dabbaaji goɗɗi, goɗɗi boo kulnete ngam a rufi ƴiiƴam yimɓe, a wonni lesdi e a toonyi berniwol e jooɗiiɓe nder maagol fuu.
Ɗume suura nafata haa cehoowo seha ka? Ɗume suura njamndi ɓolinaandi ngam ekkitingo fewre nafata? Ngam ɗume goɗɗo waɗata hoolaare mum haa labbi ɗi mbolwataa nde nii kaŋko waɗi ɗi bee juuɗe maako?
Bone laatanto bi'anɗo leggal: “Fin!” Malla hayre muukaare: “Umma!” Lawru waawi ekkitingo na? Yaasi maaru takkaama bee kaŋŋeeri e cardi, ammaa ngeendam walaa nder maaru koo seɗɗa.
Ammaa Jawmiraawo ɗon nder haykaliiru mum seniindu. Sey duniyaaru fuu sirwo yeeso maako.
Ndaa do'aare annabi Habakuk bee daande gimi boyki:
Yaa Jawmiraawo, mi nani habaru maaɗa.
Kuugal ma hulni yam, yaa Jawmiraawo.
Huuw kuugal man fahin nder zamanu amin,
waŋgin ngal nder nyalɗe ɓadiiɗe.
Koo nder tikkere ma boo taa accu hinnuye ma.
Allah ɗon wara diga Teman,
Ceniiɗo ɗon wara diga hooseere Paran.
Maŋngu maako ɗon sudda asama,
maŋgtoore maako ɗon hebbina lesdi.
Bana ɗelko annoora, laasi naaŋge ɗon ngurto juŋngo maako,
ton baawɗe maako ɗon cuuɗi.
Nyawu kalluŋgu ndaaɓoowu ɗon ardo mo,
yontere ɗon tokko palanɗe kosɗe maako.
O dari, o dimmbini lesdi.
O laari ummaatooje, ɗe ndiwni, kooseeje ɓooymaaje campiti,
towndiije ɓooymaaje ngibbi,
kanje ngoni laabi maako diga ɓooyma.
Mi yi'i sarru ukkani laymaaji Kusan,
laymaaji Mediyan ɗon ndiwna.
Yaa Jawmiraawo, tikkere ma ɗon saata dow maaje ndiyam
e ɓernuki ma dow mbeela na?
Ngam a wa'i pucci maaɗa,
a wa'i moota pucci nga jaalorgal ma.
A taaskitini lagaawal ma,
kuri ngoni kunayeeje ɗe mbolwuɗa.
A seeki lesdi bee maaje ndiyam.
Kooseeje ngi'i ma, ɗe ndiwni.
Ilamji mawɗi ɗon ila.
Luggeeŋga mbeela ɗon hoola,
ɗon ummina ƴuuge towɗe.
Naaŋge e lewru ndari haa nokkuuje muuɗum'en,
daliila annoora kuri ma piɗaaɗi
e jayŋgol labbo ma ɗelkanŋgo.
Bee tikkere caalortooɗa lesdi,
bee ɓernuki ndirɓirta ummaatooje.
A wurti ngam hisnugo ummaatoore ma e
ngam hisnugo moytaaɗo ma.
A yibbini suudu kalluɗo diga tiitol haa les,
a wirgi caɓɓaaje maaru fuu.
Bee kuri maɓɓe a sumpiti ko'e ardiiɓe honooɓe maako,
warɓe bee gookaali seyo ngam ɓe caŋkita min,
ɓe tammo ɓe nyaaman toonyaaɗo bee sirri.
Bee pucci ma njaaɓuɗa mbeela,
haa ilamji mawɗi mbaɗi nguufo.
Mi nani ɗum. Ɓanndu am fuu ɗon diwna,
hoolo maajum dimmbini hunnduko am,
i'e am tampi,
kosɗe am ɗon ndiwna les am.
Mi ɗon reena nyalaade ɓillaare bee de'ere,
haa nde wara dow ummaatoore hippotoonde min.
Koo to ibbi finnataa,
inabooje ndimataa,
jaytunhi rimataa ɓiɓɓe,
gese mbaɗataa nyaamle,
dammooji caŋkititto diga waalde,
na'i njinni diga waalde,
ammaa min mi seyorto Jawmiraawo,
mi welweltan ngam daliila Allah kisnoowo yam.
Jawmiraawo Baawɗo woni semmbe am,
o laatini kosɗe am bana ɗe lelji,
o ɗon waancinammi dow nokkuuje towɗe.
Ngam kaliifaajo gimi, bee moolooji
Jawmiraawo wolwani Sefaniya ɓii Kusi ɓii Gedaliya ɓii Amariya ɓii Hezekiya, nder zamanu Yusiya ɓii Amon, laamiiɗo Yahuuda, wi'i
“Mi nattinan ko woni dow lesdi fuu.
Mi nattinan yimɓe e dabbaaji, mi nattinan colli non boo liɗɗi nder maayo. Mi nattinan halluɓe e ko fergata ɓe, mi nattinan boo yimɓe dow lesdi.
Mi fortan juŋngo am ngam honugo Yahuuda e jooɗiiɓe haa Urusaliima. Mi nattinan luttuɗum diina Ba'al haa nokkuure nde'e, mi halkan inɗe liman'en lawru ndu'u.
Mi halkan wa'otooɓe dow soorowol ngam sujidango jayli asamanji e sujidanooɓe hunortooɓe ndego bee innde Jawmiraawo e ndego boo bee innde lawru Milkom.
Mi halkan loriiɓe, accuɓe yam, ngam ɓe ngiɗaa ɗakkotirgo bee am, ɓe ngiɗaa sarwaago yam sam.”
Cirwe yeeso Jawmiraawo Allah! Ngam nyalaade maako ɓaditake. O taaskitini kirseteeŋga, o seni ewnaaɓe maako.
Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Nyalaade nde lii'otoomi kirseteeŋga, mi hiitoto saraaki'en e yerima'en e ɓorniiɓe limce jananne fuu.
Nyalaade man kiitotoomi diwanɓe les dammugal
Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Nyalaade man gookaali mbaɗan haa dammugal bi'eteeŋgal Dammugal Liɗɗi e bojji haa Fattude Hesre e haraka dow towndiije.
Mboye, onon jooɗiiɓe Fattude Leesnde ngam filooɓe majji, awnooɓe cardi nattidi.
Saa'i man mbiɗitittoomi Urusaliima bee pittirlaaji, mi hiito mbaateendam'en hoolɗiniiɓe. Kamɓe ɓe ɗon mbi'a haa ɓerɗe maɓɓe: Jawmiraawo waɗataa ko wooɗi malla ko halli!
Woɗɓe njaɓtan jawdi maɓɓe, mbilan cuuɗi maɓɓe. Nden ɓe nyiɓtoto cuuɗi, ammaa ɓe njooɗataako ton. Ɓe njuboto inabooje, ammaa ɓe njarataa inaboojam maaje.”
Nyalaade Jawmiraawo mawnde ɓaditake, ɗon wara bee jaawɗum. To hoolo maare waɗi, koo annduɗo konu boo wookan.
Nde laatoto nyalaade tikkere, nyalaade ɓillaare e bone, nyalaade bonnonda e bonnuki, nyalaade nyiɓre e nyiɓɓuki, nyalaade duule e nyiɓre ɓaleere kurum,
nyalaade luwal konu e hoolo dow berniiji cemmbiɗɗi e kisruɗe towɗe.
Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Mi hulnan yimɓe haa ɓe njaha bana wumɓe, ngam ɓe mbaɗi hakke dow am. Ƴiiƴam maɓɓe waanjete koo toy bana mbulwuldi, teteki maɓɓe boo bana mbuuwri.”

Cardi maɓɓe e kaŋŋeeri maɓɓe kisnataa ɓe nyalaade nde tikkere Jawmiraawo waŋgata, nde yiite kaajal maako nyaamata duniyaaru. Ngam o timminan yimɓe lesdi, law o timminta ɓe. Ɗum laatoto kulniiɗum masin!
Mooɓte, kawte, onon yimɓe ummaatoore nde walaa semteende,
hiddeko on caŋkito, on majja bana nyaande
Ɗakkotire bee Jawmiraawo, onon leesɓe nder lesdi, waɗanɓe muuyo maako! Ɗaɓɓite adilaaku! Ɗaɓɓite yaŋkinaare! Teema on kisan nyalaade nde tikkere Jawmiraawo waŋgata.
Gaaza ferwan, Askalon laatoto ladde, konne'en ndiiwan yimɓe Asdod caka nyalawma, ɓe kalkan Ekuruun.
Kayto! Bone laatanto on, onon Kereti'en jooɗiiɓe kommbi mbeela! Ndaa ko Jawmiraawo wolwi dow mooɗon: “An Kanaana, lesdi Filisti'en, mi halkete, walaa koo gooto luttata nder maaɗa!”
Lesdi ma kommbi mbeela laatoto durduɗe, haa waynaaɓe ndurata, ndi heewan baalɗe ngam tokke dammooji.
Luttuɓe Yahuuda maran lesdi man, ɓe nduran tokke maɓɓe ton, kiikiiɗe boo ɓe njooɗo nder cuuɗi Askalon. Ngam Jawmiraawo Allah maɓɓe hinnoto ɓe, wartiran joonde maɓɓe bana naane
Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wi'i: “Mi nani jancoore Mo'ab e kuudi Ammooni'en, no ɓe njanciri yimɓe ummaatoore am, no ɓe mawnitori dow lesdi maɓɓe.

Ngam maajum min Allah mo Isra'iila'en cujidanta ɗum wi'i: Fakat bana mi geeto lesdi Mo'ab laatoto bana Sodoma, lesdi Ammooni'en boo bana Gomorra. Lesɗe ɗe'e laatoto nokkuure gi'e e wasarde mannda, ladde yeewnde haa foroy. Yimɓe am luttanɓe njaɓtan ɓe, luttuɗum ummaatoore am martan mardi maɓɓe
Ɗum waɗan daliila mawnitaare maɓɓe, ngam ɓe njanci yimɓe Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama, ɓe mawniti dow maɓɓe.
Jawmiraawo laatanto ɓe kulniiɗo, o halkan ɗowanteeɓe duniyaaru fuu. Jooɗiiɓe haa duuɗe cujidanan mo, koo moy haa nokkuure muuɗum
Onon Etiyopiya'en boo, kaafahi Jawmiraawo yuwan on
Jawmiraawo fortan juŋngo muuɗum gal woyla, o halkan Assuura, o wilan berniwol Niniwe, ngol laatoto ladde meere.

Tokke mbaaloto ton, non boo dabbaaji ɗuuɗɗi feere feere. Lamnjatal e camnagel mbaaloto caka daŋraŋge maagol. Colli ciikan haa burɗe cuuɗi, baagaaje kaa'e tan ngonata haa nastirde, daŋraŋge leɗɗe cemmbiɗɗe ɗoofete.

Bana non berniwol ceyiiŋgol koolɗiniiŋgol laatorto, ngol jooɗino jam, ngol wi'no: “Sey min, walaa berniwol potanŋgol bee am sam!” Ayye! Ngol laati ladde meere e waalorde kuuje ladde! Koo moy caalotooɗo haa maagol wemmboto, dimmban hoore mum
Bone laatanto berniwol tuurtoowol, coɓŋgol, toonyoowol yimɓe muuɗum!
Ngol ɗowtaaki, ngol jaɓaay elto, ngol hoolaaki Jawmiraawo, ngol ɓaditaaki Allah.
Saraaki'en caka maagol ɓe barooɗe ngurɓotooɗe, hiitooɓe maagol boo caafaali jaɓtanɗi saa'i kiikiiɗe, ɓe luttataa koo i'al gootal haa fajiri.
Annabi'en maagol ɓe elewɓe, rikici'en, liman'en maagol boo ɗon coɓna ceniiɗum, ɗon luuta tawreeta.
Ammaa Jawmiraawo o adiliijo caka maagol, o waɗataa kalluɗum. Nde weeti fuu, o ɗon ta'a kiita maako, o lelnataa ka sam. Ammaa kalluɗo walaa semteende!
Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Mi nattini ummaatooje, mi wili kisruɗe maaje. Laabi maaje perwi, walaa caalotooɗo ton! Gure maaje natti, walaa jooɗiiɗo ton!
Mi tammi: Jonta ngol hulatam sike, ngol jaɓan elto am. Nokkuure maagol wilatake! Nde mi hiiti yimɓe maagol fuu, ɓe tullitini kuuɗe maɓɓe.

Ngam maajum ndeeneeɗam”, non Jawmiraawo wi'i. “Ndeene nyalaade nde ndarotoomi ngam wullaago on. Mi annini mooɓtugo ummaatooje e hawtugo laamuuji ngam mi waanja tikkere am dow maajum. Yiite kaajal am nyaaman duniyaaru fuu.”
“Ɓaawo man ndokkanmi ummaatooje kunnduɗe laaɓɗe, haa yimɓe fuu ewno innde am, ɓe njaggano yam bee ɓernde woore.
Diga gaɗa maaje Etiyopiya, sujidanooɓe yam saŋkitiiɓe ngaddantam dokke.
Nyalaade man on meetataa semtoraago tuurtol mon dow am. Nder wakkati man nden ittanmi jurotooɓe mawnitiiɓe caka mooɗon, on meetataa mawnitaago dow hooseere am seniinde.
Mi luttanan hoore am ummaatoore ne'iinde laafunde caka mooɗon. Nde hisran bee innde Jawmiraawo.
Luttuɓe Isra'iila mbaɗataa kalluɗum, ɓe mbolwataa fewre, walaa bolle cargooje nder kunnduɗe maɓɓe. Bana tokkere ɓe ndurata, ɓe mbaaloto, walaa kulnanɗo ɓe
Sey on ngima, on mbelmbelta, onon yimɓe Isra'iila! An Urusaliima, seya, yimu bee ɓernde ma fuu!
Jawmiraawo itti kiita dow maaɗa, riiwi konne'en ma. Jawmiraawo, laamiiɗo Isra'iila, ɗon wondi bee maaɗa. Sarru hulnataa ma fahin.
Saa'i man Urusaliima nanan habaru ni'i: “Taa hul, Siyona, taa juuɗe ma tampa!
Jawmiraawo Allah maaɗa ɗon wondi bee maaɗa, o cemmbiɗɗo, kisnoowo. O seyorto ma bee welwelo, o hesɗitinte bee yiide, o welweltan ngam maaɗa bee gookaali seyo bana nder nyannde juulde.”
Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Mi ittanan on sarru, ngam taa toskaare maagu teddana on.
Ndaa, saa'i man kalkanmi ɓillooɓe on fuu. Mi wallan woosɓe, mi mooɓtan saŋkitiiɓe. Haa ɓe toski fuu, ton ndokkanmi ɓe tedduŋgal e daraja.
Saa'i man ngartiranmi on, mooɓtanmi on. Mi hokkan on tedduŋgal e daraja caka ummaatooje duniyaaru fuu, ngam mi wartiran joonde mooɗon bana naane, onon on ngi'an ɗum.” Non Jawmiraawo wi'i.

Nder nduuɓu laamiiɗo Dariyus ɗiɗaɓu, lewru joweegooru, nyannde go'oore maaru, Jawmiraawo wolwani Zorobaabila ɓii Salatiyel, ngomna dow Yahuuda e Yosuwa ɓii Yocadak, hooreejo liman'en, bee hunnduko annabi Haggay. O wi'i
“Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wi'i: Ummaatoore nde'e ɗon wi'a, wakkati nyiɓtaago haykaliiru Jawmiraawo waɗaay tawon.”
Nden Jawmiraawo wi'i bee hunnduko annabi Haggay:
“Ɗum saa'i ngam mooɗon haa njooɗooɗon nder cuuɗi ɓasaaɗi leɗɗe, asee boo haykaliiru am ɗon wili na?
Jonta ndaa nii Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wi'i: Numte kuuɗe mon!

On aawi ɗuuɗɗum, ammaa on codi pamarum. On nyaami, ammaa on kaaraay. On njari, ammaa ɗam ittaay suuno mooɗon. On ɗon ɓorni, ammaa on ɗon maata jaaŋgol. Kuuwanɗo ngam ngeenaari ɗon jaɓa rufa ndi nder booro sumpitaaŋgo.
Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wi'i: Numte kuuɗe mon!
Mba'e dow hooseere, ngadde leɗɗe, nyiɓte haykaliiru. Kanjum seynatammi, ɗum teddintam boo.
On tammi on keɓan ɗuuɗɗum, ammaa ndaa, on keɓi pamarum. Nde on koori ɗum haa saare, mi wifti ɗum. Ngam ɗume kuuwmi ɗum? Ngam haykaliiru am laatiindu bille, saa'i on ɗon cukli bee cuuɗi mooɗon.
Ngam maajum asamanji njogitani on saawawre, lesdi boo jogitani on ƴaamle.
Mi umri hokkere waɗa dow lesdi e kooseeje e dow demetirle e ko lesdi fuɗnata fuu. Ngam daliila hokkere man, inaboojam e nebbam pamɗiti, yimɓe e dabbaaji boo njari bone, kuuɗe ɗe kuuwɗon fuu mbonni.”

Zorobaabila ɓii Salatiyel e Yosuwa ɓii Yocadak, hooreejo liman'en e yimɓe luttuɓe nder ummaatoore fuu nanani Jawmiraawo Allah muuɗum'en, waato bolle ɗe Jawmiraawo Allah maɓɓe neli annabi Haggay wolwango ɓe. Ummaatoore fuu ɗowtani Jawmiraawo.
Nden Haggay, nelaaɗo Jawmiraawo yecci yimɓe ummaatoore ni'i: “Jawmiraawo wi'i: Mi ɗon wondi bee mooɗon.”

Jawmiraawo suusɗini Zorobaabila ɓii Salatiyel, ngomna dow Yahuuda e Yosuwa ɓii Yocadak hooreejo liman'en e yimɓe luttuɓe nder ummaatoore fuu. Ɓe ngari, ɓe kuuwi haa haykaliiru Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama.
Ɗum waɗi nder nyannde noogas e nayaɓre haa lewru joweego'ooru, nder nduuɓu laamiiɗo Dariyus ɗiɗaɓu.
Nder lewru joweeɗiɗaɓru, nyannde noogas e go'oore maaru, Jawmiraawo wolwani annabi Haggay:
“Wolwan Zorobaabila ɓii Salatiyel, ngomna dow Yahuuda e Yosuwa ɓii Yocadak, hooreejo liman'en e yimɓe luttuɓe nder ummaatoore fuu, yeccu ɓe:
Moy caka mooɗon onon luttuɓe yi'nooɓe tedduŋgal haykaliiru naane? E noy ndaarɗon ndu jonta? Naa ndu laati bana huunde meere haa gite mooɗon na

Jawmiraawo wi'i: An Zorobaabila, sey a semmbiɗa jonta. An boo, Yosuwa ɓii Yocadak hooreejo liman'en, sey a semmbiɗa. Onon yimɓe lesdi fuu, sey on cemmbiɗa. Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wi'i: Kuuwe, ngam mi ɗon wondi bee mooɗon,
fodde alkawal ngal kaɓɓumi bee kaakiraaɓe mooɗon, saa'i ɓe ngurti Misra. Jonta boo, Ruuhu am ɗon caka mooɗon, taa kule
Ngam ndaa nii Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wi'i: Nii seɗɗa mi dimmban asamanji e lesdi, mbeela e lesdi njoorndi
Mi dimmban ummaatooje fuu, nden kuuje maaje marɗe saman ngaran haa ɗo. Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wi'i: Mi hebbinan haykaliiru ndu'u bee tedduŋgal.
Cardi e kaŋŋeeri, min jeyi. Non Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wi'i.
Tedduŋgal haykaliiru ɗiɗawru ndu'u ɓuran ngal aranndu. Mi jo'inan salaaman e hayru haa nokkuure nde'e”, non Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wi'i.
Nder nduuɓu Dariyus ɗiɗaɓu, lewru joweenayaɓru, nyannde noogas e nayaɓre, Jawmiraawo wolwani annabi Haggay.
Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wi'i: “Ƴam liman'en ko ɓe anndi dow haala ka'a:
To goɗɗo saawi kusel cenaaŋgel nder gawargal limce muuɗum, nden limce man meemi tamseere, koo nyaamdu defaandu, koo inaboojam, koo nebbam, koo nyaamdu woondu, ɗum senoto na?” Liman'en njaabi: “Aa'a!”
Haggay tokki ƴamugo: “To goɗɗo soɓi bee meemugo maayɗo, nden meemi woore nder kuuje ɗe'e, nde soɓan na?” Liman'en njaabi: “Nde soɓan
Nden Haggay wi'i: “Jawmiraawo wi'i: Bana non yimɓe ummaatoore nde'e laatori yeeso am, bana non kuugal juuɗe maɓɓe fuu wa'i. Ko ɓe lii'anto yam ton fuu, soɓi.
Ammaa jonta, kakkilane ko waɗete diga hannde yahugo yeeso. Hiddeko on mballina hayre dow hayre haa haykaliiru Jawmiraawo,
nde goɗɗo wari haa waagaare nde o tammoto muudooje noogas, sappo tan o tawi. Nde goɗɗo wari haa ɓiɗɗirde inaboojam ngam nyeɗugo bulki cappanɗe jowi, noogas tan o tawi.
Mi nattini nafuuda kuuɗe juuɗe mon fuu, mi yoorni alkamaaje mon, mi wonni kuuje mon bee nyawuji e mallimallooje, ammaa on lortaaki haa am, non Jawmiraawo wi'i:
Kakkilane ko waɗete diga hannde yahugo yeeso, waato diga nyannde noogas e nayaɓre nder lewru joweenayaɓru, nde on mballini caɓɓawal haykaliiru Jawmiraawo, kakkilane ɗu'um:
Aawdi jinni haa beembal na? Inabohi e ibbi e rummaanoohi e jaytunhi ndimaay na? Ammaa diga hannde puɗɗanmi barkiɗingo on.”
Fahin Jawmiraawo wolwani Haggay nder nyannde noogas e nayaɓre lewru man, o wi'i:
“Wolwan Zorobaabila, ngomna dow Yahuuda, yeccu mo: Mi dimmban asamanji e lesdi,
mi yibbinan leese laamuuji, mi halkan baawɗe laamuuji ummaatooje, mi do'an mootaaji pucci e wa'iiɓe ɗi. Wa'iiɓe pucci mbarmbartiran bee kaafahi, ɓe ndo'oto bee pucci maɓɓe.
Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wi'i: Nyalaade man mi hoo'ete, an Zorobaabila ɓii Salatiyel, jaggiiɗo am, mi laatinte bana haatummeere am, ngam an woni cuɓaaɗo am.” Non Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wi'i.
Nder nduuɓu Dariyus laamiiɗo Persiya ɗiɗaɓu, nder lewru joweetataɓru, Jawmiraawo wolwani annabi Zekariya ɓii Berekiya, taaniraawo Iddo ni'i
“Min Jawmiraawo mi tikkani kaakiraaɓe mooɗon masin.
Wi' ɓe, ndaa ko Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wi'i: Lorte haa am, nden min boo mi lortoto haa mooɗon.

Taa laate bana kaakiraaɓe mon. Annabi'en ɓooyma ngooynani ɓe: Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wi'i: Lorte e laabi mooɗon kalluɗi, tuube, acce kuuɗe mooɗon kalluɗe! Ammaa ɓe nanaay, ɓe kakkilanaay wolde am.
Toy kaakiraaɓe mooɗon? Annabi'en boo ɗon ngeeɗa haa foroy na?

Ammaa mi ukkani kaakiraaɓe mooɗon naalooje fodde bolle am e farillaaji am ɗum umrumi sukaaɓe am annabi'en. Nden ɓe lorti, ɓe mbi'i: Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama anninino waɗugo min fodde laabi amin e kuuɗe amin, non o waɗi boo.”
Nyalaade noogas e nayaɓre nder lewru sappo e go'ooru, waato lewru Sebat, nder nduuɓu Dariyus ɗiɗaɓu dow laamu, Jawmiraawo wolwani annabi Zekariya ɓii Berekiya, taaniraawo Iddo bana ni'i:
Haŋki ngi'mi kayɗiniiɗum: Goɗɗo ba'iiɗo puccu mboɗeewu ɗon dari caka leɗɗe asuraaje
Mi ƴami malaa'ikaajo bolidanɗo bee am: “Pucci ɗi'i ɗum ɗume, barkaama?” O jaabi yam: “Mi faamtinte haala maaji.”
Ba'iiɗo puccu caka asuraaje go wi'i: “Wa'iiɓe ɗi ngoni ɓe Jawmiraawo neli ngam ɓe taaroya duniyaaru.”
Ɓe mbolwani malaa'ikaajo ba'iiɗo puccu caka asuraaje go: “Min taaroyi duniyaaru fuu, ndu ɗon de'i siriw.”
Nden malaa'ikaajo Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Yaa Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama, ndey enɗata Urusaliima e gure Yahuuda? A tikkani ɗe duuɓi cappanɗe joweeɗiɗi jonta.”
Jawmiraawo jaabi malaa'ikaajo bolidanɗo bee am bee bolle booɗɗe, de'itinooje.
Nden malaa'ikaajo oo wi'i yam: “Wooynu ni'i: Ndaa ko Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wi'i: Mi mari yiide haajunde masin dow Urusaliima e Siyona.
Mi heewi tikkere dow ummaatooje koolɗiniiɗe, ngam saa'i mi tikkanino berniwol Urusaliima seɗɗa, ammaa ɗe ɓesdi sarru maagol.
Ngam man Jawmiraawo wi'i: Mi wartanan Urusaliima bee enɗam. Haykaliiru am nder maagol nyiɓtete, berniwol Urusaliima mahititte. Non Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wi'i.
Kadiboo wooynu: Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wi'i: Berniiji am keewan kuuje booɗɗe fahin. Jawmiraawo de'itinan Siyona, o suɓan Urusaliima fahin.”
Mi tijji, mi yi'i luwe nayi.
Mi ƴami malaa'ikaajo bolidanɗo bee am: “Luwe ɗe'e ɗum ɗume?” O jaabi yam: “Kanje ngoni luwe caŋkititɗe Yahuuda e Isra'iila e Urusaliima.”
Kadiboo Jawmiraawo yi'ni yam kila'en nayo.

Mi ƴami: “Ɗume ɓe ngari waɗugo?” O jaabi: “Luwe go caŋkiti Yahuuda, haa walaa koo goɗɗo ɓaŋgti hoore mum. Ammaa kila'en ɓe'e ngari ngam hulnugo e do'ugo luwe go. Ngam ummaatooje ɓaŋgti ɗe dow lesdi Yahuuda, ngam saŋkititgo yimɓe maari.”
Mi tijji, mi yi'i goɗɗo ɗon jogi ɓoggol poondirgol.
Mi ƴami mo: “Toy njahataa?” O jaabi yam: “Haa Urusaliima, ngam foondugo noy njaajirka e noy njuutirka maagol.”
Saa'i malaa'ikaajo bolidanɗo bee am go ɗon yaha, malaa'ikaajo feere wari fotti bee maako.
Malaa'ikaajo bolidanɗo bee am go wi'i mo: “Yaawɗa law, yeccu suka jogiiɗo poondirgol go: Urusaliima taarnataake bee mahol, ngam yimɓe e dabbaaji nder maagol ɗuuɗan.
Jawmiraawo wi'i: Min bee hoore am mi faddan ngol bana mahol yiite. Haa caka maagol boo, mi waŋginan tedduŋgal am.”
Jawmiraawo wi'i yimɓe muuɗum: “Onon ɓe mi saŋkiti haa alkibilaaji nayi fuu, jonta kam ndogge, ngurte lesɗe woyla!
Onon yimɓe Urusaliima, dahaaɓe haa Baabila, njaawɗe wurtaago law haa ndaɗon.”
Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama mo neli yam wi'i dow ummaatooje jaɓtuɗe on kuuje: “Meemɗo on, meemi ɓiŋngel yiitere am!
Ndaa, mi ɓaŋgtan juŋngo am dow maɓɓe haa ɓe laato keɓal maccuɓe maɓɓe.” Nden on paaman Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama neli yam.
Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Ceye, mbelmbelte, onon yimɓe Urusaliima! Ngam mi ɗon wara haa mi jooɗo caka mooɗon.”
Nyalaade man ummaatooje ɗuuɗɗe ɗakkoto Jawmiraawo, ɗe laatoto ummaatoore maako. O jooɗoto caka mooɗon. Nden on paaman Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama neli yam haa mooɗon.
Yahuuda laatoto maral Jawmiraawo nder lesdi ceniindi fahin. Urusaliima boo wartan berniwol ngol o suɓi ɗum fahin.
Sey koo moy fuu sirwo yeeso Jawmiraawo! Ngam o ummake diga jooɗorde maako seniinde.
Nden Jawmiraawo yi'ni yam Yosuwa, hooreejo liman'en. O ɗon dari yeeso malaa'ikaajo Jawmiraawo. Sayɗaanu boo ɗon dari haa nyaamo maako ngam wullaago mo
Malaa'ikaajo Jawmiraawo wi'i mo: “Jawmiraawo telɓane, an Sayɗaanu! Jawmiraawo cuɓɗo Urusaliima telɓane! Goɗɗo oo nanndaay bee doccal gurtinaaŋgal diga yiite na?
Yosuwa ɗonno ɓorni limce tunwuɗe, saa'i o ɗonno dari yeeso malaa'ikaajo.
Malaa'ikaajo umri suka'en wonduɓe bee muuɗum: “Ɓorte mo limce tunwuɗe ɗe'e.” Nden o wi'i Yosuwa: “Ndaa, mi ittani ma aybe maaɗa, mi ɓornante limce jaage.”
O wi'i: “Meete mo meetaleewol laaɓŋgol!” Ɓe meeti ngol dow hoore maako. Nden ɓe ɓorni mo limce laaɓɗe. Malaa'ikaajo Jawmiraawo ɗon dari.
Ɓaawo man malaa'ikaajo Jawmiraawo umri Yosuwa:

“Ndaa ko Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wi'i: To a tokkake laabi am, to a ɗowtanake umrooje am, nden mi laatinte kaliifaajo haykaliiru am e dalde maaru. Mi duŋante ngam ndaroɗa kal-kal bee huuwooɓe am dariiɓe ɗo.
Nan, an Yosuwa hooreejo liman'en, nane onon hawtiɗiraaɓe maako boo. On laati alaama mbooɗka ka'a: Mi waddan suka am bi'eteeɗo Fuɗŋgo

Ndaa hayre nde mi wallinta yeeso Yosuwa. Dow hayre nde'e, woodi gite joweeɗiɗi. Min bee hoore am, mi winndan binndol dow maare. Mi ittan aybeeji lesdi ndi'i nder nyalaade woore. Non Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wi'i.
Nyalaade man on ewnotirto ngam jooɗaago jam les inabooje mooɗon e les ibbe mooɗon. Non Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wi'i.
Malaa'ikaajo bolidannooɗo bee am lorti haa am, findini yam bana goɗɗo findinirte e ɗoyŋgol mum.

O ƴami yam: “Ɗume ngi'ata?” Mi jaabi: “Mi ɗon yi'a jo'inirɗum pittirlaaji, ɗum fuu man ɗum kaŋŋeeri, bee taasawo dow maajum. Haa dow taasawo boo woodi pittirlaaji joweeɗiɗi. Pittirla koo kaye fuu woodi kuɓɓirɗe joweeɗiɗi.
Woodi boo jaytunje ɗiɗi baŋnge taasawo. Jaytunhi gooti haa wakeere nyaamre, gooti boo haa wakeere nannde
Mi ƴami malaa'ikaajo bolwananɗo yam go: “Barkaama, ɗume jaytunje ɗe'e anndinta?”
O jaabi yam: “A anndaa ko ɗum yiɗi anndingo na?” Mi wi'i: “Mi anndaa, naywa.”
Malaa'ikaajo wi'i yam: “Ndaa wolde Jawmiraawo ngam Zorobaabila: A hiɓɓintaa kaliifaaku maaɗa bee cuusal malla bee semmbe maaɗa, ammaa sey bee Ruuhu am tan! Non Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wi'i
An hooseere mawnde, a ɗume? A laatoto waadiwol yeeso Zorobaabila. O wurtinan hayre talkumoore diga maaɗa. Yimɓe koolan: Kay, nde wooɗi! Kay, nde wooɗi!”
Jawmiraawo wolwani yam fahin, o wi'i:
“Juuɗe Zorobaabila mballini caɓɓawal haykaliiru. Kanje lamsinta ndu boo.” Non annditirton Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama neli yam haa mooɗon.
“Mo yawi fuɗɗoode kuuje pamare, seyorto yi'ugo hayre timminirde suudu haa juuɗe Zorobaabila.” Malaa'ikaajo wi'i yam: “Pittirlaaji joweeɗiɗi go ngoni gite Jawmiraawo daaranɗe duniyaaru fuu.”
Nden mi ƴami malaa'ikaajo: “Jaytunje ɗiɗi haa nyaamre e nannde jo'inirɗum pittirlaaji, ɗum ɗume?
Fahin ƴammoomi: “Ɗume lice jaytunje ɗiɗi baŋnge ilnirɗe ɗe kaŋŋeeri ilnooje nebbam sayeejam anndinta?”
O wi'i yam: “A anndaa ko ɗum yiɗi anndingo na?” Mi jaabi: “Mi anndaa, barkaama.”
Nden o wi'i yam kadi: “Kanje ngoni yimɓe ɗiɗo, moytaaɓe hoore bee nebbam ngam huuwango Jawmu duniyaaru fuu.”
Mi tijji fahin, mi yi'i deftere taggaande, ɗon fiira.
Malaa'ikaajo ƴami yam: “Ɗume ngi'ata?” Mi jaabi: “Mi ɗon yi'a deftere taggaande ɗon fiira. Njuutirka maare waɗi meetir sappo (10), njaajirka maare boo meetir jowi (5).”

O wi'i yam: “Ɗum naaloore tammiinde ukkanaago duniyaaru fuu. Haa wakeere woore ɗum winndaama: Koo moy wujji, o diiweteeɗo diga lesdi. Haa wakeere ndeya boo ɗum winndaama: Koo moy huni dow fewre, o diiweteeɗo bana non.
Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wi'i: Mi neldi naaloore nde'e ngam haa nde nasta suudu gujjo e suudu kunotooɗo dow fewre bee innde am. Nde jooɗoto ton, haa nde halkida kuuje fuu, koo piile e kaa'e fuu.”
Malaa'ikaajo bolidanɗo bee am ɓaditi, wi'i yam: “Tijja, laar ko waŋgata to!”
Mi ƴami mo: “Ɗum ɗume?” O jaabi: “Ko waŋgata ton, ɗum etirgal.” O tokki wi'ugo: “Ɗum aybeeji yimɓe dow lesdi fuu.”
Nden maɓɓoode nde dalma
Malaa'ikaajo wi'i: “Kaŋko woni zunuuba.” Nden o wudini mo nder etirgal, o maɓɓi ngal bee maɓɓorde dalma go.
Nde mi tijji fahin, mi yi'i rewɓe ɗiɗo ɗon mbaŋga. Ɓe ngoodi bileeji bana ɗi ngaasiyoowal, henndu wifi caka maaji. Ɓe ndoondi etirgal go, ɓe dilliri ngal hakkunde lesdi e asama.
Mi ƴami malaa'ikaajo bolidanɗo bee am: “Toy ɓe njahrata ngal?”
O jaabi yam: “Woɗɓe ɗon nyiɓana debbo go suudu haa Sine'ar
Mi tijji fahin, mi yi'i mootaaji pucci nayi. Ɗi ngurti hakkunde kooseeje ɗiɗi ɗe njamndi mboɗeeri.
Pucci boɗeeji ɗon kaɓɓindiri haa moota arana, haa ɗiɗaɓa boo ɓaleeji
Haa tataɓa ɗum pucci daneeji, haa nayaɓa boo ɗum pucci biidiiji
Mi ƴami malaa'ikaajo bolidanɗo bee am: “Ɗume kanji boo ɗi anndinta, barkaama?”
O jaabi ƴam: “Ɗum keni asama nayi. Ɗi ɗonno ndari yeeso Jawmu duniyaaru fuu. Jonta kam ɗi ɗon ndilla
Pucci ɓaleeji kaɓɓindiraaɗi haa moota go ndilli gal lesdi woyla. Daneeji tokki ɗi ɓaawo, ndilli gal hiirnaaŋge, nden biidiiji ndilli gal Lesdi Fombina.
Pucci boɗeeji
Nden o ewni yam, o wi'i: “Laar, dilluɗi lesdi woylaari njippinan Ruuhu am
Jawmiraawo wolwani yam wi'i:
“Jaɓ dokke haa juuɗe Helday e Tobiya e Yada'ya, ɗe dahaaɓe iwɓe diga Baabila ngaddi. An bee hoore maaɗa nastu hannde nden haa saare Yosiya ɓii Sefaniya.
Hoo'u cardi e kaŋŋeeri, waɗ meetaleewol bee maaji. Meetu ngol dow hoore Yosuwa ɓii Yocadak, hooreejo liman'en.
Nden wi' mo: Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wi'i: Woodi goɗɗo mo innde muuɗum Fuɗŋgo haa ɗo. O fuɗan haa nokkuure nde o daroto, o nyiɓan haykaliiru Jawmiraawo
Kaŋko nyiɓata haykaliiru Jawmiraawo. O ɓornoto tedduŋgal. O jooɗoto dow leeso laamu maako ngam o laamo. Limanjo goɗɗo wonan haa nyaamo maako. Narral timmuŋgal laatoto hakkunde maɓɓe
Ammaa fawnere go walline nder haykaliiru Jawmiraawo, ngam ciftinorki Helday e Tobiya e Yeda'ya e ngam ciftinorki mbooɗeeŋga Yosiya ɓii Sefaniya.”
Yimɓe ngaran diga daayiiɗum, ɓe nyiɓto haykaliiru Jawmiraawo. Non annditirton Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama neli yam haa mooɗon. Ɗum laatoto to on ɗowtanake wolde Jawmiraawo bee gooŋga.
Nder nduuɓu laamiiɗo Dariyus nayaɓu, nyalaade nayaɓre nder lewru joweenayaɓru wi'eteendu Kislew, Jawmiraawo wolwani Zekariya.
Saa'i man yimɓe Baytila nelno Sareser e Regem-Melek bee yimɓe woɗɓe ngam ɓe toro Jawmiraawo,
ɓe ƴama liman'en huuwanɓe nder haykaliiru Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama e annabi'en: “Min tokko woyugo e suumaago nder lewru jowaɓru bana min ɗonno mbaɗa duuɓi ɗuuɗɗi na?”
Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wolwani yam, wi'i:
“Yeccu yimɓe lesdi e liman'en fuu: Saa'i on cuumi, on mboyi nder lewru jowaɓru e nder lewru joweeɗiɗaɓru, duuɓi cappanɗe joweeɗiɗi, bee gooŋga cuumɗon ngam am na?
Nde on nyaami, on njari, on nyaamaay e on njaraay ngam mooɗon na?”

Bolle ɗe'e Jawmiraawo wi'no bee kunnduɗe annabi'en ɓooyma boo. Saa'i maajum yimɓe ɗonno njooɗi haa Urusaliima, ɗonno koolɗini, non boo haa gure maagol taariiɗe ngol e Lesdi Fombina e towndiije hiirnaaŋge fuu.
Jawmiraawo wolwani Zekariya ni'i:
Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wi'i: “Mbaɗe kiita ngooŋɗuka, mboonindire, enɗindire hakkunde mooɗon.
Taa toonye atiime'en e rewɓe yurumɓe e hoɗɓe e talaka'en. Taa koo moy nufano goɗɗo kalluɗum.”
Ammaa yimɓe cali nanugo. Ɓe ngayliti ɓaawo, ɓe cukki noppi maɓɓe ngam taa ɓe nana.

Ɓe caatini ɓerɗe maɓɓe bana hayre saatunde, ngam taa ɓe nana tawreeta e bolle, ɗum ko Ruuhu Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama umrani ɓe bee kunnduɗe annabi'en ɓooyma. Kanjum waɗi tikkere Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama saati masin.
Ngam maajum Jawmiraawo mo asama wi'i: “Mi ewni ɓe, ammaa ɓe nanaay. Nden kamɓe ɓe ewni yam, ammaa min mi nanaay.
Mi saŋkiti ɓe caka ummaatooje koo ɗeye fuu ɗe ɓe anndaano. Lesdi wilaama ɓaawo dilluki maɓɓe, walaa caalotooɗo ton. Ɓe ngartiri lesdi mboondi go ladde meere.”
Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wolwani yam, wi'i:
“Min Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama, mi woodi yiide haajunde masin ngam Siyona. Nde ɗon wula nder am jaw bana yiite.”
Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Mi wartan haa Siyona, mi jooɗoto haa caka Urusaliima. Innde Urusaliima laatoto Berniwol-Gooŋga, innde hooseere Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama boo laatoto Hooseere-Seniinde.”
“Min Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama mi wi'i: Ndotti'en worɓe e fulerewɓe njooɗoto fahin haa laabi Urusaliima. Koo moy maɓɓe woodi sawru haa juŋngo muuɗum ngam ɗuuɗeeŋga balɗe muuɗum.
Babe berniwol keewan ɓikkoy, ngorkoy e ndehoy, koy pijan ton.”
Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wi'i: “To ɗum laatani luttuɓe yimɓe ɓe'e kayɗiniiɗum nder nyalɗe man, ɗum laatanto yam min boo kayɗiniiɗum na?”
Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wi'i: “Ndaare, mi hisnan yimɓe am diga lesdi fuunaaŋgeeri e lesdi hiirnaaŋgeeri.
Mi wartiran ɓe, ngam ɓe njooɗo nder Urusaliima. Ɓe laatoto yimɓe ummaatoore am, min boo mi laatoto Allah maɓɓe nder gooŋgaaku e adilaaku.”
Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wi'i: “Cemmbiɗine juuɗe mooɗon, onon nanɓe bolle ɗe'e haa kunnduɗe annabi'en nder saa'iire nde'e, nder nyalaade nde ɓe mballini caɓɓaaje ngam nyiɓtaago haykaliiru am.
Ngam hiddeko nyalɗe ɗe'e ngara, walaa mo yoɓanno kuuwoowo. Dabbaaji boo kuuwi meere. Daliila konne'en, walaa mo waɗata jahaaŋgal nder hoolɗinaare. Mi acci yimɓe fuu, koo moy ummani tanum.
Min Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama mi wi'i: Jonta kam mi laatantaako luttuɓe yimɓe ɓe'e bana laatoriimi nder nyalɗe caaliiɗe.
Jonta kam, mi waddanan lesdi mon jam, inabooje ndiman, lesdi waɗan nyaamle, asama toɓnan iyeende. Hayruuji ɗi'i fuu mi hokkan ɗi luttuɓe ummaatoore nde'e haa ɓe mara ɗi.
Onon yimɓe Yahuuda e Isra'iila, bana no on laatorino alaama naaloore caka ummaatooje, bana non on laatorto alaama barka, ngam mi hisnan on. Taa kultore, ammaa cemmbiɗine juuɗe mooɗon!”
Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wi'i: “Mi anninino ukkanaago on sarru, ngam kaakiraaɓe mon tikkini yam, mi mimsitaaki boo.
Ammaa jonta mi annini woonango Urusaliima e yimɓe Yahuuda. Taa kultore sam!
Ndaa ko ngiɗmi on mbaɗa: Mbolwindire gooŋga, ta'e kiita gooŋgaaha haa babe kiita, ngam haa jam tabito
Taa koo moy nufano keeddiɗɗum kalluɗum nder ɓernde mum, taa ngiɗe hunayeere fewre, ngam mi ɗon wanya ɗum fuu. Min Allah Jawmiraawo wi'i ɗum.”
Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wolwani yam,
wi'i: “Suumaago nder lewru nayaɓru e jowaɓru e joweeɗiɗawru e sappooru laatanto yimɓe ummaatoore Yahuuda nyalɗe juulɗe e welwelo e seyo. Ammaa ngiɗe gooŋgaaku e salaaman.”
Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wi'i: “Fakat, ummaatooje e yimɓe jooɗiiɓe berniiji ɗuuɗɗi ngaran haa ɗo.
Jooɗiiɓe nder berniwol ngo'ol njahan haa jooɗiiɓe nder berniwol ngola, mbi'an: Njemmen toroyaago Jawmiraawo, pottoyen bee Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama. Min boo mi yahan.
Ummaatooje ɗuuɗɗe e cemmbiɗɗe ngaran haa Urusaliima ngam fottugo bee Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama e toraago mo.
Saa'i man yimɓe sappo wolwanɓe ɗemɗe feere feere njogoto limce Yahuuduujo gooto, ɓe mbi'a: Min njahdan bee mooɗon, ngam min nani Allah ɗon wondi bee mooɗon.”
Ɗo woni koŋngol Jawmiraawo. Jawmiraawo wolwi dow lesdi Hadarak, berniwol Damas boo woni jipporde wolde man. Jawmiraawo mari gure Siriya
O ɗon wolwa dow Hamat, kommbi Damas, non boo dow Tirus e Sidon, berniiji marɗi hikma.
Tirus mahi mahol paddirgol. Ngol mooɓti cardi bana mbulwuldi e kaŋŋeeri laaɓndi boo bana loope dow laawol.
Ammaa Jawmiraawo hoo'an ngol, o yibbinan mahol paddirgol maagol nder mbeela, yiite nyaaman ngol
To berniwol Askalon yi'i ɗum, ngol hultoran, Gaaza diwtoran masin ngam kulol. Non boo Ekuruun, ngam ngol sooyan tammunde ballal. Laamiiɗo wonataa haa Gaaza, walaa goɗɗo jooɗoto haa Askalon.
Njaalu'en njooɗoto haa Asdod. Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Mi nattinan mawnitaare Filisti'en.

Mi wiftan diga kunnduɗe maɓɓe kusel marŋgel ƴiiƴam e diga caka nyii'e maɓɓe boo coɓŋgel lii'anaaŋgel labbi. Kamɓe boo ɓe laatoto luttuɓe ɓe Allah meeɗen, ɓe laatoto bana yeɓre lenyol gonŋgol nder Yahuuda. Jooɗiiɓe Ekuruun boo nastan caka yimɓe am bana Yebusi'en mbaɗno

Min bee hoore am mi saŋnginan nder lesdi am ngam aynugo ndi. Mi faddan ndi ngam konne'en saalotooɓe. Walaa jananno koo gooto meetataa wargo haa yarna ummaatoore am bone, ngam jonta mi ɗon hakkilana nde.”
An berniwol Siyona, yimu bee seyo! An Urusaliima, welwelta! Ndaa, laamiiɗo maaɗa ɗon wara haa ma. O adiliijo, o jaaliiɗo. O jaŋkiniiɗo, ba'iiɗo wamnde, waato wamnde molde

O nattinan mootaaji pucci konu nder Efrayim, non boo pucci konu nder Urusaliima. O yewan lagaaje konu fuu. O tabitinan salaaman caka ummaatooje. Laamu maako yaajan diga mbeela nga'a haa ngaya, diga maayo Efratis haa keeri duniyaaru
Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Ngam daliila alkawal am bee mooɗon, tabitinaaŋgal bee ƴiiƴam ndufaaɗam, mi yooftan haɓɓaaɓe mooɗon diga ngaska ka walaa ndiyam.
Onon haɓɓaaɓe heewɓe tammunde, ngarte haa berniwol cemmbiɗŋgol. Mi ɗon anndina on ɗum hanndeere nde'e: Mi warjoto on mbooɗeeŋga cowi ɗiɗi dow boneeji ɗi njarɗon.
Mi wartiran lesdi Yahuuda bana lagaawal konu, Efrayim boo laatoto kurol. An Siyona, mi umminan ɓikkoy maaɗa ngam haa koy kippoya Yunaniŋke'en, mi laatinte bana kaafahi haa juŋngo cemmbiɗɗo.”
Nden Jawmiraawo waŋgan dow maɓɓe. Kurol maako ɗelkan bana ma'ere. Allah Jawmiraawo fuufan luwal konu, o yahan nder keni caatuɗi iwɗi fombina.

Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama aynan yimɓe mum. Ɓe kalkan konne'en, ɓe campitan kaa'e piɗaaɗe diga piwli, ɓe naman ɗe. Ɓe ndufan ƴiiƴam konne'en maɓɓe bana inaboojam. Ɓe ilnan ɗam bana ɗam kirsaaɗi nder taasaaje dufirɗe ƴiiƴam malla bana ƴiiƴam ndufaaɗam dow coɓɓuli hirsirde.
Nyalaade maajum Allah Jawmiraawo hisnan ummaatoore mum bana gaynaako hisnirta tokkere baali mum. Bana kaa'e ɗuuɗa-samanje haa meetaleewol laamiiɗo, non ɓe njaynirta haa lesdi maako.
Ɓe ceyoto, ɓe laatoto ŋarniiɓe! Alkamaari semmbiɗinan sukaaɓe, inaboojam kesam boo faanyɓe.
Tore Jawmiraawo, o hokka on iyeende saa'i nduŋngu. Kaŋko waɗata naargeeji, o toɓnanan on waabiliire. O fuɗnanan koo moy haakooji nder ngesa muuɗum.

Labbi ɗon carwo on fewre, hiila'en boo ɗon mbaɗa annabaakuuji pewooji. Koyɗi ɗi ɓe anndinta boo ngalaa saman. De'itinki maɓɓe ɗum huunde meere. Ngam maajum yimɓe ɗon ngiilo bana baali, ɓe ɓillake ngam ɓe ngalaa gaynaako
Tikkere am saatanan waynaaɓe, mi ummanto jawɗi
Diga Yahuuda laamiiɓe feere feere ngurtoto. Ɓe semmbiɗɓe bana hayre talkumoore

Yimɓe Yahuuda nanndan bee honooɓe semmbiɗɓe, ɓe ndamman konne'en maɓɓe bana loope dow laawol. Non ɓe kaɓrata, ngam min Jawmiraawo mi ɗon wondi bee maɓɓe. Konne'en maɓɓe wa'iiɓe pucci, keewan semteende.

Mi semmbiɗinan yimɓe Yahuuda, mi rimɗinan yimɓe Yusufu. Mi hooran ɓe, ngam mi woodi enɗam ngam maɓɓe. Ɓe laatoto bana mi meeɗaayno wudingo ɓe sam. Min woni Jawmiraawo Allah maɓɓe, mi jaaban tornde maɓɓe.
Worɓe Efrayim laatoto honooɓe semmbiɗɓe. Ɓerɗe maɓɓe ceyoto bana to ɓe njari inaboojam. To ɓiɓɓe maɓɓe ngi'i ɗum, ɓe ceyoto, ɓerɗe maɓɓe keewan seyo daliila Jawmiraawo.
Mi ewnoto yimɓe ummaatoore am, ngam mooɓtugo ɓe. Mi rimɗinan ɓe. Ɓe ɗuuɗan fahin bana ɓe ɗuuɗiri naane.
Mi saŋkiti ɓe caka ummaatooje bana ɓe caakirta aawdi, ammaa nder lesɗe daayiiɗe ɓe ciftortam. Ɓe njooɗodotto bee ɓikkoy maɓɓe, nden ɓe ngartan.
Mi wartiran ɓe diga lesdi Misra e lesdi Assuura. Mi mooɓtan ɓe, mi yahran ɓe nder lesdi Gile'at e dow kooseeje Libanon. Ammaa haa ton boo, pellel famɗanan ɓe.
Ɓe eeroto Maayo Masiibo, min Jawmiraawo mi fiyan ƴuuge maago, koo nokkuuje lugguɗe ɗe Niil boo njooran. Nden mawnitaare Assuura leestan, baawɗe Misra nattan.
Mi semmbiɗinan ummaatoore am Isra'iila, Isra'iila tokkoto muuyo am. Min Jawmiraawo wi'i ɗum.
An Libanon, maɓɓitit dammuɗe maaɗa, haa yiite nyaama leɗɗe ma cemmbiɗɗe
Uuma, an lekki booɗki! Ngam leɗɗe cemmbiɗɗe ndo'ake, leɗɗe mawɗe ɗe'e nattidi! Mboye, onon leɗɗe mawɗe haa Baasan! Ngam laynde sukkunde nde goɗɗo waawataano nastugo nder maare fe'idaama!
Nane, waynaaɓe ɗon mboya, ngam durdude maɓɓe woonde halkaama. Barooɗe cemmbiɗɗe ɗon ubbo, ngam guuɓe cukkuɗe haa maayo Urdun mbonnaama.
Jawmiraawo Allah am wi'i yam: “Waynu baali taaskitinaaɗi ngam hirseego!
Soodooɓe ɗi ɗon kirsa ɗi, ɓe ndaarataa ɗum bana aybe. Soorrooɓe ɗi ɗon mbi'a: Useko Jawmiraawo, ndaa min ndiski! Koo waynaaɓe maaji boo ngalaa enɗam ngam maaji.”
Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Mi enɗataa jooɗiiɓe nder lesdi! Mi hokkan koo moy haa juŋngo keeddiɗɗum e juŋngo laamiiɗo mum. Kamɓe ɓe mbonnan lesdi, min boo mi hisnataa koo moye diga juuɗe maɓɓe.”
Mi duri baali ɗi soorrooɓe taaskitini ngam hirseego. Mi hoo'i cabbi ɗiɗi. Wooru maaji, mi ewni ndu: Mbooɗeeŋga, nduya boo: Kawtal. Nden mi tokki durugo tokkere.
Mi riiwi waynaaɓe tato nder lewru wooru. Nden mi fuɗɗi wanyugo baali, kanji boo ɗi cafti yam.
Nden kadi mi wi'i ɗi: “Mi durataa on fahin! Mbaatanɗi, mbaata! Majjanɗi, majja. Luttanɗi boo nyaamindira hakkunde maaji.”
Mi hoo'i sawru am: Mbooɗeeŋga go, mi yewi ndu. Bana non piistumi alkawal ngal Jawmiraawo haɓɓuno bee ummaatooje fuu.
Ngal fiistaama nyalaade man. Soorrooɓe baali hakkilananɓe yam go annditi ɗum wolde Jawmiraawo.
Nden kadi mi wi'i ɓe: “To ɗum fottani on, ndokkeeɗam ngeenaari am. To naa non boo, acce.” Ɓe ndokki yam ngeenaari am, ceede cardi cappanɗe tati.
Ɓe poondi yam mi ke'anɗo ngeenaari mboondi! Jawmiraawo wi'i yam: “Sakkinan ɗum ɓolinoowo.” Mi hoo'i ceede cardi cappanɗe tati go, mi sakkinani ɗe ɓolinoowo nder suudu Jawmiraawo.
Nden mi yewi sawru am ɗiɗawru wi'eteendu kawtal go. Bana non piistumi deerɗiraagu hakkunde Yahuuda e Isra'iila.
Jawmiraawo wi'i yam: “Hoo'u fahin kuuje kuugal gaynaako paataaɗo.
Ndaa, mi neloyan gaynaako goɗɗo haa lesdi. O suklantaako baali majjuɗi, o ɗaɓɓitittaa eerɗi, o hurgataa nyawɗi, o nyaamnataa jami. Ammaa o nyaaman kusel baali ɓurɗi fayugo, o seekan koloŋgi maaji.
Bone laatano gaynaako meereejo gudinanɗo tokkere! Kaafahi wara dow juŋngo maako e dow yiitere maako nyaamre! Juŋngo maako waata! Yiitere maako nyaamre wuma!”
Ɗo woni koŋngol Jawmiraawo dow Isra'iila. Jawmiraawo mo we'iti asamanji, mo saɓɓi lesdi, mo tagi ruuhu nder neɗɗo, wi'i:
“Ndaa, mi laatinan berniwol Urusaliima jardugel keewŋgel ɓernuki am. Ngol laatanto ummaatooje taariiɗe ngol fuu giilol. Yaake to ngol hippaama, hoore Yahuuda fuu yiilan.
Nder wakkati man laatinanmi Urusaliima bana hayre teddunde ngam ummaatooje fuu. Yiɗɓe eftugo nde fuu ɓoostoto. Nden ummaatooje duniyaaru fuu mooɓan ngam honugo ngol.
Nyalaade man mi hulnan pucci maɓɓe, mi yinnan wa'iiɓe ɗi. Mi maɓɓitan gite am dow Yahuuda ngam aynugo ɗum, ammaa mi wumnan pucci ummaatooje goɗɗe. Min Allah Jawmiraawo wi'i ɗum.
Nden mawɓe Yahuuda mbi'an nder ɓerɗe muuɗum'en: Jooɗiiɓe nder Urusaliima cemmbiɗi, ngam daliila Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama, Allah maɓɓe.

Nyalaade man laatinanmi mawɓe Yahuuda bana yiite njamnaaŋge les leɗɗe, bana jamre yiite caka ƴommbe. Ɓe nattinan ummaatooje taariiɗe ɓe fuu, gal nyaamo e nano fuu. Ammaa yimɓe Urusaliima tokkoto jooɗaago nder berniwol muuɗum'en.
Jawmiraawo aartan hisna ci'e
Saa'i man Jawmiraawo aynan jooɗiiɓe nder Urusaliima. Tampuɓe caka maɓɓe laatoto semmbiɗɓe bana Daawuda. Yimɓe danygol Daawuda boo laatanto ɓe bana Allah, bana malaa'ikaajo Jawmiraawo yeeso maɓɓe.
Nyalaade man mi halkan ummaatooje ukkantooɗe Urusaliima fuu.
Ammaa dow saare Daawuda e jooɗiiɓe nder Urusaliima mbaannjanmi ruuhu mbooɗeeŋga e do'a. Ɓe tijjoto yam ngam daliila am, min mo ɓe njuwi
Nyalaade man bojji ɗuuɗan haa Urusaliima, bana bojji daliila Hadad-Rimmon

Saare koo ndeye nder lesdi fuu sunoto feere mum. Yimɓe danygol saare Daawuda boo feere mum: Worɓe feere muuɗum'en e rewɓe maɓɓe feere muuɗum'en. Lenyol danygol saare Natan feere mum: Worɓe feere muuɗum'en e rewɓe boo feere muuɗum'en.
Yimɓe danygol saare Lewi feere mum'en. Worɓe feere muuɗum'en e rewɓe maɓɓe feere muuɗum'en. Yimɓe danygol saare Sim'i feere mum'en. Worɓe feere muuɗum'en e rewɓe maɓɓe feere muuɗum'en.
Non boo ci'e luttuɗe fuu: Worɓe feere muuɗum'en e rewɓe maɓɓe feere muuɗum'en.”
“Nyalaade maajum saare Daawuda e jooɗiiɓe nder Urusaliima keɓan seeɓoore maɓɓitiinde ngam lootugo hakke e coɓɗum fuu.”
Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wi'i: “Saa'i man nattinanmi inɗe labbi nder lesdi, ngam taa goɗɗo siftora ɗe. Mi nattinan boo fewooɓe wi'anɓe ɓe annabi'en e ruuhu coɓki nder lesdi.
To goɗɗo tokkake waɗugo annabaaku, baaba maako e daada maako mbi'an ɗu'um: Sey a maaya, ngam a ɗon fewa bee innde Jawmiraawo! Baaba maako e daada maako njuwan mo yaake o waɗata annabaaku.
Saa'i man annabi'en cemtan ngam koyɗi muuɗum'en ɗi ɓe koyɗi saa'i ɓe ɗon mbaɗa annabaakuuji maɓɓe. Ɓe meetataa ɓornugo alkibbaare annabi'en huuwraande bee gaasa ngam zammbaago yimɓe.
Koo moy maɓɓe wi'an: Naa mi annabiijo, min kam mi demoowo, ngam goɗɗo marni yam ka saa'i mi derke.
To goɗɗo ƴami mo: E ɗume ɓattajje ɗe'e dow wiɓɓere maaɗa? Nden kam o jaaboto: Mi naawnaama haa suudu waaye'en am.”
Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wi'i: “An kaafahi, ummana gaynaako am, mo mi waɗi ɗum kuuwdiɗɗiraawo am! Mbar gaynaako, nden baali caŋkititto koo toy fuu. Mi waylitan juŋngo am, mi fiya pamari
Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Nden, nder lesdi fuu geɓe yimɓe ɗiɗi maayan, sey yeɓre woore tan yeeɗata.

Mi nastinan luttanɓe bee yoŋki ɓe'e nder yiite ngam laɓɓingo ɓe bana goɗɗo laɓɓinirta cardi. Mi foondan ɓe bana goɗɗo laɓɓinirta kaŋŋeeri. Nden kadi ɓe toroto yam, min boo mi jaɓan tornde maɓɓe. Mi wi'an: Onon, on yimɓe ummaatoore am. Kamɓe boo ɓe mbi'an: Jawmiraawo woni Allah amin.”
Ndaa, nyalaade Jawmiraawo ɗon wara, onon jooɗiiɓe haa Urusaliima. Ɓe cenndan mardi mon yeeso mooɗon.

Jawmiraawo mooɓtan yimɓe ummaatooje fuu haa Urusaliima ngam konu. Ɓe nyaama berniwol, ɓe mbila cuuɗi, ɓe toskina rewɓe. Reeta jooɗiiɓe nder berniwol ɓe ndaheteeɓe, ammaa luttanɓe nattataa nder berniwol.
Nden Jawmiraawo wurtoto, haɓan bee ummaatooje ɗe'e, bana o woowri haɓugo nder nyalaade haɓre.

Nyalaade man kosɗe maako ndaroto dow Hooseere Jaytunje, kommbi Urusaliima, gal fuunaaŋge. Hooseere Jaytunje seekan caka cak, waadiwol maŋngol masin waŋgan gal fuunaaŋge dilla hiirnaaŋge. Reeta hooseere daayoto gal woyla, reeta feere boo gal fombina.

On ndoggan gal waadiwol ceekŋgol caka towndiije go, ngam ngol yottoto Asal. On ndoggan bana kaakiraaɓe mooɗon ndoggirno daliila dimmbaaki lesdi nder zamanu Uzziya, laamiiɗo Yahuuda. Nden Allah Jawmiraawo am wardan bee seniiɓe muuɗum fuu.
Nyalaade man jayŋgol e jaaŋgol e mallimallooje ngonataa
Nde laatoto nyalaade feereere. Jawmiraawo tan anndi nde. Nde walaa nyalawma, non boo jemma. Ammaa koo kiikiiɗe boo, jayŋgol laatoto.
Nyalaade man ndiyam ndokkanɗam ngeendam ɓuloyan diga Urusaliima. Reeta maajam ilan haa mbeela fuunaaŋge, reeta boo haa mbeela hiirnaaŋge. Ɗam tokkoto ilugo nduŋngu e ceeɗu
Nden Jawmiraawo laamanto duniyaaru fuu. Saa'i man kaŋko tan wonata Jawmiraawo, walaa goɗɗo maran innde nde'e.

Lesdi taariindi Urusaliima fuu laatoto yayre, diga Geba haa yotto Rimmon haa fombina Urusaliima. Ammaa berniwol Urusaliima towtan, ngol tabitan haa nokkuure muuɗum. Ngol yaajan diga Dammugal Benyamin haa yotto babal dammugal kiiɗŋgal e Dammugal Toldu, diga suudu Hananiyel towndu haa yotto ɓiɗɗirde laamiiɗo.
Yimɓe njooɗoto ton, nattinki meetataa laataago, yimɓe Urusaliima njooɗoto jam

Ndaa masiibooji ɗi Jawmiraawo ukkanto yimɓe ummaatooje honiiɓe Urusaliima fuu: O nyolnan kusel ɓalli maɓɓe diga ɓe ɗon ndari dow kosɗe maɓɓe tawon. Gite maɓɓe nyolan nder gasɗe muuɗum'en, ɗemɗe maɓɓe boo nder kunnduɗe maɓɓe.
Nyalaade man Jawmiraawo hebbinan ɓe bee kultoreeŋgol maŋngol. Ɓe kaɓan hakkunde maɓɓe. Koo moy ukkanto keeddiɗɗum.
Yimɓe Yahuuda boo kaɓan ngam wallugo Urusaliima. Ɓe njaɓtan mardi ummaatooje taariiɗe fuu: Kaŋŋeeri e cardi e limce ɗuuɗɗe masin.
Masiibo ukkanto pucci e alfadariije e geelooɗi e bamɗe e dabbaaji gonɗi nder caŋngeeje ɗe'e fuu. Masiibo oo nanndi bee oya go.
Nden yimɓe luttanɓe haa ummaatooje ummaniiɗe Urusaliima fuu ngaran ton nde hitaande yaalti fuu, ngam sujidango Laamiiɗo, Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama e ngam waɗugo juulde bukkaaji.
To asŋgol koo ngole nder duniyaaru waraay sujidango Laamiiɗo haa Urusaliima, Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama, iyeende toɓataa nder lesdi maagol.
To asŋgol Misra waraay haa Urusaliima ngam waɗugo juulde bukkaaji, nden kam masiibo ukkanto ngol bana ummaatooje ɗe ngarataa waɗugo juulde nde'e.
Bana non kiita waran dow Misra e ummaatooje ɗe ngarataa waɗugo juulde bukkaaji.
Nder wakkati man, binndol laatoto dow leŋngi pucci bana ni'i: “Senaama ngam Jawmiraawo.” Defruɗe nder haykaliiru Jawmiraawo laatoto cenaaɗe bana taasaaje gonɗe yeeso hirsirde.

Payanɗe gonɗe nder Urusaliima e Yahuuda fuu laatoto cenaaɗe ngam Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama. Lii'otooɓe kirseteeɗi fuu kuuwtiniran ɗe, ndefa nder maaje. Nder wakkati ki'i, piloowo wonataa nder suudu Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama.
Ndaa koŋngol ngol Jawmiraawo wolwi bee hunnduko Malakiya
Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Mi yiɗi on.” Ammaa onon on ɗon ƴama: “Ɗume hollata a yiɗi min?” Jawmiraawo ɗon jaabo: “Naa Isuwa woni deerɗu Yaakubu? Ammaa Yaakubu ngiɗmi,
Isuwa kam mi wanyi ɗum. Mi wartiri kooseeje maako bille meere, mi hokki cuuli maral maako

To Edoomi'en mbi'i: “Ɓe mbili min gure, ammaa min mahititto bille amin”, nden kam Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wi'an: “Booɗɗum, kamɓe ɓe mahan, ammaa min mi yibbinan ɗum.” Ngam maajum yimɓe ewnoto Edoom lesdi halleende e ummaatoore nde Jawmiraawo tikkani haa foroy.
Gite mooɗon ngi'an ɗum. Nden on mbi'an: “Jawmiraawo woni mawɗo, koo gaɗa keeri Isra'iila boo

Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wi'i liman'en: “Ɓiɗɗo teddinan baaba mum, maccuɗo boo teddinan jawmum. Nde nii mi Baabiraawo, toy tedduŋgal ngal haandani yam? Nde nii mi Jawmiraawo, toy teddinoore nde haandani yam? Onon liman'en, on ɗon njawo innde am. Ammaa on ɗon mbi'a: Bee ɗume min njawri nde?
Bee lii'aago nyaamdu soɓndu dow hirsirde am. Ammaa on ɗon mbi'a: Bee ɗume min coɓniri ma? Bee numugo: Taabal Jawmiraawo

To on lii'anake yam dabbaaji bumɗi kirseteeɗi, naa ɗum kalluɗum na? To on lii'ani yam dabbaaji boosɗi e nyaawɗi, naa ɗum kalluɗum na? Sey on njaha, on ndokka ɗum ngomna mooɗon. On tammi ɗum fottanan mo na? Koo o yerdoto on na?” Non Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wi'i
Jonta tore Allah haa o mo'ana en. Nde nii on lii'anake mo dokke bana nii, kaŋko o yerdoto on na? Non Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wi'i.
“Ayye! Ɓuranno to gooto mon maɓɓi dammuɗe haykaliiru, ngam taa on kuɓɓa yiite meere dow hirsirde am! Mi seyoraaki on sam, mi jaɓataa dokkal diga juuɗe mooɗon. Non Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wi'i.

Ngam diga fuɗirde naaŋge haa mutirde maage, ummaatooje ɗon teddina innde am mawnde. Koo toy fuu yimɓe ɗon ngula uurle ngam innde am, ɓe ɗon lii'ano yam dokke laaɓɗe ngam innde am mawnde caka ummaatooje. Non Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wi'i.
Ammaa onon on ɗon coɓna innde am bee wi'ugo: Taabal Jawmiraawo soɓi, nyaamdu dow maagal boo laati meere.

On ɗon mbi'a boo: Kayya, torra meere non! On ɗon njawo yam. Non Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wi'i. On ɗon ngadda dabbaaji ɗi on ngujji malla boosɗi e nyaawɗi, haa on lii'ano yam ɗi kirseteeɗi. On tammi mi jaɓan ɗi diga juuɗe mooɗon na? Non Jawmiraawo wi'i.

Naaloore dow rikiciijo marɗo njawdiri ndi o togani yam nder tokkere maako, ammaa o lii'ani yam kallundi. Ngam mi laamiiɗo mawɗo, innde am boo nde hulniinde caka ummaatooje.” Non Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wi'i.
“Jonta kam, onon liman'en, umroore nde'e ɗon ngam mooɗon:

To on nanaay, to on mbaɗaay anniya teddingo innde am, nden kam mi ukkan naaloore dow mooɗon, mi laatinan barkaaji mon naaloore. Ooho, mi naali ɗi, ngam on ngalaa anniya hakkilango koo ɗume.” Non Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wi'i.
“Ndaa, mi furkititto danygol mon, mi wiccan coowoowe dabbaaji ɗi on kirsata nder juulɗe mon haa geese mon, ɓe ndufdan on bee maaje fuu.
Nden on anndan min mi umri umroore nde'e ngam mooɗon, haa alkawal am bee lenyol Lewi tabita. Non Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wi'i
Alkawal am bee maako laatino ngeendam e salaaman. Mi hokki mo ɗum ɗiɗi fuu ngam haa o hulammi. Nden o huli yam, o diwni ngam innde am
Kiita gooŋgaaha wonno haa hunnduko maako. Zammba woodaa haa hunnduko maako. O tokki yam bee hoolaare e ɓernde gooŋgaare. O lortini ɗuuɗɓe diga aybeeji maɓɓe.
Ngam kuugal limanjo ɗum ekkitingo anndal Allah. Yimɓe ɗaɓɓitan kiita haa maako, ngam o nelaaɗo Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama.
Ammaa onon, on celi laawol bee kiita mon, on ndo'i ɗuuɗɓe nder hakke bee kiita mon. On piisti alkawal am bee lenyol Lewi. Non Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wi'i.
Ngam man mi yawni on, mi toskini on yeeso ummaatoore fuu, ngam on kakkilanaay laabi am. Nde on mbaɗi kiita boo, on kiitaaki yimɓe fuu kal-kal.”
Naa en fuu en ngoodi Baabiraawo gooto na? Naa Allah gooto tagi en fuu na? Koni en zammbotirta? Koni en njawi alkawal ngal Allah haɓɓuno bee kaakiraaɓe meeɗen?
Yahuuda waɗi zammba nder Isra'iila e nder Urusaliima. Yahuudu'en kuuwi kuuɗe nyidduɗe. Yahuuda soɓni nokkuure seniinde nde Jawmiraawo yiɗi bee te'ugo faanyɓe tokkiiɓe ɗowanteeɗo jananno.
Mo huuwata irin ɗu'um, Jawmiraawo ta'uma danygol maako
Woodi boo huunde ɗiɗawre nde on mbaɗata: On ɗon cudda hirsirde Jawmiraawo bee gonɗi e bojji e uumaali, ngam o faalataa dokke mon, o jaɓataa ɗe diga juuɗe mon.
Ammaa on ɗon ƴama: “Ngam ɗume?” Ngam Jawmiraawo laati ceedoowo hakkunde maaɗa e debbo sukaaku ma. Debbo oo woni kawtiɗɗiraawo ma mo kaɓɓuɗa alkawal bee muuɗum, ammaa a zammbi mo.
Naa Jawmiraawo laatini on goɗɗo gooto nder ɓanndu e ruuhu na? Ɗume goɗɗo oo ɗaɓɓata? Naa heɓugo ɓikkoy koy Allah hokkata? Ngam maajum kakkilane ko'e mooɗon. Taa goɗɗo zammbo debbo sukaaku muuɗum.

Jawmiraawo Allah mo Isra'iila wi'i: “Mi ɗon wanya ceergal bana mi wanyirta goɗɗo mo soɓni limce mum bee toonyaare. Ngam maajum kakkilane ko'e mooɗon. Taa on mbaɗa zammba.” Non Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wi'i.

On ɗon comna Jawmiraawo bee bolle mon. Ammaa on ɗon ƴama: “Bee ɗume min comni mo?” Bee wi'ugo: “Waɗanɓe halleende fuu ɗon pottana Allah, o ɗon seyoro ɓe.” Malla boo: “Toy Allah kiitoowo gooŋgaajo woni?”
Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wi'i: “Ndaa, mi ɗon nela nelaaɗo am
Ammaa moy waawata ɓusugo nyalaade garki maako? Moy waawata dartaago nyalaade nde o waŋgoyta? Ngam o laatoto bana yiite ɓolinoowo, bana saabulu lootoowo
O jooɗoto bana ɓolinoowo e laɓɓinoowo cardi. O laɓɓinan ɓiɓɓe Lewi, o wo'inan ɓe bana kaŋŋeeri e cardi, haa ɓe lii'ano Jawmiraawo dokke pottanɗe.
Nden dokke Yahuuda e Urusaliima pottanan Jawmiraawo, bana nder balɗe caaliiɗe, bana nder duuɓi ɓooymaaji.

Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wi'i: “Mi waranan on ngam kiita. Mi yaawɗoto laataago ceedoowo dow waɗooɓe hiila e jeenooɓe e seedooɓe fewre, dow waɗanɓe huuwooɓe muuɗum'en rikici bee ngeenaari, dow toonyooɓe rewɓe yurumɓe e atiime'en, dow waɗanɓe aybe heedi jananɓe e dow yimɓe ɓe kulataa yam.”
“Min, Jawmiraawo, mi waylataako. Ammaa onon haa jonta on ɓiɓɓe Yaakubu.
Diga saa'i kaakiraaɓe mon on celi laawol farillaaji am, on ɗowtanaaki ɗi. Lorte haa am! Nden kam mi loroto haa mooɗon.” Non Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wi'i. “Ammaa on ɗon mbi'a: Noy min lortorto?
Goɗɗo waawan zammbaago Allah na? Ammaa onon on ɗon zammbo yam. On ɗon mbi'a: Noy min zammbori ma? Haa zakka e haa dokkal boo.
On naalaaɓe, onon yimɓe ummaatoore fuu on ɗon zammbo yam.

Ngadde zakka fuu nder sigordu, haa nyaamdu tawe nder suudu am.” Non Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wi'i. “Poondeeɗam bee waɗugo bana non, on ngi'an fakat mi maɓɓitan burɗe asama, mi waanja barka dow mooɗon bee fantugo
Mi telɓanan nyaamooji ngam mooɗon, ɗi mbonnataa ƴaamle lesdi mon. Inabooje haa gese mon ndiman foroy, meetataa tampugo. Non Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wi'i.
Ummaatooje fuu ewnoto on barkiɗinaaɓe, ngam lesdi mon laatoto mboondi.” Non Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wi'i.
Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Bolle mooɗon caati dow am. Ammaa on ɗon ƴama: Ɗume min mbolwindiri dow maaɗa?
On mbi'i: Jagganaago Jawmiraawo woni meere. Ko nafata to min kakkilani umrooje maako? Ko nafata to min cunake yeeso Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama?
Jonta min ɗon ndaara yedduɓe bana kamɓe ngoni barkiɗinaaɓe. Waɗanɓe halleende keɓi hayru. Naa kanjum tan, ammaa koo to ɓe njarribake Allah, ɓe ndaɗan.”
Nden hulɓe Jawmiraawo mbolwindiri. Jawmiraawo boo heɗiti, nani. Deftere ciftorki winndaama yeeso maako ngam hulɓe mo, teddinanɓe innde maako.
Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wi'i: “Kamɓe ɓe laatoto yiɗaaɓe am nder nyalaade nde taaskitinanmi. Mi enɗan ɓe, bana baaba enɗirta ɓiyum jaggantooɗo ɗum.
Nden on cenndindiran gooŋgaajo bee kalluɗo fahin, non boo jaggantooɗo Allah bee mo jaggantaako ɗum.”

“Fakat, nyalaade nde'e waran, wulannde bana yiite ɓolinirde. Nden yedduɓe e waɗanɓe halleende laatoto bana tiitiiho. Nyalaade man wulan ɓe, accantaa ɓe koo ɗaɗol koo lisal.” Non Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wi'i.
“Ammaa teddinanɓe innde am kam, ndaa iinaare am: Adilaaku am waŋganan on bana puɗki naaŋge. Nyawnduki wardan bee laasol maage. Nden on ngurtoto, on ndiwan bee seyo bana nyalahoy gantaakoy.
On ndamman halluɓe, ngam ɓe laatoto ndoondi les jaaɓruɗe kosɗe mon nder nyalaade nde taaskitinanmi.” Non Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wi'i.
“Ciftore tawreeta ka mi hokki jagganoowo yam Muusa dow hooseere Sina, waato farillaaji e kiitaaji ngam Isra'iila fuu.
Ndaa, mi nelan annabi Eliya haa mooɗon, hiddeko nyalaade Jawmiraawo mawnde hulniinde wara
Kaŋko o lortinan ɓerɗe baabiraaɓe haa ɓikkoy e ɓerɗe ɓikkoy haa baabiraaɓe maakoy, ngam taa mi wara, mi nattina lesdi ndi'i.”
Deftere Tobit ɓii Tobiyel taaniraawo Ananiyel. Ananiyel, o ɓii Aduyel, o taaniraawo Gabayel. Ɓe fuu maɓɓe ɓe yimɓe asŋgol Asiyel, goɗɗo lenyol Neftali.

O ɗonno jooɗi lesdi Neftali haa dow towndiije Galiili nder berniwol Tisbe hakkunde Kades gal woyla, Haser haa hiirnaaŋge e Fogor gal fombina. Diga ton o dahaama haa lesdi Assiriya yaake Salmanasar laamani lesdi maajum.
Min Tobit, mi tokki laabi gooŋga e mi huuwi kuuɗe booɗɗe kala nyalaade fuu ngeendam am. Mi hokki sadaka haa banndiraaɓe e yimɓe dahaaɓe bee am haa Niniwe nder lesdi Assiriya nde ɗuuɗɗum.

Wakkati nderkaaku am, yaake mi ɗonno haa lesdi am Isra'iila tawon, lenyol kaaka am Neftali fuu wurti diga saare Daawuda e diga Urusaliima. Alhaali boo Allah suɓi berniwol ngo'ol nder Isra'iila ngam haa le'i fuu ngara lii'a kirseteeɗi. Haa ton, haykaliiru, jooɗorde Allah, nyiɓaama e senaama ngam zamanuuji garanɗi fuu.
Dow kooseeje Galiili, saare am bee lenyol kaaka am Neftali fuu ɗonno lii'ana gaggel kaŋŋeeri kirseteeɗi, ngel Yerobo'am, laamiiɗo Isra'iila, jo'inno haa nokkuure seniinde haa Dan.
Mi ɗonno yaha Urusaliima nyalɗe juulɗe, ndego feere am bana Tawreeta umri Isra'iila haa foroy. Mi ɗonno yahra ɓenndalooje aartuɗe, afi dabbaaji, zakka dabbaaji am fuu e gaasa baali am arana.

Mi ɗonno hokka ɗum liman'en, yimɓe asŋgol Haruna ngam ɓe lii'o ɗum. Mi ɗonno hokka zakka alkamaari am, inaboojam, jaytunje, ibbe e ɓenndalooje feere haa ɓiɓɓe Lewi huuwanɓe haa Urusaliima. Mi ɗonno hooca yeɓre woore nder sappo nder ceede am fahin, mi yahri ɗum Urusaliima, mi ɗonno majjina ɗum ton.

Yeɓre woore nder sappo feere boo mi ɗonno hokka ɗum atiime'en, rewɓe yurumɓe e jananɓe nastuɓe nder diina Isra'iila'en. Duuɓi tati fuu mi ɗonno yahra e hokka ɓe ɗum haa min nyaamda ɗum fodde umroore Tawreeta Muusa e bana Deboora, maama debbo danyɗo Ananiyel, baaba am umri yam ngam baaba am maayi, acci yam mi atiimeejo.
Nde mi laati suka, mi te'i debbo nder lenyol am, o danyani yam ɓiɗɗo, mi inndi mo Tobiyas.
Ɓaawoɗon, mi dahaama haa Assiriya, mi jooɗi haa Niniwe. Nder berniwol ngo'ol, saaro'en am e yimɓe lesdi am ɗonno nyaama nyaamdu ndu heefeerɓe nyaamata.
Ammaa min kam, mi naŋgti hoore am ngam taa mi nyaama nyaamdu heefeerɓe man.
Nde nii mi ɗonno siftora umroore Allah am bee nafsu am fuu,
Allah Ɓaŋiiɗo heɓnani yam mo'ere yeeso Salmanasar. O halfini yam soodgo ɗum ko o mari haaje fuu.
Haa nyalaade maayde maako, mi ɗonno yaha Mediya soodoygo kuuje. Bana nii nyalde feere, mi halfini Gabayel deerɗiraawo Gabaryaahu, ceede baakin kilo teemeɗɗe tati nder boorooji.
Nde Salmanasar maayi, ɓiɗɗo maako laami haa pellel maako.
Nder zamanu Salmanasar, mi ɗonno hokka sadaka ɗuuɗka haa yimɓe lenyol am.
Mi ɗonno hokka dolɓe nyaamdu, mi ɗonno ɓorna temmbuɓe. To mi laari goɗɗo lesdi am maayɗo, cakkinaaɗo gaɗa mahol Niniwe, mi ɗonno uwa mo.

Mi uwi boo mbaraaɓe Sennakerib. kaŋko huɗino Allah, laamiiɗo asama, haa Yahudiya. Ngam hiitaago mo, Allah dooli mo o sotta, o dogga lesdi man bee law. Bee wartugo Niniwe, Sennakerib ɓerni, mbari Isra'iila'en ɗuuɗɓe, mi uwi ɓe nder cuuɗiiɗum. Laamiiɗo ɗaɓɓiti ɓalli maɓɓe, ammaa o tawaay ɗi.
Goɗɗo Niniwe yehi haa maako, wi'i mo min ɗonno uwa ɗi, ngam maajum mi nyukki. Nde mi nani laamiiɗo ɗonno ɗaɓɓitammi haa mbarammi, kulol naŋngi yam, mi doggi.
Ɓe njaɓti maral am fuu, ɓe ndokki ɗum laamiiɗo. Luttani yam sey debbo am Anna e ɓiŋngel am Tobiyas tan.

Koo balɗe cappanɗe nayi ngaɗaay, ɗiɗoy nder ɓikkoy maako mbari mo, koy ndoggi dow kooseeje Araraada. Asarhaddon, ɓiɗɗo maako feere laami haa pellel maako. O halfini Ahikar ɓii deerɗiraawo am Anayel, kaliifaaku kuuɗe laamu e ceede fuu.

Ahikar torani yam, nden mi wari haa Niniwe. kaŋko wonno jarnoowo laamiiɗo e yerima'en, cigoowo haatummeere laamu, ardiiɗo kuuɗe laamu e lisaafi ceede yaake Sennakerib wonno laamiiɗo Assiriya. Asarhaddon jo'itini mo nder kuuɗe maako. Ahikar o banndiraawo am, o ɓii deerɗiraawo am gorko.

Yaake laamu Asarhaddon, mi warti saare am haa Niniwe. Mi tawti debbo am Anna e ɓiɗɗo am Tobiyas. Saa'i Pantekosta, juulde senaande asaweeje joweeɗiɗi ɓaawo Paska, ɓe ndefani yam nyaamduuji belɗi. Mi jooɗi haa mi nyaama,

ɓe ngaddani yam nyaamduuji ɗuuɗɗi belɗi dow taabal. Nden mi wi'i ɓiŋngel am: “Yah haa deerɗiraaɓe men Isra'iila'en dahaaɓe haa Niniwe. Tef caka maɓɓe talakaajo kooliiɗo Allah, wi' mo o wara, o nyaamda bee am. Mi ɗon reene.”

Tobiyas dilli ɗaɓɓititgo talakaajo caka deerɗiraaɓe men, ammaa o warti, o wi'i: “Baaba am”! Mi jaabi: “Ɗume waɗi, ɓiŋngel am?” Ɓiŋngel go jaabi: “Baaba, woodi goɗɗo nder ummaatoore meeɗen mbaraama! Ɓe ɗeɗɗi mo, ɓe cakkini mo haa laawol, haa jonta ɓanndu maako ɗon waali ton”.
Nden mi ɗali nyaamdu go, mi doggi haa babal maajum, mi sottini maayɗo, mi wallini mo les daŋki hiddeko naaŋge muta, nden mi uwa mo.
Nde mi warti, mi yiiwi tawon ngam haa mi seno, nden mi nyaami bee suno.
Mi siftori ko annabiijo Amos wi'no: “Juulde mooɗon laatoto maayiti e gimi mooɗon boo laatoto bojji”, nden mi fuɗɗi woygo.
Nde naaŋge muti, mi yehi, mi wasi ngaska, mi uwi maayɗo go.
Heeddiɗɗiraaɓe am njali yam, mbi'i: “O tammi walaa ko hulnata mo fahin! Naane ɓe ɗaɓɓiti mbargo mo, o doggi. Ammaa ndaa, o ɗon uwa maayɓe fahin”.
Jemmaare man, mi yiiwi ngam haa mi seno, mi wurti haa yolnde, mi waali, mi forti les mahol, mi suddaay yeeso am ngam gulɗum.

Mi anndaano colli mbaɗi caɓɓe nder mahol, ɗon njooɗi ton dow hoore am. Bu'e maaji gulɗe njani nder gite am, mbaɗi toɓɓere raneere. Mi yehi haa hurgooɓe ngam ɓe kurgammi, ammaa koo nde ɓe ngaɗani yam leɗɗe ɗuuɗɗe, toɓɓere raneere tulliti haa wumni yam fuu. Mi wumi kulus duuɓi nayi. Ɗum sukli deerɗiraaɓe am fuu. Ahikar suklani yam baakin duuɓi ɗiɗi haa nde o dilli Elimayis.
Yaake man, debbo am Anna huuwi bana rewɓe sannyooɓe.

O ɗon hokkita ko o sannyi haa ƴamɓe mo, kamɓe boo ɓe ɗon njoɓa mo. Balɗe joweeɗiɗi lewru Distros, o timmini godoore nden o yahri nde haa ƴamɓe mo, ɓe ndokki mo ceede deydey coggu maajum, nden ɓe ɓesdani mo be'el.
Nde o nasti saare am bee be'el go, ngel fuɗɗi woygo. Mi ewni debbo am, mi ƴami mo: “Toy be'el nge'el iwi? Naa ngel gujjaaŋgel sika? Lornu ngel haa jawmiiŋgel. En mbaawataa nyaamgo kuuje gujjaaɗe.”

O jaabi: “Ɗum caahu, ɓe ɓesɗani yam dow ngeenaari am!”. Mi jaɓanaay mo sam. Mi tokki wi'go mo, o lornana jawmiiŋgel. Daliila maajum mi ɓerni dow maako. Nden o wi'i yam: “Toy nafuuda sadakaaji ma e mbooɗeeŋga ma heedi talaka'en? En ndaari ko ɗum wartani ma!”
Nde mi ɗonno nder suno caatuŋgo, mi fuɗɗi uumugo e woygo. Nder uumaali am, mi fuɗɗi torugo, mi wi'i:
“A adiliijo, Jawmiraawo, kuuɗe ma fuu ɗe adiliije. A ɗon huuwana min tum mbooɗeeŋga e gooŋgaaku. An woni kiitoowo duniyaaru fuu.
Jonta, Jawmiraawo, taa yejjitam, laaram useni. Taa hiitam ngam hakkeeji am malla ngam aybeeji ɗi min mbaɗi, min e kaakiraaɓe am.
Ngam min ɗowtanaaki umrooje maaɗa, a acci konne'en amin ɓofti min kuuje, ndahi min, mbari min. Ummaatooje haa a saŋkiti min njali min, kuɗi min.
A gooŋgaajo nder kiitaaji maaɗa fuu nde a hiiti yam ngam hakkeeji am e ɗi kaakiraaɓe am. Ngam fakat min ɗowtanaaki umrooje maaɗa, min ngeeɗaay nder gooŋgaaku yeeso maaɗa.

Jonta, waɗam ko fottani ma. Hoocu yoŋki am haa mi majja diga dow lesdi, mi warta loope. Ndikkana yam maaygo dow yeeɗugo, ngam mi nani kuudi ɗi pottanaay yam, mi mettaaɗo masin. Jawmiraawo, ittanam mettamɓeram ɗa'am, nastinam nder siwtaare duumiinde. Taa wiirnam yeeso ma, Jawmiraawo! Ndikkana yam maaygo dow jooɗaago nder mettamɓeram e nango kuudi ɗi'i!”
Nyalde man nden, nder berniwol Ekbatan nder lesdi Mediya, Saraatu ɓii Raguyel boo nani korɗo baaba mum huɗi ɗum.

Saraatu ɓaŋgaama nde joweeɗiɗi. Ammaa nde ɓe ɓaŋgi mo fuu ginnaawol kalluŋgol bi'eteeŋgol Asmodeewu mbari gorko man hiddeko ɓe mbaalda fodde ɗabiya. Ndaa ko korɗo wi'i Saraatu: “An mbarata worɓe ma! Njoweeɗiɗo ɓaŋgi ma, ammaa koo innde gooto caka maɓɓe, a heɓaay.
Ngam ɗume a ɗon torra min bee maayde maɓɓe? Yah, hawtoya bee maɓɓe, taa min ndaara ɓiŋngel gorgel malla deyel ngel ndanyɗa.”

Nyalde maajum, ɓernde Saraatu metti masin, o woyi jamum, o wa'i haa suudu wonndu dow ndu baaba maako bee anniya ɓiltaago. Ammaa o numi, o wi'i: “Taa ɓe kuɗa baaba am bee wi'go: A woodino ɓiɗɗo debbo gooto tan, ndaa o ɓiltake ngam suno maako caatuŋgo. Mettamɓeram baaba am mbaran ɗum. Hiddeko mi ɓilto, ndikka mi toro Jawmiraawo, o mbarammi ngam taa mi nana kuudi dow am balɗe fuu.”
Saraatu tiiti feneetir, ɓaŋgti juuɗe, tori, wi'i:
“Tedduŋgal laatano ma, Allah enɗoowo! Koo moy teddina innde ma haa foroy! Tagle ma fuu teddine haa foroy!
Jonta, mi ɗon tiite, mi ɗon tijje.
Wurtinam e duniyaaru ndu'u ngam taa mi meeta nango kuudi dow am.
Jawmiraawo, a anndi mi paanyo debbo, mi meeɗaay anndugo gorko tawon.

Mi toskaay innde am koo innde baaba am nder lesdi ndi ɓe dahi min. Mi ɓiɗɗo debbo bajjo baaba am, o heɓaay donoowo feere. O walaa deerɗiraawo feere haa ɓaŋgammi e mi yeeɗa ngam maako. Mi maayraaɗo worɓe njoweeɗiɗo, ngam ɗume mi yeeɗata fahin? Ammaa, Jawmiraawo, to a yiɗaa mi maaya, useni nan kuudi ɗi ɓe ɗon kuɗammi.”
Nder wakkati man nden Allah tedduɗo yerdi tornde Tobit bee nde Saraatu fuu.

Allah neli malaa'ikaajo Rafayel ngam hurgugo ɓe ɗiɗo fuu. Sey Rafayel itta toɓɓere raneere wonnde nder gite Tobit ngam o laara annoora Allah fahin. O hisna Saraatu, ɓiɗɗo Raguyel diga ginnaawol kulniiŋgol bi'eteeŋgol Asmodeewu nden o ɓaŋgra mo bee Tobiyas ɓii Tobit. Sey Tobiyas mari laawol ɓaŋgugo mo dow muuyooɓe feere. Nde Tobit nasti saare, Saraatu ɗon jippo diga suudu mum dow ndu baaba mum.
Nyalde man Tobit siftori ceede ɗe o accino haa Gabayel nder berniwol Rages nder lesdi Mediya.
O numi nder maako: “Nde mi tori Allah mi maaya, ndikka mi ewna ɓiɗɗo am Tobiyas, mi wolwana mo haala ceede man hidde mi maaya.”
O ewni Tobiyas go. Nde Tobiyas yotti, o wi'i mo: “To mi maayi, uwam bana no haani. Neɗɗin daada ma, taa wudin mo koo nyalde woore nder ngeendam maako. Waɗan mo ko fottanta mo fuu, taa mettin mo.
Taa yejjitit, ɓiŋngel am, sababuuji ɗuuɗɗi o yiidi wakkati a ɗonno nder reedu maako. To o maayi, uw mo kommbi am, nder yenaande woore bee am.
Ɓiŋngel am, taa yejjitit Jawmiraawo balɗe ma fuu. Accu waɗgo hakkeeji e luutgo umrooje Allah. Nder ngeendam ma fuu, waɗ ko laati adiliijum, taa tokka laawol kalluŋgol.
Ngam yeeɗanɓe nder gooŋga fuu kumtan nder ko ɓe mbaɗata.
Hoocu yeɓre nder jawdi ma, hokku ɗum huuwanɓe kuuɗe adiliije. Waɗ ɗum bilaa mimsitaare. Taa ɗoyla laafuɗo, Allah boo ɗoylataako ma.
Hokku sadaka fodde mardi ma koo ndi ɗuuɗndi malla ndi famardi. To a mari seɗɗa, taa hul hokkugo nder seɗɗa maajum.
Bana nii, a siganan hoore ma ndesaari ngam nyalɗe ɓillaaje.
Ngam dokkoowo sadaka haa laafuɗo hisan maayde. Caahu maako haɗan mo nastugo nder nyiɓre.
Koo moy hokki sadaka, lii'ani Allah Ɓaŋiiɗo dokkal ngal o yerdoto.

Ɓiŋngel am, aran taa waɗ daakaareeku. Ɓaŋ debbo mo lenyol kaaka maaɗa. Taa ɓaŋ debbo jananno ngam en ɓiɓɓe annabi'en. Ɓiŋngel am, taa yejjitit kaakiraaɓe men Nuuhu, Ibrahiima, Isiyaaku fuu ɓaŋi rewɓe lenyol muuɗum'en. Allah barkiɗini ɓe, hokki ɓe ɓikkoy, o iinani danygol maɓɓe lesdi.

Jonta ɓiŋngel am, yiɗ deerɗiraaɓe ma, taa yaw deerɗiraaɓe ma worɓe e rewɓe ngam haa ɓaŋga debbo caka maɓɓe. Gooŋga, mawnitaare woni daliila halkere e jiiɓotiral maŋngal, mbaateendam woni daliila laafere e ɓillaare naawnde, ɗum daada weelo boo.
Taa reen jaŋngo ngam hokkugo ngeenaari kuuwanoowo ma fuu. Yoɓ mo law. To a tokki Allah bana nii o warjoto ma. Hakkil, ɓiŋngel am, nder kuuɗe ma fuu. Sey a laato ne'iiɗo nder kuugal ma fuu.
Taa waɗ goɗɗo ko a wanyi. Taa yar mbal haa a wuyka. Taa accu wuykere ardine.
Senndu nyaamdu ma bee beelaaɗo, ɓornu temmbuɓe. Diga ɗuuɗeeŋga jawdi ma, hokku sadaka bilaa mimsitaare.
Neldu nyaamdu ma haa maayiti adiliijo, ammaa taa neldu to o hakkeejo.
Sarwa hikmaajo fuu, taa yeeba sawari booɗɗo.

Koo ndeye fuu yettu Allah Jawmiraawo. Tora mo o darna laawol ma e o humtane anniyaaji ma fuu e ko ngiɗɗa waɗgo fuu. Ngam hikma laataaki mardi ummaatoore koo ndeyeere, ammaa sey Allah tan. O dokkoowo jawdi fuu, o leesna mo o yiɗi fuu haa joonde maayɓe. Jonta ɓiŋngel am, siftor wasuyeeji ɗi'i, taa a yejjitaa ɗi sam.
Ndaa ko mi yiɗi anndingo ma jonta: Mi acci ceede kilo teemeɗɗe tati haa Gabayel ɓii Gabaryaahu haa Rages nder lesdi Mediya.
Taa hul ɓiŋngel am, to en laafi. A maran jawdi ɗuuɗndi to a ɗowtanake Jawmiraawo Allah, to a daayake hakke fuu e to a waɗi ko o yiɗi.”
Tobiyas jaabi Tobit: “Baaba, mi waɗan ko umruɗa fuu.
Ammaa noy njaɓranmi ceede ngam o anndaa yam, min boo mi anndaa mo?”

Tobit jaabi: “Min bee Gabayel min mbinndi bataakewol, min mbinndi ɗiɗo fuu, min mbaɗi juuɗe amin dow maagol. Min cenndi ngol, geɓe ɗiɗi, koo moy hooci reeta, mi accani mo reeta maako bee ceede. Jonta waɗi duuɓi noogas diga mi accani mo ceede man. Ɗaɓɓu ɗoftoowo koolaaɗo, ɓiŋngel am. En njoɓan mo deydey kuugal maako to on ngarti. Yah haa Gabayel hoocititgo ceede man.”
Tobiyas wurti, ɗaɓɓi goɗɗo annduɗo laawol Mediya. O tawi Rafayel, ammaa o anndaa ɗum malaa'ikaajo Allah.
O ƴami mo: “Toy iwɗaa, soobaajo?” Malaa'ikaajo jaabi mo: “Mi gooto caka deerɗiraaɓe maaɗa Isra'iila'en. Mi wari haa ɗo tefgo kuugal.” Tobiyas wi'i: “A anndi laawol yahgo lesdi Mediya na?”

Rafayel jaabi: “Ooho, mi anndi, mi yehi nde ɗuuɗɗum, mi anndi laabi man fuu laaɓɗum. Nde ɗuuɗɗum mi waali haa Gabayel, deerɗiraawo meeɗen gonɗo haa Rages. Ummaago diga Ekbatan yahgo Rages waɗan balɗe ɗiɗi, ngam Rages ɗon nder hooseere, Ekbatan boo caka yayre.”
Tobiyas wi'i: “Munyanam, soobaajo am, haa mi yaha mi maatina baaba am. Sey a ɗofta yam, mi yoɓete.”
Malaa'ikaajo wi'i mo: “Booɗɗum, mi ɗon munyane, ammaa yaaw.”
Tobiyas lori haa baaba muuɗum, wi'i mo: “Mi tawi goɗɗo caka deerɗiraaɓe meeɗen Isra'iila'en.” Tobit jaabi: “Waddu mo haa ɗo, ɓiŋngel am. Mi yiɗi anndugo saare e asŋgol maako e to en njaɓan o ɗofte.”
Tobiyas wurti ewnoyi malaa'ikaajo go, wi'i mo: “Soobaajo am, baaba am yiɗi yiidugo bee ma.”

Malaa'ikaajo wari nasti saare. Tobit aarti saani mo, malaa'ikaajo jaabi: “Allah hokke hayru ɗuuɗɗo.” Ammaa Tobit wi'i mo: “Hayru moye ngelotoomi fahin? Mi bumɗo: Jonta mi yi'ataa jayŋgol naaŋge, mi ɗon nder nyiɓre bana maayɓe ɓe meetataa yi'go jayŋgol naaŋge. Mi geeto tawon, ammaa mi ɗon jooɗi caka maayɓe. Mi ɗon nana yimɓe ɗon mbolwa, ammaa mi yi'ataa ɓe.” Malaa'ikaajo wi'i: “Tiɗɗin ɓernde ma! Allah yamɗitinte law! Tiɗɗin ɓernde!” Baaba wi'i: “Ɓiɗɗo am Tobiyas yiɗi yahgo lesdi Mediya. A waawan ɗoftugo e ɗowgo mo na? Fakat, mi yoɓete, soobaajo am.” Malaa'ikaajo wi'i: “Mi waawan ɗoftugo mo, mi anndi laabi fuu, ngam mi jahɗo nde ɗuuɗɗum haa Mediya. Mi ƴaɓɓi jaaje e kooseeje lesdi ndi'i fuu, mi anndi boo laabi maari fuu.”
Tobit ƴami mo: “Deerɗam, tinndinam saare e lenyol maaɗa, useni.”
Malaa'ikaajo wi'i: “Ngam ɗume a yiɗi anndugo ɗum?” Tobit wi'i mo: “Mi yiɗi anndugo gooŋga, deerɗam. A ɓii moyjo? Noy innde ma?”
O jaabi: “Mi Azariya ɓii Ananiyas mawɗo, gooto caka deerɗiraaɓe ma.”

Tobit wi'i mo: “A jaɓɓaama, Allah barkiɗine, deerɗam! Taa ɓernu ngam mi yiɗno anndugo gooŋga dow iwde ma. Tawmi a banndiraawo am, iwde ma nde woonde. Mi anndi Ananiyas e Natan, ɓiɓɓe Semeliya mawɗo. Ɓooyma, ɓe ɗofti yam haa Urusaliima, ton min cujidani Allah. Kamɓe naa ɓe waɗooɓe hakke. Yimɓe saare ma ɓe adili'en, asŋgol ma ngol booɗŋgol. A jaɓɓaama boy!”
O ɓesdi wi'ugo: “Mi yoɓete ngeenaari bana no haandi, suleyre cardi kala nyalaade fuu e ngam nafakka maaɗa, mi hokkete ko ndokkanmi ɓiŋngel am.
To on ngarti jam mi ɓesɗante.”

Malaa'ikaajo wi'i: “Mi ɗoftan mo. Taa hul: Min njahan jam, min ngartan jam ngam walaa joote haa laawol.” Tobit jaabi: “Allah barkiɗine, deerɗam!” Nden o ewni ɓiyiiko, o wi'i mo: “Ɓiŋngel am, taaskitin ko haandi ngam jahaaŋgal, nden dillu bee deerɗiraawo ma. Allah mo asama ayna on, wartira on jam! Malaa'ikaajo maako ɗofta on, ayna on!” Tobiyas taaskiti jahaaŋgal. O harli baaba e daada maako, nden Tobit wi'i fahin: “Njippore jam.”
Daada Tobiyas woyi, wi'i Tobit gorum: “Ngam ɗume a neli ɓiŋngel am? Naa kaŋko woni sawru nder juŋngo meeɗen? Naa kaŋko woni walliinde meeɗen nde o wondi bee meeɗen?
Ngam ɗume suuno ceede kulniiŋgo bana nii? Accen haala man, ɓiŋngel meeɗen ɓuri ceede saman.
Ko Allah hokki en ngam wuurgo he'i.”
Tobit jaabi: “Taa sakla. Ɓiɗɗo meeɗen wartan jam bana o dilliri. An bee gite ma a laaran mo nyalaade gartuki maako.
Taa sakla, taa hul ngam maɓɓe, deerɗam debbo. Malaa'ikaajo booɗɗo ɗoftan ɓiɗɗo meeɗen, jahaaŋgal maako humtan e o wartan jam.”
Nden debbo Tobit acci woygo.
Suka dilli bee malaa'ikaajo. Rawaandu boo tokki ɓe. Nde hiiri, ɓe caŋngini haa fomoonde maayo Tigiris.
Suka jippi lootgo kosɗe mum, liiŋga diwi haa yaasi, yiɗi moɗgo mo kosŋgal. Tobiyas wooki.
Nden malaa'ikaajo wi'i: “Naŋngu liiŋga man, jogu nga booɗɗum.” Suka waawti liiŋga go, fooɗi nga haa fomoonde.
Malaa'ikaajo wi'i: “Seeku nga, ittu haahaande, ɓernde e heŋre, sigu ɗum, nden sakkin teteki. Fakat haahaande, ɓernde e heŋre ɗum lekki ngam hurgugo.”
Suka seeki nga, itti haahaande, ɓernde e heŋre. O sa'i kusel maaga, o nyaami ngel, o sammini mannda dow luttuŋgel man ngam sigaago ɗum.
Ɓaawoɗon, ɓe ɗiɗo fuu ɓe tokkitini laawol, ɓe njotti keerol lesdi Mediya.
Suka ƴami malaa'ikaajo: “Azariya giɗaaɗo am, noy ɓernde, heŋre e haahaande liiŋgu kurgirta nyawuji?”
Malaa'ikaajo jaabi: “To Sayɗaanu malla ginnaawol kalluŋgol naŋngi gorko malla debbo, ɓe ngulan ɓernde e heŋre liiŋgu yeeso maɓɓe, nyawu fuu majjan, koo ko luttata.
Haahaande boo nafan toɓɓe daneeje nder gite, to ɓe nguji gite bee maare e ɓe puufi dow toɓɓe, gite njamɗitan.”
Nde ɓe njotti Mediya e ɓe ɓadi Ekbatan,
Rafayel wi'i suka: “Deerɗam Tobiyas!” O jaabi: “Ndaa yam”. Malaa'ikaajo wi'i fahin: “Jemmaare nde'e, sey en mbaala haa Raguyel banndiraawo maaɗa. O mari ɓiɗɗo debbo, innde maako Saraatu.

Sey kaŋko tan o mari, walaa ɓiɗɗo gorko malla debbo feere. An woni banndiraawo mo ɓuri ɓadaago Saraatu. An mari laawol ɓaŋgugo mo e rongo jawdi baaba maako. O paanyo debbo kakkilɗo, cuusɗo e ŋarniiɗo, baaba maako boo o cemteteeɗo.

Haani a ɓaŋga mo. Nan ko mi wi'ete deerɗam. Mi wolwanan baaba maako asiri, hannde o laatanto ma muuyaaɗo. To en ngarti haa Rages en ngaɗa ɓaŋgal. Fakat Raguyel waawataa salanaago ma sakkomaa haa o hokka mo haa goɗɗo feere. To naa non, fodde Tawreeta Muusa, o mbareteeɗo ngam o anndi, an mari laawol ɓaŋgugo ɓiɗɗo maako dow goɗɗo feere. Nan deerɗiraawo am: Diga hannde asiri, min bee Raguyel min ngaɗan sawari dow paanyo debbo, min kaɓɓan teegal ngam ma. To en ɗon ngarta Rages, en koocan mo, en njahran mo haa maaɗa.”

Tobiyas jaabi: “Deerɗam Azariya, mi nanɗo o ɓaŋgaama bee worɓe njoweeɗiɗo ammaa ɓe maayi fuu nder suudu waaleteendu. Jemma nii, nde ɓe ngiɗi hawtugo bee debbo man, fuu ɓe maayi. Yimɓe feere mbi'i yam ginnawol mbari ɓe.

Ngam maajum kulol naŋngi yam. Walaa ko ginnawol waɗata paanyo debbo, ammaa ngol mbaran gorko fuu, giɗɗo hawtugo bee maako. Mi ɓiɗɗo bajjo, to mi maayi, saaro'en am cunoto, suno man mbaran ɓe. Walaa boo ɓiɗɗo feere mo uwata ɓe.”
Rafayel wi'i fahin: “A yejjiti ko baaba ma wi'i ma debbo caka banndiraaɓe ma ɓaŋgata na? Nan deerɗam: Taa hul ginnawol ngo'ol, ɓaŋ Saraatu. Fakat, ɓe ndokkete mo hannde jemma.
Ammaa to a nasti suudu ɓaŋaaɗo ma, wa'tu tayre heŋre e ɓernde liiŋgu dow ƴulɓere sarado. Ginnawol luuɓnan uureeŋgol man, nden ngol doggan. Ɓe ngi'ataa ngol fahin kommbi maako.

Hiddeko on kawta, on ɗiɗo fuu on ummo tawon, on tora Jawmiraawo mo asama. On tora haa o enɗa on, o ayna on. Taa hul Saraatu taaskitinaaɗo ngam ma diga ɓooyma, an boo a hisnan mo. O yahdan bee ma, fakat a heɓan ɓikkoy bee maako, a yiɗan koy masin, taa hul, useni!”
Nde Tobiyas nani bolle Rafayel no Saraatu o banndiiko, o fuɗɗi yiɗugo mo bee ɓernde maako fuu.

Nde ɓe njotti Ekbatan, Tobiyas wi'i malaa'ikaajo: “Azariya, deerɗam, ɗoftam law haa Raguyel deerɗiraawo meeɗen.” Malaa'ikaajo yahri mo haa Raguyel. Ɓe tawi mo o ɗon jooɗi haa yolnde maako, ɓe aarti ɓe koofni mo. Raguyel jaabi ɓe: “Allah hokka on hayru, soobiraaɓe am. On njaɓɓaama.” O nastini ɓe nder saare.
O wi'i debbo maako Edna: “Sukaajo oo nanndi ceh bee banndiraawo am Tobit!”
Edna ƴami ɓe: “Soobiraaɓe am, toy iwɗon? Minin min Isra'iila'en lenyol Neftali dahaaɓe haa Niniwe.”
O ƴami fahin: “On anndi Tobit, banndiraawo amin na?” Ɓe mbi'i mo: “Ooho min anndi mo.”
“O jamo na?” Ɓe mbi'i mo: “O jamo”. Tobiyas ɓesdi: “O baaba am!”
Nden law Raguyel ummi, hebbi mo, ɗon woya. O wi'i mo: “Allah barkiɗine ɓiŋngel am! Baaba ma o booɗɗo! Ee mettuɗum, goɗɗo adiliijo e caahiiɗo nii laati bumɗo!” O hebbi Tobiyas, o woyi fahin.
Edna, debbo maako, Saraatu ɓiɗɗo maako boo mboyi daliila Tobit.
Nden Raguyel hoo'i njawdiri nder tokkere maako, hirsi ndi ngam jaɓɓaago hoɗɓe maako.
Ɓe ngiiwi, ɓe ceni fodde al'aadaaji maɓɓe, nden ɓe puɗɗi nyaamgo. Tobiyas wi'i Rafayel: “Deerɗam Azariya, ƴamanam Raguyel, Saraatu denɗiraawo am.”

Raguyel nani ɗum, o wi'i suka: “Nyaam, yar, hiiru booɗɗum tawon. Deerɗam, walaa goɗɗo feere haani ɓaŋga ɓiɗɗo am Saraatu sey an. Mi waawataa hokkugo mo goɗɗo feere sey an, ngam an woni banndiraawo ɓurɗo ɓadaago yam. Ammaa sey mi wi'e gooŋga:
Mi meeɗi te'nugo mo haa deerɗiraaɓe Isra'iila'en njoweeɗiɗo, ɓe maayi ɓe fuu nder jemmaare nde ɓe ngiɗi hawtugo bee maako. Bee maajum fuu, nyaam, yar: Jawmiraawo hooynan ɗum.”

Ammaa Tobiyas jaabi: “Aa'a, mi nyaamataa, mi yarataa koo ɗume haa ɗo, sey to a jaabi dow haala man.” Raguyel jaabi: “Nonnon, mi waɗan ɗum. Mi hokki ma Saraatu fodde Tawreeta Muusa. Jaɓ mo o debbo ma, Allah hokki ma mo. Diga jonta o debbo ma, an boo a goriiko. O debbo ma diga hannde haa foroy. Jawmiraawo mo asama ayna on jemmaare nde'e ɓiŋngel am. O woonana on, o hokka on jam.”

Nden Raguyel ewni ɓiɗɗo maako Saraatu. Nde o yotti, o naŋngi juŋngo maako, o ɗofti mo haa Tobiyas, o wi'i mo: “Jaɓ mo, o debbo ma fodde Tawreeta Muusa! Hoocu mo, yahru mo jam haa saare baaba ma. Jawmiraawo mo asama ɗofta on, hokka on hayru.”
Nden o ewni debbo maako, o wi'i mo o wadda ko haani ngam winndugo. O winndi alkawal teegal. Ndaa ngal: “Raguyel te'ni Tobiyas Saraatu ɓiyum fodde Tawreeta Muusa”. Nden ɓe nyaami, ɓe njari.
Raguyel ewni debbo muuɗum Edna: “Wo'itin suudu waaleteendu ɗiɗaɓru, nden a yahra ɓiɗɗo meeɗen debbo nder maaru.”
Edna dilli, wo'iti leeso nder suudu waaleteendu bana o wi'no mo. O ɗofti ɓiɗɗo maako, o woyi daliila maako. Nden o woosti gonɗi maako, o wi'i:
“Tiɗɗin ɓernde ma, ɓiŋngel am! Jawmiraawo mo asama waylita suno maaɗa bee seyo. Tiɗɗin ɓernde ma, ɓiŋngel am!” Nden o wurti.
Nde ɓe timmini nyaamgo e yargo, ɓe ngiɗi waalaago. Ɓe njahri suka nder suudu waaleteendu.
Tobiyas siftori bolle Rafayel, o losi nder booro maako heŋre e ɓernde liiŋgu, o wa'ti ɗum dow ƴulɓere sarado.
Uureeŋgol liiŋgu farti ginnawol, ngol doggi nder henndu haa Misra. Rafayel tokki ngol, naŋngi ngol, haɓɓi ngol law bee callalluuji.
Nde saaro'en ndilli, ɓe maɓɓi suudu waaleteendu. Tobiyas ummi dow leeso, wi'i Saraatu: “Umma, debbo am giɗaaɗo, sey en ngaɗa do'a, en toro Jawmiraawo, o enɗa en, o ayna en.”

Saraatu ummi, ɓe puɗɗi toraago Jawmiraawo ngam o ayna ɓe. Ndaa ko Tobiyas wi'i nder tornde muuɗum: “Yettoore woodani ma, Allah mo kaakiraaɓe amin. Koo moy maŋgta innde ma nder zamanuuji garanɗi! Tagle haa asama e dow lesdi fuu maŋgte haa foroy!
A tagi Aadama, a hokki mo Hawwa, debbo maako, haa o walla mo e ɓe njogotira. Haa maɓɓe ɓiɓɓe Aadama fuu iwi. An wi'i: Ɗum wooɗaay haa neɗɗo wona feere mum. Mi waɗanan mo balloowo, pottananɗo mo.
Jonta, Jawmiraawo, naa ngam suuno mi ɓaŋi debbo oo, ammaa ngam gooŋgaaku heedi ma. Yurmin mo e yurminam min boo, waɗ min njooɗodo haa foroy haa min naywida.”
Ɓe ɗiɗo fuu ɓe mbi'i hawtaade: “Aamiina, aamiina!”
Nden ɓe mbaali.
Yeeso seɗɗa, Raguyel ummi, ewni huuwooɓe mum ngam wasgo yenaande, ngam o numi: “To suka maayi, yimɓe njalan, ɓe kuɗan min.”
Nde ɓe timmini wasgo yenaande, Raguyel warti saare, o ewni debbo maako
o wi'i mo: “Nel korɗo nder suudu waaleteendu, o laara to Tobiyas ɗon bee yoŋki. To o maayi en uwa mo, taa goɗɗo annda ɗum sam.”
Ɓe maatini korɗo, ɓe ndokki mo pittirlayel kuɓɓaaŋgel, ɓe maɓɓiti parewal. Korɗo nasti, tawi ɗiɗo fuu nder ɗoyŋgol tedduŋgol.
O wurti, o anndini ɓe: “O geeto, sey jam!”
Nden Raguyel yetti Allah mo asama, wi'i: “A maŋgteteeɗo Allah am, laaɓa-ɓerɗe'en fuu maŋgtete, maŋgtoore woodani ma haa foroy!
Mi ɗon maŋgte ngam a seyni yam masin, ko kulanmi laataaki. A yurmini min fodde yurmeende ma ɗuuɗnde.
A maŋgteteeɗo ngam a yurmini ɓiɓɓe ɗiɗo gorko e debbo wajjuɓe ɓe'e. Jawmiraawo, mo'an ɓe e aynu ɓe. Hebbin ngeendam maɓɓe bee seyo e mo'ere maaɗa.”
Raguyel wi'i huuwooɓe muuɗum, ɓe maɓɓa yenaande.
Raguyel ƴami debbo muuɗum defana mo nyaamdu ɗuuɗndu. O suɓti na'i ɗiɗi, jawɗi nayi nder tokkere maako, defooɓe taki ɗum. Nii ɓe puɗɗiri taaskara ɓaŋgal.
Raguyel ewni Tobiyas, wi'i mo: “Nder balɗe sappo e nayi, a dillataa. A jooɗoto haa saare am ngam nyaamgo e yargo, a seynan ɓiɗɗo am debbo, ngam o yarno boneeji ɗuuɗɗi!

Nden mi hokkete reeta maral am, a hooran ɗum jam haa baaba ma. To min maayi, min e debbo am, on keɓan reeta jawdi am luttundi boo. Tiɗɗin ɓernde ma, ɓiŋngel am! Min e debbo am Edna saaro'en maaɗa, min kaɓɓi amaana bee maaɗa e bee debbo ma diga jonta haa foroy. Tiɗɗin ɓernde ma, ɓiŋngel am!”
Nden Tobiyas ewni Rafayel, wi'i mo:
“Deerɗam Azariya, hoocu huuwooɓe nayo bee geelooɗi ɗiɗi, dillu haa Rages haa Gabayel. Hokku mo bataakewol ngol ɓe ngaɗi juŋngo dow muuɗum, haa o lornane ceede. Nden wardu bee Gabayel haa ɓaŋgal.
A anndi baaba am ɗon lima nyalɗe luttuɗe. To mi ɓurni nyalaade woore, ɗum suklan mo jamum. Ammaa nde Raguyel huni o accataa yam mi dilla, min kam, mi waawataa ƴaɓɓaago hunayeere maako.”

Rafayel dilli haa Rages nder lesdi Mediya bee huuwooɓe nayo e geelooɗi ɗiɗi, ɓe mbaali haa Gabayel. Rafayel hokki mo bataakewol, anndini mo no Tobiyas ɓii Tobit ɓaŋgri e no o waɗani mo mbaataŋga. Law Gabayel dilli limgo boorooji ceede bee kalagaaje, ɓe mba'ini ɗum dow geelooɗi.
